Text: Abraham suan: David suan Jesu Kris khangthu bu:
Abrahamin Issak a suanga; Isaakin Jakob a suanga; Jakobin Juda leh anaute a suanga;
Judain Tamar lakah Piriz leh Zira a suanga; Pirizin Erom a suanga; Eromin Aram a suanga
Aramin Aminadab a suanga, Aminadabin Nasen a suanga; Nasenin Salmon a suanga;
Salmonin Rahab lakah Boaz a suanga; Boazin Ruthi lakah Obed a suanga; Obedin Jessai a suanga.
Jessaiin kumpipa David a suang. Huan kumpipa Davidin Uria ji lakah Solomon a suanga
Solomonin Rehoboam a suanga, Rehoboamin Abija a suanga, Abijain Asa a suanga;
Asain Jehosaphet a suanga Jehosaphetin Jeram a suanga, Jeramin Uzzia a suanga
Uzzianin Jotham a suanga; Jothamin Ahaz a suanga; Ahazin Hezekia a suanga;
Hezekianin Manassi a suanga; Manassiin Amon a suanga; Amonin Josia a suanga;
Babulon lama sala a pi lai un Josiain Jekonia leh a unaute a suang.
Huan, Babulon lama sala a pi nung un Jekoniain Salathiel a suanga; Salathielin Zerubbabel a suanga;
Zerubabelin Abiud a suanga; Abiudin Eliakim a suanga;
Eliakimin Azer a suanga; Azerin Zadok a suanga, Zadokin Akim a suanga, Akimin Eluid a suanga;
Eliudin Eleazar a suanga, Eleazarin Mathan a suanga, Mathanin Jakob a suanga;
Jakobin Joseph, Mari pasal a suanga; huai Mari lakah, Jesu Kris kichi a hong piangta.

Huchiin suan tengteng tuh Abraham apat David chiang suan sawm leh suan li ahi, David apat Babulon lama sala a pi tan un, suan sawm leh suan li ahi, Babulon lama sala a pi ua pat Kris tan suan sawm leh suan li ahi.
Huan, Jesu Kris hongpian dan tuh hichibang ahi; A nu Mari Joseph toh a kikham lai ua a omkhawm ma un, Kha Siangthouin a gaisak chih a natheita ua.
Huchiin, a pasal Joseph tuh, mi diktak ahi a, amah daisak a ut het keia, a gukin tawpsan a tum.
Himahleh, huai thute a ngaihtuah laiin, ngaiin, a mangin Toupa angel a kiangah a hong kilaka, Joseph, nang David tapa, na ji Mari neih lau ken, a nau pai Kha Siangthou laka ahi,
Tapa a nei dia, a min dingin Jesu na sa ding, aman a mite a khelhna ua kipan a hotdam ding jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, TOUPAN jawlnei kama.

Ngai in, nungak siangthou a gai dia, tapa a nei dia, a min dingin Immanuel a sa ding uh. chia a nagen a hongtun theihna dingin huai tengteng tuh a hongom hi. Huai tuh, i kiang uah, Pathian a om, chihna ahi.
Huchiin, Joseph ihmu lai a thoukhia a, Toupa angel in a kianga thu a piak bangin a hiha, a ji tuh a neita a;
Himahleh, tapa a neih masiah a kithuahpih kei; huan, a min dingin Jesu a sata.
Huan, kumpipa Herod a lal laia, Judia gama, Bethlehem khuaa Jesu a hongpianin, ngaiin, suahlam a kipan mi pilte Jerusalem khua ah a hongpai ua.
Koiah ahia Judate Kumpipa hongpian? suahlam ah a aksi ka mu ua, amah be dia hongpai ka hi uh, a chi ua.
Huan kumpipa Herodin huai a jak phetin a lungjing a, Jerusalemte tengteng leng a lung uh a jing sam ua.
Huchiin, siampu liante leh mite laigelhmite tengteng a sam khawm a, Kris pianna ding tuh a dinga.
Huan, amau tuh a kiangah Judia gama Bethlehem khua ah; hichiin jawlneiin a gelh a kei hiam.
Nang, Judia gama Bethlehem aw, Judia khopite lakah na neupen kei hial, Na sung akipana ukpa hongsuak ding ahi ngala, ka mi Israelte vengpa dingin, chih, a chi ua
Huai nungin Herodin a gukin mi pilte tuh a sama, ngentel takin aksi kilat lai a dong kheta a.
Huan, amau tuh Bethlehem khua ah a paisaka, Pai ta unla, naungek thu ngentel takin dong khia un, huan ken leng amah ka hongbiak theih samna dingin, na muh tak un, honghilh un, a chi a.
Huan, kumpipa thu a jak un; a aptta ua; huan ngaiin suahlama aksi a muh uh naunek omna tung jawn a tuna a khawl masiah a ma uah a paizel a.
Huan, aksi tuh amuh un, a kipak lo mahmah ua
Huan, in sungah a valut ua, a nu Mari kianga naungek tuh a mu ua, a bok, a bia ua; huan a gou bawm khawng uh a hong ua, a kiangah kipahna dangkaengte, begawte, murrate a lan ua.
Huan, Herod kianga kik nawnlou dingin a mang ua vauhilhna a om jiak un, amau kho lamah lam tuam ah a paita uh.

Huan, a pai nung un, ngaiin, Toupa angel Joseph kiangah a mangin a kilaka, Thou inla; naungek leh a nu pi inla, Aigupta gamah taimang in, kon hilh nawn masiah huailaiah om gige in; Herodin naungek hihmang dia zong ding a hih jiakin, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a jan ajanin naungek leh a nu a pi a, Aigupta gamah a paita a.
Huan, Herod sih mateng haulai ah a om gige a; Toupan jawlnei kama, Ka tapa tuh Aigupta gam apat ka sam khia, chia a gen tuh a hongtun theihna dingin.

Huchihlaiin Herodin mi pilte khem a hih a kitheih tak in a heh mahmah a, mi a sawla, a hun lai tak thu ngentel taka mi pilte a dot khiak bangin, Bethlehem khua leh a kim tengtenga pasal naupang kum nih chiang nuai lam tuh a vek un a that a.
Huchihlaiin jawlnei Jeremiain
Rama khua ah husa a ja uh, kah khang, misi ngaia mau vengvung khawng, Rakelin a tate a kah a, a om nawn louh jiak un a khamuan theih kei, chia a gen tuh a hongtung ta.
Himahleh Herod a sih nungin, ngaiin, Toupa angel Aigupta gamah Joseph kiangah a mangin a kilaka.
Thou inla, naungel leh a nu pi inla, Israel gamah pai in; naungel thah tumte a sihtak jiak un, a chi a.
Huchiin a thou a, naungek leh a nu tuh a pi a, Israel gamah a lut taa.
Himahleh, Arkelausi a pa Herod sikin Judia gamah a lal chih a jakin, huai lama pai a lauta a; huan a manga vauhilha a om jiakin Galili lamah a paita a;
Nazaret kichi khua khatah a va omta a; Amah jaw Nazaret mi a chi ding uh, chia jawlneite nagen a hongtun theihna dingin.
Huan, huchihlaiin Baptispa Johanin,
Kisik un! van gam a naita, chiin, Judia gamdai ah thu genin a hongpai a.
Amah ahi, jawlnei Isaiin. Gamdaia mi kikou awin, Toupa lamlian sial unla a lampi khawng bawl tang un, a chi, chia a nagen.
Huan, huai Johanin sangawngsaw mul puan a silha, a kawng savun kawnggakin a gaka, a an tuh khaukhup leh khuaiju ahi.
Huchihlaiin Jerusalem khuate, Judia gamte tengteng, Jordan lui dung kim khawng ate tengteng a hongpai khia ua,
a kianglamah a pai ua, a khelhna uh thupha tawiin Jordan lui ah amah kiangah Baptisma a tang ua.
Himahleh, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite tampi amah baptisma tang dinga hongpai a muh takin, a kiang uah, Gul suante! hehna hongtung ding taisan dingin kuan honthuhilh a?
Huchiin kisikna toh kilawm gah honsuang khia un;
Abraham ka pu uh ahi, chiin, kingaihtuah kei un, Pathianin hiai suangte khawng Abraham suantein a dingsak thei hi, ka honchi ahi.
Tua kipanin heipi sing bul tengah a koih ta uh; huchiin, sing chih gah hoiha gah lou peuhpeuh a phuk ua, mei ah a pai lut jel uh.

Ken jaw kisikna dingin tui in ka honbaptis ngei a, himahleh, amah ka nunga hong pai tuh keimah sangin a thupijaw a, a khedap tawi tak leng ka hi kei, Aman jaw Kha Siangthou leh meiin noute a hon baptis ding.
A khutin phazah a tawia, a phual a jap siang sipsip ding a, buhpang ah a buh a sung ding, a si bel mei mit theilouin a hal mang ding, a chi a.
Huchihlaiin a kianga baptisma tang dingin Jesu Galili gam akipan Jordan luiah Johan kiangah a hongpai a.
Johan in bel, Nang kei na honbaptis kiphamoh zopia, ka kiangah na hongzosop ahi maw? chiin, kham a tum a.
Himahleh, Jesun a akiangah, Tuin lemsak teitei in, hichi banga diktatna tengteng hihtangtun ei adia kilawm hi, chiin, a dawnga. Huchiin lem a sata a.
Huan, Jesu baptisma a tan takin tui a kipanin a pawt pah ngala, huan, ngaiin, amah adingin van ahong kihonga, Pathian Kha tuh vakhu banga hongsukin, a tunga hongtu a mu a.
Huan, ngaiin, vana kipanin aw, in, Hiai ka Tapa deih tak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi, a chi a.
Huaikhitin Jesu tuh diabol khema om dingin gamdai ah Kha pi lutin a omta a.
Huan, ni sawmli leh jan sawmli an a ngolh nungin a gil a hongkialta a
Huan, khempa tuh a hongpaia, a kiangah, Pathian Tapa na hih leh hiai suangte tanghou suak dingin thu pe ve, a chi a,
Himahleh, aman, Mihing tanghou kiain a hong kei dinga, Pathian kama thu chin pawtin a hing zo ding. chih gelh ahi, chiin a dawnga
Huaizoh in, diabolin kho siangthou ah a pi luta, Pathian biakin tungzum ah a koiha
Huan a kiangah Pathian Tapa na hih lei kikesakin; Na tung thu ah jaw a ngelte thu a pe dinga, a khut un hondom ding ua, huchilou injaw na khein suang na sui khading. chih gelh ahi ngala, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Toupa na Pathian zeet ken, chih gelh ahi sam hi, a chi a
Huan, diabolin tangsang takah a pi nawna, khovel gam tengteng leh a thupina a ensak a.
Huan, a kiangah Khupbohin honbe lechin, hiai tengteng ka honpe ding a chi a.
Huaitakin Jesun a kiangah, Setan, hia kipanin pai mangin, Toupa na Pathian na biak dinga amah na kia na sep ding ahi chih gelh ahi, a chi a.
Huaizohin diabolin a paisanta a Huan ngaiin angelten amah na hongsek sak uh.
Huan Johan a man uh chih Jesun ajak phetin, Galili lamah a kihemkhia a
Huan, Nazaret khua a paisan a, Kapernaum khua ah a om nilouh a, huai tuh Zebulun leh Nephtali uka, dil geia om ahi,
Jawlnei Isai kama
Dil lama, Jordan gala, Zebulun gam leh Nephtali gam, Jentelte Galili
mial nuaia tuten vak thupi a mu uh a, sihnamun leh a lim a tute tungah vak a hong suakta a, chia a gen tuh a hongtun theihna din.
Huainung siah Jesun, Kisik un! van gam a naita hi, chiin, thugen a panta a.
Huan, Galili dil geia a vak kawmin, unau nih simon Peter kichi a unau Andru toh, dil ah len paiin a mu a; nga man ni him ahi ua.
Huan, aman tuh a kiang uah, Honjui un, huchiin mihing man dingin ka honbawl ding, a chi a.
Huan lente khawng nusepahin amah a juita ua,
Huan, huailaia kipanin a pai jel a unau dang nih, Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unau Johan, a pa uh Zebedai kianga longa a lente khawng uh bawlphain a mu a; huan, amau tuh a samta a.
Huchiin, long leh a pa uh nuse pahin amah a juita ua.
Huan, Jesun a kikhopna in khawng ua hilhin, gam Tanchin Hoih tuh genin, mite laka natna chiteng leh hatlouhna chiteng hihdamin Galili gam tengteng ah a pai vialvial a.
Huan, Suria gam tengtengah a tanchin a thangta a; huchiin, mi damlou tengteng dam louhna leh natna chih thuakte, dawi matte, kaihveite, jawte, a kiangah a honpi ua, a na hihdamta a.
Galili gam akipan, Dekapoli kua akipan, Jerusalem leh Judia akipan leh Jordan gal akipan bangin mipi tampi takin amah a jui uh.
Huchiin, mipite tuh a muhin tangah a pai tou a, huan, a tu a, a nungjuite a kiangah a hongpai ua; huan thu a gen a,
amau thu a hilh a:
Lungsima gentheite a hampha uh van gam amaua ahi ngala.
Lungkhamte a hampha uh; khamuan a om ding ahi ngal ua
Thunuailutte a hampha uh; lei gou luah ding ahi ngal ua.
Diktatna lunggulha gilkiala dangtak te a humpha uh; tai ding ahi ngal ua.
Zahngai theite a hampha uh; zahngaihna mu ding ahi ngal ua.
Lungsima siangthoute a hampha uh; Pathian mu ding ahi ngal ua.
Lemna bawlte a hampha uh; Pathian tate chih ding ahi ngal ua.
Diktakna jiak a sawina thuakte a hampha uh, van gam a maua ahi ngal a.
Min keima jiaka hontai ua, a hon sawi ua, juaua gilou chitenga a honhek hun chiangun, na hampha uh.
Kipak unla, nakpitakin nuam un; van ah na kipahman uh a thupi ngala: tuamah bangin na ma ua jawlnei omte leng a nasawi nak uhi.
Lei chi na hi uh: himahleh chi peng leh, bangin ahia a kihih-al nawn ding? Paihkhiaka mihingte chil gawpgawp lou ngal dingin, bangmah din a phatuam kei.
Khovel vakna na hi uh. Tang tunga kho om selguk theih ahi kei.
Min khawnvak dein loh nuai ah a koih ngei kei uh. a koihna ah a koih jaw uh. Huchiin in sunga mi om tengteng atan hi
Huchimah bangin, na vak uh mi mit muh dingin vak hen, huchiin na thilhih hoihte uh a mu ding ua, na Pa uh vana om a pahtawi thei ding uh.
Dan thu hiam, jawlneite thu hiam hihmang dinga hongpai ka hih um kei un; hihmang dinga hongpai ka hi kei, hih tangtung dinga hongpai ka hi jaw.
Chih taktakin ka honhilh ahi, lei leh van a man masiah dan thua sut vom neu chik hiam, thai vom neu chik hiam, khat leng a mang keihial ding, a veka atun kim masiah uh.

Huchiin, kuapeuh hiai thupiak neupente laka a khat lel leng jui lou a, tuabanga hih dia mite thuhilh peuhmah, van gamah mi neupen a kichi ding hi; ahihhangin, kuapeuhmah juia thuhilh behlap tuh, van gamah mi lian a kichi ding hi.
Na diktatna un laigelhmite leh Pharisaite diktatna a khup ken jaw van gamah na lut kei hial ding uh chih ka honhilh ahi.
Nidang laia mite kianga, Tual na that ding ahi kei, kichi leh, kuapeuh tualthat tuh vaihawmnaa din lauhthawnhuai takin a om ding uh, ki chi na zata uh;

Ken jaw, Kuapeuh a unau tunga heh tuh vaihawmnaa din lauhthawnhuai tak in a om ding; huan kuapeuh a unau selphou tuh vaihawmmite hawmsaka om lauthawnhuai takin a om ding; huan, kuapeuh, Nang mihai chi tuh, Gehenna meia paih lauhthawnhuai takin a om ding uh chih ka honhilh ahi.
Huai jiakin, maitam bula na thilpiak na lat lel laia na unauin na tungah lunghihlouhna a nei chih na thei khiak leh.
Huai maitam ma ah na thilpiak tuh nusia inla, pai inla na unau kilempih phot inla huan na thilpiak lan in.

Na langpa tuh vaihawmnain juana lampia na pai khawm lai un lem zok in, huchilou in jaw na langpan thukhenmi khut ah honpe dia, thukhenmin mimanpa kiangah a honpe dia; suangkulh ah a honkhum kha ding uh.
chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, Paihsasan khat nangawn na piak kim masiah huailaia kipanin na pawt khe kei hilhial ding.
Ang na kawm ding ahi kei, kichi na jata uh. Ken jaw,
Kuapeuh numei khelhpih utna toh en tuh, a lungsimin ang a kawm khinta chih ka hinhilh ahi.
Huan, na mit taklamin a honhihpuk leh, khel khia inla, pai mai in, na sapumpi a puma Gehenna a pai sangin na sapuma ka khat manthat nanga dingin a hoih hi.
Huan, na khut taklamin a honhihpuk leh, tan inla, pai mai in; na sapumpi a puma Genhenna a pai sangin, na sapum a ka khat manthat nanga dingin a hoih jaw hi.
Kuapeuh zi main kimakna lai a kiangah pia heh, leng a kichi.
Ken jaw kuapeuh tangval ngaih jiak hi lou a, zi main amah tuh angkawmsak ahi, huan, kuapeuh maksa nung nei tuh angkawm ahi chih ka honhilh ahi.
Nidanglaiin mite kiangah, Juauin kichiam kenla, Toupa kiangah na kichiam nate tuh tangtun jawin, a kichi chih leng na zata uh.
Ken jaw, ka honhilh ahi, Chiam himhim kichiam kei un; van louin kichiam kei un, huai tuh Pathian laltutphah ahi ngala; lei louin kichiam sam kei un, huai tuh a khe ngakna ahi ngal a.
Jerusalem louin kichiam sam kei un, huai tuh Kumpipa thupitak khopi ahi ngala.
Na lu louin na kichiam ding ahi sam kei, sam zang khat leng na hihngouin, na hihdum thei ngal kei a.
Na thugen uh, A hi, ahi. Hi lou, hilou, hi vanglak heh; a kan a val jaw gitlouhna laka suak ahi.
Mit sikin mit, ha sikin ha a kichi chih na zata uh.
Ken jaw ka honhilh ahi. Mi gilou nang kei un; na biang taklam bengte tuh, a lehlam leng doh jaw un.
Huan kuapeuhin na lakah thusia bawlin, na puannak lak a tup leh, na puanja leng lasak ngal in.
Huan mel khat pai dia honphut teitei kiangah mel nih paisak in.
A honngen kiangah pia inla, na laka leitawi nuam tuh kiheisan ken.
Na vengte it inla, na melmate hua in, a kichi chih na zata uh.
Ken jaw ka honhilh ahi, na melmate uh it unla, a honsawite thum sak un;
na Pa uh vana om tate na hih theihna ding un, aman tuh migiloute leh mi hoihte tungah a ni a suak saka, mi diktatte leh diktatloute tungah leng vuah a zu sak.
Nou honitte kia na it un, kipahman bang ahia na muh ding un? siahkhonmiten leng huchihbangin a hihsam kei ua ahia?
Huan, na unaute kia uh chibai na buk un bang na hih tam tuan ua ahia? Jentelten leng hichi bangin a hih sam kei ua hia?
Huchiin, na Pa uh vana om a hoih kim sipsip bangin na hoih kim sipsip ding uh ahi.
Na thil hoih hihte uh mi muh dingin, mihing mitmuha hihlou dingin pilvang un; huchilouin jaw na Pa uh vana om kiangah kipahman na neikei ding uh.

Huchinin, mi kianga thilpiak na piakin, mi lepchiahten mi phat a loh theihna ding ua. kikhopna in khawng, kongzing khawnga a hih nak bang un na ma ah pengkul mut ken. Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi. A kipahman uh a mu ta uh.
Nang jaw mi kianga thilpiak napiakin, na khut taklamin a hih na khut veilamin thei dah heh.
Na thilpiak tuh a guka a om theihna din: huchiin na Pa a guka mupan tuh a hondin ding hi.

Huan, na thum chiangun, mi lepchiah te bangin na hih ding uh ahi kei; min a muh theihna ding un, kikhopnain bangah kongzing kathuam laitak bangah ding kawmin thum a uttuan sese uh. Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, a kipahman uh a muta uh.
Nang jaw na thumin, na dantan sunggil ah lut inla, na kong khak inla, na Pa a guka om kiang ah thumin huchiin napa a guka honmuin a hondin ding.
Huan, na thum un, Jentelte bangin gentuan mawkmawk kei un: a pau tam jiak ua jak a om ding a kisa uh.
Huaijiakin, amau bangin om kei un, amah na nget ma ua na Pa un bangbang ahia na khawkna uh a thei gige ngala.
Huchuun nou jaw hichibangin thum un: Ka Pa uh vana om. na min ki zahtak hen.
Na gam hongtung hen. Na deihlam vana a kihih bangin, lei ah leng kihih hen.
Tunin ka nek khop uh an honpia in.
Kabatte uh honngaidam in.. kouleng ka leibate uh ka ngaihdamtak bangun.
Khemn ah honpilut kenla, gilou lakah honhu jaw in. chiin.
Mi a tatleknate uh na ngaihdam uleh, na Pa uh vana omin leng a hongaidam sam ding.
Himahleh, mite a tatlekna uh ngaihdam kei ngal un, na Pa un na tatlekna teuh a ngaidam sam kei ding.
An na ngolh un len, mi lepchiahte bang in ngui mel po kei un: amau jaw mi mit muha an ngawla kilat theihna ding un, amai uh a gum sak nak uh ahi. chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, a kipahman uh a muta uh.
Nou jaw, an na ngolh chiangun na lu uh sathau nilh unla, na mai uh phiat unla;
huchiin, na Pa uh aguka om mitmuh ah loungal mihing mitmuh ah an ngawl na bang kei ding ua; huchiin, na Pa uh aguka mupan tuh a hondin ding.
Leia, leikha leh tuiekin a nek siatna ah, gutaten a phen vang ua gukna uah gou kikhol kei un;
van ah, leikha leh tuiekin a nek siat louhna ah, gutaten a phen ua a guk sam louhna uah, gou kikol jaw un.
Na gou omna peuh uah na lungtang u leng a om ding.
Sapum khawnvak tuh mit ahi; huchia namit a chim leh na sapum a pumin a tan suak ding.
Na mit a siat le tuh na sapum a pumin a mial khin vek ding. Huchiin na sunga vak tuh mial hileh, mial hina tel inchia.
Khuamahin heutu nih na a sem kop theikei; khat huain khat a it dinga; a hihkeileh, khat gumin khat a simmoh ding. pathian leh sum na na sem kop theikei ding uh.

Huaijiakin, ka honhilh ahi. Bang ahia ka nek ding, bang ahia ka dawn ding, chiin, na hinna thu uleh. Bang ahia ka silh ding, Bang ahia ka ten ding, chiin, na sapum thu uh lunghimoh kei un. Nek ding sang in hinna a thupi zo ka hia? Silh leh ten sangin sapum leng a thupi zo ka hia?
Tungleng vasate en un; buh a tuh kei uh, a at kei uh, buh in ah leng a sek lut sam kei uh; himahleh, na Pa uh vana omin amau a vak hi. Noute amau sangaa nakpitaka manpha jaw hilou na hi umaw?
Huan, noute lakah lunghihmoh jiaka kuan ahia amah dung lam tong khata hihsang tuan thei?
Huan; silh leh ten thu bang dinga lunghimoh na hi ua? Gamlaklili pak khandan hoihtakin ngaihtuah un; na a sem kei ua, khau leng a khek kei uh;
himahleh, ka honhilh ahi, Solomon hilhial leng athupina tengteng a akizepin hia lili pak khat phain leng zepin a om kei.
huchiin, gamlak loupa, tuni banga hinga, a jinga thuka khul mai ding bawn Pathianin huchi lawmlawma a zep in tuh, aw nou gintawnte, silh leh ten honpe zo tham lou ding hia?
Huchiin. Bang ahia i nek ding, ahikeileh. Bang ahia i dawn ding? ahihkei leh. Banga ahia i dawn ding? a hihkeileh, Bangsilin ahia i om dingm hiam chiin lunghimoh ken un.
Jentelten huai tenteng a zong uhi. Huai tengteng na khawk uh chih na Pa uh van a omin a thei gige hi.
A gam leh a diktatna tuh zong masa jaw un, huchiin huai teng tuh a honpiak behlap ding hi.
Huchiin, a jiinga ding lunghimoh keiun, a jingin amah a ding a kilunghimoh tawm ding jiakin. Nikhatading in ni khat gimthuak a hun hi.
Hawmsak kei un, hawmsak na hih louhna ding un.
Na hawmsak bangmahin hawmsakin na omding uh, na tehna ngei mah un a hontehsak nawn ding uh.
Huan bangdia, nangmah mita singtum om ngaihtuah loua, na unau mita nin neng neu chik mu na hia?
Bang chin na unau kiangah. Namita kipanin huai nin neng neu chik honla khesak ve, na chih theih ding? Ngaiin, nangmah mit mahmah ah singtum a om nilouh ngala.
Milepchiah: na mit a kipan singtum la khe masa in; huchiin na unau mita kipan nin neng neu chik lak khiakding ki chiantakin na mu thei ding.
Ui kiang ah thil siiangthou pe kei un; vok maah na tuikepsuang uh leng pai kei un, a chilse kha ding ua, huan, kiheiin a honbaljak khading uh.
Ngen un. piakin na om ding uhi, zongin na muding uh; kiu un, a honhon ding uhi;
kuapeuh a ngenin a mu ua; kuapeuh a zongin a mu ua; kuapeuh a kiu tuh honin a om ding uhi.
Ahihleh, nou khawng, kuapeuh na tapa un tanghou honngen taleh, kuan suang na pe ding ua?
Ahihleh, ngasa hongen taleh, kuan gul na pe ding ua?
Huchihileh, nou migilou inbawn, na tate uh thil hoih piak nadan na theih un, na Pa uh vana omin a ngente thil hoih pe zo semsem lou ding hia?
Huaijiakin, thil bangkim min na tung ua a hih ua na deih ding bang uh, mi tungah leng hih sam un; huaituh dan thu leh jawlneite thu ahi him ahi.
Kong kochik ah lut un; manthatnaa paina kong tuh a ja a, a lam leng a lian ngala, huai lam a lut tuh tam leng a tam mahmah uh;
hinna a paina kong a kochik a a lam leng a neua, a mute leng tawm chik ahi uh.
Jawlnei takloute lakah pilvang un, huaite tuh belam vun silhin na kianguah a hongpai nak ua, a sung lam uah lah nge duhgawl pipi ahi ngal ua.
A mau tuh a gah uah na thei ding uh. Khaulingnei gui ah grep gah a lou ngei ua hia?
Lenling ah leng theipi a lou ngei ua hia? Huchi mahbangin sing hoih peuhmah a gah hoih naka; sing sia tuh a gah se nak.
Sing hoih a gah se theikei, sing sia lah a gah hoih thei sam kei.
sing chih gah hoih lou peuh tuh a phuk ua mei ah a pai uh.
Huajiakin amau tuh a gah uah na thei mai ding uh.
Toupa, Toupa, nonchi napeuh van gamah a lut kei ding uh; ka Pa vana om deihlam hihte tuh a lut ding uh
Huai ni chiangin mi tampiin, Toupa, na minin thute ka gen ua, na minin dawite ka delh khia un, na minin thil lamdang tampi ka hih jel uh hi lou hiam? a chi ding ua.
Huai hun chiangin, Nou thil gilou hihte aw, ka honthei ngei kei, ka kianga kipanin paimang in, chiin, amau ka hilh ding.
Huchiin, mi chih hiai ka thu ja a, jawm peuh tuh, mi pil suangpi tunga in lam mi toh ka teh ding ahi.
Vuah a hongju a, tui a hong khanga, huih a hongnunga, huai in tuh a honmut jialjiala; himahleh a chim keia; suangpi tunga lep kip a hih jiakin.
Huan, mi chih, hiai ka thu jaa jawm lou peuh tuh, mihai piaunel tung lela in lammi toh ka teh ding ahi.
Vuah a hongju a tui a hongkhanga, huih a hongnunga, huai in tuh a honmut jialjiala; a chimta huai tuh a nak chip ngei hi, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Jesun huai thu a gen zoh takin, mipin a thuhilh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah ua
Laigelhmite bang lou a, thuneihna nei bang taka amaute thu a hilh jiakin.
Huan, tanga kipana a hongpai suk nungin mipi thupitakin amah a juita ua,
Huan, ngaiin, a kiangah phak a hongpai a, Toupa, na ut leh na honhih siangthou thei hi, chiin, chibai a buk a.
Huan, Jesun a sawka, a khoih a, Ka ut hi, na siangthouta in, a chi a. Huan, thakhatin a phak tuh a hongsiangthou pah ngala.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Kuamah hilhlou dingin pilvang in, ahihhangin siampu kiangah vakilak inla, Mosiin thilpiak ding a chihte lan in a theihchet na ding un, a chi a.
Huan, Kapernaum khua a lut in, a kiangah sepaihzaheutu a hongpai a
Toupa, ka naupang jawin in ah a lum maimaha, nakpitaka hihnatin a om a, chiin hahtangpiin a ngena.
Huan, aman tuh akiangah, Ka ongpai dia, ka hihdam ding, a chi a.
Huan, sepaihzaheutun, Toupa, ka in sung na lutna tak ahi kei, thu kia gen lechin, ka naupang a dam na ding.

Kei leng mi thu a om ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte a om ua, nang, Pai in, ka chihleh, a pai jel; mi dang kiangah len, Nang hongpai aw, ka chih leh, a hongpai jel; ka sikha kiangah leng, Hiai hih in, ka chih leh, a hih jel, chiin a dawnga.
Huan, Jesun huai thu a jakin lamdang a sa a, amah juite kiangah, Chihtaktakin, ka honhilh ahi, Israelte lakah leng hichitela ginna thupi ka mu kei.
Ka honhilh ahi, Suahlam leh tumlam apat mi tampi a hongpai ding ua, van gamah Abrahamte, isaakte, Jakobte kiangah a tu ding ua;
gam tate jaw polam mialah paihkhiakin a om ding uh; huai ah tuh kah leh hagawi a om ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun sepaihzaheutu kiangah, Paita in; na gin bangin na tungah hongtung heh, a chi a. Huchiinm naupang a hongdamta.
Huan, Jesu tuh Peter in ah a lut a, a ji nu tuh khosika lum a mu a.
Huan a khut a khoihsaka, a khosik tuh a daita; huan, a thoua a na a sep sakta a.
Huan, nitaklam a honghihin a kiangah dawimatte tampi a honpi ua; huan thuin dawite tuh a delh khiaa, damlo tengteng tuh a hihdam a;
jawlnei Isaiin, Amah ngeiin, i hatlouhnate a la a, i natnate a pua a, chia a gen tuh a hongtun theihna dingin.
Huan, Jesun mipi thupitak a kima a muhin, gal khat lama pai dingin thu a pia a.
Huan, laigelhmi khat a hongpaia, a kiangah, Heutupa, na paina peuhah ka honjui ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Sehalten kua a nei ua, tungleng vasaten leng bu a nei uh, himahleh Mihing Tapain jaw a lu ngakna ding mun a neikei, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuite laka mi dangin, a kiangah, Toupa, ka pa honvui sak photin, a chi a,
Himahleh, aman tuh a kiangah, Honjui in; misiin amau misi kivui uheh, a chi a.
Huan, longah a tuanga, a nungjuiten a jui ua
Huan, ngaiin, dil ah huihpi thupi tak a hongnunga, huchin, tuikihawtin long tuh a honvuk noinoi a; amah lah a ihmu a.
Huan, a kiangah a hong pai ua, a phawng ua, Toupa, hon hondamin, mangthang ding ka kei uhiam; a chi ua.
Huan, aman tuh a kianguah, Gin tawmte aw, bangdia lau na hi ua? a chi a. Huai nungin a thou a, huihte leh dil tuh a tai a; huan a hongdai sipsipta.
Huan, miten tuh lamdang a sa mahmah ua. Hiai mi, mi bang ahia, huih leh dil nangawnin a thu a man uh? a chi ua.
Huan, gal khat lam Gadara mite gam tuh a tunin dawi mat nih, han a kipana hongpawtin, a hontuak ua; a hang mahmah ua, huchiin, huai lampi ah tuh kuamah a pai theikei uh.
Huan, ngaiin, amau tuh, PAthian Tapa, kou leh nang bang ahia i kizolhna? Hun chiam tun maa kou honggawl dia hiai a hong pai na hi maw? chiin, a kikou ua.
Huan, a omna ua kipata gamla khopah vok hon tampi a ta ua.
Huan, dawiten tuh, Na hondelh khaika leh hua vokhon sungah honlutsak in, chiin, a kiangah hahtangpiin a ngen ua.

Huan, aman tuh a kianguah, Pai ve ua, a chi a. Huchiin, a hongpawt ua, vok sung khawngah a valut ua; huan, ngaiin, vok hon tengteng tuh tuigei ken ah a tai suk ua, dil ah a tai lut ua, tui ah a mangthangta uh.
Huan, a vulte a tai ua, khua ah a pai ua, bangkim ahilhta ua, dawi matte tunga thil hongtungte khawng.
Huan, ngaiin, a khuain Jesu dawn dingin a hongpawt ua; huan amah a muh tak un a gam ua kipana pawt dingin hahtangpiin a ngen uh.
Huan longah a luta, a galkaha, amah khua a hongtungta hi.
Huan, ngaiin, mi khat zenga damlou, lupnaa lum a hon jawng ua; huchiin, Jesun a ginna uh muin, zenga damloupa kiangah, Tapa, khamuangin om in, na khelhnate ngaihdam hihen, a chi a.
Huan, ngaiin, laigelhmi kuatehiam a kingaihtuah ua, Hiai miin Pathian a gensia, chiin.
Huchiin Jesun a ngaihtuahte uh a thei a, bangdia na lung ua gilou ngaihtuah na hi ua? a chi a.
Na khelhnate ngaihdam hihen, chih leh, Thou inla, khein pai in, chih a koi a baihlam zaw
Himahleh Mihing Tapain leitung ah khelhnate ngaih dam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un, (zenga damloupa kiangah) Thouin, na lupna la inla, na inah pai in, achia.
Huchiin a thoua, a in ah a paita hi.
A hihhangin mipiin a muh un, lamdang a sa ua huchibang hihtheihna mihingte kianga pepa, Pathian a pahtawita uhi.
HUan, Jesu huai a kipanin a pai jela, siahpiakna mun a tu, mi khat, amin Matthai a mu a; huan, a kiangah, Honjui in, a chi a. Huchiin, a thou a, a juita.
Huan, hichi ahia, ina ankuang a um laiin, ngaiin, siahkhonmite leh mikhialte tampi a hongpai ua, Jesu leh a nungjuite tuh a umpih chiat ua.
Huan Pharisaiten huai a muh un, a nungjuite kiangah, bangdia na heutupa un siahkhonmite leh mikhialte kianga ne ahia? a chi ua.
Himahleh, Jesun huai a jak takin, Mi hatten daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damtheilouten a kiphamoh jaw uh.
Huchiin, Kithoihna deihlou in zahngaihna ka deih hi, chih, a omdan vazil un, mi diktatte sam dia hongpai k ahi kei, mikhialte sam dia hongpai ka hizaw, achia.
Huchih laiin Johan nungjuite a kiangah a hongpai ua, Bangdia kou leh Pharisaiten an ngawl gige a, na nungjuiten ngawl lou uh ahia? a chi ua.

Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Mou pite kianga a pasal ding a omlai teng mou piten a sun thei ua hia? Himahleh, a pasal ding tuh a kiang ua kipana pi mang nite a hongtung dinga, huai hun chiangin an a honngawl ding uh.
Huan, kuamahin puan lui puan tuikhai louh themin a thuap ngei kei uh; a thuapna dingin puan tuh a kaikek zo ding, a hong nakkek zo sem ding.

Kuamahin uain thak savun uain-thawl luiah a thun ngei kei uh; huchilou injaw savun thawlte a puak kek dia, uain, tuh a bo dia, savun-thawl leng a hongse ding; huaijiakin uain thak tuh savun uainthawl thakah a thun jaw ua, huchiin hoihtakin a om tuaktuak, a chi a.
Huan a kiang ua a gen laitakin, ngaiin, vaihawmpa khat a hongpaia, chibai a buka, Ka tanu tu takin a si a; himahleh, hongpai inla, a tungah na khut koih lechin, honghing nawn ding, achia.
Huchiin, Jesu a thoua, a juita a, nungjuiten leng a jui sam uh.
Huan, ngaiin, numei khat, kum sawm leh kum nih si pawta damlou, a nungah a hongpai a, a puan mong a khoiha;
A puan mongkia khoih lengleng, hihdamin ka om mai ding, a lungsimin a chi a.
Huan, Jesu a kihei a, amah a mu a, Ka tanu, khamuang takin om in; na ginna na dampih hi, a chi a. Huchiin, numeinu tuh huaidak a kipan a hongdamta.
Huan, Jesu vaihawmpa in ah a luta, tamngai tumte leh mipi thawmngaih vengvungte a va muhin.
Pawt un: naupang a si kei, a ihmu ahi jaw, achi a. Huan, amau tuh amah a nuihsan maimah ua.
Himahleh, mipi tuh delh khiaka a om nung un, alut a, a khut ah a len a, naupang tuh a hongthouta a.
Huan, huai tanchin tuh huai gam tengteng ah a hongthang kheta.
Huan, Jesu huai a kipanin a pai jela, mittaw nihin, David Tapa, ka tunguah zahngai in, chia, kikou in a jui ua.
Huan, in a a lut leh, mittawte tuh a kiangah a hongpai ua; huan, Jesun a kiang uah. Hiai hih theiin na hongingta uh hia? a chi a. Amau tuh a kiangah, Gingta e, Toupa, a chi ua.
Huan, aman tuh a mit uh a khoiha, Na gintak bang un na tunguah tung heh, a chi a. Huchiin, a mit uh a hong vakta a.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Kuamah theih louh dingin pilvang un, achi bilbela.
Himahleh, amau tuh a pawt ua, huai gam tengteng ah a tanchin a hihthangta uh.
Huan, a pawt laitak un, ngaiin, dawi mat pautheilou khat a kiangah a honpi ua.
Huan, dawi tuh a delh khiak takin pautheilou tuh a hongpauta a; Huan mipiten lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Israelte lakah hichibang a mu ngei kei uh, a chi ua.
Pharisaiten bel, Dawi lal vangin ahi, dawite a delh khiak nak, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kikhopnain khawng ua hilhin, Gam Tanchin Hoih tuh genin, dam louhna chiteng leh natna chiteng khawng hihdamin, kho lian leh kho neu tengteng a tawn vialviala.
Huchiin, mipiten a muhin, chingding neilou belamte banga gimthuak leh dalha a om jiak un a hehpihta mahmah a,
Huchiin, a nungjuite kiangah, Buh lak dinglah a tam mahmaha, himahleh, a semmite a tawm uh;
huaijiakin a buh la ding a semdingte sawl dingin buh Neipa kiangah ngen un, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjui sawm leh nihte a kiangah a sam a, a kiang uah dawi ninte tunga thuneihna a pia a, amau hawlkhe ding leh, damlouhna chiteng leh natna chiteng hihdam dingin.
Huan, sawltak sawm leh nihte min tuh hiaite ahi: A masa penin Simon, Peter kichi leh a unau Andru te: Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unau Johan te,
Philip leh Bartholomai te: Thoma te leh siahkhon Matthai te: Alphai tapa Jakob leh Thaddia te;
Kanan mi Simon leh juausana mansakpa Juda Iskariot te.
Huai sawmlehnihte tuh Jesun a sawl khia a, a kiang uah hichin thu a pia a; Jentelte lam ah pai kei unla, Samasi mite khua himhim ah leng lut kei un;
Ahihhangin Israel nam belam mangte kaingah pai jaw un.
Huan, na pai un, Van gam a hong naita, chiin, thu gen jel un.
Damloute hihdam unla, misite kaithou unla, phakte hihsiangthou unla; dawite hawlkhia un, a thawnin na mu ua, a thawnin pia un.
Na kawnggak uah khawng dangkaeng hiam, dangka hiam, dal dangka hiam tawi kei unla;
zinna a dingin kawljal hiam, puannak nih hiam, khedap hiam, chiangkhun hiam tawi sam kei un; nasemmi tuh a nek ding mutak ahi ngala.
Huan, kholianah hiam, khoneu ah hiam na lutna peuh ua nou hontung sak tak mi ding zong khia unla, na pawt nawn mateng uh huai ah tuh tung kinken un.
Huan, in a na lut ding un chibai buk un.
Huan, in a mite tuh chibai buk tak ahih uleh na khamuanna thu uh a tunguah hongtung heh; a tak kei uleh na khamuanna thu uh na tunguah hongkik nawn heh.
Huan, kuapeuh nou hon kipahpih lou a, na thu uleng a ngaihkhiak kei uleh, huai in a kipan hiam, huai a kipan hiam a na pawt chiang un, na khepek ua leivui tat khia un.
Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Thukhen ni chiangin huai khuate sangin Sodom leh Gomorra gam thuak ding tuh a dan a om zo ding.
Ngaidih ua, nge laka belam om bangin ka honsawl khia ahi: huchiin, gul banga pila, vakhu banga poi khoih lou in om un.
Himahleh, mihing lakah pilvang un: vaihawmmite a honmansak ding-ua, kikhopnain bangah a honvuak ding jiakun;
A hi, keimah jiakin gamukte leh kumpipate ma ah amaute leh Jentelte theihsakna dingin a honpi ding uh.
Himahleh, a honmatsak chiangun, Bang chi ding ahia, bang thu ka gen dia? chiin, lungkham kei un; na gen ding uh tuh a hun takin a hontheisak ding ahi ngala.
A genpa tuh noumau na hi kei ding ua, na Pa uh Khain noumau ah a gen zo ding ahi ngal a.
Huan, hihlup dingin unaupa leh unaupa a kimansak ding ua, pan leng a ta a mansak ding; taten leng a nu leh a pate uh a dou ding uh, a hihlumsak ding uh.
Ka min jiakin mi tengteng huat na hi ding uh; himahleh, a tawp phaa thuak ngap peuhmah tuh hotdamin a om ding.
Huchiin, hiai khuaa hon gawt chiangun, kho dangah taisan un; chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Mihing Tapa a hongpai main Israel khuate tuh na na sik suak kei ding uh.
Nungjui a heutu tungah a om kei; sikha leng a pu tungah a om kei.
Nungjui tuh a heutu banga a hongom leh, sikha tuh a pu banga a hongom tuh a hun e. In neipa bawn, Beelzibul a chih uleh, a inkuanpihte tuh nak chihna tel un chia;
Huaijiakin, amaute kihta kei un; lang lou dinga sel bangmah a om kei, theih louh dinga im leng bangmah a om kei hi.
Miala nou ka honhilh vak ah na gen ding ua; bil bula na jak uh in tunga tuangin tangkoupih un.
Huan, sapum hihluma kha hihlum theiloute kihta kei unla; Gehenna a kha leh sapum hihmang theipa kihtajaw un.
Kawlgit nih dal dangka khatin a juak jel uh hi lou hiam? himahleh, a lak ua khat leng na Pa uh theih louhin lei ah a ke kei ding.
Na sam zangte uh nangawn leng sim vek ahi.
Huaijiakin lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin na manpha jaw uh ahi.
Huchiin, mite maa hon gum peuhmah tuh, ka Pa van a ma ah ka gum sam ding.
Himahleh, kuapeuh mite maa honkitheihmohbawl tuh, ka Pa vana ma ah ka kitheihmohbawl sam ding.
Lei tungah lem lengsak dinga hongpai hiam honsa kei un; lem lengsak dinga hongpai ka hi kei a, namsau leng sak dinga hongpai ka hi jaw.
Mi a pa dousak dingin, tanu a nu dousak dingin, mou a nu dousak dinga hongpai ka hi.
Mi a melma tuh amah inkuanpih te laka mi mah ahi ding.
Kuapeuh a nu hiam, a pa hiam, kei sanga it jaw tuh, ka mi hi tak ahi kei; kuapeuh a tanu hiam a tapa hiam kei sanga it jaw leng, ka mi hi tak ahi kei.
Kuapeuh a kros pua honjui lou tuh ka mi hi tak ahi kei.
Kuapeuh a hinna muin a tan dinga, keimah jiaka a hinna tanin a mu ding.
Kuapeuh nou honkipahpihin kei honkipahpih ahi a, kuapeuh kei honkipahpih tuh a honsawlpa kipahpih ahi.
Kuapeuh jawlnei tuh jawlnei a hih jiaka kipahpihin jawlnei kipahman a mu ding; kuapeuh mi diktat tuh mi diktat a hih jiaka kipahpihin mi diktat kipahman a mu ding.
Huan, kuapeuh, hiai mi neu chikte laka khat kianga, nungjui a hih jiaka tuisik nou khat kia pia leng, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi. A kipahman uh a tan kei hial ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Jesun a nungjui sawm leh nihte thu a piak zoh phetin huai a kipanin a khua khawng ua hilh ding leh thugen dingin a paita a.
Huan, Johanin, suangkulh sunga Kris thilhihte a najakin a nungjuite tuh sawlin a kiangah,
Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, a hihkeileh midang hungaih lai ding ka hi uhia? a chi saka.
Huan Jesun a kiang uah, Pai nawnta unla, thil na muh uh leh na jak uh Johan kiangah vahilh un.

Mittawte a mit uh a hong vakta, khebaite khein a hongpai ua, phakte a hongsiangthouta ua, bengngong te leng a bil uh a hongvakta, misite leng kaihthohin a omta ua; a jawngten leng Tanchin Hoih hilh a dongta uh.
Huan, kuapeuh ka tunga lunghihlouhna mu lou tuh a hampha uhi, chiin a na dawnga.
Huai mite tuh a paitak un, Jesun mipite kingah Johan thu a genta a, Bang en dinga gamdai a pai khia neita ua? Sialluang huih mut ling maw?
A hihkeikeh, bang en dingpena pai khia neita ua? Puan nem silh maw? Ngai un, puan nem silhte jaw kumpipate in ah eive a om uh.
A hihkeileh, bang jiakpenin ahia na pai khiak uh? jawlnei, en dngin maw? A hi tawk vo oi, ka honchi ahi, jawlnei sanga leng thupijaw.
en dih, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl ahi, aman tuh na ma ah na lam a bawl ding. chih, a tanchin a gelh uh, hiai mipa ahi.
Chihtaktakin, ka honhilh ahi, Numei suan lakah Baptispa Johan sanga thupijaw a suak ngei kei; himahleh van gama mi neu deuh leng amah sangin a thupizo ngal ua.
Baptispa Johan om akipan tutanin van gamin hiamgamna a tuak nak, hiamgamten hat thuin a la uh.
Jawlneite tengteng leh dan thuin Johan a hongom tanphain a na gen khol jel uh ahi.
Na pom nop uleh, huai jaw Elija, hongpai dingpa mah ahi.
Kuapeuh jakna dinga bil neiin ja heh.
Himahleh, tulai khangthakte bang toh ka tehpih dia? Naupang dawlmun khawnga tua, a lawmte sama

a nu leh a pa a zah ding a hikei, na chi ua. Huchiin na thugousiah ziak un Pathian thu tuh bangmahlou na suah uh.
Nou lepchiahte, Isaiin na tungtang thu uh a na genkhol dik mahmah hi.
Hiai mite'n a kam un a hon zah ua, himahleh a lungtang un a hon gamlat uhi.
Abang abang hileh, a thuhilhna uah mihing thupiak a hilh ziak un a hon biak uh a thawn mai ahi, chiin, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, mipi a sam a, a kiang uah, Ngaikhia unla, na theisiam un;
Kam a lut mihing hihnin a pang ahi kei; himahleh kam a pawt in, huai ngei in mihing a hihnin ahi zaw, a chi a.
Huailai in a nungzuite a hongpai ua, a kiang ah, Pharisaite'n huai thu a zak ua a lungkimlouhdan uh na thei hia? a chi ua.
Aman tuh, Kung tengteng ka Pa van a om suanlouh tuh bohkhiak in a om ding.
Amaute awlmoh kei un: mittaw makai ahi uh; huchi in mittaw in mittaw mah a pi leh kokhuk ah a ke khawm ding uh, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, Peter in a kiang ah, Huai gentehna thu hon hilhchian tanla, chi in a dong a.
Huan aman, Tutan a nou leng theihna neilou a om nalai na hi umaw?
Kam a lut peuhmah gil ah a ke khia a, dailenna ah paihkhiak in a om chih na theikei ua hia?
Kam a pawtte bel lungtang a hong pawt ahi ua: huaite ngeingei in mihing a hihnin nak.
Lungtang a kipan in ngaihtuahna giloute, tualthahnate, angkawmnate, kingaihnate, guktaknate, heknate, gensiatnate a hong pawt nak;
huaite ahi mihing hihnin; khut sil lou a an nek in mi a hihnin kei, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu hiai a kipan a pawt a, Tura leh Sidon uk ah a paita.
Huan, ngaidih, huai gam a kipan Kanan numei khat a hong pawt a, Toupa, David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai in, ka tanu dawi in lungkhamhuaipi in a man a, chi in, a kikou a.
Aman bel kam khat in leng a dawngkei. Huan, a nungjuite'n, I nung ah a kikou a kikou ngal a, paisak mai tanla, chi in a hon ngen ua.
Aman bel, Israel nam lak a belam mangte kiang lou ngal ah sawl ka hikei a chi a, a dawng a.
Himahleh, numei tuh a hong pai a, Toupa hon huh in, chi in, chibai a buk a.
Huan, aman, Tate tanghou laksak a, uite kiang a paih a kilawm kei, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, aman, Toupa, hih jaw ahi a; himahleh, uiten leng a pu uh dohkan a kipan a tanghou nen kia a ne jel sam ve ua oi, a chi a.
Huaitak in Jesun a kiang ah, Numei, na ginna thupi na tel e; na deih bang tak in na tungah om hen, a chi a, a dawng a, Huchi in a tanu tuh, huaihun ngei in a hong damta.
Huan, Jesu huai a kipan a pai a, Galili dil kiang a hongtung a: huan, tang ah a paitou a, huailai ah a tuta a.
Huan, mipi tampitak, khebaite, mittawte, pautheiloute, piangsualte leh midang tampi honpi in, a kiang ah a hongpai ua; huan, a na hihdam chiatta.
Huchi in, mipin pautheiloute hong pau a, piangsualte hong hoih a, khebaite khe a pai a, mittawte'n hon mutheita uh chih a muh un lamdang a sa mahmah ua; huchi in Israelte Pathian tuh a phatta uh.

Huan, Jesun a nungjuite a sam a, Mipite tu in ni thum ka kiang ah a omta ua, nek ding bangmah a neihlouh jiak un, ka hehpih mahmah; anngawl in ka paisak utkei hi, huchilou in jaw lamkal ah a bah kha ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuiten tuh a kiang ah, Mipi hiai zahzah vahna khop tanghou hu zahzah gamdai ah koi a kipan in i mu dia? A chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Tanghou phel bangzah na nei ua? A chi a. Huan, amau tuh a kiang ah, Phel sagih, nga neu tawmchik toh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman tuh lei a tu ding in mipite thu a pia a.
Huan, tanghou phel sagih leh ngate a la a, kipahthu a gen a, a balkham a, nungzuite kiang ah a pia a, huan nungjuiten mipite kiang ah a pe sawn uh.
Huan, a vek un a ne ua, a vah chiat ta ua; anek val nen uleng, bawmpi sagih dim a ngah uh.
A nete tuh numei leh naupang simlouh in, piching ngen leng sangli ahi uh.
Huan mipite a sawl mang nung in long ah a tuang a. Magadan gam a hongtungta.
Huan, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite a hongpai ua, amah ze etna ding in van a kipan chiamtehna amaute ensak ding in a ngen ua.
Himahleh, aman a kiang uah, Nitaklam a hong hih in, Khua a pha dia a ding meisan a suak, na chi nak uh.
Huan, jingsang in, Tunin khua se dia a ding e, meisan a suak a, a niam kai, na chi nak uh. Van omdan na thei siam ngal ua, himahleh, hun chiamtehnate na thei siam theikei uh.

Khangthak giloutak leh angkawm hatten chiamtehna a zong ua, himahleh, Jona chiamtehna lou ngal a kiang uah chiamtehna himhim piak a hikei ding, a chi a, a dawng a. Huan, amaute a paisan a, a pawt kheta.
Huan, nungjuite gal khatlam a a tun un tanghou a po mangngilh ua,
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Pharisaite leh Saddukaite silngou lak ah kiveng unla, pilvang un, a chi a.
Huan, amau, Tanghou i po hetkei, chi in a kingaihtuah ua.
Huan, Jesun huai a thei a, Gin tawmte aw, bang achia tanghou na neihlouh ziak ua kingaihtuah na hi ua?
Tu nangawn in na lungsim un na thei naikei lailai umaw? Mi sangnga tanghou phel nga leh, na bawmpi dimsak zah uh, na thei gige kei ua hia?
Mi sangli tanghou phel sagih leh, na bawmpi dimsak zah uleng?
Tanghou thu na kiang ua genlou in. Pharisaite leh Saddukaite silngou lak ah, pilvang un, chih gen ka hi jaw chih bang achia theilou na hi ua? A chi a.
Huaitak in tanghou silngou lak a pilvang ding in a sawlkei a. Pharisaite leh Saddukaite thulhilhna lak a pilvang ding in amau a sawl jaw chih a hon theita uh.
Huan, Jesu Philippi Kaisari uk a hongtun in a nungjuite kiang ah, Min Mihing Tapa kua ahi a chi ua? chi in, a dong a.
Huan, amau, Khenkhat in, Baptispa Johan ahi, a chi ua; khenkhat in, Elija ahi, a chi ua; khenkhat in, Jeremia hiam zawlnei kua hiam ahi, a chi uh, a chi ua.
Aman tuh a kiang uah, A hihleh, nou kua ahi non chi ua? a chi a.
Huan, Simon Peter in, Kris Pathian Hing Tapa tuh na hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, Jesun a kiang ah, Simon Bar-Jona, hampha chia; sa leh sisan in a hon theihsak na hikei a, ka Pa van a om in hon theihsak na hi zo ngal a.
Huan, ka hon hilh ahi, nang Peter na hi, hiai suangpi tungah ka saptuam ka lamtou ding a, misi kho kulh kongkhakten huai a zoukei ding.
Vangam tahbite ka hon pe ding a, leitung ah bangpeuh na hen vanah leng hen ahi ding a leitung ah bangpeuh na phel vanah leng phel ahi ding, a chi a.
Huai zoh in Kris ahi chih kuamah hilhlou ding in nungjuite tuh a chi bikbek a.

Huai nungsiah tuh Jesun Jerusalem a a pai dingdan bang, upate, siampu lalte, laigelhmite lak a thil tampi a thuak dingdan bang, hihlup a a om dingdan bang, ni thum ni a kaihthoh a a om dingdan bang a nungjuite a theisak panta a.
Huan, Peter in amah a pituamta a; Toupa, Hi hetkei hen! Huaite na tungah tung ngei hetkei hen! Chi in, a taihilh ta a.
Amah bel a kihei a, Peter kiang ah, Setan, ka nung ah pai in; kei a din pukna na hi; Pathian thilte ngaihtuahlou in mihing thilte na ngaihtuah jaw ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a nungjuite kiang ah, Kuapeuh in a hon zuih nop leh, amah gimthuak khawk salou in, a kros pua in hon zui heh.
Kuapeuh a hin humbit ut in a tan ding a; kuapeuh keimah jiak a a hinna tanin a humbit ding.
Min khovel a pum in nei henla, a hinna tan jel leh, amah a ding in bang a phatuam dia? A hihkeileh, min a hin sikin bang a pe thei a?
Mihing Tapa a angelte toh, a Pa thupina a kizem a a hongpai ding ziak in: huai chiang in mi chih a nasep bang bang un a din chiat ding.
Chihtaktakin ka hon chi ahi, hiai a dingte a khen tuh, Mihing Tapa a gam a hongpai a muh ma siah uh, sihna chiamlou hial ding a om uh, a chi a.
Huan, ni guk nung in Jesu'n Peter te, Jakob te, a unau Johan te a tuam in tang sangtak ah a paitouhpih a.
A ma uah a mel omdan a hong lamdangta a; a mai ni bang in a hong tang a, a puansilh te tuh vuk bang in a hong ngouta a.
Huan, ngaidih, Mosi leh Elija tuh amah toh kihoupih in a kiang uah a kilak ua.
Huan, Peter in Jesu a houpih a, Toupa, ei din hiai a om a hoih, na ut leh hiai ah aidakbuk thum ka bawl ding a; nang a ding in khat, Mosi ding in khat, Elija ding in khat, a chi a.
A gen laitak in, ngaidih, mei ngoutak in amau a hon liahta a; huan, ngaidih, mei a kipan in aw in, Hiai ka Tapa deihtak, ka kipahna mahmah ahi: amah thu ngai un, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuite'n huai tuh a zak un khupboh in a puk ua, a lau mahmah ua.
Huan, Jesu'n amau a hong khoih a, Thou unla, laukei un, a chi a.
Huan, a dakkhia ua, Jesu kia lou ngal kuamah a muta kei uh.
Huan, tang a kipan a a kumlai un. Jesu'n a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa misi lak a kipan a thoh nawn masiah na thil muh uh kuamah hilhkei un, chi in thu a peta.
Huan a nungjuite'n a kiang ah, Laigelhmite'n, Elija a hong pai masa ding ahi, bangchidan a chi ahi ua le? Chi in a dong ua.
Huan, aman, Elija a hong pai ding him ahi, bangkim a siam hoih ding.
Himahleh, ka hon hilh ahi, Elija zaw a hong pai khinta, amah a theikei ua, a tungah a utut un a hihzota uh. Huchimah bang in Mihing Tapa in leng alak uah a thuak sam ding, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huaitak in, nungjuite'n tuh, Baptispa Johan thu a kiang uah a gen ahi chih a hontheita uh.
Huan, mipi kiang a hongtun un, mi khat a kiang ah a hongpai a, a ma a khukdin in,
Toupa, ka tapa tungah zahngai in, kaihvei ahi, a nak thuak telmai; tamveipi mei ah a puklut a, tamveipi tui ah leng a puk nak.
Huan, na nungjuite kiang ah ka honpi a, a hihdam theikei uh, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu'n, Khangthak ginna neilou a chihmohte aw, bang tan ahia ka hon thuak zoh ding, amah tuh ka kiang ah honpi un, a chi a, a dawng a.
Han, Jesu'n dawi a tai a, a sung a kipan in a pawtta a; huai daktak a kipan in naupang tuh a hong damta.
Huai nung in, nungjuite tuh a tuam in, Jesu kiang ah a hongpai ua, Bang achia kou delhkhe theilou ka hi ua? A chi ua.

Huan, aman a kiang uah, Na gin tawm ziak un. Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, ankam tang malkhat bang ginna na neih uleh, hiai tang kiang ah, Hiai a kipan in hua pam ah va kisuan in, na chi ding ua, a kisuan mai ding; nou ding in hihtheihlouh himhim bangmah a omkei ding, a chi a.
Akoi abang hileh, hichi bang jaw thumna leh anngawl louh ngal in a paikhe kei.
Huan, Galili gam a a hongkikhop lai un, Jesun a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa jaw mihingte khuta matsak-in a om ding; huan a hihlum ding ua;
Huan, ni thum niin kaihthohin a om ding, a chi a. Huchiin, a lungkham mahmah uh.
Huan, Kapernaum khua a hongtun un, Pathian biakin sum khonte Peter kiangah a hongpai ua, Na pu un biakin sum pe jel sam lou hia? A chi ua,

Aman tuh, Pe jel sam e, a chi a. Huan, in a va lut in, Jesun a kiangah, Simon, bang chin na ngai a? Lei a kumpipaten siah hiam, sum neihman hiam, kua lakah ahia a lak jel uh? A tate uh lakah hia, mituam lakah? Chi in, a na gentuh a.
Huan, Peter in, Mi tuam lakah, a chihtak in, Jesun a kiangah, Huchi ahihleh tate awl uh ahi vo oi.

Himahleh, nang dil ah vahoh inla, ngakuai diah inla, nga a hongsuak masapen man in, a kam kek lechin dangka nih na mu mai ding; huai tuh la inla kei leh nang a ding in a kiang uah pia in, huchilou in jaw amaute i hihlungkim kei kha ding, a chi.
Huai laitakin nungjuite Jesu kiangah a hongpai ua, Van gamah kua a thupipen dia le? A chi ua.
Huan, aman tuh naupang neu chik a sama; a lak uah a ding saka.
Chihtaktakin ka honchi ahi, Na lamdan ua, naupang neuchik bang na honghih kei uleh, vangam ah na lut kei hial ding uh.
Huchi in, kuapeuh hiai naupang neu chik banga kingainiam, huai mi tuh vangam ah a thupipen ding.
Huan kuapeuh ka min jiaka hichi bang naupang neu chik khat kipahpih tuh keimah honkipahpih ahi ding.
Himahleh, hiai hongingta neu chikte laka khar leng hihpuk tuh, a ngawng uah buh gawijanna suang lianpi ok sakin tupi thuk lai ah khe mang le uh amau a dingin a phatuam zo ding.
Puknate jiak in khovel tung a gik hi; puknate bel hongom ding him ahi a; himahleh pukna omsakpa tung a gik.

Huan, na khutin hiam, na khein hiam, a honhihpuk leh, tan inla, pai mang in; khut nih hiam khe nih hiam neia khantawn meia paih a om sang in, piangsualin hiam khebaiin hiam hinna a lut nanga ding in a hoihjaw.
Huan, mitin a honhihpuk leh khel khia inla, pai mang in; mit lang nih neia Gehenna meia paiha om sangin, mit lang khat neia hinna a lut nanga ding in a hoihjaw.
Hiai mineute lak a khat leng simmoh lou ding in pilvang un, a angelte un van ah ka Pa van a om mel a mu gige uh chih ka hon hilh ahi.
Mihing Tapa tuh mangthangte zong ding a hongpai ahi ngal a.
Bangchi na sa ua? Mi kuapeuh in belam za nei henla, a lak ua khat vak mang taleh, sawmkua leh kuate tuh nusia in, tang a pai in, a mangpen a zongkei dia hia?
Chihtaktak in ka hon hilh ahi, a muh nawn zenzen in tuh, sawmkua leh kua vak mang loute tungah sang in, a tungah a kipak zo ding.
Huchibang mah in hiai mineute lak a khat manthat leng na Pa uh van a om deihlam a hikei hi.
Huan, na unau in na tungah thil ahihkhelh leh, pai inla, amah leh nang kia theih in a khelhna ah hilh in; a hon ngaih khiak leh na unau tuh na zou ahi ding.
A hon ngaihkhiak kei leh mi dang khat hiam nih hiam na kiang ah na pi dia, huchi in thu chiteng theihpih mi nih hiam thum hiam kam a hihkip a a om theihna ding in.
Huan amau leng a ngaihkhiak nopkei a leh, saptuamte kiang ah tun in; huan, saptuamte leng a ngaihkhiak nopkei leh, amah tuh nang ding in Jentel leh siahkhonmi bang hi heh.
Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, leitung ah bangpeuh na hen uh tuh, van ah hen ahi ding. Huan leitung a na phel peuhmah uh, van ah leng phel ahi ding.
Chihtaktak in ka hon hilh nawn ahi. Leitung ah na lak ua mi nih a thil ngetlam ua a kithutuah uleh, ka Pa van a om hihsak in a om ding uh.
Mi nih hiam thum hiam ka min a a kikhopna peuh uah a lak uah ka omzel ngal a, a chi a.
Huailai in Peter a hongpai a, a kiang ah, Toupa, ka unau in bangzahvei ahia ka tungah khial leh ka ngaihdam ding? sagihvei tan in ahi diam? A chi a.
Jesu'n a kiang ah, Sagihvei tan in ka hon chikei, Sagihvei mun sawmsagih tan in, ka honchi jaw ahi.
Huaijiak in, vangam tuh kumpipa kua hiam a sikhate kiang a a sum thu hihchet tum toh tehpih ahi.
Huchia a hihchet pat tak in, mi khat talent singkhat ba a kiang ah a honpi uh.
Huan piak ding a neihlouh jiak in, a pu in amah toh, a ji toh, a tate toh, a neih tengteng toh zuak a dit ding thu a pia a.
Huchi in, sikha in tuh, Toupa, ka tungah zahngai tadih inla, a vek in ka hon pe ding, chi in khupboh in chibai a buk a.
Huan, huai sikhapa pun a hehpihta mahmah a, a khah a, a bat a ngaidamta.
Himahleh, huai sikha tuh a paikhia a, a sikha hihpihte lak a khat a makhai za ba a vamu a; huan, amah a man a, Na bat hon pia in, chi in a gawl a mek a.
Huchi in a sikha hihpihpan tuh khupboh in, Ka tungah zahngai tadih inla, ka hon pe ding, chi in a ngen ngutngut a.
Himahleh a utkei a; a bat a piak zoh masiah suangkulh ah a vakhumta a.
Huchi in, a sikha hihpihte'n a thil hih tuh a muh un, a lungkham mahmah ua. A thil hih tengteng a Toupa uh a vahilhta uh.
Huaitak in a Toupa'n amah tuh a sam a, a kiang ah, Sikha gilou, non nget ngutngut jiak a, na hon bat tengteng hon ngaidam hi ing a;
ka hon hehpih bang in nang leng na sikha hihpih na hehpih sam ding hilou hia? A chi a.
Huan, a Toupa tuh a thangpaita a, a bat tengteng a piak zoh masiah migawtte kiang ah a peta a.
Mi chin in na lungtang tak ua na unaute uh na ngaihdam kei uleh ka Pa van a om in leng huchi bangmah in na tunguah a hih sam ding, a chi a.
Huan hichi bang ahi a, Jesu'n huai thute a genzoh tak in, Galili gam a kipan a pawt a, Jordan lui gal Judia gamah a vahoh a;
Huan, mipi thupi tak in a zuan ua; huai ah tuh amaute a hihdamta.
Huan, Pharisaite a kiang ah a hong ua, amah ze-etna ding in, Bang jiak peuh in leng min a ji mak a siang hia? a chi ua.
Huan, aman, A tung a kipan a mau bawlpan numei leh pasal a bawl leh,
Hiai jiak in pasal in a nu leh a pa a paisan ding a, a ji a len ding;

huchi in, a nih un sa pumkhat a hong hita ding uh, a chi chih na simkei ua hia? Huchi in, nih a hita kei ua, sa pumkhat ahi zota uhi. Huaijiak in Pathian zopsa mihing in khenkei heh, a chi a, a dawng a.
Amau tuh a kiang ah, A hih leh, bang dia Mosi in kimakna lai piak a mak ding ahi chi a thu pia ahia leh? A chi ua.
Aman a kiang uah, Mosi in na lungtang uh khauh jiak in eive na jite uh mak a phal; himahleh, a tung a kipan huchi bang ahi ngeikei.
Ken zaw ka hon chi ahi, Kuapeuh tangval ngaihjiak hilou a, ji ma a midang nei tuh, angkawm ahi: maksa nei peuhmah leng angkawm ahi a chi a.
Nungzuite'n a kiang ah, Pasal a ji lam thu huchi bang a hihleh kiten hoihkei, a chi ua.
Aman bel a kiang uah, Huai thu ahihleh, mi napeuh in a pom theikei ding uh, a piaknate kia loungal in.

Mi chilgeh, a nu uh gil sung ua kipang a huchi bang a piang himte a om ua; michilgeh, mihing khut a gehte leng a om sam ua; michilgeh, vangam jiak a chilgeh a kibawl tawmte leng a om sam uh. Kuapeuh a pom thei in pom heh, a chi a.
Huailai in a tung ua a khut koih a, a thumsak ding in, a kiang ah naupang neute a honpi ua; huan, nungzuite'n a na sal ua.
Jesu'n bel, Naupang neute ka kiang ah hon sawl unla, khamkei un; vangam tuh hichi bang mite a ahi ngal a, a chi a.
Huan, a tunguah a khut a koih a, huai apat tuh a paita.
Huan, mi khat a kiang ah a hong a, Pu, khantawn a hinna ka neih theihna ding in thil hoih bang ka hih ding? A chi a.
Huan, aman a kiang ah, Thil hoih thu bangdia hon dong? Hoih khat kia a om; abang-abang hileh, hinna a lut na ut leh thupiakte zui in, a chi a.
Huan, aman a kiang ah, A koi pen maw? A chi a. Huan, Jesu'n, Tual na thah ding ahikei; Ang na kawm ding ahikei; Na gu ding ahikei; Na hek ding ahikei;
Na nu leh na pa zah in, chihte leh, Nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte na it ding ahi, chih, a chi a.
Tangval in tuh a kiang ah, Huai thu tengteng tuh ka zui zel; bang ka samlai a? A chi a.
Jesu'n a kiang ah, Hoih kim a om na ut leh, pai inla, na neih juak inla, mi jawngte kiang ah pia in, huchi in, van ah gou na nei ding; huan, hongpai inla, hon jui in, a chi a.
Tangval bel huai thu a jak in lungkham tak in a paimangta a, sum tampi nei a hih jiak in.
Huan, Jesu'n a nungzuite kiang ah, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, mi hausa dia vangam a lut haksa pi ahi.
Huan, ka hon hilh ahi, mi hausa Pathian gam a lut sang in sangawngsau phim bil a lutsuak a baihlam zaw, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuite'n huai a jak un, lamdang a naksak mahmah ua, Kua hotdam in a om zou dia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesu'n amau a en a, a kiang uah, Huai tuh mihing hih vual a hikei a, Pathian a di'n bel bangkim hihtheih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Peter in a kiang ah, Ngaidih, kou bangkim paisan in ka hon juita ua; bang ka mu ding ua le? a chi a, a dawng a.

Huan, Jesu'n a kiang ah, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, Khovel thakna ah, Mihing Tapa a thupina tutphah a a tut chiang in, nou kei hon juite, Israel nam sawm leh nihte vaihawm in, laltutphah sawm leh nih ah na tu sam ding uh.
Huan, mi chih in in hiam, unaute hiam, sanggamnute hiam, pa hiam, nu hiam, tate hiam, gamte hiam ka min jiak a paisan peuhmah in tuh a leh ja a mu ding ua, khantawn a hinna a tang ding uh.
Himahleh, mi tampi, masapen a omte tuh, nanungpen in a om ding uh; nanungpen a omte leng masapen in a om ding uh.
Van gam tuh, in neipa grephuana semdingte chial ding a jinga pawt bang ahi.
Huan, aman tuh nasemte toh ni khata makhai loh dia a kituah tak un a grep huan ah a sawl chiat ta a.
Huan, dak thumna ding khawng in a vapawt a, midang dawl mun a ding maimaite a mu a;
huan, a kiang uah, Nou leng grep huan ah va pai sam ve ua, a kilawm hun ka honpe de, a chi a.
Huchi in, a paita ua. Huan, dak gukna ding khawng in leh dak kuana ding khawng in a va pawt nawna, huchi bangmah in a hih nawn a.
Huan, dak sawm leh khatna khawng ding in a va pawt a, mi dang dingte a mu a; huan, a kiang uah, Bangdia ni tum ahiai lai a ding maimai na hi ua? A chi a.
Amau tuh a kiangah, Kuamahin a honchial louh jiakun, a chi ua. Aman tuh a kiang uah, Nou leng grep huan ah va hoh sam un, a chi a.
Huan, nitaklam a honghih in, grep huan neipan, a sum kempa kiangah, Nasemte sam inla, a nanungpen a kipanin a masapen tan in aloh uh pia in, a chi a.
Huan, dak sawm leh khatna ding khawng a achialte a hong uh leh makhai a mu chiat ua.
Huan, a masapente a hong un, muh tam deuh a kiging ua; himahleh amau leng makhai mah a mu chiat uh.
Huan, a sum a san takun, in neipa tungah a phunta ua,
Hiai nanungpenten dak kal khat kia a sem ua, kou sun haksa leh khoul thuakte toh kibangin na bawla, chi in.
Aman bel, a lak ua mi khat kiangah, Lawm, na tungah bangmah ka hihkhial sama; makhai loh dingin i kituak ka hia?
Nanga la inla pai mai in; nang ka honpiak bangmah hiai nanungpen kiangah ka pe nuam ahi.
Kei a hiven, ka utut a ka hih a siang ka hia? A hihkeileh, kei ka hoih jiakin nang na haja ahia? chi in, a dawng a.
Huchi in, a nanungpente tuh a masapente a honghi ding ua, amasapente leng a nanungpente a honghi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu Jerusalem khua a a hohtouh lai in nungjui sawm leh nihte a pituam a, lampi ah a kiang uah,
Ngai dih uh, Jerusalem khua ah i pai tou dia, Mihing Tapa siampu lalte leh laigelhmite khut a matsak in a om ding; huan, amau tuh si ding in a tungah thu a hihpuk ding uh,
nuihza bawl nadia zat ding leh kros a kilhden ding in Jentelte kiang ah a pe ding uh; huan, ni thum ni a kaihthoh in a om ding, a chi a.
Huai laitak in, Zebedai tapate nu, a tate pi in, a kiang ah a hong a, chibai a buk a, thil bang hiam a ngen a.
Huan aman a kiang ah, Bang ahia na deih? A chi a. Huan, aman, Hiai ka tapate nih na gamah, na taklam ah khat, na veilam ah khat a tut theihna ding un thu pia in, a chi a.
Jesu'n bel, na nget theilou hi uteh. Ka nou dawn ding na dawn thei ua hia? a chi a, a dawng a. Amau a kiang ah, Thei e, a chi ua.
Aman a kiang uah, Ka nou tuh na dawn ngei ding ua; himahleh ka taklam leh ka veilam a tut ding thu jaw kei piak ding a hikei, ka Pa bawlsakte a ding ahi zo ding, a chi a.
Huan, sawmte'n tuh huai a na jak un unau nihte tungah a hehta ua.
Jesu'n bel amaute a sam a, Jentelte vaihawmte tuh a tunguah a lal mahmah ua, a mi liante un a tunguah thu a nei mahmah lai uh chih leng na thei uh.
Himahleh, nou lak ah jaw huchi a hikei ding; kuapeuh na lak ua mi lian hih ut tuh na nasem un a om zo ding ahi;
kuapeuh na lak ua masapen hih ut tuh na nasem un a omlai ding ahi;
Mihing Tapa nasepsak a om ding in a hongpai kei a, nasem ding leh mi tampi tatna dia a hin pe ding a hongpai ahi jaw, a chi a.
Huan, Jeriko khua a kipan a pawt lai un mipi tampi tak in amah a jui ua.
Huan, ngaidih, mittaw nih lam gei a tute'n Jesu a pai chih a jak tak un, TOUPA, nang David Tapa, ka tunguah zahngai in, chi in, a kikou ua.
Huan, mipi'n dai ding in a tai ua; himahleh, amau tuh, Toupa, nang David Tapa, ka tunguah zahngai in, chi in, a kikou semsem ua.
Huan, Jesu a ding a, amau a sam a, Na tunguah bang chi a ka hih na ut ua? a chi a.
Amau tuh a kiang ah, Mit vak ka ut uh, a chi ua.
Huchi in, Jesu'n a hehpih mahmah a, a mit uh a khoih a; huchi in, a mu thei pah ngal ua, amah tuh a juita uh.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a tun ding un, Bethphage khua, Oliv tang tuh, a tun un Jesu'n nungjuite nih a sawl a, a kiang uah,
Na ma jawn khua uah vahohta unla, sabengtung khih, a kiang a a nou toh, na mu ding ua; phel unla, ka kiang ah hon kai un.
Huan, kuapeuh in na kiang ua banghiam a gen uleh, Toupa'n a deih a ahi, na chi ding uh; huan, aman tuh a hon sawl pah mai ding, a chi a.
Hiai tengteng tuh jawlnei kam a gen a hong tun theihna ding in a hong omta hi.
En dih, na Kumpipa, thunuailut tak in, sabengtung tungah- sabengtung nou tung ngei a tuang in na kiang ah a hong dek, chi in, Zion tanu tuh hilh in, a chih.
Huchi in, nungjuite tuh a vapai ua, Jesu'n a kiang ua thu a piak bang ngei in a hih ua,
sabengtung leh a nou tuh a honkai ua, a tunguah a puante uh a phah ua, huai ah a tuangta a.
Huan, mipi lak a tamjaw in lampi ah a puante uh a phah ua, midang in sing sawl a sat ua, lampi ah a phah ua.
Huan, mipi a malam a paite leh a juite'n, David Tapa kiang ah Hosanna: Toupa min a hongpai tuh a hampha hi: tungnungpen ah Hosanna: chi in, a kikou ua.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a honglut in, a khua in, Hiai mi kua ahia? Chi in, a ling souhsouh ua.
Huan, mipite'n, hiai mi jawlnei Jesu, Galili gam a Nazaret khua a ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesu Pathian biak in ah a valut a, biakin a juakmite leh leimite tengteng a delhkhia a, dangka khengte dohkante leh vakhu juakte tutphahte leng a sawnpaih sak a;
a kiang uah, Ka in thumna in a chi ding uh, chih gelh ahi; nou bel suamhatte khuk in na bawljaw uh, a chi a.
Huan, Pathian biak in ah mittawte leh khebaite a kiang ah a hong ua; amau a na hihdam.
Himahleh, siampu lalte leh laigelhmite'n a thil lamdang hihte leh biakin a, David Tapa Hosanna: chi a naupang kikoute a muh un, a lungkimkei mahmah ua,
a kiang ah, Hiaite thugen na ja hia? a chi ua. Huan, Jesu'n a kiang uah, Ja e; Naungekte leh nawi nelaite kam a pawt in pahtawina na hihkimta, chih na sim ngeikei ua hia? A chi a.
Huan, amau tuh a paisan a, khopi apat a pawt a, Bethani ah a pai a; huai ah a giakta.
Huan, jing a khopi lam a akik nawnlai in a gil a hong kialta a.
Huan, lamsik ah theipi kung a mu a, a va naih a, a nah kia loungal bangmah a mukei a. Huan, a kiang ah, Khantawn in na gah nawnta ken a chi a.
Huan, theipi tuh a vul pah ngal a. Huan, nungjuite'n huai amuh un, Bangchidan ahia theipi a vulpah tel? chi in lamdang a sa mahmah ua.

Huan, Jesu'n a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin, ka hon hilh ahi, ginna na neih ua, na gin lah kei uleh, theipi tung a hih bang phet leng na hihkei ding ua, hiai tang kiang ah leng, Na kisuan inla, tuipi ah na kipai in, chi le uchin, na chih bang un, a hong om ding.
Huan, bang peuh gingta a thum a na nget uh na mu ding uh, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, Pathian biakin a lut nung a, thu a hilhlai in, siampu lalte leh vantang upate a kiang ah a hong ua, a kiang ah, Kua thu in ahia hiai thil na hih? Kuan thu a hon pai a? A chi ua.
Huan, Jesu'n a kiang uah, Ken leng thu kam khat kon dong sam ding, huai tuh na hon hilh uleh, kua thu in ahia hiai thil ka hih, ka hon hilh sam ding.

Johan baptisma, hiai kaw kipan ahia? Van a kipan hia, a hihkeileh mihing a kipan? A chi a, a dong a. Huan, a kingaihtuah ua. Van a kipan, chi lehang, Bang dia amah ginglou na hi ua leh? A hon chi kha dia.
Huan, Mihing a kipan, chi lehang, mipi i kihta ngal a; mi tengteng in lah Johan jawlnei in a sim ngal ua, a chi ua.
Huchi in, Jesu a dawng ua, Theikei ung, a chi ua. Aman leng a kiang uah, Ken leng kua thu in ahia hiai thil ka hih ka hon hilh samkei ding, a chi a.
Himahleh, nou bang chi na sa ua? Mi kuahiam in tapa nih a nei a, Khatpa kiang ah a vahoh a, Ta aw, tuni'n grep huan ah vasem ve, a chi a.
Aman, Ka utkei, a chi a, a dawng a; himahleh a denchiang in a lungsim a kheng a, a kuanta a.
Huan, khatpa kiang ah leng a vahoh a, tua bangmah in a vachi a. Huan, aman, Pu, ka kuan ding, a chi a, a dawng a; himahleh a kuanta kei.

Huai mi nihte a kua jaw in, a pa uh deihlam a hih aleh a chi a. Amau tuh, A masapen in, a chi ua. Jesu'n a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, siahkhonte leh kijuakte'n Pathian gamah nou a hon lut khalh ding uh.

Johan tuh diktatna lam tawn in na kiang uah a hong a, amah lah na gingta ngalkei ua: siahkhonmite leh kijuakte'n bel amah a gingta ua; noute'n huai na muh nung un leng amah na gintak theihna ding un na kisik nuam tuankei uh.

Gentehna thu dang ngaikhia un: Mi kuahiam, in nei a om a, huai min tuh grephuan a bawl a, gawl in a um suak a, grep sukna khuk a tou a, in sang a lam a; huan, lou kemte kiang ah khoh loh ding in a pia a, gam dang ah a paita a.
Huan, a gah loh a hun ding kuan in a gah la ding in lou kemte kiang ah a sikhate a sawl a.
Huan, lou kemte'n tuh a sikhate a naman ua, khat a vua ua, khat a that ua, khat suang in a deng ua.
Huan, sikha dang, a masa pawl sang a tamjaw a sawl nawn a; amau tungah leng a ma ua mite a hih bangmah un a na hih nawn ua.
Huai nung in tuh, Ka tapa a zahtak ding uh, chi in, a tapa tuh a kiang uah a sawl a.
Himahleh lou kemte'n a tapa a na muh tak un, Hiai mipa gouluahdingpa ahi; that ni e: a gou luah ding tansak ni, a kichi ua.
Huchi in, amah tuh a man ua, grephuan a kipan a pai khia ua, a thatta ua.
Huchi in grep huan neipa a hongpai chiang in huai lou kemte tungah bang chin a hon hih dia le? A chi a.

Amau tuh a kiang ah, Huai migiloute tuh haksa tak in a hihmangthang ding a, grep huan lah lou kemmi dang a loh hun teng a a gahte a kiang a pe jel dingte kiang ah, khoh loh ding in a pe ding, a chi ua.

Jesu'n a kiang uah, Laisiangthoute a, In lammite suang deihlouhpen, huai ngeingei a ning a suang phatuampen a hong hita. Huai tuh Toupa hih ahi, i mit muh in a lamdang ahi, chih, na sim ngeikei ua hia?
Huaijiak in, Pathian gam tuh na kiang ua kipan laksak ahi dia, a gah suah ding nam dang kiang ah piak ahi ding, chih, ka hon hilh ahi.
Huan, huai suang tung a puk tuh a kitam gawp dia; a delh khakte houh a gawijan ding, a chi a.
Huan, siampu lalte leh Pharisaite'n a gentehna thute a jak un amau tung thu a gen chih a theita ua.
Huan, amah tuh mat a tum ua; himahleh mipite a kihta ngal ua, jawlnei a a sim jiak un.
Huan, Jesu'n, amaute a houpih a, a kiang uah gentehna thu a gen nawn a,
Vangam tuh kumpipa kua hiam a tapa a dia kitenna ankuang lui toh teh ahi.
Huan, kitenna ankuang um dia achialte tuh sam ding in a sikhate a sawl a, himahleh, a hong nuamkei uh.

Huan, aman, Ka chialte kiang ah, Ngai dih ua, ka ankuang ka manta; ka bawngtalte keh ka gan vak thaute ka gou a, bangteng a manta hi; kitenna ankuang um ding in hongpaita un, chi un, chi in, a sikha dangte a sawl nawn a.
Himahleh, a na limsakkei ua, a pai mang ua, khat tuh a lou ah a kuan a, khat tuh a sumsinna ah;
mi dangte'n a sikhate a man ua, zumhuai tak in a bawl ua, a hihlumta mai ua.
Huchi in, kumpipa tuh a thangpaita a; a sepaih hon a sawl a, huai tualthatte a hihmang a, a khua uh leng a halsakta.
Huan, a sikhate kiang ah, Kitenna ankuang man a hita, ka chialte lah ne tak a hikei uh.
Huaiziak in, lamkathuamte khawng ah pai unla, mi na muh peuhpeuh uh kitenna ankuang um ding in chial un, a chi a.
Huchi in, huai sikhate a pawt ua, lamkathuam khawng a vapai in, a muh peuhmah uh, migilou leh mihoihte leng, a pikhawmvek ua: huchi in, kitenna dantan tuh mi chialte in a hong dimta a.
Himahleh, kumpipa tuh mi chialte en ding a a hong lut leh, kitenna puan silhlou mi khat huai ah a mu a;
Huchi in, a kiang ah, Lawm, bangchidan ahia, kitenna puan silhlou ahiai lai a nong lut? a chi a. Huan, amah tuh a dai dide a.
Huan, kumpipa'n a sikhate kiang ah, A khut leh a khe gak unla, polam mial ah paikhia un; huailai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding, a chi.
Chialte tuh tampi ahi ua, telte jaw tawmchik ahi uh, a chi a.
Huailai in Pharisaite a thugen a mat theihna dingdan a vakikum ua.

Huan, amau tuh a nungjuite uleh Herod pawlte a kiang ah a sawl ua, huai mite'n tuh, Sinsakpa, mi diktak na hi a, diktak in Pathian lam thu na hilh a, poisak tuan kuamah na neikei chih ka thei uh; kuamah khentuam na neikei a.
Huaijiak in, bangchi na sa a? hon hilh di aw? Kaisar kiang a siah tawi a siang hia sianglou? A chi ua.
Himahleh, Jesu'n a gitlouhdan uh a nathei a, Lepchiahte aw, bangdia hon ze-et na hi ua?
Siahsum tuh honla un, a chi a. Huan, a kiang ah makhai a honla ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Hiai kua lim leh kua min ahia? A chi a.
Amau tuh a kiang ah, Kaisar a, a chi ua. Huan, aman a kiang uah, A hih nung, Kaisar thilte Kaisar kiang ah pia unla, Pathian thilte Pathian kiang ah peta unla, a chi a.
Huai a jak un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, amah a paisan ua, a paimangta uh.
Huai ni mah in, Saddukaite, thohnawnna a omkei chite, a kiang ah a hong ua;
a kiang ah, Sinsakpa, Mosi in, Mi ta neilou in si leh, a unaupa'n a ji luah in a unaupa a di'n chi a khah sak ding ahi, a chi a.
A hi, ka lak uah sal sagih a om ua; a upapen in ji a nei a, a si a, huan, chi a khahlouh jiak in a ji tuh a unaupa luah ding in a nutsiat a;
huchimah bang in nihna in a luah a, thumna in a luah lai a, sagihna tan in a luah chiat ua.
Huan, a vek ua a sih nung un numei mah leng a sita a.
Huchi in, thohnawnna ah amau sagihte lak ah kua pen ji ahi dia? a vek un lah a nei chiat ngal ua, chi in, a dong ua.
Jesu'n a kiang uah, Laisiangthou leh Pathian thilhihtheihna na theihlouh jiak un na ngai khial nak uhi.
Thohnawnna ah ji leh pasal a kitenna om nawnkei a, van a angelte bang ahi zota ding uh.
Ahihhang in, misi thohnawnna thu Pathian in na kiang ua a gen na simkei ua hia?
Kei Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, Jakob Pathian ka hi, chi in, Pathian jaw misi Pathian a hikei a, mihing Pathian ahi jaw, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, mipite'n huai a jak un a thuhilh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah ua.
Pharisaite'n bel, Jesu'n Saddukaite a selkhia chih a zak un a kikhawmta ua.
Huan, a lak ua dansiammi khat in, amah ze-et in thu a dong a,
Sinsakpa, dan thu ah bang thupiak pen ahia thupipen? chi in,
Huan, aman a kiang ah, Toupa na Pathian tuh na lungtang tengteng in, na kha tengteng in, na lungsim tengteng in na it ding ahi, chih.
Huai tuh thupiak thupipen leh poimoh pen ahi.
Huan, a zom in, a kibatpih tuh hiai ahi, Nangmah na ki-it bang in na vengte leng na it ding ahi, chih.
Huai thupiak nih ah dan thu leh jawlneite thu tengteng a kikhaikhawm vek ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Pharisaite a kikhoplai un. Jesu'n amaute thu a dong a.
Kris tuh bangchi na sa ua? kua tapa ahia? A chi a. Amau tuh a kiang ah, David tapa, a chi ua.
Aman tuh a kiang uah, Bangchidan in ahia David in Kha a amah Toupa, a chih a.
Toupa'n, ka Toupa kiang ah, Na melmate na khepek nuai a ka koih ka taklam ah tu in, chia, a chih?
David in amah, Toupa, a chih ngal leh, bangchin a tapa ahi dia? a chi a.
Huan, kuamah in kam khat in leng a mah a dawng theikei ua, huai ni a kipan tuh kuamah in thu dang himhim a dong ngam nawnta kei uh.
Huan, Jesu'n mipite leh a nungjuite kiang ah thu a gen a.
Laigelhmite leh Pharisaite Mosi tutphah ah a tu jel ua,
huaijiak in a hon hilh peuhmah uh hih unla jui jel unla; amau thihhih bang jaw hih tuankei un, gen jaw a gen jel ua, a hih tuankei uh.
Puakgik haksatak a bawl ua, mite a suan uh, amau lah a khut zung un leng a suan nuamkei uh.
A thilhih tengteng uh tuh mihing muh ding in ahi, ahih jawk nak uh, a thil but uleh a khipte uh a hih lian ua, a puan mongkai uh a sau sak ua.
ankuangluina ah mun hoihpen bang kikhopna in ah tutphah hoihpen bang.
dawl mun a chibai buk bang, min, Rabbi, a chih bang uh a deihtuam se ngal nak uh.
Nou jaw, Rabbi chih in omkei un; sinsakpa khat na nei ua, nou tengteng tuh unaute na hi ngal ua.
Huan, leitung ah kuamah, Pa, chikei un: na Pa uh khat kia ahi, van a om.
Heutu chih in om samkei un, heutu khat na nei ua amah Kris ahi.
Na lak ua thupipen na sikha ua a om jawk ding ahi.
Kuapeuh kiliansak tuh a dai ding, kuapeuh kingaineu tuh pahtawi in a om ding.
Himahleh nou laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: vangam lampi mite na khak sak ngal ua: nou lah na lut ngalkei uh, mi a lut dingte lut ding leng na phalkei jel uh.
Laigelhmite leh Pharisai lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: meithai inte na negai ngal ua, thumna saupi mikhemna ding in na bawl ua: huaijiak in mohna liansem na mu ding uhi.

Nou laigelhmite leh Pharisaite, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: phungkai khat lel leng bawl ding in tuipi leh gam na pai kimvel ngal ua, huan huchi bang a a hong om tak in, amah tuh noumau lehnih in gawtmun ta in na bawl jel uh.
Nou makai mittaw, Kuapeuh Pathian biakin lou a kichiam, huai bangmah ahikei; kuapeuh Pathian biakin a dangka-eng lou a kichiam jaw tangtunsak ding ahi, chite aw, na tung uh a gik hi:
Nou mihai mittawte aw: a bang a thupi jaw a dangka-eng hia, dangka-eng siangthousak Pathian biakin?
Huan, Kuapeuh maitam lou a kichiam tuh, bangmah ahikei: a tung a thil piak om lou a kichiam peuh bel tangtunsak ding ahi, na chi uh.
Nou mittawte aw, a bang a thupi jaw a, thil piak hia thilpiak siangthousak maitam?
Huchi in, maitam lou a kichiam peuhmah jaw maitam leh a tung a om tengteng lou a kichiam hi ahi;
huan, Pathian biakin lou a kichiam peuhmah jaw Pathian biakin leh a sung a teng pa lou a kichiam hi ahi:
huan, van lou a kichiam peuhmah leng Pathian tutphah leh a tung a tupa lou a kichiam hi ahi.

Nou laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: pudinate, mohurite, zirate sawm ah khat na pe jel ua, dan thu khawk jaw- diktatna te, hehpihna te, ginomna te- na limsak ngalkei ua; himahleh hiaite eive na hih ding uh, a dangte hihlou tuanlou in.
Nou makai mittawte, thousi khisiang a sangawngsau valhte aw!
Laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: nou leh kuang polam na hihsiang ua, a sung lah lepgukna leh kideklouhna in a dim ngal a.
Nou Pharisai mittaw, nou leh kuang sunglam hihsiang masa un, a polam leng a hong sian theihna ding in.
Laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh gik hi: han nuhngou, polam kilawmtak a lang, a sunglam lah misi guhte leh nin chiteng a dim bangte na hi ngal ua.
Nou leng huchi bang tak in polam ah mihing mitmuh in diktat tak in na lang ua, na sunglam u bel lepchiahna leh gitlouhna in a dim ngal a.
Nou laigelhmi leh Pharisai, lepchiahte aw, na tung uh a gik hi: jawlneite han in na lam ua, mi diktat hante leng na jem ua.
I pipute damlai a na om hihta leng, Jawlneite sisan a suahna ua panglou ding hi hang a, na chi uh.
Huchi in jawlneite thatte ta na hi uh chih na kitheisak uhi.
Na pipute uh tehna dan uh hihdim ngal mai un.
Gulte aw, gul suante aw, Gehenna vaihawmna bang chin na pel thei ding ua?

Ngai dih ua, huaiziak mah in na kiang uah, jawlneite, mipilte, laigelhmite ka hon sawl ding; khenkhat na hihlum ding ua, kros ah na kilhden ding uh, khenkhat na kikhopna in uah savun khau in na jep ding ua, kho teng ah na sawi jel ding uh.

Huchi in, Abel mi diktat tak sisan akipan, Pathian biakin leh maitam kikal a Barak tapa Zakaria na thah uh sisan tan in, leitung a mi diktat sisan a suah tengteng uh noumau tungah a hongtung thei ding.

in tung a om in a in a bang hiam tuh ding in kumkei heh;

Ngai un, ka hon hilhkholta ahi.

huai hun chiang in Mihing Tapa chiamtehna van ah a hong lang ding. Huai hun chiang in leitung a nam tengteng in a sun ding ua, Mihing Tapa tuh thilhihtheihna leh thupina lian toh vanmei tung a hongpai a mu ding uh.

lei leh van a mang dia, ka thu a hihleh a mang kei ding.

Huai ni, thuchim tun ma khawng in, Noa long a a lut ni tan in, a ne un a dawn ua, zi leh pasal in a kinei ua;
tuichim a hongtung a, a vek ua a lak mang masiah bangmah a theikei uh; Mihing Tapa hongpai nawnna tuh huchi mahbang ahi ding.
Huai hun chiang in lou ah mi nih a om ding ua; khat tuh paimangpih in a om dia, khat tuh nutsiat in a om ding.

Huaijiak in kiging un, bangni in ahia na Toupa uh a hongpai ding na theihlouh jiak un,
Himahleh, hiai thei un, guta a hongpai hun ding innei in thei leh, a veng dia, a in a phen vang sak kei ding.
Huaijiak in nou leng kiging gige in om un, na ginlouh dak un Mihing Tapa a hongpai ding jiak in.
Sikha muanhuai, piltak, a pu'n a hun teng a a tan ding uh hawmsak ding a a inkuanpihte tung a heutu dia a koih, kuapen ahi dia le?

Ahihhang in sikha gilou in, a lungtang in, ka pu a hong zokkei ding, chi in,
a sikha hihpihte na navota henla, nekham-takhamte kiang ah ne in dawnta leh:
huai sikha pu a gintaklouh ni in, a theihlouh lai in, a hongpai ding a,

Huchi in a lak ua mi nga a hai ua, nga a pil uh.
A haite'n a khawnvakte uh a tawi un, a tui leng a tawi ngalkei ua;
a pilte'n bel a khawnvakte uh a tawi un, a um ah a tui leng a tawi uh.

Himahleh, a pilte'n, Kou leh nou a ding in a kiching kei ding; a juakte kiang ah pai unla, lei jaw un, chi in, a dawng ua,
Huan, lei ding a a paimang kal un mouneipa tuh a hong tungta a; huchi in, a mansate tuh amah toh kitenna ankuang um ding in a lut ua; huan, kongkhak a khakta uh.
Huai nung in nungak siangthou dangte leng a hongtung ua, Toupa, Toupa, hon hon in, a chi uh:
Himahleh aman tuh, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, ka hon thei ngeikei, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huchi in, ki ging un, a ni leh a hun na theihlouh jiak un.
Mi, gam dang a pai dia kisa, a sikhate sam a, a sumte a kiang ua kemsak bang ahi ngal a:
Sikha khat kiang ah talent nga a pia a, sikha dang kiang ah talent nih a pia a, sikha dang kiang ah talent khat a pia a; a hih theih hun dingdan chiat un a pia a; huan, a paita a.
Huan, talent nga mupa tuh huai in a vasumsin pah a, talent nga dang a mu kheta a,
Huchimah bang in talent nih mupa'n leng talent nih dang a mu kheta a.
Talent khat mupa bel a va kuan a, lei a tou a, a pu dangka a selgu zota.
Huan, sawtpi nung in huai sikhate pu tuh a hongpai a, a mau toh a sum tanchin a hihfelta hi.
Huan, talent nga mupa a hongpai a, talent nga dang a hon tawi a, Pu, nang talent nga non kemsak a; en dih; talent nga dang ka mukhia e, a chi a.
A pu'n a kiang ah, Sikha hoih leh muanhuai, na hih hoih hi, tawmchik tungah na muanhuai a, tampi tungah ka hon omsak ding; na pu kipahna ah lut in, a chi a.
Huan, talent nih mupa leng a hongpai a, Pu, nang talent nih non kemsak a; en dih, talent nih dang ka mukhia e, a chi a.
A pu'n a kiang ah, Sikha hoih leh muanhuai, na hihhoih e, tawmchik tungah na muanhuai a, tampi tungah ka hon omsak ding; na pu kipahna ah lut in, a chi a.
Huan, talent khat mupa leng a hongpai a, Pu, mi chihhakpi na hi chih ka hon thei a; na tuhlouhna ah leng na at nak, na thehlouhna ah leng na khawm nak ahi;
huaiziak in ka lau a, ka vapai a, na talent lei ah ka selgu a; en in, nang a ngei na mu nawn hi, a chi a.
A pu'n a kiang ah, Sikha gilou leh zongjaw, ka tuh louhna ah leng ka at a, ka thehlouhna ah leng ka khawm nak chih na thei maw?
Huchi ahih ngal leh ka dangka sumsinte kiang a na koihtak ding hi a, huchia, ka hongpai a kei a tuh a pung toh ka muh nawn ding ahi veleh.
Huaiziak in a talent khat laksak unla, talent sawm neipa kiang ah pia un.
Kuapeuh a nei tuh piak behlap ahi ding a, a hong hau ding; kuapeuh a neilou tuh a neih sun nangawn laksak ahi ding.
Huan, sikha phatuamlou tuh polam mial ah paikhia un, huai ah kah leh hagawi a om ding, a chi a, a dawng a.
Ahihhang in, Mihing Tapa, a angelte tengteng toh, a thupina a kivan a a hongpai hun chiang in, a thupina tutphah ah a tu dia;
a ma ah nam chih a kikhawm ding ua; belam chingpa'n kel lak a a belamte a khenkhia bang in amau tuh a khenkhe ding:
belamte tuh a taklam ah a koih ding a, kelte tuh a veilam ah a koih ding.
Huai hun chiang in Kumpipa'n a taklam a mite kiang ah, Ka Pa deihsakte aw, hongpai unla, khovel siam chil a pata nou a dia gam bawlsa luah un;
ka gil a kial in, nou nek ding non pia ua; ka dang a tak in, dawn ding non pia uh; mikhual ka hih in non zintun ua;
vuaktang ka hih in, puan non silhsak uh; ka chi a nat in, ka kiang a na hong jiak un, a chi ding.
Huai hun chiang in, mi diktatte'n, Toupa, Chik in ahia gilkial a kon muh ua nek ding kon piak uh? dangtak a kon muh ua, dawn ding kon piak uh?
Chik in ahia mikhual a kon muh ua, kon zintun uh? vuaktang a kon muh ua, puan kon silhsak uh?

Huan, Kumpipa'n a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka hon holh ahi, Hiai ka unau neupente lak a mi khat tung a na hih uh tuh, ka tung a hih na hi uh, chi in, a dawng ding.

Huai hun chiang in amau leng, Toupa, chik in ahia gilkial ahiam, vuaktang in hiam, china in hiam, suangkulh ah hiam kon muh ua, na kon sepsaklouh uh? chi in a dong ding uh,
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, Hiai mi neupente lak a mi khat tung a na hihlouh utuh ka tung a hihlou na hi uh, chi in, a dawng ding.
Huan, huaite khantawn gawtna ah a pai ding ua; mi diktatte tuh khantawn hinna ah a pai ding uh, a chi a.
