Ni nih nung chiang in Paikan Ankuangluina a hong om ding chih na thei ua, Mihing Tapa kilhden ding in a mansak ding uh, ahi, a chi a.

Huan, Jesu Bethani khua a, phak Simon in a a omlai in,
Numei khat alabasta bawm, thau gimlim mantampi tawi in, a kiang ah a hongpai a, an a umlai in a lu ah a sung a.

Hiai thau man tampi zuak a, mi jawngte kiang a piak theih ahi ngal a, a chi ua.

Hiai thau gimlim ka sa a sun tuh, vui ding a hon bawl ding in a hih ahi.
Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, khovel tengteng ah koi ah leng hiai Tanchin Hoih a genna peuh uah hiai numei thil hih leng amah theihgigena ding in a gen jel ding uh, a chi a.
Huai nung in sawm leh nihte lak a mi khat, Juda Iskariot a chih uh, siampu liante kiang ah a hoh a.
Amah kon mansak ding a, bang non pe ding ua? a chi a. Huan, dangka sawmthum a buksakta ua.
Huai nung tuh matsakna lemtang a zongta a.
Huan, Tanghou Silngou hellouh ni, ni masapen in nungjuite tuh Jesu kiang ah a hong ua, Paikan Ankuanglui nekna ding in koi ah ahia hon bawlsak le ung na ut? a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Khopi ah kua hiam kiang ah hoh unla, a kiang ah, Sinsakpa'n, Ka hun a naita a; nungjuite toh Paikan Ankuang na in ah ka um ding u e, a chi, vachi un, a chi a.

Mihing Tapa a tanchin a gelh bang tak un a pai ding ahi; himahleh, Mihing Tapa mansak dingpa tung a gik e: huai mipa tuh piangkei leh amah a ding in a hoihzo ding, chi in, a dawng a.

Na vek un dawn un, hiai ka sisan, khelhnate ngaihdamna ding a mi tampi dia pawt ding, thukhunna tuh ahi.

Huai zoh in amaute toh mun khat Gethsemani a chih uh a tung ua: huan, aman tuh a nungjuite kiang ah, Pam a ka vathum kal in hiai ah na tu un, a chi a.

Huchi in, siampu lianpen tuh a ding khia a, a kiang ah, Bangmah a dawnglou maw? Hiaite hon hekna bangchidan ahia? a chi a.
Jesu bel a dai dide a. Huan, siampu lianpen in a kiang ah, Pathian hing min in ka hon vau ahi, Kris, Pathian Tapa tuh na hi hia? hon hilh in, a chi a.
Jesu'n a kiang ah, Hi e. Himahleh, ka hon hilh ahi, tunung chiang in Mihing Tapa thilhihtheihna taklam a tu a, van mei tung a hongpai na mu ding uhi, a chi a.
Huan, siampu lianpen in a puansilh a botkek a, Pathian a genseta; theihpih dang bangdi'n i kiphamoh nawn dia? Ngai dih uh, Pathian a gensiatdan tuh tu in na ja uh. Bangchi nasa ua? a chi a.
Amau tuh, Si tak ahi, chi in, a dawng ua.
Huan, a mai ah chil a sia ua, a tum ua; khenkhat in a khutpek ua beng in,
Nang Kris, kua ahia hon tum? hon hilh in, a chi ua.
Huan, Peter tuh polam ah, huangsung ah a tu a: huan, nungak khat a kiang ah a hongpai a, Nang leng Jesu Galili gam a mi kiang a om na hi ve, a chi a.
Aman bel, Na thu gen ka theikei hial, chi in, a vek ua ma ah a kitheihmohbawl a.
Huan, inlam a vapawt tak in nungak dang in amah tuh a mu a, huailai a omte kiang ah, Hiai mi leng Nazaret Jesu kiang a ompa ahi ve, a chi a.
Huan, Huai mihing jaw ka theikei, chi in, kichiam in a kitheihmohbawl nawn a.
Huan, sawtlou nung in, a kiang a dingte'n, Peter kiang ah, Nang leng a lak ua mi na hi tawk vo oi, na pau ah a kithei ve, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Huai mihing jaw ka theikei, chi in, hamsia kiloh in a kichiamta a. Huan, ak a khuangpahta ngal a.
Huan, Peter in Jesu'n, Ak a khuan ma in nang thumvei non kitheihmohbawl ding, a chih thu a theithak nawnta a. Huan, a pawt a, a kap huphup hi.
Huan jingsang a hong hih in siampu liante leh vantang upate tengteng Jesu hihlum ding in a tung thu ah a kihou ua;
huan, a gak ua, a pi ua, gam ukpa Pilat kiang ah a peta ua.
Huan, Juda a mansakpa'n Jesu siamlouh a tangsak uh chih a theih tak in a kisik a, dangka sawmthum tuh siampu liante leh upate kiang ah a hon tawi nawn a.
Mi dik sisan ka khot tuh thil ka na hihkhial ahi, a chi a. Amau tuh, Huai kou a ding in bang a khawk dia? Nang na lohloh loh in, a chihsan ua.
Huan, aman tuh dangka tuh mun siangthou ah a pailut a, a paimang a; a va awklumta.
Huan, siampu liante'n dangka tuh a la ua, Hiai thohlawm bawm a koih a siangkei, sisan man ahi ngal a, a chi ua.
Huchi in, a kihou ua, mikhualte vuina ding in belvelmi mun a leita uh.
Huaizaik in ahi, huai mun tuh tutan a Sisan Mun a chih uh.
Huan, jawlnei Jeremia in a na gen, Huan dangka sawmthum, amah man ding a Israel tate lak a kuate hiam in a sak uh tuh, a lata ua;
Toupa'n hon hilh bang in belvel mi mun man ding in a pia ua, chih a hong tangtungta.
Huan, Jesu tuh gam ukpa ma ah a ding a. Huan, gam ukpa'n, Judate kumpipa na hi hia? chi in, a dong a. Huan, Jesu'n a kiang ah, Hi e, a chi a.
Huan, siampu liante leh upate'n a heklai un bangmah in a dawngkei a.
Huchi in, Pilat in a kiang ah, A hon hekna zouzai uh na za ka hia? a chi a.
Huan, kamkhat lel in leng a dawngkei a; huchi in gam ukpa'n lamdang a sa mahmah a.
Huan, gam ukpa'n ankuanglui ni in mi henta khat, a deihdeih uh, mipite a ding in a pawtsak jel a.
Huan, huailai in mi henta minthang, Barabba a chih uh a nei ua.
Huchi in, a hong kikhop un, Pilat in a kiang uah, Kua hon pawtsak leng na ut ua? Barabba hia, Jesu Kris kichi? a chi a.
Hajatna jiak in amah a mansak uh chih a thei ngal a.
Huan, vaihawmna tutphah a a tutlai in, a ji in, Huai midik tungah bangmah hih ken, tuni in amah jiak in mang in thil tampi ka thuak ahi, chi in thu a khak a.
Huan, siampu liante leh upate'n Barabba nget a Jesu hih mangthat ding in, mipite a khem ua.
Gam ukpa'n bel amau a houpih a, Amau nihte a kua jaw hon pawtsak leng chi na hi ua? a chi nawn a.
Huan, amau tuh, Barabba, a chi ua. Pilat in a kiang uah, Jesu Kris kichi, bang ka chihta dia le? a chi a. Avek un, Amah jaw kros ah kilhden in om heh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Bang di'n maw? Bang a hihkhial a ahia? a chi a. Himahleh, amau tuh, Kros ah kilhden in om heh, chi in, a kikou vengvung ua.
Huchi in, Pilat in bangmah a hih theikei a, a hong buai deuhdeuh zo ding chih a theih in, tui a la a, mipite ma ah a khut a sil a, Hiai midik sisan ah ka siang e; noumau na lohloh loh un, a chi a.
Huan, mipi tengteng in, A sisan jaw koumau tungah leh ka tate uh tungah om heh, chi in a dawng ua.
Huaikhit in Barabba tuh a pawtsak a; Jesu bel a jep a, kros a kilhden ding in a peta a.
Huai khit in, gam ukpa sepaite'n Jesu tuh inpi ah a pilut ua, a pawl ua mi tengteng a kiang ah a hongkhawm ua.
Huchi in, a puante khawng a suahsak ua, puan san a silhsak uhi.
Huan, linglukhu a phan ua, a khusak ua, a khut taklam in sialluang a tawisak ua; a ma ah a khukdin ua, Chibai, Judate kumpipa, chi in nuihza bawlna'n a nei uh.
Huan, amah chil a siat ua, sialluang a laksak ua, a lu ah a khen ua.
Huan, nuihza bawlna dia a neih khit un, puan tuh a suah sak ua, amah puante tuh a silhsak nawn ua, kros a kilhden ding in a pita uh.
Huan, a pai khiak lai un, Kurini khua a mi, a min Simon a mu ua; huai mi tuh a kros po ding in a man ua.
Huan, Golgotha kichi mun a hongtun un, (Luguh mun chihna a hi)
uain thuk, bangkhat kha toh hel, dawn ding in a pia ua, himahleh a chep tak in a dawn nuamkei a.
Huan, kros a a kilhden khit un, aisan in a puansilh tuh a kihawm ua.
Huan, huai ah a tu ua a vengta ua.
Huan, a hekna, HIAI JUDATE KUMPIPA JESU A HI, chia gelh, a lu tungah a suang uh.
Huan, amah toh, suamhat nih a kilhden lai ua, a taklam ah khat a veilam ah khat.
Huan, mi vialvak peuh in a enghou ua,
a lu uh sinkhum a, Nang Pathian biakin hihsia a ni thum a lam nawnpa, kihihdam in; Pathian Tapa na hih leh kros a kipan hong kumsuk tanla, chi in.
Huchimah bang in siampu lalte'n, laigelhmite toh, enghou in,
Mi dang bawn a hihdam jel, amah leh amah kihihdam theilou pi in. Israelte kumpipa a hihngal leh tu in kros a kipan hong kum leh a kei dia, huchi in amah tuh i gingta mai ding.
Pathian a muang na a ka, amah jaw, a ut leh tun ah hondam leh a ke; Pathian Tapa ka hi, a chi ngal a, a chi ua.
Suamhat a kilhden un leng, huchimah bang in a enghou a.
Huan dak gukna a kipan dak kua tan in khovel a hong mial vekta a.
Huan, dak kua ding khawng in, Jesu tuh ngaihtak in a kikou a, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabak thani? chi in, a kikoukhia a, huai tuh, Ka Pathian, ka Pathian bangdia hon paisan? chihna ahi.
Huan, a kiang a ding khenkhatte'n huai a jak un, Hiai mi'n Elija sam ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, a lak ua mi khat kintak in a taipah a, spanji a la a, uain thuk ah a diah dim a, chiang ah a suang a, a dawnsak tou a.
Huan, Midangte'n, Thudon dah un, amah lakhe ding in Elija a hong hiam i en ding a chi ua.
Huan, Jesu tuh ngaihtak in a kikou nawn a, a kha a khahta a.
Huan, ngai dih, Pathian biakin puanjak tuh a tunglam a kipan a nuailam tan in hong keksuakta a; huan, jin bang a hong ling a, suangpite a hong khangkham a; hante a hong kihong a;
mi siangthou ihmusate sapum tampi leng kaihthoh in a omta ua;
huaite tuh, A thoh nawn nung in, han a pat hong pawt in kho siangthou ah a lut ua, mi tampi lak ah a kilakta ua.
Huan, sepaih zaheutu leh a kiang a Jesu veng a omsamte'n, jinling leh thil omdante a muh un a lauta mahmah ua, Hiai mi Pathian Tapa ahi ngeingei, a chi ua.
Huan, huailai ah, numei tampi, a nasepsak kawm zel a Galili gam a kipan a hon juite a om ua, gamlapi ah a en ua;
huaite lak ah tuh Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob leh Joseph nu, Zebedai tapate nute a om ua.
Huan, nitaklam a honghih in, mi hau, a min Joseph Arimathai khua a, a hongpaia, amah ngei leng Jesu nungjui ahi sam a;
Huai mi tuh Pilat kiangah a vahoh a, Jesu luang a ngen a. Huan, Pilatin pe dingin thu a pia a.
Huchiin Joseph in a luang tuh a la a, puan malngat siangtakin a tuama,
A han thak, suang khuakkuak ah a sial a; han kongkhak ah suang lian pi in a delh a, a paita.
Huan, huai lai ah tuh Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang a om ua, han ma jawnah a tu ua.
Huan, a jing in, huai tuh Kiginni jing ahi, siampu liante leh pharisaite Pialt kiang ah a om khawm kheukhou ua,
Pu huai mikhemhat in, a damlai in, Ni thum nung in ka thou nawn ding, a chih ka thei gige ua.

Huchi in han tuh ni thum ni tan a veng hoih ding in thu pia in; huchilou in jaw a nungjuite'n amah a va gu kha ding ua, vantang kiang ah, Misi lak a kipan a thou nawnta ahi, a chi kha ding uh; huchin khemna nanung jaw tuh a masa sang in a hoih keizo sem ding, a chi ua.
Pilat in a kiang uah, Vengmi sepaihte na nei ve ua oi; pai unla, na hihtheih bang un veng hoihsak ta unla, a chi a.
Huchi innvengmi sepaihte toh a va hoh ua, han tuh a veng hoihsak ua, suang tuh achiamteh uh.
Huan, Khawlni nitaklam in, ni sagih ni masapen ding a khovak pat in, Mari Magdalini leh Mari dang tuh han en ding in a kuan uh a.
Huan, ngaidih, jin nakpitak in a hong ling a; Toupa angel van a kipan a hongsuk a, suang tuh a hong khukkhia a, a tungah a tuta a.
A mel omdan tuh khophia bang ahi a, a puansilhte tuh vuk bang in a ngou a;
amah a kihtak jiak un vengmite tuh a ling ua, misi bang in a hong omta uh.
Huan, angel in numeite a houpih a, a kiang uah, Nou zaw laukei un: Jesu, a kilhden uh na zong uh chih ka thei:
hiailai ah a omta kei; a gen bang ngei in a thou nawnta, a lupna mun en him un.

Huan, pai meng unla, nungjuite kiang ah, Misi lak a kipan a thou nawnta ahi; ngaidih uh, Galili gamah na ma uah a pai; huailai ah amah na mu ding uh, chi in, hilh un. Ngai dih uh, ka hon hilhta ahi, a chi a.
Huan, lau leh kipak mahmah kawm in han a kipan in a pai mengmeng ua, a nungjuite hilh ding in a taita ua.
Huan ngaidih, Jesu'n amau a tuak a, Chibai aw, a chi a. Huchi in, amau tuh a khepek khawng a len ua, chibai a buk uh.
Huan, Jesu'n a kiang uah, Laukei un, paita unla, Galili gam a pai ding in ka unaute va hilh un; huai ah tuh na hon mu ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a va pailai un vengmi sepaih khenkhat khopi ah a va lut ua, thil omdan tengteng siampu liante kiang ah a va hilh ua.
Huan, upate toh a kikhawm ua, a kihou zoh un, sepaihte kiang ah dangka tampi a pia ua,
Jan in, ka ihmut kal un, a nungjuite tuh a hong ua, amah a guta uhi, chi unla.
Huan, gam ukpa'n huai a najak leh amah leng i khem ding ua lunghimohlou ding in i bawl na ke, a chi ua.
Huchi in dangka tuh a la ua, a hilh bangbang un a hihta ua; huchi in, tutan in huai thu tuh Judate lak ah a genthang lai uh.
Himahleh, nungjui sawm leh khatte tuh Galilli gamah, Jesu'n tang a sehsak ah a hoh ua.
Huan, amah a muh un chibai a buk ua; khenkhat in bel a ginglah uh.
Huchi in, Jesu tuh a kiang uah a hong a amau tuh a houpih a, Lei leh van a thuneihna tengteng ka kiang ah piak a hita.
Huaijiak in, kuan unla, nam chih a pan nungjuite bawl unla, Pa leh Tapa leh Kha Siangthou min in baptis unla,
thu kon piak tengteng pom ding in thuhilh un. Huan, ngai un, kei khantawn in, khovel tawp pha in leng, na kiang uah ka om jel ding, a chi hi.
Pathian Tapa Jesu Kris Tanchin Hoih tun tungna
Jawlnei Isai laibu ah, Ngaidih, ka sawltak na maah ka sawla, aman na lampi a bawl ding.
Gamdaia mi kikou aw in, Toupa lamlian sial unla, a lampite hihtang un, a chi, chia gelh bangin.
Johan, gamdaia baptispa, thilhihkhelh ngaihdamna dinga kisikna baptis thu genin, a hongpawt a,
Huan, Judia gama mi tengteng leh Jerusalem khua a mi tengteng a pawt ua, a kiang lamah a pai ua, a khelhnate uh thupha tawiin Jordan luiah, a kiangah baptisma a tang chiat ua.
Huan, Johan tuh sangawngsau mul puanin a kivana, a kawng savun kawnggakin a gaka a an tuh khaukhup leh khuaiju ahi.
Huan, Ka nungah kei sanga thupijaw a hong lel ahi; kuna a khedap khau phel tak leng ka hi kei.
Ken tuiin nou ka honbaptis jel a; aman jaw Kha Siangthouin a honbaptis ding, chiin a gen a.
Huan, huai nite khawngin hichi a honghi a, Jesu Galili gama Nazaret khuaa kipanin a hongpaia, Jordan lui ah Johan baptisma tansakin a om.
Huaitak in; tui apat a pawtin, van kihonga, Kha vakhu banga a tunga hongkum a mu a,
Huan, Nang ka Tapa deihtak na hi a, na tungah ka kipak mahmah ahi, chiin, van a kipanin aw a hongpawt a.
Huan, Khain amah tuh gamdai ah a sawlpah ngala.
Huchiin, Setan khem kawmin gamdai ah ni sawmli a om a, gamsa lakah bang a om a; angelten a na a sep sak uh.
Huan, Johan mat a om nungin, Jesu, Pathian Tanchin Hoih genin, Galili gamah a honga.
A hun a hongtungta a, Pathian gam leng a hongnaita; kisik unla Tanchin Hoih gingta un, chiin.
Huan, Galili dil gei a nawk laiin Simon leh Simon unaupa Andru dil ah len paiin a mu a; nga manmi ahi him ua.
Huan, Jesun, a kiang uah, Honjui un, huchiin mihing man din ka honbawl ding, a chi a.
Huan, len khawng paisanin a jui pah ua.
Huan, saulou a pai leh Zebedai tapa Jakob leh a unau pa Johan a mu a, huaite tuh len bawl phain long mahah a om ua.
Huan, aman amau a sam pah a; huchiin, a pa uh Zebedai tuh kilohmite a goihte utoh longah a nusia ua, a juita uh.
Huan, Kapernaum khua ah a valut ua; huan, Khawlniin kikhopna in ah a lut a, thu a hilh a.
A thuhilh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah ua; laigelhmite banglou a, theihna nei hileh kilawm taka amau thu a hilh jiakin.
Huan, a kikhopna in uah dawi nin paimi khat ana om a; aman tuh,
Nazaret Jesu, kou leh nang banga hia i kizoolhna om? Kou honhimang dia hong na hi maw? Nang ka honthei a, Pathian Mi Siangthou na hi, chiin, a kikou khe pah ngala.
Huan, Jesun a taia, Dai inla, a sunga kipanin hongpawt in, a chi a.
Huan, dawi ninin amah engbawla ngaihtaka kikouin a sunga kipan a hongpawt ta a.
Huan, a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, huchiin, Hiai bang ahia le? thuhilhna thak ahi ve! Dawi ninte nangawn thunei takin thu a pia a, a thu a mang jel uh, chiin, a kidong uh.
Huan, Galili gam kim tengtengah gam chih ah a tanchin a thang pah ta a.
Huan, kikhopna in akipan a pawt un, Jakob leh Johan toh Simon leh Andru in ah a lut pah ua.
Huan, Simon ji nu khosikin a chi a na a, a na lum a; huchiin, a tanchin tuh Jesu a hilh pah ua.
Huan, aman a khut a valen a, a phongta a; huchiin a khosik a damta a, a na uh a sepsakta.
Huan, nitaklama ni a tum nungin, damlou tengteng leh dawi matte a kinagah a honpi ua.
A khojang un kongkhak ah a hongom khawm kheukhou ua.
Huan, mi tampi natna chitenga nate a hihdama, dawi tampi a delhkhia a; dawiten amah a theih jiak un a pau uh a phal kei.
Huan, jingsangin, khovak ma tham in a thoua, a pawta, gamdai mun ah a vahoha, huaiah a thum a.
Huan, Simon leh a lawmten a nungah a jui ta ua.
huan, amah a vamuh un a kiangah, Mi tengtengin hongzong hi ve un, a chi ua.
Huan aman tuh a kiang uah, Mun dangah kho naite khawngah hohni, huailai khawng banga leng thu ka gen theihna dingin; huaimah lah ka hongpawt san ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huchiin thu hilha dawite delhkhe kawm jelin Galili gam tengteng a a kikhopnain uah te a lut jel hi.
Huan, a kiangah phak a hongpaia, Na ut leh non hihsiangthou thei, chiin, ama ah khukdinin, a ngen ngutngut a.
Huan, aman tuh a na hehpih mahmaha, a sawka, a khoiha, Ka ut hi, na siangthouta in, a chi a.
Huchiin, phaknain tuh amah a taisan pah ngala, hong siangthouta hi.
Huan, Jesun amah a kham bikbeka, a sawlkhe paha.
Kuamah kianga bangmah gen lou dingin pilvang in; a hihhangin siampi kiangah vakilak inla, na kisiansakna dingin Mosi in thil a sehte lan in, a theihchetna ding un, a chi a.

Himahleh, amah tuh a pawta, huai thu nakpi taka tangkoupihin a than jakta a; huchiin Jesu tuh a langtangin khua ah a lut theita kei a, gamdai mun khawngah a om zota; huan, mun teng apatin a kiangah mite a hong jel uh.
Huan, ni bangzah hiam nungin Kapernaum khuaa a honglut nawn leh, in ah a om chih thu a hongthangta a.
Huchiin, kongkhak kim a leng omna ding himhim omlou khop hialin mi tampi a hongkhawmta ua; huan a kiang uah thu a genta a.
Huan, mijaw khat, mi li jawn, a kiangah a honpi ua.
Huan, mipi jiaka a kiang naia a hongtheih louh jiakun a omna in tung uh a hong ua; huan, a laihong khit un a a lupna tuh a tunga mijaw lum kawmin a khai khe suk ua.
Huchiin, Jesun a gin dan uh a na muhin, mijaw kiangah, Ka ta, na khelhnate ngaihdam a hita, a chi a.
Huan, laigelhmi khenkhatte huai laiah a tu ua.
Hiai min bangdia hichi bang thu gen ahia? Pathian a gnsia hi; mi khat, Pathian kia loungal, kuan ahia khelhnate ngaidam thei? chiin, a lungtang un a ngaihtuah ua.
Huan, Jesun, a lungtang un huchibangin a ngaihtuah uh chih a lungsimin ana thei paha, a king uah, Huai thu bang dia na lungtang ua ngaihtuah na hi ua?
Mijaw kiangah, Na khelhnate ngaihdam a hita, chih leh, Na lupna la inla, kein paita in, chih a koi ahia a gen nuam jaw?
Abang abang hileh, leitung ah Mihing Tapain khelhnate ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na theihna dingun, mijaw kiang ah
Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na in ah pai in, ka honchi, a chi a.
Huchiin amah tuh a thou, a lupna a la paha, a vek ua mitmuhin a pai kheta a; huchiin a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah uh, Hichi bang himhim i mu ngei kei, chiin, Pathian a phat uh.
Huan, a awt nawna dil geiah a paita a, huan, mipi tengteng a kiangah a vahoh ua, thu a nahilha.
Huan, a pai kawmin, Levi, Alphai tapa,. siahpiakna muna tu a mu a, a kingah, Honjui in, a chi a. Huan a thu a a juita a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Jesun Levi in ah an a um a, siahkhonmite leh mi khialte tampiiin Jesu leh a nungjuite tuh a umpih chiat ua, amah juite tampi ahi ngal ua.
Huan, Pahrisaite laka laigelhmiten Jesun mi khialte leh siahkhonmite kianga a nek a muh un, a nungjuite kingah, Bang chi dan ahia siahkhonmite leh mi khialte kainga a neka a dawn? a chi ua.

Huan, Jesun huai a ja a, a kiang uah, Mi hatten daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damlouten a kiphamoh jaw uh; mi diktatte sam dinga hong ka hi keia, mi khialte sam dinga hong ka hi keia, mi khialte sam dinga hong ka hi jaw, a chi a.
Huan, Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaiten an a ngawl ua; huan mi a hong ua, Jesu kiangah, Bang dia Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite, nungjuiten an ngawl ua, na nungjuiten a ngolh sam louh uh? a chi ua.
Jesun a kiang uah, Mou pite kianga a pasal ding a om laiteng mou piten an a ngawl thei ua hia? A pasal ding a kiang ua a om laiteng a ngawl theikei ding uh.
Himahleh, a pasal ding a kiang ua kipana pi mang nite a hongtung dinga, huai ni chiangin jaw a ngawl ding uh.
Kuamahin puan lui puan tuikhai nai louh themin a thuap ngei kei uh; thuap le uh, a thuap bit na dingin a kai kek dinga, a thakin a lui a kai kek dinga, a hongkek semsem ding.

Huan, kuamah-in uain thak, savun uain thawl lui ah a thun ngei kei uh; thun le uh, uain in savun thawl a phu kham dinga, uain a mangthang ding, savun thawl mah leng; uain thak tuh savun uain thawl thak ah a thun zonak uh, a chi a.

Huan, aman tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih a la-a, van lam en in a vualjawla, tanghou phelte a balkhamta-a, a ma ua lui dingin a nungjuite kiangah a pia a; ngasa nih leng huaite tengteng lakah a hawm jakta a.
Huan, a vek un a ne ua, a kham chiat uh.
Huan, tanghou neu leh ngasa nente tuh bawm sawm leh nih dimin a luak uh.
Tanghouphel nete tuh pasal piching ngen sang nga ahi uh.
Huan, amahmahin mipi a kikhensak sangin gal khat lama Bethsaida khuaa napai masa dingin a nungjuite longah a tuang sak teitei pah a.
Huan, amau a kikhensak nungin thum dingin tangah a hohta a
Huan, nitaklam a honghihin, long tuh dil lai takah a omta a, amah kiain gamah a om a.
Huan, a long kalh uah amau mangbangin amu a, huihin a hilou lamah a sawn ngala. Huchiin phalvak ding kuan laitakin dil tunga khea paiin amau lam a honjuan a, amau paisuaksan a tum a.
Himahleh, amau amah dil tungah khea pai a muh un sikha khattou a sa ua, a kikou khia uh;
A vek un amah a mu ua, a lau mahmah ngalua. Himahleh aman amau a houpih pah a, a kiang uah, khamuang takin om un, keimah ka hi, lau kei un, a chi a.
Huan, longah a kiang uah a tuangtou sam a, huih tuh a dai maimah. Huan, lamdang a nak sak mahmah uh.
Tanghou thu khawng lah a theisiam kei hial ua, a lungtang uh a tak ngala.
huan, gal khat lam a kai un Gennesaret gam a tung ua, luipiau ah long a khih ua.
Huan, long akipana a pawt nungun miten amah a na theipah ua,
Huai gam kim tengtengah a tai duamduam ua, a om chih a jakna peuh uah damloute a lupna un a honjawng hial ua.

Huan, kho neu ah bang, kho lian ah bang, khota ah bang, koi peuh ah leng a lut-na ah damloute dawl mun bangah a lumsak ua, a puan mong bek khoih theih a ngen ngutngut ua, huan amah khoih peuhmah bel a dam jel uh.
Huan, Pharisaite leh laigelhmite laka mi kuate hiam, Jerusalem khua akipana hong, a kiangah a hongkikhawm ua.
Huaiten tuh a nungjui khenkhatten khut ninpia tanghou a nek uh a namuta ua, Nin, chih tuh, sil louh, chihna ahi.
Pharisai leh Juda tengtengin, Upate thugousiah a pom chinten jiak un a khut uh houhtaka a sil kei uleh a ne ngei kei uh.
(Huan, dawl mun akipana a pai un leng a kisil phot kei uleh a ne ngei kei uh. Huan, thugousiah dang tampi a chin uh a om, nou, bel, taubelte sil khawng bang).
Huchiin, Pharisaite leh laigelhmiten, Bang achia na nungjuite upate thugousiah bangbanga om loua, khut ninpia tanghou ne nak uh ahia? chiin, a dong ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Isaiin nou mi lepchiahte thu a nagenkhol dik hilhial ve, Hiaiten a mukun a honpahtawi ua, a lungtangun lah hon gamlat ngial ngal uh.
Abang abang hitaleh, a thuhilhna ua mihing thupiakte a hilh jiakun a honbiak u tuh a thawn lel ahi, chih gelh bangin.
Pathian thupiakte khulin mihing thugousiah na len chinten ua eive, a chi a.
Huan, amahmahin, a kiang uah, Na thugousiah khawng uh na zuih theihna ding ua Pathian thupiakte na deih louh ujaw, lem na thei hial ve ua:
Mosiin, Na nu leh na pa pahtawiin, Kuapeuh a nu hiam a pa hiam gensia tuh si mahmah heh, a chi ngal a;
Nou tuh hichi bangin na chi ua, Min, a nu hiam, a pa hiam kiangah, Non phatuampihna ding Korban a hita, a chih leh, (huai tuh, Pathian kianga piak, chihna ahi a),
A nu ading hiam, apa ading hiama bangmah hihsak na phal nawn kei nak uh.
Na thugousiah uh mi na piak sawnsawnna un Pathian thu bangmahlou na suah uhi; huai bang thil tampi na hih uh, a chi a.
Huan, mipite a sam nawna, a kiang uah, Na vek un ka thu ngaikhia unla, theisiam un:
Mihing polama kipana a sunga lut amah hihnin thei bangmah a om kei; mihing sunga kipana hongpawt, huaite ngei tuh mihing hihnin ahi jaw hi.
Kuapeuh jakna dinga bil neiin, ja hen, a chi a.
Huan, mipite ina a lut san nungin a nungjuiten gentehna thu amah a dong chianta ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Nou leng huchitela theihsiamna neilou na hi u maw? Bangpeuh polam akipana mihing sunga lut in tuh, amah a hihnin theikei chih na theikei ua hia?
A lungtangh sunga lut lou a, a gil sunga a lut jawk jiakin leh dailenna pawt khe mai a hih jiakin, a chi a. (Huai tuh an chiteng a siang, a chihna a hi).
huan, amahmahin, Mihing sunga pata hongpawtin, huai ngeingeiin mihing a hihnin nak ahi.
Sung lama, mihingte lungtanga kipanin, ngaihtuahna gilou bang a hongpawt nak:
Kingaihna bang, guktakna bang, tualthahna bang, angkawmna bang, enna bang, gitlouhna bang, khemhatna bang, bevenna bang, hajatna bang, gensiatna bang, kisaktheihna bang, haihuainate khawng:
Hiai thil giloute tengteng tuh sung lama kipanin a hongpawt a, mihing a hihnin nak, a chi a.
Huan, a thou-a, huaia kipanin Tura leh Sidon uk ah a paita-a; huan, in ah a lut-a, kuamah theih a deih keia; himahleh a kisel thei ngal keia.
huchiin, numei khat, a tanu naupang chik dawi nin paiin, a tanchin a naza paha, a khe bulah a khupboh-a.
Numei tuh Grik mi ahia, pianna lam ah Suro-Phoinikimi ahi. Aman tuh a tanu sunga kipana dawi delh khe dingin a ngena.
Huan, aman a kiangah, Tate hongvah masa uhen aw; tate tanghou lak-saka uite kianga paih kilawm lou hi, a chi a.
Aman a kiangah, Toupa, hihjaw ahi a, a hihhangin dohkan nuaia uiten leng tate tanghou nen khawng a ne jel sam vo oi, chiin, a dawng a.
huan, aman, a kiangah, Na thu gen jiakin paita ve le: dawi na tanu sunga kipan a pawtta hi, a chi a.
Huan, a in-ah a pai-a, a tanu, dawiin a pawt khiaksan, lupnaa lum a vamuta.
Huan, Tura gam akipanin a pawt nawna, Sidon khua tawn in Dekapoli gam pai kan jelin Galili dil a tungta a.
Huan, mi khat bengngawng, pau leng pau kichian theilou a kiangah hontonpih ua, a tunga khut koih dingin a ngen ua.
Huan, aman tuh mipi laka kipanin amah kiain a pi tuam a, a khut zungte bangin a bil sung khawng a khoih a, huan, chil a sia a, a lei a khoiha;
Huan van lam enin a ha huaia, a kiangah Ephatha, a chi a. Huai tuh, Hong kihong in, chihna ahi.
Huchiin, a bilte khawng a hongkihonga, a lei gakna leng a hongkiphel a, chiantakin a pauthei ta.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, kuamah hilh louh ding a chi bikbeka; himahleh a nak kham phetin, a nak tangkou pih zo sem ua.
Aman bangkim hoihtakin a hiha; bengngongte nangawn a pausak jel, a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huai ni khawngin, mipi tampitak a hongom nawn ua, nek ding bangmah a neikei ua, aman a nungjuite a sama, a kiang uah,
Mipi honte tuin ka kiangah ni thum a omta ua, nek ding bangmah a neih louh jiak un ka hehpih mahmah hi;
Anngawlin a in uah pai sak leng lam kalah a bah kha ding uh; khenkhatte khol houh a hongpaina uh a gamla mahmah ngala, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuiten, min hiai gamdai ah koia tanghouin ahia hiai khawngte a hihtai theih ding uh? chiin, amah a dawng ua.
Huan, aman, Tanghouphel bangzah na nei ua? chiin, amau a donga. Huan, amau, Phel sagih, a chi ua.
Huan, mipite leia tu dingin thu a pia a; tanghouphel sagih a la-a, kipahthu a gen khitin a balkhama, ama ua lui dingin a nungjuite kiangah a piaa; huan, mipite ma ah a luita uh.
Ngasa tawmchik leng a nei ua; aman vual a jawl a, huaite leng a ma ua lui dingin thu a pia a.
Huchin, a ne ua, a kham chiat ua; a khamval nen u leng bawm sagih dimin a luak uh.
Amau tuh sang li khawng ahi ua; huan, aman amaute a paisakta hi.
Huan, amah tuh a nungjuite kiangah long ah a tuangpah ngala, Dalmanutha gam a tungta.
Huan, Pharisaite a hongsuak ua, amah zeetna dingin, amah laka van akipana chiamtehna zongin amah a selta uh.

Huan, amah tuh a lungsimin nakpiin a thum a, Bang achia tulai khangthakten chiamtehna zong uh ahia? Chihtaktakin ka hon hilh ahi, tulai khangthakte kiangah chiamtehna himhim piak ahi kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, amaute a pai sana, long ah a tuang nawna, gal khat lamah a paita a.
Huan, a nungjuiten tanghou a tawi mangngilh ua, tanghouphel khat kia lou ngal longah tanghou dang himhim lah a nei ngal kei ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Pharisaite silngou leh Herod silngou lakah kiveng unla, pilvang un, a chi a.
Huan, amau, Tanghou i nei het kei, chiin, a kingaihtuah ua.
Huan, Jesun huai a theihin, a kiang uah, Bangdia tanghou na neih louh jiakua kingaihtuah na hi ua? Tu nangawnin na theithei sam kei u-maw? theisiam sam loulai maw? na lungtang uh na taksakta ua hia?
Mit nei napiin na mu kei ua hia? bil nei napiin na za kei ua hia? Theigige lou maw?
Sangnga laka tanghouphel nga ka balkhap laiin a nen bawm bangzah ahia na luah dim uh? a chi a. Huan, amau a kiangah, Sawm leh nih, a chi uh.
Huan, sangli lak sagih ka balkhap laiin, a nen bawm bangzah ahia na luah dim uh? a chi a. Huan, amau a kiangah, Sagih, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, akiang uah, Tu nangawnin na theisiam kei lai uh maw? a chi a.
Huan, Bethsaida a hong tung ua. Huan, a kiangah mittaw a honpi ua, amah khoih dingin a ngen ua.
Huan, aman mittaw khut a lena, khua a kipanin a pi khia a; huan, a mit ah chil a sia a, a tunga khut a koih khitin, Khua na mu thei hia? chiin a donga.
Huan, a hondak khia a, Mihing ka mu a; singpai bangin ka mu, a chi a.
Huan, a mitah a khut a koih nawna, huan, aman a en gegu a, a hongdam maimah a, bangkim chiantakin a mutheita.
Huan, Jesun, Khua ah leng lut ken, chiin, a in ah a paisakta.
Huan, Jesu leh a nungjuite a hongpai jel ua, Kaisari Philipi khua te a hongtung ua; huan, pai kawmin a nungjuit kiangah, Miten kei kua ahi a honchi ua? chiin, a donga.
Huan, amau, Baptispa Johan ahi, a honchi uh; midangin, Elija ahi, a honchi ua; khenkhatin bel, Jawlnei kua hiam ahi, a honchi uh, chiin, a hilh ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, A hihleh nou kei kua ahi non chi ua? chiin, a dong a, Peterin akiangah Kris tuh na hi, chiin, a dawnga.
Huan, aman a tanchin kuamah hilh louh ding a chi bikbek a.
Huan, Mihing Tapain thil tampi a thuak dingte, upate, siampu lalte, laigelhmite deih louh a a om ding khawng, hihlupa a om ding khawng, ni thum nunga a thoh nawn ding khawng amaute a hilh panta a.
Huai thute tuh chian takin a gen ahi. Huan, Peterin amah a pi tuama, a tai a.
Amah bel a hongkihei a, a nungjuite munin, Peter a tai a, Setan, ka nungah pai in, Pathian thilte ngaihtuah louin, mihing thilte na ngaihtuah jaw ahi, a chi a.
Huan, mipite, a nungjuite toh, a sam a, a kiang uah, Kuapeuhin honzuih a ut leh, amah kingaihsak louin, a kros puin honjui hen.
Kuapeuh ahinna humbit utin a tan dia; kuapeuh keimah jiak leh Tanchin Hoih jiaka a hinna tanin a humbit ding.
Min khovel a pumin a nei henla, a hinna tan jel leh, amah adingin bang a phatuam dia?
Min a hinna tangdin bang a pe thei dia?

Kuapeuh tulai khangthak angkawm leh thil gilou chingte laka keimah leh ka thu zumpih tuh, Mihing Tapain, angel siangthoute toh a Pathupinaa kivana a hong hun chiangin, huai mi tuh a honzumpih thuk sam ding, a chi a.
Huan, amahmahin, a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Hiaia ding a khente, Pathian gam thilhihtheihna toh hongtung a muh ma ua, sihna chiamlou hial ding a om uh, a chi a.
Huan, ni guk nungin Jesun Peter, Jakob, Johan a pi a, a tuamin tang sang tak ah amau kia a pai touh piha; a ma uah a mel omdan a hongkidangta a.
Huchiin, a puansilhte leia puan sawpmi himhimin a sawp ngou theih louh khop hiala ngou velvolin a hongngouta a.
Huan, Elija leh Mosi a kiang uah a hongkilak ua, Jesu toh a kihou khawm ua.
Huan, Peterin Jesu a houpih a, Heutupa, ei din hiaia om a hoih; aidakbuk thum i khoh ding a, nang din khat, Mosi din khat, Elija din khat, a chi a.
A lau mahmah jiakun, gen dingpen leng a theingal kei a.
Huan, amau liahin mei a hongkaia; meiah aw a hongsuaka, Hiai ka Tapa deihtak ahi, amah thu ngai un, a chi a.
Huan, kintakin a kim vel a en ua, amau kiangah Jesu kia lou kuamah a muta kei uh.
Huan, tang akipana a pai suk laiun, Mihing Tapa misi laka kipana a thoh nawn khit mateng a thil muhte uh kuamah hilh louh ding a chi bikbek a.
Huchiin, huai thu tuh a vom kinken ua, Misi laka pat thohnawn pen bang chihna hi ding ahia chih a kidong uh.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Bangchidana laigelhmiten, Elija a hong masa ding a-hi, chi ahi ua? chiin, a dong ua.

Huan, Aman a kianguah, Bangkim bawlhoih thak dingin Elija hongpai masa him ahi; ahihleh thil tampi a thuak dinga, muhdaha mawkbawlin a om ding chi-a mihing Tapa tungthu bangchidana gelha na om ahia leh? a chi a.
Himahleh ka honhilh ahi, Elija jaw a hong khin thamta hi, huan, a tanchin a gelh bang ngei un a tungah a utut un a hihkhin him u hi, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuite kiang a tun suk un, a kim ua mipi tampitakte leh laigelhmiten a nasel lai uh a mu suk ua.
Huan, mipi tengtengin amah a muh tak un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a kiang ah a tai pah ua, chibai a vabuk kheukhou uh.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Amau toh bang thu ahia na kisel uh? chiin a donga.
Huan, mipi laka mi khatin a kiangah, Sinsakpa, ka tapa, dawi pautheilou nei, na kiangah ka honpi a;
a matna peuhah a puksak ekek a; huchiin, a chilphuan bang a kia a, a ha bang a gawia, a gawng huthut a; huchiin, na nungjuiten delhkhe le uh ka chih leh, a hihthei ngal kei ua, chiin a dawnga.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Khangthak ginna neiloute aw, bangtan na kiang ua om ding a bangtan honthuakthei ding ka hia? amah ka kiangah honpi in, chiin, a dawng a.
Huan, amah tuh Jesu kiangah a honpi ua; huan, dawiin amah a muh takin naupang tuh nakpitakin a sawi paha; huchiin, lei ah a puka, chilphuan ke jeju in a kikhuk volvola.
Huan, aman, a pa kiangah, Hichi banga a hongkipatna bangtan a hita a? chiin, a donga. Aman, A naupan laia kipan a hita;
huchiin, amah hihmangthang dingin tamveipi mei ah leh, tui ah a sawnpuk a; himahleh, nang bang chichi hiam beka na hih theih leh honhehpih inla, honhuh in, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Na hih theih leh e: a gingtamia dingin bangkim hihtheih ei ve, a chi a.
Huchiin, naupang pan tuh, ka gingta hi, ka ginlahna ah honhuh in, chiin, a kikou khe pah ngal a.
Huan, Jesun mipi hongtai khawm lai a muhin, dawi nin a taia, a kiangah, Nang dawi pautheilou leh bengngong, thu ka honpia hi, a sunga pat hongpawt inla, lut nawn ken, a chi a.
Huchiin, a kikou kheta a, Nakpitaka a sawi khitin a hongpawtta a, huan, naupang tuh misi luang bangin a oma; huchiin mi tamzoten, A si ahi, a chi uh.
Jesun bel a khut a lena, a kaithou a; huan a hong thou maimahta a.
Huan, Jesu ina a valut leh, a nungjuiten, Bangchi-a kou delhkhe theilou ka hi ua leh? chiin, a simin a dong ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Hichi bang jaw thumna kia loungalin bangchi mahin a pawt theikei, a chi a.
Huan, huaia kipan a pai khia ua; Galili gam a pai kan ua, kuamah theih a deih kei.
A nungjuite lah thu a hilh ngala, a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa mihingte khuta matsakin a om dia, a hihlum ding ua; huan, a hihlup nung uh ni thum nungin a thou nawn ding, achia.
Himahleh, a thu gen tuh a theisiam kei ua, amah lah a dong ngam ngal kei uh.
Huan, Kapernaum khua ah a hongtung ua; huan, in sunga a om laiin, amau kiangah, Huai lampi ah bangthu ahia na kisel uh? chiin, a donga.
Himahleh, lampi ah, I lak uah kua I thupipen ding? chia a na kisel khit jiak un a dai dide uh.
Huan, amah a tu a, sawm leh nihte a sama, a kiang uah, Kuapeuhin masapen hih a ut leh mi tengteng sangin nanungpenin a om ding ahi, mi tengteng na semin a om ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, naupang chik khat a kaia, a lak uah a dingsaka: huan, a poma, a kiang uah,

Kuapeuh ka min jiaka hichibang naupang chik khat leng kipahpih tuh keimah honkipahpih ahi ding, kuapeuh kei honkipahpih tuh, kei honkipahpih ahi kei ding ua, honsawlpa kipahpih ahi zo ding uh, a chi a.
Johanin a kiangah, Sinsakpa, kuahiam na mina dawite delhkhia ka mu ua; honzuih louh jiakin ka kham uh, achia.
Jesun, Kham nawn kei un; kuamah ka mina thil thupi hih ngala kei hon gense pah thei a om kei.
Kuapeuh ei hondou lou tuh i lama pang ahi ngal ua.
Kuapeuh Kris mi na hih jiak ua tui nou khat dawn ding honpia tuh, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, a kipahman a tan kei hial ding.
Huan kuapeuh hon gingta neu chik chikte laka khat leng hihpuk tuh, a ngawng ah buh gawi janna suang lianpi oksakin tuipi ah khe le uh, amah adingin a hoih zo ding ahi.
Huan, na khutin a honhihpuk leh, tan khia in; melhema hinnaa lut nang adingin a hoihjaw, khutnih neia gawtmun mei mit theiloua pai sangin,
a than uh a sih louha, meikuang mih louhna ah.
Huan, na khein a honhihpuk leh, tan khia in; khebaia hinnaa lut nanga dingin a hoih-jaw, khe nih neia gawtmuna paiha om sangin,
a than uh a sih louha, meikuang mih louhna ah.
Huan, na mitin a honhihpuk leh, khel khia in; mit lang khat neia Pathian gama lut nanga dingin a hoihjaw, mit lang nih neia gawtmuna paiha om sangin,
a than uh sih ngei louhna leh mei mih ngei louhna ah.
Mi chih meia soh ala om ding ahi ngal a.
Chi tuh a hoih hi; himahleh, chi leng a pen khit aleh bangin a hih-al nawnding ua? Noumau ngeiah chi nei unla, kihouthei un, a chi a.
Huan, a dinga, huaia kipanin Judia gamah leh Jordan gal ah a paita a; huan, mipite tuh a kiangah a hongkikhawm ua; huchiin, a hih ngeingei danin amau thu a hih nawn a.
Huan, Pharisai khenkhat a kiangah a hong ua, amah zeetna dingin, Min ji a mak a siang hia? chiin, a dong ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Mosiin bang chiin thu a honpia a? chiin, a dawng a.
Huan, amau, Mosiin kimakna lai gelha mak a phal jel hi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, Jesun a kiang uah, Na lungtang khauh jiakun aka huai thupiak nou dia a hon gelh sak.
Himahleh leitung pian tunga kipanin, Pathianin amau tuh numei leh pasal-in a siam ahi.
Huai thu jiakin pasalin a nu leh a pa a paisan dinga, a ji a len chinten ding;
huchiin, a nih un sa khat a honghi ta ding ua; huan nih ahi nawn ta kei ua, sa khat a honghi zota ding uh.
Huaijiakin Pathianin a gawmsa mihingin khen kei heh, achia.
Huan, in ah a nungjuiten huai thu tuh amah a dong nawn ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Kuapeuh a ji ma a, mi dang nei in a ji tuh ang a kawm san ahi;
Aman leng a pasal a khena, mi dang a neih leh, angkawm ahi sam hi, a chi a.
Huan, a khoih dingin a kiangah naupang neute a honpi ua; huan, nungjuiten a na tai ua.
Himahleh, Jesun huai a muhin a lunghikei mahmaha, nungjuite kiangah, Naupang neute ka kiangah honpaisak unla, kham kei un; Pathian gam huchibang mitea ahi ngala.
Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Kuapeuh Pathian gam naupang neuten a kipahpih banga kipahpih lou tuh a sungah a lutkei hial ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, amau a pom a, a tunguah a khut a koiha vual a jawlsakta a.
Huan, pai dinga a pawt laiin mi khat amah lamah a hongtaia, a ma ah a khukdin a, a kiangah, Sinsakpa hoih, khantawna hinna ka tan theihna dingin bangchin ka hih ding? chiin, a dong a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Bangdia hoih honchi? mi khat kia loungal kuamah hoih a om kei uh, huai tuh Pathian ahi.
Thupiakte khawng na thei vo oi - Tual that ken, Angkawm ken, Gu ken, Hek ken, Khem ken, Na nu leh na pa pahtawiin, chih khawng, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Sinsakpa huai tengteng ka naupan laia kipanin ka jui jel, a chi a.

Huan, Jesun amah a en a, a itta a, a kiangah, Hihding khat nei lai chia; pai inla, na neih peuhmah juak inla, tagahte kiangah pia in, huchiin vanah gou na nei ding; huan, hongpai inla, honjui in, a chi a.
Ahihhangin, huai thu ah a mel a hongmual a, lungkham takin a pai mangta; sum tampi nei mi a hih jiakin.
Huan, Jesun a en vialviala, a nungjuite kiangah, Sum haute Pathian gama lut haksat tuak namai e, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuiten a thugen lamdang a sa mahmah ua. Jesun bel a dawnga, a kiang uah, Naute aw, sum muangte din Pathian gama lut a haksa thei ngei.
Mihausa Pathian gama lut sangin sangawngsau phim bila lutpaisuak a baihlam jaw, a chi a.
Huan amau tuh lamdang a naksak mahmah ua, a kiangah, Ahihleh, kua hotdam ahi thei dia? a chi ua.
Jesun amau a ena, Huaijaw mihing din hih vual ahi keia, Pathiana din bel hihvual louh ahi kei: Pathian adin bangkim hih theih ahi ngala, a chi a.
Peterin a kiangah, Ngai dih, kou bangkim paisanin kon jui ua, chiin, a hon gen pana.
Jesun, Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, kuapeuh keimah jiak leh Tanchin Hoih jiaka in hiam, unaupate hiam, unaunute hiam, nu hiam, pa hiam, tate hiam, gamte hiam, paisante tuh,
tu dam sung mahmahin, inte, unaupate, sanggamnute, nute, tate, gamte a leh jain, sawinate toh, mu lou ding mahmah a omkei; hun hongtung dinga khantawna hinna toh.
Himahleh, mi tampi masapena omte tuh nanungpen a honghi ding uh, nanungpente leng masapen a honghi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Jerusalem khuaa hohtou dingin lampi ah a om ua; Jesun a ma uh a kai a; amau tuh lamdang a sa mahmah ua; a honjuiten a kihta uh. Huan, aman tuh sawm leh nihte a pi tuam nawn a,

Ngai dih ua, Jerusalem khua ah hohtou ding i hi ua; Mihing Tapa siampu liante leh laigelhmite kianga matsakin a om ding; huan, amau si dingin a tungah thu a hihpuk ding ua, Jentelte kiangah a pe ding uh;
Huan, amau tuh nuihza bawl nan a nei ding ua, chil a siat ding ua, a vo ding ua, a hihlum ding uh; huan, ni thum nungin a thou nawn ding, chiin, a tunga thil hongtung dingte amau a hilhta a.
Huan, Zebedai tapa Jakob leh Johanin amah a honnaih ua, a kiangah, Sinsakpa na kianga kon nget ding peuh uh non hihsak ka ut uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Nou adin bang honhihsak leng na ut ua? achia.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Na thupina ah na taklam ah khat, na veilam ah khat hontusak in, a chi ua.
Jesun tuh, a kiang uah, Na nget uh na theikei ua ahi. Ka nou dawn ding na dawn theiding ua hia? ka baptisma tan ding leng na tang thei ding ua hia? a chi a.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Thei e, a chi ua. Huan, Jesun, a kiang uah, Ka nou dawn ding na dawn ding ua, ka baptisma tan ding leng na tang ding ua:
himahleh ka taklam ah hiam, ka veilam ah hiama tut ding thu jaw kei piak ding a-hi keia, a bawlsakte uh ading ahi zo ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, sawmten huai a na jak un, Jakob leh Johan tungah a lungkimta kei hial ua.
Jesun amau a sama, a kiang uah, Jentelte tunga vaihawm dia a sehte uh a tunguah a lal mahmah ua, a mi liante un a tunguah thu a nei mahmah uh chih na thei uh.
Himahleh, nou lakah jaw huchi bang ahi kei ding; kuapeuh na lak ua mi lian hih ut tuh na nasem un a pang zo ding ahi.
Kuapeuh na lak ua masapen hih ut tuh mi tengteng sikhain a pang ding ahi.
Mihing Tapa hial leng na sepsaka om dingin a hongpai keia, na sem ding leh mi tampi tatna dinga a hinna pe dingin a hongpai ahi zo ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Jeriko khua a hongtung ua; huchiin, Jesu Jeriko akipanin a nungjuite leh mipi tampitak toh a pawt lai un khutdoh mittaw, Timai tapa Bartimai, lam gei ah a natu a.
Huan, Nazaret Jesu ahi chih a jak takin, Jesu, David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai ve, chiin, a kikouta a.
Huan, mi tampiin dai dingin a tai ua; himahleh aman, David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai ve, chiin, a kinak kou semsem a.
Huan, Jesu a dinga, Amah honsam dih ua, a chi a. Huan, mittaw tuh a sam ua, a kiangah, Khamuangtakin om inla, thou in; a honsam, a chi ua.
Huan, aman tuh a puan paiin, a ding khia a, Jesu kiangah a hoha.
Huan, Jesun amah a nahoupih a, Na tungah bangchia ka hih na ut? a chi a. Huan, mittawin, a kiangah, Heutupa, muh thei ka ut, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, a kiangah, Paita in, na ginna dampih hiteh, a chi a. Huchiin, a mu thei pahta a, lampi ah Jesu tuh a juita hi.
Huan, Jerusalem khua tung dinga a kisak ua, Oliv tanga Bethphage leh Bethani kho kiang a tun un, a nungjuite laka mi nih a sawla, a kiang uah,
Hua na majawn ua, khua ah vahoh unla; huan, na lut tung un sabengtung nou khih, kuamah tuan ngei louhna, na vamu ding ua; huai tuh phel unla, honkai un.
Huan, kuapeuhin, Huai bangdia hih? A honchih uleh, Toupan a deih ahi; hiai lai-ah a honkoihsak nawnpah ding, na chi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a hohta ua, kongzing ah kongkhak polama sabengtung nou khih a vamu ua; huan, huai tuh a phelta uh.
Huan, huaia ding kuate hiamin, a kiang uah, Sabengtung nou bangdia phel? a chi ua.
Huan, amau Jesu gen bang takin a kiang uah a gen ua; huchiin a phalta uh.
Huan, sabengtung nou tuh Jesu kiangah a honkai ua, a tungah a puante uh a phah ua; huan, a tungah a tuangta hi.
Huan, mi tampiin lampi ah a puan uh a phah ua; mi dangin leng gama sawlnah satin a phah ua.
Huan, a ma lama paite leh a nunglama honjuiten, Hosanna! Toupa mina hongpai a hampha!
Gam hongtung ding, i Pa David gam a hampha! Tungnungpen ah Hosanna! chiin a kikou ua.
Huan, Jerusalem khuaa Pathian biakin ah a valut a; huan, bangkim a et velvel khitin nitaklam leng a honghita a, a pawt a, sawm leh nihte toh Bethani ah a hohta ua.
Huan, a jingin Bethani akipan a pawt nungin a gil a hongkialta a.
Huan, theipi kung nah nei gamlapia a mu a, A gah ka muh khak leh, chiin a vajuana; huan, a vatunin a nah kia loungal bangmah a mu kei a; theipi gah hun ahi kei him a.
Huchiin, Jesun sing tuh a houpihta a, Tuban khantawnin nang apat kuamahin gah ne nawnta kei hen, a chi a. A nungjuiten huai tuh a ja uh.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a tung ua, Pathian biakin ah a valut-a, biakina banghiam juakmite leimite a delh khia-a, dangka khengmite dohkante leh vakhu juakmite tutphah khawng a sawn puk sak-a;
Huan, Pathian biakina kuamahin van a lut paisuak pih uh a phalta kei hi.
Huan, a kiang uah, Ka in nam chih adingin thumna in a chi ding uh, chih gelh ahi ka hia? Nou lah suamhatte khukin nabawl jaw ua, chiin, a hilhta.
Huan, siampu liante leh laigelhmiten huai a ja ua, huan amah a hihmanthat theihna ding a zongta ua; mipi tengtengin amah a lau ngal ua, a thuhilh lamdang a sak jiakun.
Huan, nitaklam a honghihin khopia kipanin a pawt khia uh.
Huan, jingsanga a pai kawm un theipi kung tuh a zung tan phaa vuai khin vekin a muta ua.
Huchiin, Peterin theikhiain, a kiangah, Heutupa, en dih: theipi kung hamsiat na loh a na vuai khin vekta, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Pathian gingta un.

Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, kuapeuhmahin, hiai tang kiangah, Na kisuan inla, tuipi ah nakipai in, chia, a lungtanga ginglel loua a gen tuh a tung ngeingei ding chih gingta peuhmahin a gen bangbang a mu ding uh.
Huaijiakin ka honhilh ahi, bangkim na thum ua na nget peuhmah uh mu sain kiging unla huchiin, na mu ding uh.
Huan, thuma na din peuhmah chiang un kua tungah leng thupoi banghiam na neih uleh ngaidam un; na Pa uh vana omin leng na tatlekna uh a honngaihdam theihna dingin.
A hihhangin na ngaihdam kei uleh, na Pa uh vana omin leng na tatleknate uh honngaidam sam kei ding hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a tung nawn ua; huan, Pathian biakina a vakvak laiin siampu liante, laigelhmite, upate a kiangah a hong ua,
A kiangah, Kua thuin ahia hiai thilte na hih? Hiai thilte hih dingin kuan ahia thu nang honpia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Ken leng thu kam khat ka hondong sam ding, hondawng le uchin, huchiin kua thuin ahia hiai thil ka hih chih ka honhilh ding.
Johan Baptisma vana kipan hia; mihing a kipan? hondawng un, a chi a.
Huan, a kingaihtuah ua, Vana kipan chi lehang, Bang achia a thu ging lou na hi ua leh? a honchi kha dia;
mihinga kipan, i chi dia eita maw? a ki chi ua. Himahleh mipi a kihta ua; mi tengtengin Johan lah jawlnei taktakin a bawl chiat ngal ua.
Huchiin, Jesu a dawng ua, Thei kei ung, a chi ua. Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Ken leng kua thuin ahia hiai thil ka hih, ka honhilh sam kei ding, achia.

Huan, gentehna thuin a kiang uah a genta a, Kuahiamin grephuan a bawla, a kim huangin a um a, grep sukna ding khuk a tou a, in sang a lama, loukhoumite kiangah khohloh dingin a pia a, gam dangah a hohta-a.
Huan, a loh hunin huan-a a gah tuh a tansik amau kianga kipana la dingin loukhohlohmite kiangah sikha khat a sawla.
Huan, huai mi tuh a na man ua, a vua ua, khut vuakin a pai sak nawnta ua.
Huan, sikha dang a kiang uah a sawl nawna; huai mi leng a lu ah a na hihliam ua, zumhuaipiin a na bawl ua.
Huan, sikha dang a sawl nawn jela; huai mi tuh a na hihlum ua. Sikha dang tampi leng-khenkhat a na vua ua, khenkhat a na hihlum ua.
Huan, khat, tapa deihtak, a nei lai a; Ka tapa jaw a zah ding uh, chiin, amah a nanungpenin a kiang uah a sawla.
Himahleh, huai loukhohlohmiten, Hiai mi gouluahdingpa ahi; i that ding uh aw: huchiin a gou luahding eia ahi mai ding, a kichi ua.
Huchiin, amah a na man ua, a hihlum ua, grep huan apat a lawn kheta ua.
Huaijiakin, grephuan neipan bangchin a honhih dia? Loukhohloh mite a honhih mangthang dia; huan tuh midangte a pe ding.
Hiai laisiangthou na sim kei ua hia? In lam mite suang deihlouhpen, huai mahmah a ninga suang phatuampen a honghita hi.
Huai tuh Toupa hih ahi, i mit muh uah a lamdang hi, chih, a chi a.
Huan, amah mat a tumta ua; huai gentehna thu lah amau dema a gen ahi chih a thei ngal ua. Huchiin amah tuh a nusia ua, a paimangta uh.
Huan, a thu gena mattheihna dingin Pharisaite leh Herod pawla mi kuate hiam a kiangah a sawl ua.

Huchiin, amau a hongtun un, a kiangah, Sinsakpa, mi diktat na hi a, deihsak tuan kuamah na neikei chih ka thei uh, kuamah khentuam neilouin, chihtak ngialin Pathian lam thu na hilh jel ahi: Kaisar kianga leiman liau a siang hia siang lou?
Pe ding ka hi ua, pe lou ding? a chi ua. Aman bel a lepchiahdan uh theiin, a kiang uah, Bangdia hon zeet na hi ua? Makhai hontawi un, ka na en ding, a chi a.
A hontawi ua. Huan aman a kiang uah, Hiai kua lim leh kua min ahia? a chi a.
Huan, amau, Kaisar-a, a chi ua. Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Kaisar thilte Kaisar kiangah pia unla, Pathian thilte Pathian kiangah peta unla, a chi a. Huchiin, lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huan, Saddukaite, thohnawnna a om kei chite, a kiangah a hongua;
A kiangah, Sinsakpa, Mosiin, kuapeuh a unaupan ta neilou in a ji sihsan taleh, a unaupan a ji luahin a unaupa dingin chi a suahsak ding, chiin, a hongelh sak ahi.
A hi, sal sagih a om ua; a upa penin ji a neia, chi suah louin a si a.
Huan, a nihnain a luah a, chi suah louin a si nawn jela; a thumna in huchibang mahin.
Huchiin, sal sagihte tuh chi himhim suah louin a si jel uh. A nanungpenin numei leng a sita hi.
Thohnawn hunin a kuapen ji ahi dia le? sagih ten jiin a nei chiat ngal ua, chin a dong ua.
Jesun a kiang uah, Hiai jiak hilou hia, na theihkhelh nak uh, Laisiangthou leh Pathian thilhihtheihna na theih louh jiak un?
Misi lak apat a thoh nawnun ji leh pasala kinei lou ding ahi ua, vana angelte bang hizota ding uh ahi ngalua.
Huam, misite kaihthoha a om ding thu u lah Mosi laibua, Loubuk ah, Pathianin, Kei Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, Jakob Pathian ka hi, chia, amah a houpihdan na sim kei ua hia?
Amah jaw misi Pathian ahi keia, mihing Pathian ahi jaw; na thei khial tel u e, a chi a.
Huan, laigelhmite laka mi khat a honga, a kisel uh a na ngaikhia a, Jesun amaute thutakin a dawng chih a theia, a kiang ah, Thupiak tengteng ah koi ahia thupipen? chiin, a donga.
Jesun, A thupipen tuh hiai ahi: Israel aw, ngai dih uh, Toupa i Pathian uh Toupa khat kia ahi a;
Toupa na Pathian tuh na lungtang tengtengin, na kha tengtengin, na lungsim tengtengin leh na hatna tengtengin na it ding ahi, chih.
A zom tuh hiai ahi, Nangmah na kiit bangin na vengte leng na it ding ahi, chih. Hiai khawng sanga thupiak thupijaw himhim a om kei, chiin, a dawnga.
Huan, laigelhmin a kiangah, Hi-na ngei e, Sinsakpa amah jaw khatkia ahi a, amah lou jaw kua dangmah a om kei uh,

Amah tuh lungtang tengtenga, theihsiamna tengtenga, hatna tengtenga ita, eimah i kiit banga vengte it tuh pum hal thilpiak leh kithoihna tengteng sangin a hoihzo petmah chih, na gendik hilhial ngei, a chi a.
Huan, piltakin a dawng chih Jesun a theihin, a kiang ah, Pathian gam na gamlat kei ve, a chi a. Huai nungsang tuh kuamahin thu himhim a dong ngamta kei uh.
Huan, Jesun Pathian biakina thu a hilh laiin, amaute a houpiha, Kris tuh David tapa ahi chih laigelhmiten bangchidana gen uh ahia?
David ngeiin, Kha Siangthouin, Toupan, ka Toupa kiangah, Na melmate na khepek ngaknaa ka bawl masiah ka taklamah tuin, a chi a, a chi a.
David ngeiin amah, Toupa, a chi ngala, koi akipanin ahia amah a tapa a hih? a chi a. Huan, mivantangin kipak takin a thu a ngai khia ua.
Huan, a thuhilhna ah, laigelhmite lakah pilvang un; amau lah puannak tual silha vak a ut ua, dawl muna chibai buk bang,
Kikhopna ina tutphah hoih pen bang, ankuangluina-a mun hoihpen bang, a nuamtuam nak uh;
meithai in a ne gai ua, tangpi khemna dingin sawtpipi a thum uh; huaiten siamlouhtanna lianjaw a tang ding uh hi, a chi a.
Huan, sum kholna jawnah a tu a; sumkholnaa mipi sum khiakdan a en a; mi hau tampi takin tampipi a khia ua.
Huan, meithai jawng tak a honga, dal dangka muja nih a khia a, huai tuh paihsa khat hu ahi.
Huan, Jesun a nungjuite a sama, a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Sumkholna a khe tengteng lakah hiai meithai jawng takin a khe tam pen hi.
Hiaite tengtengin a neihlet ua a khia ua; aman jaw a hawmthoh laitak, a neih sun, a nuntakna ding tengteng a khe vek ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Pathian biakina kipan a pai khiak laiin, a nungjuite laka mi khatin a kiangah, Sinsakpa, en dih, a suang leh a in khawng thupi mahmah hi a, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, a kiangah, Hiai in thupi tak na mu maw? hihchip louha, suang kichiang himhim hiaiah a om kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Oliv tanga Pathian biakin jawna a tut laiin, Peter, Jakob, Johan leh Andru ten a kiangah,
Huaite chikchiangin a hongom dia? huai tengteng a tunding chiangin chiamtehna bang a om dia: honhilh in, chiin a sim dot ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Kuamahin honkhem louhna ding un, pilvang un.
Mi tampi, Kris tuh ka hi, chiin, keimah min louin a hong ding uh, mi tampi a khem ding uh.
Huan, kidou thu leh kidou thuthang khawng na jak hun chiang un mangbang kei un; huaite hongtung ding him ahi uh; himahleh, tawpna jaw ahi nai ta-dih kei ding.
Nam tuam leh nam tuam a kidou ding ua, gam tuam leh gam tuam a kidou ding ua; mun tuamtuam ah jin a ling dia; kial a ke dia. Huai tuh nauvei kipatna ahi.
Himahleh, pilvang un; vaihawmmite a honmansak ding ua; kikhopnain khawngah a honvo ding ua; keimah jiakin gam ukte leh kumpipate ma ah theihpihna pe ding na hongding ding uh.
Huan, Tanchin Hoih tuh nam tengteng kianga hilh masak ding ahi.

Huan, a honpi ua, a honmatsak hun chiang un, Bang ka gen de aw? chiin, ngaihtuah khol kei un; a hun taka theihsaka naom peuh uh, huai ngeingei gen jaw un; a genpen jaw noumau na hi kei ding uhi, Kha Siangthou ahi zo ding.
Huan, hihlup dingin unaupa leh unaupa a kimansak ding ua, pain leng tapa a mansak ding; taten leng a nu leh pate uh a dou ding uh, a hihlum sak ding uh.
Keimah min jiakin mi tengteng huat na hi ding uh; himahleh, a tawp phaa thuakpa, huai mi mah tuh hotdamin a om ding.
Himahleh, hihmangbangpa kihhuai a din louhna dinga ding na muh chiang un, (a sim peuhin a omdan thei heh) huai hun chiangin Judia gama omte tangsang ah taimang uheh;
huan, in tunga om kum kei heh; a ina banghiam om tuh dingin zong lut sam kei heh;
huan, lou-a om a puan tuh dingin kik nawn kei heh.
Huai niin gaite leh naunou pomte tung a gik ding.
Huan, huaite phalbia a hongtun louhna dingin thum un.
Huai nite banga gimthuakna thupi himhim Pathian bawl leilungpian tunga kipan tutanin a om ngei nai keia, chikchiangmahin a hongom ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Huan, Toupan huai nite hihtom keileh mi hing himhim hingin a pawt kei ding uh; himahleh, mi tel, a sehte jiakin nite tuh a hih tom a.
Huan, huai hun chiangin, kuapeuhin na kiang ua, En dih uh: Kris tuh hiailai ah a om, a hihkeileh, En dih uh: hua laiah, hiam a chih uh leh, um kei un;
Kris takloute leh jawlnei takloute a hongpawt ding uh ahi ngala, huaiten, chiamtehna leh thillamdang a hih ding uh, hithei lehouh, telte nangawn a khem theihna ding un.
Nou jaw pilvang un, ngai dih uh, bangkim ka honhilh khol khin ahi.
Himahleh, huai nitein, huai gimthuakna khitin, ni hihmialin a om dinga, kha a vak nawnta kei dia.
Van akipanin aksite a hongke ding ua, vana thilhihtheihna omte hihlinin a om ding uh.
Huai hun chiangin Mihing Tapa Thilhihtheihna leh thupina lianpi toh mei laka hongpai a mu ding uh.
Huai hun chiangin angelte a sawl khe dia, a telte lei ningli a pat-lei tawp akipana van tawp pha in a khawm khawm ding uh.
Huchiin, theipi kungah a gentehna thu zil un: ahiang a hongnou a, a nah a hong selin nipi a nai chih na thei uh.
Huchi bangmahin, nou leng, huaite a hongtung na muh hun chiang un, amah a hongnaita a, kongkhak bul mahmah ah a om chih, thei un.
Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, huai tengteng a tunkim masiah tulai khangthakte a mang kei ding uh.
Lei leh van a mang dia, ka thu a hihleh a mang kei ding.
Himahleh, huai ni leh a dak thu Pa kia loungal kuamahin, vana angelten leng, Tapain leng a theikei uh.
Pilvang unla, kiging gigea omin thum un; a hun lah na thei ngal kei ua.
Mi, a in pai sana, a sikhate thu nei saka, a nasep ding uh pe chiata, kongkhakveng leng kigin ding thu pe phota, gam danga vatam bang ahi.
Huaijiakin kiging gigein om un, inneipa hong ding hun, nitak lam hia, jan ah hia, akkhuanin hia, jingin hia hi ding chih na thei ngal kei ua;
Huchilou injaw, hongpai guih khaleh ihmuin a honmu khading.
Huan, na kiang ua ka gen tuh mi tengteng kianga ka gen ahi, Kiging gigein om un, a chita a.
Huan, ni nih nungin Paikan Ankuangluina leh Tanghou silngou sohlouh Ankuangluina om ding ahi a; siampu liante leh laigelhmiten, amah zekhema, mana, a hihlup theihna dingdan a zongzong ua;
himahleh, Ankuanglui sungin hi keiheh, huchilouin jaw vantang lakah buaina a hongom kha ding, a chi ua.
Huan, Bethani khuaa phak Simon ina a om laia, ankuang a um laiin numei khat, alabaster bawma spiknardi thau gimlim man tampi tawiin a honga, a bawm tuh a hihkhama, a lu ah a sungta a.
Himahleh, khenkhat tuh a lunghita kei ua, Bang dinga thau gimlim hihmang mawkmawk ahia?
Hiai thau makhai za thum sanga tamjawa juaka, mi gentheite kianga piak theih ahi ngala, a chi ua. Huchiin, a tungah a phunta uh.
Jesun tuh, Hih hen aw; bangdia va hihbuai na hi ua? ka tungah thil hoihtak a hih ahi.
Mi gentheite chiklaipeuhin leng na kiang ua om ahi ua, na ut hun peuh un na hehpih thei ngal ua; kei bel chiklaipeuha na kiang ua om gige ding ka hi kei.
A hihtheih khamkham a hih ahi; ka sapum vui dinga thau nuh khol ahi.
Huchiin, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, khovel tengteng koipeuhah leng Tanchin Hoih a kigenna ah hiai meithai thilhih leng amah theihgigena dingin a kigen jel ding hi, a chi hi.

Mihing Tapa a tanchin a gelh bang tak un a pai ding: himahleh, Mihing Tapa mansak ding mipa tung a gik hi: Huai mihing jaw piang kei leh amah adin a hoihzo ding, a chi a.

Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Pathian Gama a thak ka dawn ni a tun masiah grep gui gaha ka dawn nawnta kei ding, a chi hi.
Huan, la a sakzoh un, a pawt ua, Oliv tangah a hohta uh.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Na vek un lungkiain nontaisan ding uh, Belamchingpa ka khen dia, belamte a dalh ding uh, chih gelh ahi ngala.
Himahleh, ka thohnawn nungin Galili gamah na ma uah ka pai ding, a chi a.
Peterin bel a kiangah, A vek un lungkiain hontaisan mahle uh, ken jaw kontaisan kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Tu jan ngeingeiin, ak nih vei a khuan main, nang thumvei non kitheihmohbawl ding, a chi a.
Aman bel khauhtakin, Na sihna ah si sam ding himahleng ka honkitheihmohbawl kei hial ding, a chi guapguap a. Huchimah bangin a chi chiat uh.

Huan, Peter, Jakob leh Johan a pi a, nak pitaka lungkhamin a mangbang mahmah a.
Huchiin a kiang uah, Ka kha a lungkham mahmaha, sihna khop hial ahi; hiaiah om unla, kiging gige un, a chi a.

Abba, Pa, bangkim na hihtheia; hiai nou kei akipanin la mang in; himahleh, kei thu hilou in nangmah thuthu hijaw hen, a chi a.
Huan, a hongpaia, amau tuh ihmuin a honmu a, huchiin, Peter kiangah, Simon, ihmu na hi maw? Dak kal khat leng kiging gigein na om theikei maw?
Khemnaa na lut louhna ding un kiging gigein thum un. Khain tuh a ngapa, sa jaw a hat kei, a chi a.
Huan, a vahoh nawna, a thugen ngei genin a thum nawna.
Huan, a hongpai nawna amau tuh ihmuin a honmu nawna, a ihmut uh a suak mahmah ngala; dawn dan leng a theikei uh.
Huan, a hongpai thum veina ah, a kiang uah, Na ihmu lailai umaw, na tawlnga lailai umaw? A hunta ve; a hun hongtungta; mihing Tapa mikhialte khuta juausana piak ahita.
Thou un, i pai ding uh; en un, hon juausanpa hongnai, a chi a.
Huan, a gen laitakin, Juda, sawm leh nihte laka mi khat tuh, a hongtungpahta ngala, siampu liante leh laigelhmite leh upate akipan mipi, temsau leh khetbuk tawite toh.
Huan, juausanpan, Ka tawp peuhmah amah ahi ding; man unla, kizentakin na pi mang ding uh, chiin chiamtehna ding a na hilhkhol diamdiama.
Huchiin, a tun takin amah a vanaih paha, Rabbi: chiin, a tawp tantan a.
Huan, amah a lenta ua, a manta uh.
Huan, a kianga dingte laka mi kua hiamin a temsaua doka, siampu lianpen sikha a sata, a bil a sat khiak sak.
Huan, Jesun amau a houpiha, a kiang uah, Temsaute, khetbukte tawiin suamhat man ding bang hialin, honman dingin nong kuan u maw?
Pathian biakin ah ni tenga thuhilhin na kiang uah ka om jela; non man ngal kei ua. Himahleh, Laisiangthou a hongtun theihna ding ei ve, a chi a.
Huan, a vek un amah a nusia ua, a taimang vekta uh.
Huan, tangval kuahiam, puan malngat kia batin, amah a juia; huan, amah a na man uh;
Himahleh, a puan malngat a taisana, vuaktangin a taimangta.
Huan, Jesu tuh siampu lianpen kiangah a pi ua; huan, siampu liante, laigelhmite tengteng toh a hongton uh.
Huan, Peterin gamla pia kipanin amah a juia, siampu lianpen inhuangsung konglai phain; huan, sikhate lakah mei lum awiin a tu sam a.
Huan, Jesu a hihlup theihna ding un siampu liante leh vaihawm mite tengtengin amah hekna a zong ua, a mu sam kei uh.
Mi tampiin juauin a hek ua, himahleh, a hekna thu uh a kituak sam kei.
Huan, kuate hiam a ding ua, juauin a hek ua,
Hiai min, Hiai Pathian biakin khuta lam ka hihse dia, ni thum sungin biakin dang, khuta lam louh, ka lam ding, a chih, ka ja uh, a chi ua.
Himahleh huchiin leng a hekna thu uh a kituak thei samsam kei.
Huan, siampu lianpen a laiah a ding khia a. Jesu kiangah, Bangmaha dawnglou maw? Hiaite honhekna bangchidan ahia? chiin, a donga.
Amah lah a dai dide a, bangmahin a dawng kei a. Siampu lianpenin a kiangah, Kris, Hampha Tapa, na hi hia? chiin, a dong nawna.
Huan, Jesun, Hi e; Mihing Tapa Thilhihtheihna taklama tu a, van mei laka hongpai na mu ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, siampu lianpenin a puansilh a botkeka, Theihpih dang bang din i deih dia?
Pathian a gensiatdan na zata uh; bangchi na sa ua? achia. Huan, a vek un amah tuh si takin a sep chiat ua;
Huan, a khenin amah chil a siat pan pah ua, a kiangah, Gen in, a chi ua. Huan, vengtuten a let kawm un a beng ekek uh.
Huan, Peter tuh nuai lama inhuang sung konglaia a om laiin siampu lianpen sikha nungakte laka khat a hong paia,
Peter meilum awi a mua, a en a, Nang leng Jesu Nazaret mi kianga om na hi ve, a chi a.
Aman tuh, Na thugen ka theikei, a ngaihna himhim leng ka theikei, chiin, a kitheihmohbawl a. Huan, inlim ah a vapawt khia a; huchiin, ak a khuangta hi.
Huan, nungakin a mu a, a kianga dingte kiangah, Hiai mi a lak ua mi ahi, a chi nawnta a.
Himahleh a kitheihmohbawl nawna. Huan, sawtlou nungin a kianga dingten, Peter kiangah, A lak ua mi hi tawk teh, Galili gam a mi na hi ngala, a chi ua.
Aman tuh, Huai na mihing gen uh ka theikei, chiin, hamsia kilohin a kichiamta a.

Huan, akkhuan nihveina tuh a khuangpah ngal hi. Huan, Peterin, Jesun a kianga, Ak nihvei a khuan main nang thumvei non kitheihmohbawl ding, a chih thu a theikhe thak nawn a. Huan, huai tuh a ngaihtuaha a kapta.
Huan, jingsang a honghihtakin, siampu liante tuh upate leh laigelhmite leh vaihawmte tengteng toh a kihou ua, Jesu a hen ua, a pi ua, Pilat kiangah a pe pah ngal uhi.
Huan, Pilatin a kiangah, Judate Kumpipa na hi hia, chiin a donga. Huan, aman a kiangah, Hi e, chiin, a dawng a.
Huan, siampu lianten thu tampiin a hek ua.
Huchiin, Pilatin a dong nawna, a kiangah, Bangmaha dawng lou maw? Ngai tanla, a honhek na uh tamdan! a chi a.
Jesun bel bangmahin a dawngta keia; huchiin Pilatin lamdang a sa mahmah.
Huan, Pilatin ankuanglui nin mi henta khat a nget peuhmah uh a pawtsak jel a.
Huan, mi khat, Barabba a chih uh, a helte lakah hensain a oma, huaiten tuh helna ah tual a that uh.
Huan, mipite a vahohtou ua, amau adinga a hihsak jel banga hihsak dingin a ngen ua.
Huan, Pilatin a dawnga, a kiang uah, Judate Kumpipa honkhahsak leng na ut u hia? a chi a.
Siampu lianten hajat mana a honpaipih uh ahi chih a thei ngala.
Himahleh, siampu lianten mipite tuh Barabba pawt sak jawk ngen dingin a hasuan ua.
Huan, Pilatin a kiang uah, Judate Kumpipa a chih uh bang ka loh tadia le? chiin, a dong nawn a.
Huan, amau, Kros ah kilhden in, chiin, a kikou nawn ua.
Huan, Pilatin a kiang uah, Bang din maw? Bang a hihkhiala ahia? a chi a. Himahleh amau tuh, Kros ah kilhden in, chiin, a kikou semsem ua.
Huchiin, Pilatin mipite hihlungkim a uta, Barabba tuh a pawt sakta; huan, Jesu tuh a vuak zohin krosa kilhden dingin a peta hi.
Huan, sepaihten inhuangsung kong lai, Praitoriam a chih uah, amah a pilut ua, a pawl ua mi tengteng a sam khawm uh.
Huchiin puansan dup a silhsak ua, ling lukhu a gan ua, a khusak uh.
Huan, Chibai, Judate Kumpipa! chiin, chibai a bukta uh.
Huan, a lu ah sialluangin a khen ua, chil a siat ua, khukdin in chibai a buk uh.
Huan, nuihza baawlnaa a zat zoh un, puan san dup tuh a hawk ua, amah puan a silh sak nawn ua, krosa kilhden dingin a a pi kheta uh.
Huan, mi vialvak khat, a gamlama kipana hongpai, a kros po dingin a man ua Simon Kurini khua a, Aleksandar leh Rufasi pa tuh.
Huan, Jesu tuh Golgotha munah a pi ua, huai tuh Lu Guh mun, chihna ahi.
Huan, uain murra toh hel a pia ua, himahleh a sang nuam kei hi.
Huan, kros ah a kilhden ua, a tan ding chiat uh theihna dingin aisanin a puansilhte tuh a kihawm uh.
Huan a kilhden uh tuh dak thumna khawng ahi a.
Huan, a hekna lai a tunglamah a gelh ua, JUDATE KUMPIPA, chiin.
Huan, suamhat nih amah toh a kilhden sam ua, a taklamah khat, a veilamah khat.
Huan, Laisiangthou, Huchiin amah tuh talekte toh simkhawm a hita, chih genna hihtangtunin a omta hi.
Huan, mi kivialleh peuhin a lu uh singin, Ehe! Nang Pathian biakin susiaa ni thuma lam nawnpa,
Kihihhing inla, kros a kipan hongkum in, chiin a enghou ua.
Huchi bangmahin siampu lianten, laigelhmite toh, amau laka enghouin, midang bawn hihhinga, amah kihihhing theilou bang.
I muh a, i gintak theihna dingin, Kris, Israel Kumpipa, tuin krosa kipan hongkum leh ake, a chi ua. Huan, amah toh a kilhden samte un leng amah a enghou ua.
Huan, dak gukna a honghihin, dak kuana dongin gam pumpi ah mialna a hongomta a.
Huan, dak kuana khawng dingin Jesu tuh aw ngaihtakin, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani? chiin a kikou khiaa, huai tuh, Ka Pathian, ka Pathian, bangdia honpaisan? chihna ahi.
Huan, a kianga ding khenkhatten huai a jak un, Ngai un, Elija a sam, a chi ua.
Huan, mi khat a taia, spanji uain thuka diah dimin, chiangah a taka, a dawn tou saka. Khawl dih ua, amah la khe dingin Elija a hong hiam i en ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu tuh aw ngaihtakin a kikou a, a kha a khahta hi.
Huan, Pathian biakin puanjak tuh a tunglam akipanin a nuailam phain a hongkikek paisuakta.
Huan, a ma jawna sepaih zaheutupa dingin a kha huchibanga a khah a muhin, Hiai mi Pathian Tapa ahi ngeingei, a chi a.
Huan, numeite leng gamla taka enin a om ua; huaite lakah Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob naupangjaw leh Jose nu, Salomi leng a pang ua;
Huaite tuh Galili gama a om laia, amah juia, a nasepsak jelte ahi uh; huan, numei dang tampi Jerusalem khuaa amah toh hohtou samte leng a om uh.
Huan, nitaklam a honghihin Kiginni a hih jiakin, huai tuh Khawlni maa ni ahi,
Joseph, Arimathai khua a mi, vaihawmpa zahtakhuai, Pathian gam lamen sam mi, a honga, hangtakin Pilat kiangah a luta, Jesu luang a ngenta a.
Huchiin, Pilatin huchibanga a si pah tuh lamdang a sa mahmah a, huchiin sepaih zaheutupa samin, a sihna a sawtta hiam chih a dong a
Huan, sepaih zaheutupa kama a sita chih a theihin, a luang Joseph kiangah a pia a.
Huan, aman tuh puan malngat a leia, amah a la khia a, puan malngatin a tuama, han khuakkuak ah a siala, han kong suangin a delhta a.
Huan, Mari Magdalini leh Jose nu Mariin a sialna tuh a mu uh.
Huan, khawlni a hongbeiin Mari Magdalini, Mari Jakob nu leh Salomi-te a vahoh ua, amah a nuh ding un banghiam gimlim a lei ua.
Huan, ni sagih ni masapenin, jingsang piin, ni suah laiin han a vatung ua.
Huan, Han kong akipan suang kuan honkhuk khiak sak ding a de aw? a kichih laitak un,
A dak ualeh, suang tuh khuk khiaksain a muta ua, a lian mahmah ngala.
Huan, han sungah a lut ua, tangval khat puan ngou silh, taklam panga tu a mu ua; lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huchiin, aman tuh a kiang uah, Lamdang sa kei un; Jesu Nazaretmi, a kilhden uh, zong na hihtuak ua; a thou nawnta hi; hiaiah a om takei; en un, a sialna uh!
Himahleh, pai unla, a nungjuite leh Peter kiangah, Galili gamah na ma uah a pai ding hi; na kiang ua a chih bang ngeiin huaiah na mu ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, linna leh lamdang sakluatnain amau a phaktak jiakin a pawt ua, han akipan a tai vengveng ua; a lau jiakun kuamah kiangah bangmah a gen kei uh.
Huan, ni sagih ni masapen jingsanga a thohnawnin, Mari Magdalini, a sung apat dawi sagih a delh khiaknu kiangah a kilak masapen a.
Huan, amah tuh Jesu ompih jelte kiangah a vahoha, misi suna a kah lai un a vahilhta a.
Himahleh, amau tuh a hing nawna, muh leng a mu chih a za na ua, a gingta tuan kei uh.
Huan, huai nungin a lak ua mi nih gam lam juana a pai lai un mel dang puin a kiang uah a kilak nawna.
Huan, amau tuh nungjui dangte kiang ah a vahilh ua, amau thu leng a gingta tuan kei uh.
Huan, huai nung nawnin, an a um lai un sawm leh khatte kiang ngeiah a kilaka, a thoh nawn nunga a mute thu a gintak louh uh leh a lung tang khauh thu uah a taihilhta a.
Huan, a kiang uah, Khovel tengtengah pai unla, thil siamtengteng kiangah Tanchin Hoih hilh un.
A gingtaa baptisma tang tuh hotdamin a om ding ua; gingtalou tuh siamlouh tangin a om ding uh.
Huan, hiai chiamtehnaten a gingtate a jui jel ding: Ka minin dawite a delh khe ding ua, pau thak bangin a pau ding uh;
gulte khutin a la ding ua; sihna gu bangchibang dawn mahle uh bangmah a chi kei ding uh; damloute tungah a khut uh a koih ding ua, a dam jel ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, Toupa Jesu tuh, a kiang ua thu a gen khitin vana pi touhin a om a, Pathian taklamah a tuta hi.
Huchiin, amau tuh a pai khia ua, gam tengah thu a genta ua, Toupan amaute a seppiha, a jui chiamtehnaten thu tuh a hihkip jel hi. Amen.
Huai thilte i lak ua takpetpeta gina om, mi tampiin a thu gelh ana tup uh,
A tunga pata a mute leh thu nasemten honhilh bang un,
Theophil aw, a bul apat bangkim chiantakin ka suia, kizom jelin nanga dingin kigelh leh a hoih ding, ka chi ahi;
tumaa thu nang honhilh uh a dik ngelngel hi chih na theihna dingin.
Judia gam kumpipa Herod a dam laiin, Abija pawla mi a min Zakaria khat a om a; huaiin Aron tanute laka khat jiin a neia, a min tuh Elizabet ahi.
A nih un Pathian mitmuhin diktatin a om ua, gensiat beiin Toupa thupiak leh a dan tengteng juiin a omjel ua.
Himahleh Elizabet a chin jiakin ta a neikei ua, a nih un upa pitak ahi tuak ngal ua.
Huan, hichibang ahi a, a pawlte hihdan bang jela Pathian maa siampua a gamtat laiin,
siampu dan bangin Toupa biakina lut leh gimlim hal tuh a tan ahi a.
Huan, gimlim hal hun laiin mipite a vek un inpua ah a na thum ua.
Huan, Toupa angel khat gimlim halna maitam taklama dingin a kiangah a kilak a.
Huan, Zakariain a muh takin a lungjinga, lau leng a lau a.
Himahleh angelin a kiangah, Zakaria, lau ken, na nget jaka a om jiakin, na ji Elizabet in tapa a honneihsak dia, a min Johan na sak ding ahi.
Huan, nang na nuamin na kipak dinga; amah a suahin mi tampi a kipak ding uh.
Toupa ngaihin mi lian ahi dia, uain leh ju himhim a dawn kei ding; a nu sung apat himin Kha Siangthouin a hongdim ding.
Israel suante tampi Toupa a Pathian lam uh a ngasak nawn ding a.

Huan, pate lungtang tate lam ngasak ding, mi chihmohte mi diktat pilna lam ngasak ding, Toupa dinga mi pite mansaa om sak dinga na bawl khol dingin Elija lungsim leh thilhihtheihna puin Toupa ma ah a pai ding. a chi hi.
Huan, Zakariain angel kiangah, Huai bangchin ka thei dia? kei putek hi inga, ka ji leng pitek ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, angelin a dawnga, a kiangah, Gabriel, Pathian maa ding jel ka hia; nang houpih ding leh, huai thu hoih honhilh dinga sawl ka hi.
Ngaiin, ka thugente a huntaka hongtung ding, na gintak louh jiakin huai thilte a hongtun masiah na dai dide dia, pau leng na pau theikei ding, a chi a.
Huan, vantang in Zakaria a nangak ua, Pathian biakin sunga a om sawt jiakin lamdang a sa mahmah ua.
Huan, a hongpawtin a kiang uah thu a gen theita kei a; huchiin, biakin ah kha kilak a mu ahi chih a theita ua; huan, a kiang uah chiamtehna te a bawl a, pau theilouin a om lailai hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a nasepna ni a kim takin a in ah a paita a.
Huan, tua nite nungin, a ji Elizabet tuh a honggaita a, kha nga a buta a,
Mi laka ka min se khuhna dingin, Toupan a honmuhin, hichibangin ka tungah a hihta, chiin.
Huan, a kha gukna ah Pathianin angel Gabriel, Galili gama khua khat Nazaret a chih uah,
nungak siangthou khat kiangah a sawla, huai nungak tuh David suan mikhat a min Joseph toh ki kham ahi ua; nungak min tuh Mari ahi.
Huan, angel tuh a kiangah a luta, Chibai, nang nakpitaka deihtuam: Toupa na kiangah a om, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu jiakin a lunghimoh mahmaha, Bangchidana chibai honbuk a diam aw? chiin, a kingaihtuaha.
Huan, angelin a kiangah, Mari, lau ken; Pathian lakah deihsakna na tang hi.
Ngai in, na gai dia, tapa na nei dia, a min din Jesu na sa ding ahi.
Amah mi lian a honghi dinga, Tungnungpen Tapa a chi ding uh; Toupa Pathianin a kiangah a pu David tutphah a pe dia.
Jakob suante tungah khantawnin a lal dia, a gam in bei ni a neikei ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, Mariin angel kiangah, Hiai bangchin ahi dia? pasal lah neilou inga, a chi a.

Huan, angelin a dawnga, a kiang ah, Kha Siangthou na tungah a hongtung dinga, Tungnungpen thilhihtheihnain a honliah khum ding, huai jiakin misiangthou hongpiang ding leng, siangthou Pathian Tapa, chihin a om ding, a chi a.
Huan, ngaiin, na sanggamnu Elizabetin leng a tek nungin tapa a paita; a ching a chihchih uh, tu kha a kha gukna a hita.
Pathian thu pawt himhim thil hih theilouin a om kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Mariin, Ngai in, Toupa sikhanu ka hi, na thu bang jelin ka tungah tung hen, a chi a. Huan, angelin a paisanta.
Huai laiin Mari a thou a, singtangah, Judia gama khua khat ah a hoh paha;
Huan, Zakaria in ah a luta, Elizabet chibai a buk a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Elizabetin Mari chibai buk a jak takin, a sung a naungek a tanga; huan, Elizabet tuh Kha Siangthouin a hongdimta; huan, aw ngaihtakin a kikou a,
Nang numei sapsap din na hampha hi, na gil gah leng a hampha hi.
Ka Toupa nu ka kianga na hong bangchidan ahia oi?
Ngai in, non chibai buk husa ka bila a lut takin, a kipah jiakin naungek ka sungah a tang ahi.
A gingnu a hampha hi, a kianga Toupan thu a gen tuh tung ding a hih jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, Mariin, Ka nuntaknain Toupa a pahtawi e,
Ka kha leng ka Hondampa Pathian tungah a kipak mahmaha.
A sikhanu nam tom dan a mu a, a hehpiha; ngai in, tu nung siah khangthak tengtengin hampha honchi ding uh.
Amah Mi hatin ka tungah thil thupi tak honhih saka, a min leng a siangthou hi.
A laudansiamte tuh khangthak tanin a hehpih jeljel.
A banin a tha hatdan a ensaka, mi kisatheite tuh a lungtang gelna a hihdalhta.
A laltutphah ua lal tute a kai khia a, nam tomte tuh a pahtawita a.
Gilkial te thil hoihin a hihvah a, mihaute khut vuakin a pai mang sakta hi.
A sikha Israel taksap awng tuh a huta, a zahngaihna theihgigena dingin.
I pipute kianga a gen bangin khantawin Abraham leh a suante lamah.
Huan, Mari kha thum khawng a kiang ah a oma, huan, a in lamah a pai nawnta.
Huan, Elizabet nau suah a honghunta a; huchiin tapa a honneita a.
Huan, a vengte leh a sanggamten Toupan a hehpih mahmah chih a na ja ua, a kipahpih uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, a ni giat nin naungek zeksum dingin a hong ua; a min din a pa min mah Zakaria sak a tum ua.
Huan, a nun, Hi lou e, amah jaw Johan sak jawk ding ahi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, a nu kiangah, Na sanggamte lakah hiai min pu kuamah a om sam ua, a chi ua.
Huan, a pa kiangah chiamtehnate bawlin, A min din bang sa lehang na deih a? a chi ua.
Huan, lai gelhnapek a ngena, A min Johan ahi, chiin a gelh a.
Huan, a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah uh. Huan, thakhatin a kam hongkihongin a lei a hongkiphel a, Pathian phatin a hongpau kheta a.
Huan, a kim ua omte tengtengin a lau ta ua; Huchiin, huai thute tuh Judia gam singtang tengtengah a thang ta a.
Huan, a za peuhmahin, a lungtang un a vei chiat ua, Huai naungek bangchi phet a honghi de aw? chiin. Huan, Toupa khutin amah a panpih ngala.
Huan, a pa Zakaria tuh, Kha Siangthouin a hongdima, a genkhol a,
Toupa, Israel Pathian, phatin om hen, a mite a honveha, tatna a siamsak a.
A sikha David inkuanpihte lakah hotdamna ki a honbawlsaktak jiakin;
Tang laia kipan a jawlnei siangthoute kama, a gen bangin.
I doute lakah leh honhote tengteng laka hotdam-a i om ding thu,
I pipute kianga achiam zahngaihna tangtungsak dingin leh a thukhun siangthou theigige dingin.
I pu Abraham kianga a kichiam a.
I doute laka a honbit saka, lau loua a na i sepna ding.
I dam sung teng a mit muha siangthou leh diktat taka omna dingin.
A hi, Bawi, nang jaw Tungnungpen jawlnei a honchi ding ua; a lampi khawng bawl dingin Toupa maah na pai ding ahi ngala.
A khelhnate uh ngaihdamna dia a mite kianga hotdamna theihna pe ding in.
I Pathian lungtanga hehpihna jiakin, huchia tunglam akipan i tunga ni a tan chianga.
Mial laka leh sihna lima tute tanvak ding leh khamuanna lampia i khete kalsuan sak dingin, a chi a.
Huan, naungek tuh a hongkhang lian deuhdeuha, a kha lam a honghat hiaihiai a, Israelte kianga a hongkilak masiah gamdai ah a om gige.
Huan, huai laiin hichi ahia, Kaisar Augusta in khovel tengteng min khum ding thu a pia a.
Huai tuh Suria gama Kurinia gam ukpa a hih laia min khumna masapen ahi.
Huchiin, mi tengteng a min uh khum dingin amau khua chiat uah a hoh ua.
Huan, Joseph leng, David inkuante leh a suan a hih manin Galili gama Nazaret khua akipanin, Judia gama David khua Bethlehem kichi ah a hoh ta a.
Mari a zikham gai san lai toh, min khum dingin.
Huan, hichi ahia, huai laia a om lai un, a nauneih a honghunta a.
Huan, a ta masain pasal a nei khe ta a; huan, puanin a tuama, khualbuka a tak louh jiak un gan an piakna ah a sial hi.
Huan, huai gam mah ah belam chingmite a om ua, gamlak ah janin a belam uh a ching ua.
Huan, Toupa angel khat a kiang uah a hongding a, Toupa thupinain a kim uh a tanvak a; huchiin a lauta mahmah ua.
Huan, angelin a kiang uah, Lau kei unla, ngai un, mi chih adingin tanchin hoih kipahhuai mahmah ka hontut ahi.
Tuniin nou adingin David khua ah Hondampa a piangta, amah Kris Toupa ahi.
Huan, hiai nou adingin chiamtehna ding ahi; naungek puana tuam, gan an piakna kuanga lum na mu ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, angel kiangah vana mipi hon a hongom khawm guih ua, Pathian a phat ua.
Tungnungpen ah Pathian thupi henla, leitunga a kipahpih mahmah mihingte lakah lemthu leng hen, a chi uhi.
Huan, hichi ahia, angelten vana a paisan tak un, belam chingmiten, Tun ah Bethlehem kho phain pai lehang, Toupan thu a honhilh hongtung tuh i en ding uh, a kichi ua.
Huchiin, a pai mengmeng ua, Mari toh, Joseph toh, gan an piakna kuanga naungek lum toh a vamu ua.
Huan, a vamuh un a naungek tanchin angelin a hilh tuh a gen thangta uh.
Huan, a za peuhmahin belam chingmite thugen lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Mariin bel thugen tengteng a lungtangin a ngaihtuah a, a vom gige a.
Huan, belam chingmiten angel hilh bang ngeia bangkim a muh ua a jak jiak un, Pathian pahtawi leh phat kawm jelin a kik nawnta ua.
Huan, a zek sumna ding ni giat a hongchinin, a min din, sula a om ma hima angelin a saksa, Jesu a sa uh.
Huan, Mosi dan banga a kisiansakna ni uh a hongtunin, Jerusalem khua ah amah a vatonpih tou ua, Toupa kianga amah lan dingin.
(Toupa thu a, ta pasal sul hong peuhmah Toupa adinga seh a chi ding uh, chia gelh bangin),
Toupa Dan thua gen banga vakhu kop khat hiam vapal nou nih hiam kithoihna lan dingin.
Huan, ngai in, Jerusalem khua ah mi khat a min Sumeon a om a; huai mi tuh mi diktat tak leh Pathian limsak tak ahia, Israelte khamuanpa ding a ngak ngitnget a, a tungah Kha Siangthou a om hi.
Huan, Toupa Kris a muh masiah jaw a si kei ding chih Kha Siangthouin a na thei sak him ahi.
Huan, Kha theihsakin Pathian biakin ah a valuta; naungek Jesu tuh a nu leh a pan Dan ngeina banga a tunga hihsak dinga a honpi lut lai un,
aman a na-angpoma, Pathian a phata,
Toupa, tun ah na thu bang jelin, na sikha khamuang takin na pai sak dinga:
Na hotdamna ka mitin a muhtak jiakin,
Huai mi chih muha na bawltak tuh;
Jentelte kianga kilakna vak leh na mi Israelte thupina ding, a chi hi.
Huan, naungek thu a gen tuh a nu leh a pan lamdang a sa mahmah ua.
Huan, Sumeonin amau a vual jawla, a nu Mari kiangah, Ngai in, hiai naupang Israel laka mi tampi pukna ding leh dinkhiakna dinga seh ahi, gensiata om chiamtehna hi dingin leng.
(A hi, nang lungtang leng temsauin a dawt pailet ding a) huchia mi tampiin a lungtang ua a ngaihtuahte uh a latna dingin, a chi hi.
