Huan, mi khat, a min, Anna, jawlnei, Phanuel Tanu, Asher nama mi a oma; amah tuh tek tak ahi a, a nungak tawp nung siah a pasal kiangah kum sagih a oma,
huan, kum sawmgiat leh kum li hial a methaia, aman tuh Pathian biakin pai san louin a sun a janin anngawl kawma thumin Pathian a be jel.
Huan, huchihlaitakin amah a hongpaia, Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gena, Jerusalem tatna lamen peuhmahte kiangah Jesu tanchin a gen hi.
Huan, Toupa dan jela thil tengteng a hih zoh un, Galili gama, amau khua Nazaret ah a kik nawnta uh.
Huan, naungek a hongkhang lian deuhdeuha, a honghat hiaihiaia, pilnain a dimtaa, Pathian deihsakna tuh a tungah a omta hi.
Huan, kum tengin, Paikan Ankuanglui hunin, a nu leh a pa Jerusalem khuaah a hoh jel ua.
Huan, amah tuh kum sawm leh kum nih a hihin dan ngeinain a hoh tou ua.
Huan, ankuanglui akikhita a kik nawn lai un, naupang Jesun Jerusalem khuaah a om san a. A nu leh pan a theikei ua,
huchiin a pawl lak ua om hi nanteh a chi ua, ni khat lam a pai khin ua, a sanggamte uh leh a meltheihte uh lakah a zong uh.
Huan, a muh louh jiak un zong kawmkawmin Jerusalem khuaah a kik nawnta ua.
Huan, hichi ahi a, ni thum nungin, Pathian biakin ah, sinsakmite laka tu a, a thu uh na ngaikhiaa, amau thu dongin, a vamuta ua.
Huan, a thu za peuhin a theihdan leh a dawndan lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huan, a nu leh a pan amah a muh un, lamdang a sa mahmah ua: huan, a nun, a kiangah, Ta aw, bangdia hichibanga honhih na hia? Ngai in, na pa leh ken lungkham takin kon zong uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Bangdia honzong na hi ua? ka Pa ina ka om ding na theikei ua hia? a chi a.
Huan, a kiang ua a thugen tuh a theisiam kei uhi.
Huan, amau a jui suka, Nazaret khua a hongtung a, a thu uh mangin a oma. Huan, a nun huai thil tengteng tuh a lungtang ah a vom gige a.
Huan, Jesu tuh a pil deuhdeuha, a honglian hiaihiaia, Pathian leh mihing deihsakin a om deuhdeuhta.

Huan, Tiberia Kaisar a vaihawm kum sawm leh kum nga kumin, Pontia Pilat Judia gamukpa ahi a, Herod Galili gam kumpipa ahi a, a unau Philip Ituria leh Trakoniti gam kumpipa ahi a, Lusania Abiline gam kumpipa ahi a.
Ana leh Kaiapha siampu Lianpen ahi ua, huailaiin Gamdai ah Zakaria tapa Johan kiangah Pathian thu hongtunga.
Huan, amah bel Jordan lui gei kim gam tengteng ah a hoha, thil hihkhial ngaihdamna dingin kisikna baptisma thu a gen jela.
Jawlnei Isai thu bu ah, Gamdaia mi kikou aw gingin, Toupa lamlian sial unla, a lampite tangsak un,
Guam chih sun dim ahi dinga, tang chih, mual chih, hihniam ahi ding; lampi kawite tansak ahi dinga, lampi phokte mamsak ahi ding;
Huan, mi tengtengin Pathian hotdamna a mu ding uh, a chi, chih gelh bangin.
Huan aman, baptisma tang ding a kianga mipi hongsukte kiangah, Gul suante aw, thangpaihna hongtung ding taisan dinga kua ahia honvauhilh?
Huchiin kisik minpu takin gah un, Abraham ei honsuangpa ahi aka, na lungsim un chi kei un; Pathianin hiai suang khawng Abraham suante din a dingsak thei chih ka honhilh ahi.
Tu mahmah inzong heipi sing bul tengah koih ahita; huchiin, sing chih gah hoiha gah lou peuhmah phukin a oma, mei ah paihin a om, a chi a.
Huan, mipiten a kiangah, Bang ka hih ding ua leh? a chi ua, a dong ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Kuapeuh puannak nih neiin a neilou kiang ah hawm hen; kuapeuh an neiin huchibangmahin hih hen, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, siahkhonmite leng baptisma tang dingin a hong ua, a kiangah, Sinsakpa, bang ka hih ding ua? a chi ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Honseh sak val uh vakhon kei un, a chi a.

Huan, sepaihten leng a kiang ah, Kou leng bang ka hih ding ua? a chi ua, a dong ua. Huan aman a kiang uah, Kuamah hiamgamin hih kei unla, diklou piin kuamah hek kei unla, na loh uah lungkim un, a chi a.
Huan, miten a lamet ua, mi tengtengin Johan tung thu a lungtang ua, Kris ahi kha zenzen de aw? chia a ngaihtuah laiun,

Johanin a dawnga, a vek ua kiangah, Ken jaw tuiin ka hon baptis a, himahleh keimah sanga mi thupijaw a hong pai ding, a khedap khau phel tak leng ka hi kei; aman tuh Kha Siangthou leh meiin nou a honbaptis ding.
A khutin a phazah a tawia, a phual a jap siang vilvelna ding leh a buhpanga buh sunna dingin; a si tuh mei mit theilouin a hal mang ding, a chi hi.
Huan, hasotna thu dang tampiin mite kiangah Tanchin Hoih a hilh jela.
Himahleh, kumpipa Herod-in bel a nau ji Herodia tungthu ah leh a thil hihkhelh tunga Johanin a taihilh jiakin,
a thil hihkhelh tengteng behlapin amah tuh suangkulh ah a khumta hi.
Huan, hichi ahia, mi tengtengin baptisma a tan khit un, Jesun leng baptisma a tankhitin, a thum a, van a hongkihonga,
Kha Siangthou tuh sa puin vakhu bangin a hongsuk a, a tungah a tuta a; huan, van akipanin aw a hongpawt a, Nang ka Tapa deihtak na hi; na tungah ka kipak mahmah, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun thu a hilh pat tung laiin amah tuh kum sawm thum khawng a hita, mi ngaihin jaw Joseph tapa ahi a, huai tuh Heli tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Matthat tapa ahi a, huai tuh Levi tapa ahi a, huai tuh Melki tapa ahi a, huai tuh Janna tapa ahi a, huai tuh Joseph tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Matthathi tapa ahia, huai huai tuh Amos tapa ahi a, huai tuh Nahum tapa ahia, huai tuh Esli tapa ahi a, huai tuh Naggai tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Maathi tapa ahi a, huai tuh Matthathi tapa ahi a, huai tuh Semmei tapa ahi a, huai tuh Josek tapa ahi a, huai tuh Joda tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Joanan tapa ahi a, huai tuh Rhesa tapa ahi a, huai tuh Zerubbabel tapa ahia, huai tuh Salathiel tapa ahi a, huai tuh Neri tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Melki tapa ahi a, huai tuh Addi tapa ahi a, huai tuh Kosam tapa ahi a, huai tuh Elmadam tapa ahi a, huai tuh Er tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Jose tapa ahi a, huai tuh Eliazer tapa ahi a, huai tuh Jorim tapa ahi a, huai tuh Matthat tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Levi tapa ahi a; huai tuh Simeon tapa ahi a, huai tuh Juda tapa ahi a, huai tuh Joseph tapa ahi a, huai tuh Jonam tapa ahi a, huai tuh Eliakim tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Melia tapa ahia, huai tuh Menna tapa hia, huai tuh Mattatha tapa ahi a, huai tuh Nathan tapa ahia, huai tuh David tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Jesai tapa ahi a, huai tuh Obed tapa ahi a, huai tuh Boaz tapa ahi a, huai tuh Salmon tapa ahi a, huai tuh Nahson tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Aminadab tapa ahi a, huai tuh Aram tapa ahi a, huai tuh Esrom tapa ahi a, huai tuh Perezi tapa ahi a, huai tuh Juda tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Jakob tapa ahia, huai tuh Isaak tapa ahi a, huai tuh Abraham tapa ahi a, huai tuh Tera tapa ahi a, huai tuh Nahor tapa ahi.
Huai tuh Seruk tapa ahi a, huai tuh Reu tapa ahi a, huai tuh Peleg tapa ahi a, huai tuh Eber tapa ahi a, huai tuh Selah tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Kainan tapa ahi a, huai tuh Arphaksad tapa ahi a, huai tuh Sem tapa ahi a, huai tuh Noa tapa ahi a, huai tuh Lamek tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Matthusel tapa ahi a, huai tuh Enok tapa ahi a, huai tuh Jared tapa ahi a, huai tuh Mahalalil tapa ahi a, huai tuh Kainan tapa ahi a,
huai tuh Enos tapa ahi a, huai tuh Set tapa ahi a, huai tuh Adam tapa ahi a, huai tuh Pathian tapa ahi.
Huan, Jesu tuh Kha Siangthouin a dima, Jordan lui akipan a kik nawna, diabol khem kawmin gamdai ah ni sawm li Kha piin a om a.
Huan, huai ni khawngin bangmah a ne kei a;
Huan, a tawpin a gil a hongkialta a. Huan, diabolin a kiangah, Pathian Tapa na hih leh hiai suang tanghou suak dingin thupia in, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Mihing tanghou kiain a hing kei ding, chih gelh ahi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, a pi tou a, mit phiat kallouin khovel gam tengteng a ensaka.
Huan, a kiangah, Hiai tengteng tunga thuneihna leh a thupina ka honpe ding; ka kianga piak a hita ngala, ka ut peuh kiangah leng ka pe jel a.
Huchiin, honbia inla, a vekin nanga ahi ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Toupa na Pathian na biak dinga amah kia na na sep ding ahi, chih gelh ahi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, diabolin Jerusalem khua ah a pi a, Pathian biakin tungzum ah a koiha, huan, a kiangah, Pathian Tapa na hih leh, hiai akipanin ke khe sukin;
Nangmah honhumbit dingin na tungthu ah jaw a angelte thu a pe ding,
chih leh, a khut un hondom ding ua, huchilou injaw na khein suang na sui khading, chih gelh ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Toupa na Pathian zeet ken, chih ahi, chiin a dawnga.
Huan, diabolin a khemna ding tenga a khem khitin a lemtan hun chiang dingin a paisanta hi.
Huan, Jesu tuh Kha thilhihtheihnain Galili gamah a pai nawnta a; huan, a tanchin huai kim gam tengah a thangta.
Huan, a kikhopna in uah thu a hilh jela, mi tengteng phatin a om hi.
Huan, a khanletna khua Nazaret a hongtunga; huan Khawlnia a hihdan ngeina bangin kikhopna in ah a luta; sim dingin a dinga.
Huan, jawlnei Isai laibu a kiangah a pia ua. Huan, laibu jial tuh a phel a, hiai thu kigelhna lai tak a sim a,

Liangvaite kiangah Tanchin Hoih hilh dinga non seh jiakin Toupa Kha tuh ka tungah a om; Aman a honsawl, salte kiangah pawtna thu leh, mittote kianga mit vak neih nawnna thu gen ding, simmoh thuakte pawt sakna ding.
Toupa lungkim kum thu gen dingin, chih.
Huan, laibu tuh a jiala, nasepsakpa a pe nawna, a tuta a. Huan, kikhopna ina mi tengteng mit tuh a tungah a tu a.
Huan, a kiang uah, Hiai Laisiangthou thu tuniin na jak un a tangtungta, chiin a genpan a.
Huan, a vek un amah a phat ua, a kam suak hehpihna thute lamdang a sa mahmah uh. Huan, Hiai Joseph tapa ahi ka hia? a chi uh.

Huan, aman a kiang uah, Nou hiai gentehna thu, Daktor, nang leh nang kihihdamin, Kapernaum khuaa na thilhih ka najak peuh uh, hiai ah nangmah kholam ah leng hih in, chiin, honchi khongkhong ding jaw neive ua, a chi a.
Huan, amahmahin, Chihtaktakin, ka honhilh ahi, Jawlnei kuamah amah kholamah min a kipahpih ngei kei.
Huchiin, diktakin ka honchi ahi, Elija dam laia, kum thum leh kha guk van a bina, khovela kial nakpitaka a hongtunin, Israel gamah meithai tampi a om ua;
Himahleh a lak ua kuamah kiangah Elija sawl ahi kei, Sidon gam lama Sarepta khuaa numei khat meithai kiangah kia sawl a hijaw.
Huan, jawlnei Elisa dam laiin leng Israel gamah phak tampi a om ua; himahleh a lak uah kuamah hihsiangthouin a om kei, Naaman, Suria mi kia hihsiangthouin a om zota ve, a chi a.
Huan, kikhopna ina mi tengtengin, huai thute a jak tak un, a heh mahmah ua,
a ding suausuau ua, khua akipanin a sawn khia ua, paih khiak dingin a kho omna kawlkhou uah a pita ua.
Himahleh, amah tuh a kikal uah a pai suaka, a paimangta.
Huan, Galili gama khua khat, Kapernaum ah vahoh suk a. Huan, Khawlniin mite thu a hilha;
huan, thunei taka a gen jiakin a thu hilh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huan, kikhopnain ah dawi nin kha pai mi khat a na om a;
amah tuh aw ngaihtakin a kikoua, Ei! Nazaret Jesu, kou leh nang bang ahia i kizolhna om? honhihmangthang dingin na hong maw? Nang kon thei, Pathian Mi Siangthou na hi, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a taia, Dai inla, a sung akipan hongpawt in, a chi a. Huan, dawiin a laiah a hihpuk phota, hihna louin a sunga kipan a hongpawtta a.
Huan, a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Hiai bang thu ahia le? Thu neitak leh thilhihthei takin dawi ninte thu a pia a, a pawt uh, chiin, a kihou ua.
Huan, huai kim gam kho tengah a tanchin a thangta.
Huan, a thou a, kikhopna in akipan a pawta, Simon in ah a lut a. Huan, Simon ji nu nakpitakin a khua a nasik a, huchiin amah adingin a nachial sak ua.
Huan, a kiangah a dinga, khosik tuh a tai a, a daita hi; huan, a thou pahta a, a na uh a sep sakta.
Huan, ni tum kuanin nat tuamtuam a na, damlou nei peuhmahin a kiangah a honpi ua; huan, a vek un a tunguah a khut a koih chiata, a nahihdam jel.
Huan, dawite leng, Pathian Tapa na hi, chia kikouin, mi tampi sunga kipanin hongpawt uh. Huan, amau a tai a, Kris tuh ahi chih a theih jiak un a pau uh a phal kei hi.
Huan, khovak takin a pawta, kuamah omlouhna mun ah a hoha; huan mipiten a zong ua, a kiangah a hong ua, amau a pai san louhna dingin let a tum ua.
Himahleh, aman, a kiang uah, Kho dang khawngah leng Pathian gam tanchin Hoih ka hilh ding ahi,
huai dinga sawl ka hi ngala, a chi a; huchiin, Galili gama kikhopna in khawngah thu a hilhta.
Huan, hichi ahia, mipiin Pathian thu a ngaihkhiak ua, amah a boh huthut lai un, amah tuh Gennesaret dil gei ah a dinga.
Huan, dil geia long nih om a mua, himahleh nga manmite lah a pawt khia ua, a lente uh a sawp ua.
Huchiin, long khat Simon-a pen ah a tuanga, a kiangah luigei akipan neukha tolh lut sak deuh a ngena. Huan, a tu a, long akipanin mipite thu a hilhta.
Huan, thugen a tawpin, Simon kiangah, Li thuk lam naih unla, nga man dingin, na lente uh pai un, a chi a.
Huan, Simonin a kiangah, Heutupa, gimtakin jankhuain ka pang ua, bangmah ka man kei ua, himahleh na thuin lente ka pai nawn ding leh, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, a paih uleh nga tampi tak a khuh ua, a lente uh tuh a kek iakkiaka.
Huan, long danga om a lawmte uh amau honghuh dingin a khutvan ua. Huan, a hongpai ua, long nih tum phialphialin a sung dim tuaktuak uh.
Huan, Simon Peterin huai a muhin, Jesu khuk kiangah khupbohin, Toupa, honpai sanin, mikhial ka hi, a chi a.
A nga mat u tuh amah leh a lawmten lamdang a sa mahmah ngal ua;
Simon pawlte mah Zebedai Tapa Jakob leh Johanin leng lamdanga sa mahmah sam uh. Huan, Jesun, Simon kiangah, Lau ken, tuban siah mihing na manta ding, a chi a.
Huan, a longte uh luigei ah a tolh galkai ua, bangkim pai sanin amah tuh a juita uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, khua khata a omlaiin ngai dih, mi khat phak bop a oma, aman Jesu a na mu a, khupbohin Toupa, na ut leh non hihsiangthou thei, a chi a, a ngen ngutngut a.
Huan, aman a sawka, a khoiha, Ka ut, nanasiangthoutain, a chi a. Huan, thakhatin a phak tuh a hongbei pah hi.
Huan, a kiangah, Kuamah hilh ken, a hihhangin siampu kiangah vakiensak inla, na sianhonna ding Mosi seh bangin lan in, mite theihchetna dingin, a chi a.
Himahleh, a tanchin thu tuh a thang sansan a; mipi thupitak a thu za nuam leh a natnate uh hihdam utin a hongkikhawm kheukhou ua.
Himahleh, amah tuh gamdaiah a tuam pai a, a thum hi.

Huan, hichi ahia, huai lain, ni khat tuh, thu a hilh a. Huan, akiangah Pharisaite leh dan siam te tuin a om ua, huaite tuh, Galili leh Judia gam kho teng akipana hongpai ahi ua; huan mi hihdamna dingin Toupa thilhihtheihna a kiangah a om.
Huan, ngai dih, lupna toh mijaw khat a honjawng ua; a maa koih dingin jawn lut a tum ua.
Huan, mipi jiakin jawn lutna dan a mu theikei ua, in tunga kipan, a lai takah, Jesu ma ah a lupna toh a khai khe suk ua.
Huan, a gindan uh a namuh in, a kiang ah, Mihing, na khelhnate ngaihdam a hita, a chi a.
Huan, laigelh mite leh Pharisaiten, Pathian gensia hiai mi kua ahia? Pathian kia louin kuan ahia khelhnate ngaidam thei? chiin a ngaihtuah ua.
Huchiin, Jesun a ngaihtuah uh a theia, a kiang uah, na lungtang uah bang na ngaihtuah ua?
Na khelhnate ngaihdam a hita, chih leh, Thou inla, khein paita in, chih, a koipen a gen nuam jaw a?
Abang abang hitaleh, khovelah Mihing Tapain khelhnate ngaihdam theihna a nei chih na theihna ding un a chi a, (Jaw kiangah) Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na in ah paiin, ka honchi, a chi a.
Huchiin, a mit muh un a thou paha, a lupna a la a, Pathian phat kawmkawmin a in ah a paita.
Huan, a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Pathian a phat ua. Tuniin thillamdang pitak i mu hi, a chi ua, a lau mahmah uh.
Huan, huaite khitin a pawta, siahpiakna muna tu, siahkhonmi khat a min Levi a mu a; huan, a kiangah, Honjui in, a chi a.
Huchiin, bangkim a paisana, a thou a, a juita.
Huan, Leviin a in ah Jesu adingin ankuang thupitak a luia; huchiin, siahkhonmi midangte toh mi tampiin amau a umpih chiat ua.
Huan, Pharisaite, a laigelhmite utoh a nungjuite tungah a phun ua, Bang dia siahkhonmite leh khialte kianga ne-a dawn na hi ua? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, a kiang uah, Mi damtheiten daktor a kiphamoh kei ua, mi damtheilouten a kiphamoh jaw uh.
Mi diktatte sam dinga hongpai ka hi keia, mi khialte kisik dinga sam din hongpai ka hijaw, chi in a dawng hi.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Johan nungjuiten an a ngawl jel ua, a thum jel uh: Pharisai nungjuiten leng huchibang mahin a hih jel uh: himahleh, na nungjuiten a ne un a dawn gige uh, a chi ua.
Jesun a kiang uah, Mou pimite kianga a pasal ding a om lai siah mou pimite na ngawl sak thei ngei ua hia?
Himahleh apasal ding amau akipana pimang nite a hongtung dinga, huai ni chiangin jaw a ngawl ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah gentehna thu leng a gena: Kuamahin puan thak eu khiain puan lui a thuap ngei kei, thuap him taleh, a thakin a kaikek dia, a thak them leh a lui tuh a kituak tuan kei ding.
Huan, kuamahin uain thak savun uain thawl lui ah a thun ngei kei uh, thunta him le uleng, uain thakin savun thawlte a phukek dia, a bo dia, savun thawlte leng a se ding uh.
Uain thak tuh savun uain thawl thakah a thun zo ding uh ahi.
Huan, kuamah, uain lui na dawn khinin leng, a thak a duh pah kei hi; a lui a hoihjaw, a chi ngala, a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Khawlni khatin buh lei khawngah a pai suaka, a nungjuiten buh vuite a khiak ua, a khutpek un a nuai siang ua, a ne ua.
Huan, Pharisai kuate hiamin, Bangdia Khawlnia hih sianglou hih na hi ua? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, David a gilkial laia a lawmte toh a thil hih uh huai bangte leng na sim kei ua hia?
Huchia Pathian ina a luta, siampute loungalin a nek siang louh tanghou koih a laka, a lawmte kianga a piak sam thu, a chi a.
Huan, amahmahin, a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa jaw Khawlni Toupa ahi, a chi hi.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Khawlni dangin kikhopna in ah a luta, thu a hilha; huan, huai ah mi khat khut taklam jaw a na oma.
Huan, laigelhmite leh Pharisaiten a hekna ding a muh theihna ding un, Khawlniin hihdam dingin a kisa hia kisa lou a simet ua.
Himahleh, aman, a lungsim uh a theia, khutjaw kiang ah, Thou inla, a laiah ding khia in, a chi a. Huan a thou a, a ding khetaa.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Khawlniin hihhoih a sianga, hih siat? hotdam a sianga, hihlup? ka hondong ahi, a chi a.
Huan, a vek un a en velvela, a kiangah, Na khut zan khia in, a chi a. Huan, a zan khiaa, a khut tuh a damta.
Huchiin a heh lo mahmah ua, Jesu tunga hihdingdan a kihouta uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huailaiin, a pawta, thum dingin tang ah a kuana, Pathian kiangah jan khuain a thum a.
Huan, khovak takin a nungjuite a sama; a lak uah nih a tela, a min uh leng sawltak a sa hi:
Huaite tuh Simon Peter a chih leh a unaupa Andru, Jakob leh Johan, Philip leh Bartholomai,
Matthai leh Thoma, Alphai tapa Jakob,
Simon, Zelot kichi leh Jakob tapa Juda leh a mansakpa Juda Iskariot ahi uh.

Huan, amau toh a pai khia a, mun jangah a dinga, a nungjuite mipite toh, Judia gam tengteng akipan leh, Jerusalem khua akipan leh, Tura leh Sidon kho lama tuipi gei akipan mipi tampitak a thu ngai nuam leh a damlouhnate uh hihdam utin a hongpai ua;
Huchiin, dawi nin bawlgawpte leng damsakin omta uh.
Huan, a kianga kipan thilhihtheihna pawtkhiaa, mi chih a hidam jel jiakin mipi tengtengin amah khoih a tum ua.
Huan, a dak khia a, a nungjuite enin a gena: Nou gentheite aw, na hampha uhi; Pathian gam noua ahi ngala.
Nou tua gilkialte aw, na hampha uhi, tai ding na hi ngal ua. Nou tua kapte aw, na hampha uhi, nui ding na hi ngal ua.
Mihing Tapa jiaka miten a honhuat ua, honpampaih ua, hontai ua, na min uh a hoih kei chia a honpaih mang chiang un, na hampha ding uh.
Huai niin kipak unla, nuamin tawm un, ngai un, van ah na kipahman uh a om kikeih ngal a; huchi bangmahin a pipute un jawlneite tungah a hih uhi.
A hihhangin, nou mi haute aw, na tung uh a gik e; na khamuanna uh na mu khinta ngal ua:
Nou tua vahte aw, na tung uh a gik e; na gil uh hongkial ding ahi ngal a. Nou tua nuite aw; na tung uh a gik e; lungkhama kap ding na hi ngal ua;
Mi tengtengin a honphat chiang un na tung uh a gik ding hi; huchimahbangin a pipute un jawlnei takloute tungah a hih uhi.
Ka thu ngaikhete aw, konhilh ahi, Na melmate uh it unla, a honhote a hoihna ding uh hih un,
Hamsia honlohte vualjawl unla, a honsimmohte thum sak un.
Biang langkhata honbengpa tuh a lehlam leng dohin; huan, na puan honlaksakpa kiangah na puannak leng it ken.
A honngen peuh kiangah pia un; huan, na van honlaksakpa kiangah ngen nawn ken.
Huan, min na tung ua a hih uh na deih ding bang jel un mi tungah leng hih sam un.
Huan, a honitte kia na it un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? mikhialten leng amau itte a it sam ve ua oi.
Huan, na tung ua hoihte tung kiaa na hoih un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? mikhialten leng huchibangmahin a hih jel ve ua oi.
Huan, muh nawn lametnate kiang kiaa thil na leitawi sak un, pahtak bang na loh ding ua? mikhialten leng a ngeingei mu nawn dingin mikhialte kiangah a leitawisak sam ngal ua.

A hihhangin na melmate uh it unla, a hoihna ding un hih unla, leitawi sak un, lunglel het lou in; huchiin na kipah man uh a tam dia, Tungnungpen tate na hi ding uh; aman mi kipahnadantheiloute leh migiloute a hehpih naknak hi.
Na Pa un mi a hehpih bangin mi hehpih sam un.
Hawmsak kei un, huchiin hawmsakin na om kei ding uh; kuamah siamlouin sep dah un, huchiin siamlouhin na om kei ding uh; ngaidam un, huchiin ngaihdamin na om ding uh;
Pia un, huchiin, piakin na om ding uh, hoihtaka teha, hen gaka, sin gaka, let nawinawiin na angsung uah piakin na om ding uh. Noumau tehna ngei maha tehsaka piak hi ding na hi ngal ua, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah, gentehnain a gen a, Mittawin mittaw mah a pi thei diam? a nih un kokhuk ah a ke khawm kei ding ua hia?
Nungjui tuh a heutupa tungah a om kei; himahleh mi chih a siamkim chiang un a heutupa bangin a om ding uh.
Huan, bangdia, na mita singtum om limsak loua, na unau mita ninneng neuchik om mu na hia?

Nangmah mita singtum om mu lou piin, na unau kianga, Unau, na mita ninneng neuchik om honla khesak ve, bangchia chi thei na hia? Mi lepchiah: na mit apat singtum la khe masa in, huchiin na unau mita ninneng neuchik lak khiak ding tuh chiantakin na mu thei ding.
Sing hoih himhim gah siaa gah a om ngei kei; sing sia lah gah hoiha gah a om ngei sam kei.
Sing chih amau gah chiatah a kithei hi. Min khau lingnei kungah theipi a lou ngei kei uh, lingnok lakah grep gah a loungei sam kei uh.
Mi hoihin a lungtang gou bawm hoih akipan thil hoihte a honla khe jela; mi gilouin a lungtang gou bawm sia akipan thil hoihloute a honla khe jel hi; a lungtanga dim val tuh a kamin a gen jel ngala.
Huan, nou bang dinga, ka gente hih loupi a, Toupa, Toupa, honchi nahi ua?
Mi chih ka kianga honga, ka thu jaa mang peuhmah kua bang ahi ua, ka honen sak ding:
In lammi, thukpia tou a, suangpi tou a, suangpi tunga suangphum lemmi bang ahi uh; huan, tui a hongkhanin, tui khauhin huai in tuha khoh a, a hihling theikeia, hoihtaka lam a hih jiakin.
A hihhangin, jaa mang lou tuh, suangphum lou a, leitung maimaha in lammi ahi; huan, tui khauhin huai tuh a khoh a, a chim paha; huai in siatna tuh thupi tak ahi, a chi a.
Huan, mite jaka a thu gen tengteng a khitin Kapernaum khuaah a luta,
Huan, sepaih zaheutu kuahiam a sikha deihtak a chi a na a, a si dekdeka.
Huchiin, Jesu tanchin a jak takin a sikha honghihdam dinga ngen dingin a kiangah Juda upate a sawla.
Huan, amau tuh Jesu kiang a vatung ua, limtakin a ngen ua,
Amah jaw hiai na hihsak tak ahi; ka nam uh a it a, ka kikhopna in uh leng amah honlamsak ahi, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Jesu tuh amau toh a hongpai a. Huan, in a tun dekdekin sepaih zaheutun a kiangah, a lawmte a sawla, ka in sung na lutna tak ahi kei,
Huaijiakin na kianga hong tak hiin leng ka kisimkei, thu leltak gen lechin, ka naupang a dam mai ding.

Kei leng mi thua om ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte a om ua; huai mipa, hiai mipa, Pai in, ka chih leh a paia, mi dang kiangah leng, hongpai in, ka chih leh, a hongpai a; ka sikha kiangah leng, Hiai hih in, ka chih leh a hih jel, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun huai thu a jakin amah tuh lamdang a sa mahmah a, a kihei a, mipi amah juite kiangah, Ka honhilh ahi, Israelte lakah leng hichi tela ginna thupi ka mu kha mahmah kei, a chi a.
Huan, a misawlte in ah a painawn ua, sikha tuh damin a muta uh.
Huan, sawtlou chikin khua khat Nain kichi ah a hoha; a nungjuite leh mipi tampitak a kiang ah a hoh sam ua.
Huan, khopi kongkhak kiang a tunin, ngai in, misi a honjawng khia ua, a nu tapa neihsun ahi a, amah lah meithai ahi ngala; a khuate tampi a kiangah a om uh.
Huan, Toupan meithainu a muh takin, a hehpih mahmaha, Kap ken, a chi a.
Huan, a vanaiha, lang a khoiha; huchiin, a jawngte a khawlta ua. Huan, Tangval, thou in, ka honchi, a chi a.
Huan, misi tuh a tu khia a, a hongpauta a. Huan, Jesun a nu kiangah a peta.
Huan, mi tengtengin a lau ua, Pathian a phat ua, I lak ah jawlnei thupi tak a hongsuakta, a chi ua, Pathianin a mite hongvehta ahi, a chi uh.
Huan, huai mi tungtang thu tuh Judia gam tengtengah leh a kiang vel gam tengah a thang kheta a.
Huan, Johan nungjuiten huai thu tengteng Johan a hilh ua.
Huchiin, Johanin a nungjuite nih a sama, Toupa kiangah a sawla, Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, mi dang hungaih lailai ding ka hi uhia? chiin.
Huan, mite tuh a kiang a hongtun un, Baptispa Johanin, Hongpai dingpa na hi hia, mi dang hungaihlailai ding ka hi uhia? chiin, na kiangah kou a honsawl, a chi ua.
Huan, huailai takin Jesun chinate, hipi veite, dawi matte tampi a hihdama, mittaw tampite leng a mit uh a hihvaka.

Huan, a kiang uah, Pai nawnta unla, thil na muh uleh na jak uh Johan vahilh un; mittawte a mit uh a hongvakta, khebaite khein a hongpaita ua, phakte a hongsiangthouta uh, bengngongte leng a bil uh a hongvakta, misite kaihthohin a omta uh, ajawngten Tanchin Hoih hilh a tangta uh.
Huan, kuapeuh ka tunga lunghihlouhna mu loutuh a hampha hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Johan sawltakte a pai nung un Jesun mipite kiangah Johan thu a genta a, Bang en dinga gamdaia pai khia neita ua? Sialluang huih mut ling maw?
A hihkeileh, bang en dingpena pai khia neita ua? Puan nem silhmi maw? Ngai un, puan thupi silh leh mi nuamsate kumpipate in khawngah eive a om uh.
Ahihkeileh, bang en ding penin ahia na pai khiak uh? Jawlnei maw? A hi tawk vo oi, ka honchi ahi, jawlnei sanga leng thupijaw.
En dih, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl ahi, aman na ma ah na lam a bawl ding, chi-a, a tanchin kigelh, hiai mipa ahi.
Numei suan lakah Johan sanga thupi jaw a om kei; himahleh, Pathian gama mi neu pen leng amah sangin a thupi jaw, ka honchi a chi a.
Huan, mi tengtengin a jak un, siahkhonmite toh, Johan baptisma natangsa ahi ua, Pathian siam a tangsak uhi.
Pharisaite leh dan theimiten bel a kianga baptisma natangsa ahi kei ua, amaua dinga Pathianin a hoih dia a sehsak tuh a deih kei uh.
Huchiin Jesu mahin, Tulai khangthakte bang toh ka teh de aw? bangtobang ahi ua?
Naupang dawlmuna tua, Tamngai hon tumsak unga, lam lou uchina; kap huphup unga, nou lah kaptuan lou uchina, chia, kichi tuah bang ahi uh.
Baptispa Johan a hongpaia, tanghou a ne keia, uain leng a dawn kei a, nou ten, Dawi jawl ei ve, na chi ua.
Mihing Tapa a hongpaia, a nein a dawna, nouten, En dih uh, anhaipa, uain haipa, siahkhonmite leh mi khialte lawm: na chi ngal ua.
Himahleh, pilna tuh a ta tengtengin siam a tan uh.
Huan, Pharisaite laka mi khatin a kianga an ne din a deih a. Huan, huai Pharisai in ah a luta, an a um a.
Huan, ngai dih, huai khuaa numei khat omin Pharisai in ah an umin a tu chih a theih takin alabasta bawmin thau namtui a hontawi a,
A nungah a khepek bul ah kap kawmin a dinga, a khituiin a khepek a sukawt a, a samin a nula, a khepek tuh a tawp a, thau namtuiin a nuh.
Huan, a sampa Pharisaiin huai a muhin, a lungsimin, Hiai mi jawlnei a hih leh akhoihnu numei kua ahia, mi bangchi ahia, theih tuaktak hi a, mi khial ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, a kiangah, Simon, na kiangah thu kamkhat gen ding ka nei, a chi a, a dawnga, Huan, aman, Bang ahia, Sinsakpa? a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, Dangka leitawi sak kuahiamin leibami nih a neia: khatin makhai za nga a ba a, khatin sawm nga.
Huan, a ditna ding a neikei a, a ngaidam tuaktuak ta. Huchiin, huai mite a kuain ahia amah it zo ding? a chi a.
Simonin, A ngaihdam diak penin hiin ka gingta, a chi a, a dawnga. Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na chi dik, a chi a.
Huan, numei lam a nga a, Simon kiangah, Hiai numei na mu hia? Na in ah ka honglutta, nang ka khepek silna ding tui nahon pe keia, aman tuh a khituiin ka khepek a sukawta, a samin a nula.
Nang tawp himhim non tawp kei; aman tuh ka honglut nungsiah ka khepek tawp a tawlnga kei.
Nang ka lutang ah thau non nilh kei; aman tuh ka khepek thau namtui a nilh.
Huaijiakin ka honchi ahi, A khelhna tampi ngaihdamin a omta; aman nakpitakin a it hi; a hihhangin, ngaihdam tawmin, neuchikin a it nak, a chi a.
Huan, numei kiangah, Na khelhnate ngaihdam ahi ta, a chi a.
Huan, a an umpihten, Mi khialte nangawn ngaidam kua ahia eita? a kichi ua.
Huan, aman, numei kiangah, Na ginna hotdam na hih loh ahi, khamuang takin pai in, a chi hi.
Anungin Jesu a paipaha, thu hilh leh Pathian gam Tanchin Hoih tun kawmin kho lian leh kho neute a tawn vialviala; a kiangah sawm leh nihte a om ua,
Numei kuate hiam dawi jawl dam nawnte leh china dam nawnte toh. Huai numeite tuh Mari a sunga pat dawi sagih pawtna Magdalini a chih uh,
Herod sumkempa Chuza ji Jonna, Sussana leh mi dang tampite toh ahi uh; huaiten amau neihsain amah a khotuah jel uh.
Huan, mipi tampitak a hongkikhawm ua, kho chiha mi a kianga a hong un, gentehnain thu a gena:
Buhchithehpa a buh chi theh din a kuana; huan, a theh lain a khen lampi sikah a kia a, min a sik ua, tungleng vasaten a ne zouta uh.
Huan, a khen suang tungah a kia a; huan a pout akin a kawt louh jiakin a vuai pah a.
Huan, a khen loulingnei lakah a kia a, louin a pou tonpiha, a dep mangta.
Huan, a khen lei hoih ah a kia a, a hongpou a, a leh jain a gahta a, a chi a. Huan, huai thu a gen lain a kikou a, Kuapeuh jakna dinga bilneiin ja uheh, a chi hi.
Huan, a nungjuiten a kiang ah, Hiai gentehna thu bang chihna ahia? chiin, a dong ua.
Huan, Pathian gam thugukte nou theih dia piak ahia, mi dang kiangah bel gentehna kiaa gen ahi; mu napia a muh theihlouhna ding uleh za napi-a a theihsiam louhna ding un.
Huai gentehna thu hiai ahi: Buh chi tuh Pathian thu ahi.
Huan, lampi sika te tuh thu zasate ahi uh; huan, diabol a hongpaia, a gin louh ua, hotdam a hih theih louhna ding un a lungtang ua kipan thu tuh a lak mangsak jel.
Huan, suang tunga te tuh a jak tak ua thu kipak taka pom pahte ahi ua; himahleh zung himhim a neikei ua, sawtlou chik kia a ging ua, khem hunin a tawp san nak uh.
Huan, loulingnei laka kiate tuh thu zate ahi ua; himahleh a khosak jelna uah damsung khosak ngaihtuahnate, hauhsaknate, nuamsaknaten a depa, a gah piching kei nak uh.
Lei hoih ate bel thu jaa lungtang kizen leh hoih a kem kinken a, kuhkaltaka gah suahte ahi uh.
Kuamahin khawnvak dein belin a khuh kei uh, lupna nuaiah leng a koih kei uh; a lut peuhmahin a vak a muh theihna dingun a koihna ah a koih jaw uh.
Thang lou ding a im bangmah a om ngal kei a, theih louh ding leh lang lou dinga selguk bangmah a om sam kei.
Huchiin, bangchibangin ahia na jak uh pilvang un; kuapeuh a nei tuh piak behlap ahi ding a, kuapeuh a neilou tuh, nei a kichih sun leng lak sak ahi ding, a chi hi.
Huan, a nu leh a unauten Jesu lam a honnaih ua, himahleh mipi jiakin a kiang a hongtung theikei ua.
Huan, Na nu leh na unaute nangmah muh tumin inpua ah ding nilouh ve uh, chiin, a hilh ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Hiai Pathian thu jaa gingtate ka nu leh ka unaute ahi uh, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huailaiin ni khat tuh longah a tuanga, a nungjuite toh; huan, a kiang uah, Dil gal khat lamah I kai ding, a chi a. Huchiin long a phel ua, a paita ua.
Huan, a pai lai un Jesu a ihmutaa; huan, dilah huihpi a hongnung suka, a long uh tuiin a dim dekdeka, lauhuai piin a omta uh.
Huan, a kiangah a vahoh ua, a phawng ua, Heutupa, Heutupa, mangthang ding ka kei umaw, a chi ua. Huan amah a khanglou-a huih leh tuikihot a taita a; huan, a tawp ua, a daita mai uhi.
Huan, a kiang uah, Na ginna uh kaw om ahia? a chi a. Huan, a lau ua, lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Hiai mi kua ahia leh? huih leh tui nangawn thu a piaka, a thu a man uh? a kichi uhi.
Huan, Gaili gam jawn Gerasinte gam a tung ua.
Huan, gama a pai khiakin, khuaa mi dawi mat kuahiamin a nadawna; huai mi tuh sawtpi puan himhim silh louin a oma, in himhim ah leng a om keia, han khawng ngen ah a om jaw a.
Huan, Jesu a muh takin a kikou a, a maah a khupboha, aw ngaih piin, Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpen Tapa, kei leh nang bang i kizolhna a om a? honhihgim mahmah lou dingin ka honngen ahi, a chi a.

Jesun dawi nin tuh huai mi sunga kipana pawt dingin thu a nape khin ngala. Huai mi tuh dawiin a man gige ahi; min khainiang leh kol a bun sak ua, a ching ngitnget ua; himahleh a gakna uh a hihtata, dawiin gamkeu khawngah a delhkhe jel hi.
Huan, Jesun, Na min bang ahia? chiin, a donga. Huan, aman, Nuai, a chi a, a sunga dawi tampi a lut jiakin.
Huan, kokhuk toneiloua pai thu a kiang ua pe lou dingin Jesu kiangah a ngen uh.
Huan, huailaiah tangah vok hon tampi a ta ua; huan, vok sunga lut theihna thu a kiangah a ngen ua. Huan, aman thu a pia a.
Huan, Dawite tuh huai mi sung akipan a pawt ua, vok sungah a lut ua; huan, vok hon tuh tuigei ken ah a tai suk duamduam ua, dil ah a tai lut ua, tuihakin a sita uh.
Huan, a vulten huai thil omdan a mu ua, a tai ua, khuaah leh gamahte khawng a gen ua.
Huan, Bang a hita a? chia, en dingin a pawt chiat ua; huan, Jesu kiang a hongtun un, dawi pawtsan nung puan silha, lungsim ngeingei puin, Jesu khe bula tu a hongmu ua, huchiin a lauta ua.
Huan, a theiten dawi mat a hihdamdan thu a maute a na hilh ua.
Huan a kim Gerasinte gama mi tengtengin, a lau mahmah jiak un, amah tuh a kiang ua kipan pai mang dingin a ngen ua; huan, longah a tuanga, a kik nawnta.
Huan, dawi pawtsan miin Jesu kianga om den a ngena.

Himahleh, Jesun, Na in ah pai inla, Pathianin nang dia thil a honhihsak a thupidan vahilh in, chiin a sawl khia hi. Huchiin, a paia, khopi sung tengteng ah Jesun amah adia thil a hihsak thupidan a tangkou pihta hi.
Huan, Jesu a hongkik nawnin Mipiin amah a kipahpih ua; amah a nangak nilouh ngal ua.
Huan, ngai dih, mi khat a min Jaira kikhopna in vaihawmpa a hongpaia, Jesu khebul ah a khupboha, a ina hoh dingin a ngen ngutnguta.
Tanu tangkhat kum sawm leh kum nih hiam phial ding a neia, huai tuh laitatin a lum ngala. Huan Jesu a pai laiin mipi honin a boh lutlut ua.
Huan, numei khat kum sawm leh kum nih si pawt a china a sum neih tengteng daktorte lakah zang khintaa, kuamahin a hihdam theih tuan;
louh uh a nungah a hongpaia, a puan mong a khoiha; thakhatin a si pawt tuh a hongkam guiha.
Huan, Jesun, Honkhoih kua ahia? a chi a. Huan, Kei jaw ka hi kei, a nachi chiat ua. Peter leh a lawmten, Heutupa, mipi honin a honboh lutlut ua, honvel vengvung ve ua oi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, Jesun, Kua hiam in jaw honkhoih ve aw, thilhihtheihna ka sung akipan a pawt chih ka theih jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, numeiin a kisel theih louh a theihin, ling kawmin a hongpaia, a maah khupbohin a khoih san leh thakhata a damtak dan mi tengteng maah a genkhe ta.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Tanu, na ginna dampih hi chia, khamuangtakin pai in, a chi a.
A pau laitakin kikhopna in vaihawmpa in akipan mi khat a hongpaia, Na tanu a sita, Heutupa hihgim nuamdahin, a chi a.
Jesun huai thu a jakin, Lau ken, gingta mai in, huchiin a dam nawn ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, in a vatunin, Peter, Johan, Jakob leh naupang nu leh pate kia chih louhngal kuamah lut a phal keia.
Huan, a vek un a nakap kheukhou ua, a kah vengvung ua, himahleh, aman, kap kei un, a si kei, a ihmu ahi jaw, a chi a.
Huan, sikhina a theih jiak un a nuihsan maimah ua.
Jesun bel a khut a lena, Nungak, thou ve, a chi a, a sam a.
Huan, a kha tuh a hongkik nawna, a thou paha.
Huan, Banghiam nek ding piak ding thu a piaa. Huan, a nu leh a pan lamdang a sa mahmah ua. Himahleh, aman a thilhih tuh kuamah hilh lou dingin a chi bikbek hi.
Huan, Jesun sawm leh nihte a sam khawma, dawi tengteng tunga thilhihtheihna leh thuneihna leh natnate hihdam theihna a pia a.
Huchiin, Pathian gam thugen ding leh dam loute hihdam dingin a sawlkhetaa.
Huan, a kiang uah, Zinna adingin chiang khun hiam, kawljal hiam, tanghou hiam, dangka hiam, bangmah keng kei un; puannak nih leng neikei un.
Huan, na tunna in peuh uah tung kinken jel un, huai in akipanin paikhia un.
Huan, a honkipahpih lou peuhmah tuh huai khua akipan na paikhiak chiang un amau mohpaihna dingin na khepek ua leivui tatkhia unla, a chi a.
Huchiin, a kuanta ua, khua a tawn vialvial ua. Gam chihah Tanchiin Hoih a hilh ua, mi a hihdam jel uh.
Huan, kumpipa Herodin a thilhih tengteng uh a nazataa; khenkhatin Johan hing nawnta ei ve a chi ua, khenkhatin,
Elija hongkilakta ei ve a chi ua, khenkhatin, Nidang laia jawlnei kuahiam thou nawnta ei ve, a chih jiak un, a lungjingtaa.
Huan, Herodin, Johan a lu ka tanta a; himahleh hichi lawmlawma a thu ka jakjak kua ahia? a chi a. Huan, amah tuh muh a tumta hi.
Huan, sawltakte a hongkik nawn un, a kiangah a thilhihte uh a hilh ua. Huan, aman amau piin khopi Bethsaida kichi ah a pai tuamta a.
Himahleh mipin a thei ua, a jui jel uh; huan, aman amau a nakipahpiha, Pathian gam thu a hilha, hihdam kiphamoh peuhmah a hihdama.

Huan, nitaklam a honghi dektaa; huan, sawm leh nihte a hongpai ua, a kiangah, khuate leh a kim gam khawnga giahna leh annektuidawn zong dingin mipite paisak tanla; tua, gamkeu muna om hi ngal hang a, a chi ua.
Aman bel a kiang uah, Nou nek ding pia un, a chi a. Huan, amau, Mi hiai zahzah adia nek ding I valei sak keileh, tanghou phel nga leh nga nih kia loungal bangmah I neikei uh, a chi ua.
Piching ngen leng sang nga hiam phial ahi ngal ua. Huan, a nungjuite kiangah, A pawlpawlin tu sak un, sawm nga khawng jelin, a chi a.
Huchiin a hih ua, a tu sak vekta ua.
Huan, tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih tuh a laa, van lam enin vual a jawla a balkhama, mipi maa lui dingin a nungjuite kiang ah a piaa.
Huan, a ne ua, a vah vekta ua, huan, a khamval nengte uh bawm sawm leh nih a luak dim uh.
Huan, hi chi ahi a, Jesu amah kiaa a thum lain a nungjuite a kiangah a om ua; a kiang uah, Mipiten kua ka hi a honchi ua? chiin a donga.
Huan, amau, Baptispa Johan ahi, honchi uh; himahleh khenkhatin, Nidang laia jawlnei kuahiam a thou nawnta ahi, a honchi uh, chiin, a dawng ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Ahihleh, nou kua ka hi non chi ua? a chi a. Peterin, Pathian kris mah, chiin, a dawnga.
Huan, huai thu kuamah hilh louh ding chi bikbekin, thu a piaa:
Mihing Tapain thil tampi a thuak dia, upate, siampu liante, laigelhmite deih louhin a om dia, thahin a om dia, ni thum niin kaihthohin a om ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, amahmahin, mi tengteng kiangah, kuapeuhin honzuih a ut leh, amah kingaihsak louin, niteng a kros puin honjui hen.
Kuapeuh a hin humbit utin a tan ding; kuapeuh keimah jiaka a hin tanin, huai mi mahin a humbit ding.
Min khovel a pumin nei henla, amah kimangsak hiam, ahihkeileh kimanloh leh, amah adingin bang a phatuam dia?
Kuapeuh keimah leh ka thu zahpih mi jaw Mihing Tapain, amah thupina toh, a Pa thupina toh, a angel siangthoute thupina toh a hongpai chiangin a honzahpih ding.
Diktakin ka honhilh ahi, Hiaia dingte akhen, Pathian gam a muh masiah uh sihna chiam lou hial ding a om uh, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai thugen nung ni giat hiam khawngin, Jesun Peter, Johan leh Jakob a pi a, thum dingin tangah a hohtou a.
Huan, a thum laiin a mel omdan a honglamdanga, a puansilhte mi leng theiin a hongngoutaa.
Huan, ngai in, mi nih amah toh a kihou ua, huai mite tuh Mosi leh Elija ahi uh.
Thupinaa kithuamin a kilak ua, Jerusalem khuaa sihna a hihkim ding thu a gen uh.
Peter leh a lawmte bel a ihmut uh a suaka, himahleh a hak teitei ua a thupina leh a kianga mi nih ding a mu uh.

Huan, huai miten Jesu a paisan dek lai un, Peterin, Jesu kiangah, Heutupa, ei din hiaia om hoih veh, aidakbuk thum i khoh dia, nang din khat, Mosi din khat, Elija din khat, a chi a-a thugen lengthei louin.
Huan huai thute a gen laiin mei a hongkaia, amau tuh a liahta; mei laka a lut laiun a lau ua.
Huan mei akipan aw a hongsuaka, Hiai ka Tapa, ka tel ahi, amah thu ngai un, a chi a.
Huan aw a daih takin Jesu amah kiain a muta uh. Huan, a dai dide ua, huailai khawngin a thil muh uh kuamah bangmah a hilh kei uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, a jingin tang akipana a paisuk nung un, mipi thupi takin amah a nadawn ua.
Huan, ngaiin, mipi lakah mi khat a kikoua, Sinsakpa, ka tapa en dingin ka honngen ahi, ka tapa neihsun ahi ngala.
Ngai in, dawiin a mana, a kikou khe guih jela; huchiin, a chilphuan bang ke hialin a gimbawla, nakpitaka hihsidupin a pai san phet jela.
Huan na nungjuite kiangah delhkhe dingin ka ngena, a hih theikei uh, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, Khangthak ginna neilou leh lampialte aw, bangtan ahia ka honthuak theih ding? Na tapa tuh hiaiah honpi in, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, a honglaiin dawiin a hihpuk eka, nakpitakin a gimbawltaa, himahleh, Jesun dawi nin tuh a taia, naupang tuh a hihdama, a pa kiangah a paisak nawnta.
Huan, mi tengtengin Pathian thupidan lamdang a sa mahmah uh. Huchiin mi tengtengin a thilhih tengteng lamdang a sak lai un, Jesun a nungjuite kiangah,
Hiai thute na bil uah lut heh. Mihing Tapa mihingte khuta mat saka om ding ahi ngala, a chi a
Himahleh, a thugen tuh a theisiam kei uh, a theihtheih louhna ding un a kisel ahi, huai thugen tanchin tuh amah a dong ngam ngal kei ua.
Huan, a lak uah kua a thupipen dia? Chih thuin a nakisel ua.
Huchiin, Jesun a lungtang ua a ngaihtuah uh a theia, naupang neu khat a kaia, a sik ah a omsaka, a kiang uah,
Kuapeuh ka min jiaka hiai naupang neu kipahpih tuh keimah honkipahpih ahi ding uh; na vek ua laka neupen ahi, a thupipen, a chi a.
Huan, Johanin, Heutupa, kuahiam na mina dawite delkhia ka mu ua, kon zuihna ua a pan sam louh jiakin ka khamta ve ua, a chi a, dawnga.
Jesun bel a kiang ah, Kham nawn kei un, kuapeuh nou hondal loutuh nou lama pang ahi uh, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, amah pi touh a hun dingin, Jerusalem khuaa hoh a tum chiltela, a maah mi a matai saka;
Huan, a pai ua, amah adia nakimansak dingin Samari mite kho khatah a lut ua.
Huan, a mai tuh Jerusalem kho lam naiha a lat jiakin amah a nakipahpih kei uh.
Huchiin a nungjui Jakob leh Johanin huai a theih takun, Toupa, amaute kangmang dingin van akipan mei sam khe leng hoih na sa hia? a chi ua.
Amah tuh a kiheia, amau a taitaa.
Huan, kho dangah a paita uh.
Huan, lampia a pai lai un, kuahiamin a kiangah, Na paina peuhah kon jui ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Sehalten kua a nei ua, tungleng vasaten leng bu a nei uh, ahihhangin Mihing Tapain jaw a lu ngakna ding mun a neikei, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun mi dang kiangah, Honjui in, a chi a. Himahleh aman, Toupa, ka pa honvui sak phot in, a chi a.
Jesun tuh a kiangah, Misiin a misi uh vui uheh; nang Pathian gam thu vahilh jak jaw in, a chi a.
Huan, mi dangin leng, Toupa, kon jui ding, a hihhangin ka ina mite kamphain honkha sak photin, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Kuapeuh leilehna lena, nunglam nga tuh, Pathian gam mi hitak ahi kei, a chi.
Huan, huai khitin Toupan mi dang sawmsagih a sepa, a paina ding kho tengah leh mun tengah, a maah nihnihin a sawla,
Huan, a kiang uah, Buh lak ding a tam mahmaha, himahleh a semte a tawm uh, huchiin a buh la dinga sem dingte sawl dingin buh Neipa kiangah ngen un.
Pai un; ngai un nge laka belamnou om bangin ka honsawl ahi.
Dangka ip khawng, kawljal khawng, khedap khawng tawi kei unla, lampi ah kuamah chibai buk kei un.
Huan, in na lutna peuh uah a masapen, Hiai in ah khamuanna tung hen, chi unla.
Huan, huaiah khamuanna ta a om leh na khamuanna thu uh a tungah a om dinga; a omkei leh na ang uah a hongkik nawn ding.
Huai in ngen ah om nilouh unla, a honpiak peuh uh nein dawn un; nasemmi tuh loh mu tak ahi. In tengah banhoh kei un.
Huan, khua na lutna peuh uah honkipahpih uleh, honlui peuh uh na ne ding ua; huaia damlou omte leng na hihdam ding ua;
a kiang uah, Pathian gam na kiang nai uah hongtungta, na chi ding uh.
Khua na lutna peuh uah honkipahpih kei uleh a kongzing uah pai khia unla,
Na kho leivui uh ka khepek ua bang leng na tunguah tat siang ung e; himahleh Pathian gam hongnaita chih thei un, na chi ding uh
Ka honhilh ahi, huai ni chiangin huai khuate thuak sangin Sodom kho thuak ding adan a om zo ding,
Korazin, na tung a gik e; Bethsaida, na tung a gik e; Noumaua thil lamdangpi kihihte Tura leh Sidon khuaa hih hileh, saiip puan silhin, vut laka tuin a kisik khin thamta ding uh.
Himahleh thukhenni chiangin nou thuak sangin Tura leh Sidon kho thuak ding a dan a om zo ding.
Huan, nang Kapernaum, van tana pahtawi na hi dia hia? misi kho tana sawn khiak eive na hih ding.

Kuapeuh na thu uh ngai khia, keimah thungaikhia ahi a; kuapeuh nou hodeih lou tuh, kei hondeih lou ahi a; kuapeuh nou honngai lou tuh kei honngai lou ahi a, kuapeuh kei honngai lou tuh, honsawlpa ngai lou ahi, a chi.
Huan, sawmsagihte tuh kipak takin a hongkik nawn ua, TOUPA, dawite leng na min jiakin ka thuthu un a om uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Khophia bangin Setan Van akipan a hong kia ka mu.
Ngai un, gulte, aikamte sikdenna thu leh, melma thilhihtheihna tengteng tunga thu neihna ka hon pia ahi; bangmahin a honhihna kei hial ding,
Himahleh, dawite na thuthu ua a omjiak un kipak kei un; vana na min uh gelh ahih jiakin kipak jaw un, a chi a.

Huan, huailaitakin Jesu tuh Kha Siangthouin a kipak mahmaha, Pa aw, lei leh van Toupa, nang mi pil leh mi bengvakte kiangah hiai thu na ima, naungekte kianga na than jiakin ka honphat ahi; ahi, Pa, huchibang hih nang ngaihin a hoih ahi.
Ka Pan bang kim honkem saka, Tapa kua ahia, Pa loungal kuamahin a theikei, Pa leng kua ahia, Tapa leh a kiang ua Tapain a theihsak nopnate kia loungal kuamah in a theikei, a chi a.
Huan, nungjuite lam a ngaa, a simin, Na thil muhte uh a mu mitte a hampha e:
Ka honchi ahi, jawlnei tampi leh kumpipa tampiten leng na thil muhte uh muh a kilawp gige ua, himahleh a mu kei uh, bila na jakte uh leng jak a kilawp thei mahmah ua, himahleh a za kei uh, achia.
Huan, ngai un, dantheimi kuahiam a dinga, amah zeetna din, Sinsakpa, khantawna hinna neihna dingin bang ka hih ding? A chi a.
Huan aman, a kiangah, Dan laibu ah bang gelh ahia? bang na sim jela ahia? a chi a.

Huan aman, Toupa, na Pathian tuh na lungtang tengtengin, na kha tengtengin, na hatna tengtengin, na lungsim tengtengin na it ding ahi; nangmah na kiit bangin na vengte leng na it ding ahi. chih, achi a, a dawng a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na dawng dik ngial e; huchiin hih lechin na hing ding a chi a.
Aman bel kisiamtansak utin, Jesu kiangah, A hihleh, ka innveng kua ahia? a chi a.
Jesun a dawnga, Kuahiam Jerusalem khua akipanin Jeriko khuaah a hoh suk deka, suam hatte a tuak zenzena, huaiten a puansilh a phel sak vek ua, a vo ek ua, si dekdekin a pai santa uh.
Huan, siampu kuahiam huai lampi ah a vapai suk zenzena, a muh takin lampi sik lehlam ah a pel maimaha.
Huan, huchibang mahin Levi chi mi khat leng huai mun a hongtunga, a muh takin lampi sik lehlam ah a pel maimaha.
Ahihhangin, Samari gama mi kuahiam a zin pailai a omna a hongtunga, a muh takin a hehpih mahmaha, a kiangah a vahoha,
a liamnate thau leh uain a buaka, a tuama, amah gan tungah a tuang saka, khualbuk ah a paipiha, a kemta.
Huan, a jingin makhai nih a suahkhiaa, khualbuk kempa kiangah a piaa, Amah na kem inlan, hiai ban a na zat teng, ka hongkik nawn chiangin ka hondin ding, a chi a.
Huai mi thumte lakah, suamhatte tuakpa adin, inveng hipen kua hiin na gingtaa? a chi a.
Huan, aman, a hehpihpa, a chi a. Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Nang leng huai bangmahin vahih in, a chi a.
Huan, a zin kawm un khua khat ah a luta; huan, numei khat a min Marthain a na zintun a.
Huai nun sanggam numei khat a neia a, a min Mari ahi, huai minu tuh Toupa khe bulah a tu a, a thu a ngaikhia a.
Marthain bel na mah semin a buai mahmah a; huchiin a kiangah, a hongpaia, Toupa, ka sanggamnun kei kia na sem dinga honkhiat khawksa lou na hi maw? Honhuh dingin chi dih ve, a chi a.
Huan, Toupan, Martha, Martha, thil tampi na ngaihtuah a, buai nei ve; thil khat kia a kul ahi;
Mariin tan hoih a tel a, huai tuh lak sak ding ahi kei, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Jesu koilai mun hiamah a thum a, a thum khitin a nungzui mi khatin a kiangah, Toupa, thumdan Johanin a nungjuite a hilh bangin honhilh sam ve, a chi a.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Na thum chiang un hichi bangin na chi ding uh, achia: Ka Pa uh, vana om, na min kizahtak hen, Na gam hongtung hen.
Ni tengin ka nek khop uh an honpia in.
Ka khelhte uh hongaidam in, kou leng kuapeuh bat honneite tengteng ka ngaidam uhi; huan, khemna ah honpilut ken.
Huan, amahmahin, akiang uah, Na lak ua kua ahi hiamin lawm nei henla, jan laiin a kianga hohin, Lawm, tanghou phel thum honleitawi sak ve;
ka lawm zinin a hontawna, a maa lui ding bangmah ka nei ngak kei a, chi henla;
in sung a pan tuh, Hon hihbuai ken; tun jaw kong khak ahi, ka tate leng ka kiangah lupnaah a ihmuta uh; thouin ka hongpe theikei, chiin, dawng leh, ka honhilh ahi,
A lawm a hih jiakin thouin a vape kei na a, a nget ngutngut jiakin thouin a deihzahzah a vape ding.
Huchiin, ka honhilh ahi, Ngen un, huan, piakin na om ding uh; zong un, huan na mu ding uh; kiu un, huan, honsakin na om ding uh.
Kuapeuh a ngenin a mu nak a, kuapeuh a zongin a mu nak a, kuapeuh a kiu tuh honsakin a om ding.
Nou laka pa pen, a tain tanghou phel ngen leh, kuan ahia suang pe ding? A hihleh, nga ngen leh, kuan ahia nga sika gul pe ding?
A hihleh, aktui ngen leh, aikam a pe dia hia?
Huchiin, nou migilouin bawn noumau tate thil hoih piakna dan na theih uleh, na Pa uh vana omin a ngente Kha Siangthou pe natel in chia: a chi a.
Huan, Jesun dawi pau theilou khat a delh khia a. Huan, hichi ahi a, dawi tuh a pawt takin pautheilou tuh a hongpauta; huchiin mipiin lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Himahleh, a khenin, Dawi lal Beelzibul jiakin eive dawite a delh khiak jel, a chi ua.
Huan, a khenin, amah zeetna dingin, vana kipan chiamtehna a ngen ua.
Aman tuh a ngaituah uh ana thei a, a kiang uah, Koi gam leng amah kidou peuh a mangthang nak; inkuan khat leng amah kidou tuh a mangthang nak.
Setan leng amah a kidou leh, a gam bangchin a dingkhe dia? -Beelzibul jiakin dawite a delh khia, non chi ngal ua.
Huan, kei Beelzibul jiaka dawite delh khia ka na hih leh, na tate un kua jiakin ahia a na delh khiak jel uh? Huaijiakin amau noute honvaihawmsak dingte ahi ding uh.
A hihhangin, kei Pathian khut zung jiaka dawite delh khe jel ka hih leh, Pathian gam na kiang uah hongtung khin ahi vele.
Mi hatin hiamzat kim tawia a in a ven sung teng, a sum bit takin a om gige a;
himahleh, a sanga hatjawin a honsuala, a zoh chiangin, a muan a galvan kim tuh a sut a, sum a lak sak tuh a hawmjak jel hi.
Kuapeuh ka lama panglou tuh, hondou ahi a, kuapeuh honlak khawm pih louin a hihjak ahi.
Dawi nin mi sung akipana apawtin, khawlna zongin tui om louhna mun peuhah a vak vak a; huan, khawlna himhim a mu kei a, ka pawtna in ah ka kik nawn mai ding, a chi a.
Huan, a va tunin phiat sianga zephoihin a mu a.
Huai takin a vapaia, amah sanga gilou jaw dawi dang sagih a honpi a, huaiah a lut ua, a om gige uh; huai mihing tuh a omdan nanung a masa sangin a honghoih keizo tham hi, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, huai thute a genlaiin, mipi lakah numei khat a kikou khia a, a kiangah, Nang honpai gil a hampha e, na nawi tep toh, a chi a.
Aman bel, A hi, himahleh Pathian thu jaa juite mi hampha ahi jaw uh a chi a.

Huan, mipite a kiangah hongkikhop lai un, Jesun, Tulai khangthakte jaw khangthak gilou ahi uh; chiamtehna a zong ua; himahleh Jona chiamtehna chih louh a kiang uah chiamtehna himhim piak ahi kei ding.
Jona tuh Ninevi khuaa mite adia chiamtehna a na hih bangin, Mihing Tapa leng tulai khangthakte din chiamtehna a honghi ding.

Thukhenni chiangin, Simlam kumpinu tulai khangthakte kiangah a ding sam dia, siamlouh a tang sak ding; Solomon pilna ngaikhe dingin bawn kawl mong a kipan a hong ngala; ngai un, Solomon sanga thupi jaw hiai ah a om ahi.
Thukhenni chiangin, Ninevi khuaa mite tulai khangthakte kiangah a ding sam ding ua, siamlouh a tang sak ding uh, Jona thu hilh jiakin a kisik ngal ua; ngai un, Jona sanga thupijaw hiai ah a om ahi.
Kuamahin khawnvak a det un in nuai tawngah a koih ngei kei uh, loh nuaiah a koih ngei sam kei uh, alut miten a vak a muh theihna ding uah a koihna ah a koih jel uh.
Na sapum khawnvak tuh na mit ahi; na mit a chim leh na sapum leng a vekin a vak suak nak hi; a chim keileh bel na sapum leng a mial vek nak hi.
Huchiin, na sunga vak om tuh mial a nahi kha ding e pilvangin.
Huchiin, na sapum koi laipeuh mial lou a a veka a vak khiak leh, khawnvak vak petpetin a tatvak bangin a vak khe vek ding, a chi a.
Huan, a gen laiin Pharisai khatin amah a kianga an ne dingin achiala; huchiin, a luta an a ne a.
Huan, Pharisaiin a an um a muhin, an nek maa a sil louh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah a.
Huan, Toupan, akiangah, Nou Pharisaiten nou leh kuang po lam na silsiang ngeitak ua; na sung lam ulah lepgukna leh gilouin a dim ngala.
Mi haite aw, polam bawlpan sung lam leng a bawl ka hia?
Himahleh, a sunga thil om tuh mi genthei kianga piak dingin zang un; huchiin, ngai un, nou adin bangkim siangthou khin ahi.

Nou Pharisaite aw, na tung uh a gik e: pudina, pardi leh anteh-louhing teng sawma khat na pia ua, diktatna leh Pathian itna na limsak ngal kei ua; himahleh huaite eive na hih ding uh, a dangte hih lou tuan lou in.
Nou Pharisaite aw, na tung uh a gik e: kikhopna in ah tutphah hoihpente leh dawl muna chibai bukte na ngaisang uh.
Na tung uh a gik hi: Han chih kithei lou, a tunga theiloua mi apai jelna bang uh, na hi uh, a chi a.
Huan, dantheimi khatin, a kiangah, Sinsakpa, hiai thu na gen tuh kou leng hontai na hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, aman, Dantheimite aw, nou leng na tung uh a gik: Puakgik, puak haksapipi mite na suan ua, nou lah tua puakgikte na khut zung khat un leng na khoih ngei ngal kei ua.
Na tung uh a gik: Jawlneite han in khawng na lam ua, na pipute uh thah ahi ngal ua.
Huchiin na pipute uh thilhihte na theihpih un na hoihsakpih uh ahi; amau a that ua, nou a han inte uh na lam ngal ua.
Huaijiakin, Pathian pilna inleng, A kiang uah jawlneite leh sawltakte ka sawl dia, a khen a that ding ua, a khen a sawi ding uh;
jawlnei tengteng sisan, leilung piantung akipan a suah, tulai khangthakte tungah phu a lak theih ding a chih;
Abel sisan suah akipan, Zakaria, maitam leh biakin kikala si sisan suah tannin; ahi, ka honhilh ahi, tulai khangthakte tungah phu a akila ding.
Nou dantheite aw, na tung uh a gik e: Pilna tabi na paimang pih ua; nou lah na lut ngal kei ua, mi lut ding lah na dal ngal ua, a chi a.
Huan, huaia kipan apawtin, laigelhmite leh Pharisaiten amah a tawng ua, thu chiteng gen sak teitei tumin leh,
a pau khelh zenzena mat tumin a tang gige uh.
Huchih laia mipi sang tampi kiphumuimui zou hiala hongkikhop un, Jesun a masapenin a nungjuite kiangah, Pharisaite silngou, lepchiahna lakah pilvang un,
Lang lou dinga selguk bangmah a om ngal keia; theih louh dinga im leng bangmah a om sam kei.
Huaijiakin miala na gen peuh uh vaka jakin a om ding; dantan sunggila bil bula na thu gen uh intungvuma tangkoupihin a om ding.
Huan, ka lawmte aw, ka honhilh ahi, Sapum hihlum a, huai nunga bangmah dang hihnawn theiloute jaw, kihta kei un,
Ahihhangin kua ahia na kihtak ding uh ka honhilh khol ahi; a hihlup nunga leng Gihennaa paih theihna thu neipa kihta un.
Kawlgit nga dal dangka nihin a juak sek kei ua hia? Himahleh, a lak ua khat leng Pathianin a mangngilh ngei ngal keia.
Na lu ua samzangte nangawn leng sim vek ahi uh. Lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin na manpha jaw uhi.
Huan ka honhilh ahi, Mite maa hon gum peuhmah Pathian angelte maah Mihing Tapain a gum sam ding a.
Himahleh mite maa honkitheihmoh bawl peuhmah Pathian angelte maah kitheihmoh bawl a hisam ding.
Huan, Mihing Tapa kalha thugen peuhmah a genkalhna uh ngaihdam sak ahi ding a; himahleh Kha Siangthou hilhial gensia tuh a gensiatna ngaihdam sak ahi kei ding.
Huan, kikhopna in a mite, vaihawmte, heutute maa a honpi hun chiangun, Bang chiin, bang thuin ka dawng dia, bang thu ka gen dia chiin lungkham kei un;
huchih huntakin, bang ahia na gen ding uh, Kha Siangthouin a honhilh ding hi, a chi a.
Mipi laka khatin, Jesu kiangah, Sinsakpa, ka u kiangah gou honhawm sam dingin hilh in, a chi a.
Himahleh, aman, a kiangah, Mihing, noumau tungah kuan ahia kei thukhenpa hiam tanseppa hiam a honbawl? a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah, Pilvang unla, enna himhim lakah kiveng un; hauhna mihing dam san ahi kei hi, a chi a.
Huan, a kiang uah gentehna thu a gen a, Mi hau kuahiam a hongpung mahmah a,
huchiin a kingaihtuah a, Bangchi bangin ka hih de aw? Ka buh leh bal koih khawmna ka nei ngal kei a.
Huan, Hichi bang in ka hih ding e; ka buhin te ka phel dinga, a sanga lianin ka lam dia, huai ah tuh ka buh leh ka van tengteng ka koih khawm ding.
Huan, ka kha kiangah, Kha, kum tampi sunga ding tampi na khol a; khawl inla, nein dawn inla, nuam takin omin, ka chi ding, a chi a.
A hihhangin, Pathianin a kiangah, Nang mihai, tu jan chiah na kha a honlak sak ding uh, huai nalam khiakte, kuaa ahi ta dia?
Amau adinga gou khola, Pathian lama haulou tuh huchi ahi nak uh, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuite kiangah, Huaijiakin ka honhilh ahi, Bang ka ne diam aw? Chiin, na hinna thu uh leh, Bang ka silhin ka teng diam aw? Chiin, na sapum thu uh lunghimoh kei un.
Nek ding sangin hinna a thupi jaw hi, puansilh sangin leng sapum a thupi jaw ahi.
Vaakte khawng ngaihtuah dih uh, buh a tuh kei ua, a at samkei uh; pang bang, buh in bang leng a neikei uh; himahleh Pathianin amau a vak ngala; nou tuh vasate sanga na manphat jawk dan uh.
Huan, nou lakah lunghimoh jiaka kuain ahia amah dunglam tong khata hihsang thei tuan?
Hiai lel leng hih theiloute bangin, bang dia thil dang lunghimoh nak na hi ua?
Lilite khandan ngaihtuah dih uh; na a sem kei ua, khau leng a khek kei uh; himahleh, ka honhilh ahi, Solomon hial leng a thupina tengtenga a kizepin, hiai lilite laka khat banga zepin a om kei.
Huchiin, gama loupa, tuni banga hinga, a jinga thuka khul nawn mai ding bawn, Pathianin hichi tela a zep leh, aw, nou mi gin tawmte aw, huai sangin puansilh honpe zo natel inchia:
Huan, na nek ding uh, na dawn ding uh, zong kei un; ginlahna lungsim neiin leng om sam kei un.
Khovela namten huai thil tengteng a zong uh; huai bang na kiphamoh uh chih na Pa un a thei gige ngala.
Amah gam zong jaw un, huchiin huai thilte leng a honpiak behlap ding ahi.
Pawl tawmte aw, lau kei un; nou kianga gam piak ding tuh na Pa uh kipah lamtak ahi.
Na neih peuh uh juak unla, mi gentheite kiangah pia un; vanah guta hohlouhna ah, leikha neksiat louh na ah, dangka ip lui theiloute, gou bei theiloute kibawl un.
Na gou omna peuh ua na lungtang uleng a om ding jiakin.
Na kawng uh gak unla, na khawnvak uh leng de sain om un;
min a pu uh kitenna ankuang luina akipana a hongpai chianga, kongkhak a honkiuh taka, na nahonthei pah dinga a na ngak nilouh bangun, om un.
A pu uh a hongpai chiangin sikha na ngak nilouha a muhte a hampha uhi; chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Aman a kawng a gak dia, amau tuh an um dingin a tu sakdinga, ana uh a sep sakding.
Jan laiin hiam, thoh hunin hiam a honga, huchi banga a honmuh, huai sikhate tuh a hampha uh.
A hihhangin, hiai thei un, guta a hongpai ding inneipan thei leh, a vengdia, a in a phen vang sak kei ding.
Nou leng mansa in om un, na gintak louhlai tak un Mihing Tapa hongpai ding ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Peterin, Toupa, hiai gentehna thu koumau kia hia non hilh, mi tengteng? achi a.
Huan, Toupan, sumkempa ginom, piltak, a puin a hun teng a a tan ding uh hawm sak dinga a inkuanpihte tunga heutua a bawl ding tuh kuapen ahi dia le?
A pu a hongpai chiangin sikha huchibanga hih a hon muhdingpa tuh a hampha.
Diktakin ka honhilh ahi, a neih tengteng tunga heutu dingin a bawl ding.
Ahihhangin huai sikhain, a lungtangin, Ka pu a hong zok kei ding e, chiin, a sikhanu, a sikhapa, na vo ta leh, nein dawnin na nakham leh.
huai sikha pu tuh, a gin louh niin, a theih louh laiin, a hong dinga, tum nih a honsuah dinga, mi ginom loute tan bang a tangsak ding hi.
Sikha a pu deihlam theigige na pia na nakiging tuan lou-a, a pu deihlama leng gamta loupan nakpitaka vuak a tuak ding.
A hihhangin, theiloupi-a vuakna thama gamtapan awlchika vuak a tuak ding. Tampi piaka ommi peuhmah kiangah tampi phutin om ding; tampi a kepsakpa uh kiangah a tamsem a phut ding uh.
Khovela mei khe suk dinga hongpai ka hi; tu inleng kang pah leh china tel ing e!
Himahleh, baptisma tan ding ka nei, huai hihtangtun mateng tuh ka om nuam lou hina mahmah tel e:
Khovela lem leng sak dinga hongpai hiam honsa nahi umaw? Hi dek lou, ka honhilh ahi, kidou leng sak dinga hongpai ka hi jaw.
Tunung chiangin inkuan khat ah mi nga a kidou ding uh, thumin nih, nihin thum.
A kidou dingua, pain a tapa, a tapain a pa; a nuin a tanu, a tanuin a nu; a piin a mou, a mouin a pi, a chi a.
Huan, mipi kiangah leng, Tumlama mei kai na muh uleh, vuah a zu ding, na chi pahngal ua; huan a hongzu ngei jela.
Huan, sim huih nung na muh chiang un, Khua lum ding ei ve, na chi uh, huan, a honglum ngei jela.
Nou lepchiah te aw, khovel leh van omdan leng na genchian thei ngal ua, bangchia tulai hun gen chian siam lou na hi ua?
Bang achia noumauin thu adik kikhen lou na hi ua?

Honhekpa toh thukhenpa kiang na zot laiun, lampi ah kilep theihna khat zong teitei in; huchilouin jaw thukhenpa mai ah honkai lut dinga, thukhenpan miman heutu honmansak dinga. Miman heutupan suangkulh ah honkhum kha ding.
Ka honhilh ahi, paihsasan khat nangawn na piak kim masiah, huai akipan na pawt kei hilhial ding, a chi a.
Huan, huchih lai takin, kuate hiam a na-om ua, huaiten, Galili gama Pilatin a sisan uh a Pathian biakna sa gohte laka a hel sakte tungtang Jesu a hilh ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Huai Galili gamete huchibang thil a thuak jiak un Galili gama tengteng sangin mi gilou tuan hi un na gingta ua hia?
Hi lou e, ka honhilh ahi, nou leng na kisik kei uleh huchi bangmahin na mangthang vek dinguh.
Huan, Siloam insangin mi sawm leh giat a delhlupte leng, Jerusalem khuaa omte tengteng sangin mi gilou tuan hi un na gingta ua hia?
Hilou e, ka hon hilh ahi, nou leng na kisik kei uleh huchibang mahin na mangthang vek ding uh, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, hiai gentehna thu a gena; Kuahiamin a grep huanah theipi suan khat anei a: huan, a kungah a gah a hongzonga, khat leng amu kei a.
Huchiin, grep gui kemmi kiangah, Ngai in, kum thum sung hiai thei kung ah a gah ka va zong jela, khatleng ka mu kei; phuk in; bangdia mun dala om nilouh ahia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Toupa, tukum bek om henla, a kimin ka tou dinga, ekin ka phungvuh tadih dia;
huainunga a gah leh ahoih ding, a gah kei leh phuk mai in, achia.
Huan khawl niin aman kikhopnain khat ah thu a hilh a.
Huan, ngai in, kum sawm leh kum giat hatlouhna dawi mat numei khat a oma; huai mi tuh a kun kheukheu a, amah thuin a ding tang theikei hiala.
Huan, Jesun amah a muh takin a sama, akiangah, Numei, na hatlouhnain a honkhahta, a chi a.
Huan, atungah a khut a koiha; huchiin, thakhatin a tangpah ngala, Pathian a phatta a.
Huan, Jesun Khawlnia mi a hihdam jiakin kikhopna in heutu a heha, mipi a houpiha, a kiang uah, Mihing na sepna ding ni guk a om vo oi; huai sungin, kihihdam un, Khawlniin hi louin, a chi a.
Toupan a kiangah, Nou lepchiahte aw, Khawlniin na bawng u hiam na sabengtung uhiam a an neknaa kipan phelin, tui dawndingin na pi khe chiat jel uh hi lou hia?
Hiai numei, Abraham tanu ahi ngala, ngai un, Setanin kum sawm leh kum giat a mana, Khawlniin leng hiai gak tuh phel sak louh dan ahia hia? a chi a, a donga.
Huai thute a gen laiin a melmate tengteng a zum ua; mipi bel a thil thupi hih tengteng jiakin a kipak uh.
Huchiin, aman, Pathian gam bang ahia? bang toh leng ka teh dia?
Ankam chi tangkhat min a laka, a huana a theh bang ahi, huai tuh a hongpou a, sing a honghi a, tungleng vasate khawng ahiangah a giak uh, a chi a.
Huan, Pathian gam bang toh ka the dia? a chi nawna.
Silngou numeiin a laka, anbuang tehna thum laka a veka a thoh mateng a phumbang ahi, a chi a.
Huan, aman thuhilh kawm jelin, Jerusalem kho lam naihin kholian leh kho neute a tawn jela.
Huan, kuahiamin, a kiangah, Hotdamte tawm chik ahi ding u maw? a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, kong kochik ah lut tum teitei un; ka honhilh ahi, mi tampiin lut a tum ding ua, a lut thei ngal kei ding uh.
In neipa a thoha, kong a khak nungin, nou a puaa dingin, Toupa, kong honhonsak in, chiin kongkhak non kiuh chiang un, aman, Koi lam mi na hi ua, honthei lou ka hi, chiin, nou a hondawng dinga;
huai hun chiangin, nou, Na muhin kane ua, ka dawn ve ua oi, ka kongzing uah leng thu na hilh jel vo oi, na chi ding uh.
Huan, aman, Ka honhilh ahi, Koi lam mi na hi ua, ka hon theikei; nou thil gilou hihtengtengte aw, ka kianga pat pai mang vek un, a honchi ding.
Abraham, Isaak, Jakob leh jawlnei tengteng Pathian gam, sunga om na muh ua, nou po lama delhkhiak na hih uh na kitheih chiangun, na kap ding ua, ha na gawi ding uh.
Huan, suahlam leh tumlam, sim leh mal akipanin mite hongpai ding ua, Pathian gamah nein a dawn ding uh.
Huan, ngai un, nanungpente leng masapena om ding a om ua, masapente leng nanungpena om ding a om uh, a chi a.
Huai laitakin Pharisai kuate hiam a hongpai ua, a kiangah, Pawt inla, hiaia kipan pai mang in: Herodin honhihlup ut mahmah ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Huai sehal kiangah hiai thu vagen un: Ngai in, tuni toh, jingchiang toh dawite ka delhkhe dia, natnate leng ka hihdam dia a ni thum niin ka zou ding.
Abangabang hitaleh, tuni toh, jingchiang toh, a ni thumni toh ka pai jel ding ahi; Jerusalem kho po lamah jawlnei sih theih hilou ahi.
Aw Jerusalem, Jerusalem: jawlneite that, na kianga honsawlte uh suanga na deng lum: akpiin a noute a kha nuaia a op khawmbangin na tate bangzah vei op khawm ka tum a? Himahleh na ut kei.
En in, na in a vuaka taisanin a om. Huan, Ka honhilh ahi, Toupa mina hongpai a hampha, na chih ma siah non mu kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Khawlniin Pharisai vaihawmmi khat ina an ne dinga hoh in, a en khia ua.
Huan, ngai in, a ma ah damlou chibawk mi kua hiam a oma.
Huchiin, Jesun dan theimi leh Pharisaite a houpiha, a kiang uah, Khawlniin hihdam asiang hia, siang lou? a chi a.
Amau bel a dai dide ua, huan, aman damlou tuh a len a, a hihdama, a paisakta a.
Huan, a kianguah, Na lak uah na sabengtung u hiam, bawng hiam tuitohkhiakkhuk ah nake taleh, Khawlniin leng kua ahia kai khepah lou ding? a chi a.
Huai thu tuh a dawng theikei uh.
Huan, a mi sapte un tutnamun hoihpen a tel jel dan uh a mu a, a kiang uah gentehna thu a genta a:
Kitenna an ne dinga kuapeuhin a honsap chiangin tutnamun hoihpen ah tu kei un; huchilou injaw, na sang ua mi phajaw a na sam kha dia, huchiin, a honsampan,
Hiai mi tutna ding awn in, a hon chi dia; huan nang zumpiin tutnamun niam pen ah natu nawn phing ding ahi.

A honsap chiangin tutnamun niam pen ah na vatu zo ding a; huchiin a honsampa a hong chiangin, na kiangah, Lawm, tutnamum hoih deuh ah tu in, a honchi theiding. Huchiin na anumpihte mitmuhin pahtawiin na om ding.
Kingaipha peuh a neu ding ua: kingaineu tuh pahtawiin a om ding uh, a kiang uah a chi a.

Huan, a sampa kiangah leng, Sunin hiam, janin hiam ankuang na lui chiangin, na lawmte, na unaute, na sanggamte, na inveng mihaute na sam kei ding; huchilou injaw a honsam thuk ding ua, a honthuk chitchiat kha ding uh.
Ankuang na lui chiangin, tagahte, piangsualte, khebaite, mittawte, na sam zo ding;
huchiin, huai bangten thukna ding a neih louh jiak un, na hampha ding; mi dikte thoh nawn chiangin thuk nawn na hih ding jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, a anumpih kuahiamin huai thu tuh a ja a, a kiangah, Pathian gama an ne ding tuh a hampha, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Mi kuahiamin janin ankuang thupi luina a bawla, mi tampi a sama;
huan, anek hunin, ami sapte kiangah, Hong ua, tuin bangkim manta, chi dingin a sikha a sawla.
Huan, a vek un thu khat satin paulam a nei chiat ua. A masapenin, a kiangah, Lou ka leita a, a en dia ka hoh kipha moh hi; honhehpih inla, hon na ngai siam heh, a chi a.
Huan, midangin, Bawng tuak nga ka leita a, a siat a phat chiandingin ka kuan dinga, honhehpih inla hon na ngai siam heh, a chi a.
Huan, mi dangin, ji ka neita a, huaijiakin ka hoh theikei, a chi a.

Huan, sikhain, a pu kiangah, huai thute tuh a vahilh ta a. Huan, inneipa tuh a heh a, a sikha kiangah, Pawt inla, kongzing khawngah, kawmkal khawngah pai mengmeng inla, tagahte, piangsualte, mittawte, khebaite hiai laiah honpilut in, a chi a.
Huan, a sikhain, Pu, non thupiak bangin ka hihkhina, himahleh mun awng lailaive aw, a chi a.
Huan, a puin, sikha kiangah, Pawt inla, lamlian khawng ah, dai khawng ah pai inla, ka in dimna dingin mi hon sawl lut teitei in.
Ka honhilh ahi, Mi ka sapte khatin leng ka ankuang lui achiam kei hial ding, a chi a, a chi a.
Huan, mipi thupi takte a kiangah a hoh sam ua; huchiin amah a kiheia, a kianguah,
Kuapeuh ka kianga hongin, a pa, a nu, a ji, a tate, a unau a sanggamnu, leh amah hinna nangawn toh a huat keileh ka nungjui ahi theikei ding.
Kuapeuh a kros pua honjui lou tuh ka nungjui ahi theikei ding.
Nou laka kuapeuhin in sang lam tum le uchin, amasain tuin, lam zohna khop sum na neih uleh neih louh thei dingin, aman ding dan kuaa hia sut lou ding.
Huchilou injaw, suang phum khin phota, a lam zoh theih kei leh, a en peuhin,
Hiai min a gel na a, a lam zou thei ngal keia chiin, a nuihsan kha ding uh.
Huan, kumpipa kuain ahia kumpipa dang dou dinga a kuan dingin, a masaa tu a, mi sing nih toh amah dou ding a hong tuh, mi sing khat toh a tuah ngam ding leh ding louh, mi dong lou ding?
Huchi a hihkei vanglakleh, kumpipa dang tuh gamla pia a om laiin, kituahna lam thuchiam ngen dingin palai a sawl ding.
Huchi bangmahin, nou lakah kuapeuh a neih tengteng paisan lou tuh ka nungjui ahi theikei ding.
Chi a hoiha, himahleh, chi leng a pen khitin, bangin a hih-al nawn ding ua?
Leia dingin a hoih kei; ekvum dingin leng a hoih sam kei; min a pai khia uh. Kuapeuh jakna dinga bil neiin ja hen, a chi a.
Huan, siahkhonmite leh mi khialte tengtengin a thu za dingin a kiang a honjuan ua.
Huan, Pharisaite leh laigelhmiten, Hiai miin mi khialte a khawla, a kianguah an a ne chiin, a phun tuaktuak ua.
Huchiin, aman a kianguah hiai gentehna a gen a:
Nou lakah kuapeuhin belam ja nei unla, a lak ua khat mangsak le-uchin, gamdai ah sawmkua leh kuate nusiain, amang pen na muh nawn ma siah uh kua ahia zong lou ding?
Huan, na muh nawn un tuh kipaktakin na liangjang uah na pua ua.
Huan, in natun tak un, na lawmte uleh na vengte uh na sam khawm ua, a kiang uah, Hon kipahpih un, ka belam mang ka mu nawnta, na chi uh.
Ka honhilh ahi, huchi bangmahin, mi dik sawm kua leh kua kisik tuanding neiloute tungah sangin mi khial khat kisik tungah vana mi a kipak zo ding uh.
Huan, numei kuapeuhin makhai sawm neiin khat mang sak leh, khawnvak dein, in phiatin a muh nawn masiah kua ahia hoihtaka zong lou ding?
Huan, a muh nawn intuh, a lawmte leh a vengte a sam khawma, Honkipahpih un, ka makhai mansak ka mu nawn ta, a chi a.
Ka honhilh ahi, huchi bangmahin, Pathian angelte maah, mi khial khat kisik tungah, kipahna om nak.
Mi kua hiamin tapa nih a nei a;
huan, a naupang zopenin, a pa kiangah, Pa, gou ka tansik honpia in, a chi a. Huchiin, a sum tuh a kianguah a hawmta a.
Huan, ni sawt lou nungin a tapa naupang zopenin a tansik tengteng a la khawm veka, gam gamlapi ah a zinta a, huai ah nuam tat luain a sum a mawk zat mangta a.
Huan, a zat bei zoh vek takin, huai gamah kial thupitak a hongtunga; nek ding a hong kitasamta a.
Huchiin, huai gam mi khat a vabela; huaiin vok an pe dingin a lou lamah a sawla.
Huan, bangkhat hawng vokin a nekte ua kihihvah a ut mahmaha; kuamahin lah bangmah a pe ngal kei ua.
Huan, amah leh amah hongkiphawk khiak takin, Ka pa kianga kilohte an nek zoh louha nei a tamtam utoh, kei lah hiai ah gilkiala si ding hi mai vengin;
Ka thou dinga, ka pa kiangah ka pai dinga, a kiangah, Pa, vana tungah leh nangmah mitmuhin thil ka hihkhial; na tapaa seh tak ka hitakei hi;
na kianga kiloh khat bangin hon bawl samin, ka chi ding, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a pa kiangah a paita a. Huan, gamlapia a omlaiin, a pan a namu a, a lainat mahmaha, a taia, a vapoma a tawp tonton a.
Huan, a kiangah a tapain, Pa, vana tungah leh nangmah mitmuhin thil ka hihkhial; na tapaa seh tak ka hita kei, a chi a.
Himahleh, a pan, a sikhate kiangah, Puan hoihpen honla khepah unla, silh sak un; a khutah zungbuh a khepekah khedap bun sak un;
bawngnou thau tak honla unla; gou un, i ne ding ua, nopbawlin i om ding uh;
hiai ka tapa a sia, a honghing nawnta ahi; a manga, i mu nawnta uhi, a chi a. Huchiin kipaktakin a om panta ua.
Huan, a tapa upa jaw lou ah a oma; huan, in a hong tun kuanin bangpeuh tum ging leh lam husa a zata a.
Huchiin, a sikha khat a sama, Tuabang ahia? chiin, a donga.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na nau a hongtunga, dam takin a muh nawn jiakin na pan bawng nou thau tak a gou, a chi a.
Huan, a heha, a lut nuamta keia; huchiin, a pa hongpawt khia a, a khema.
Himahleh, aman, a pa kiangah, Ngai in, kum hichi zah na na sem inga, na thua lah talek ngei lou inga; ka lawmte toh kipahna ka bawlna dingin kelnou leng non pe ngei ngal keia.
Himahleh, hiai na tapa kijuakte kianga na sum ne mang vekpa a hongtun takin amah adingin bawngnou thau tak na nagoh sak viala, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, aman a kiangah, Ka tapa, ka kianga om gige hi china, ka neih tengteng leng nanga hi a.
Kipak leh nuamtaka om ding ahi vo oi; hiai na nau a sia; a honghing nawna; a manga, i mu nawnta ahi ngala, a chi a, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a nungjuite kiangah hiai thu leng a gena: Mi sumhau kuahiamin sumkemmi a neia; huai min tuh a sum a zat bei sak mawkmawk thu ah a kiangah a hek ua
Huchiin, aman amah a sama, a kiangah, Na tungtang thu ka jak bangchi ahia? Na sum kepthu hon pelut in; tuban siah sum kem in na pang thei nawn kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, sumkempan, a lungsimin, Ka Toupan ka sumkep hontawp ding hi a, bangchin ka hih dia leh? lei toh lah ka ngap kei a, khutdoh lah ka zum ngala.
Sumkep a hontawp hun chiangin a in ua honom sak dingin ka hihdingdan ka theita, a chi a.
Huchiin, a Toupa sum bate a sam chiata, masapen kiangah, Ka Toupa lakah bangzah na ba a? achia a.
Aman, Thau tehnadan za khat, achia a. Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na lai la inla tu meng inla, sawmnga gelh in, a chi a.
Huan mi dang kiangah, Nang bangzah na ba a? a chi a. Aman. Buh tehna dan za khat, a chi a. Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na lai la inla, sawmgiat gelhin, a chi a.
Huan, a Toupan sumkempa diklou tuh a lemtheih jiakin a phat a; vak tate sangin hiai khovel tate a tulai thu ua a piljawk jiakun.
Ka honhilh ahi, Sum lemin nou din lawmte bawl un, sum a bei hun chianga khantawna omnaa nou a honom sak na ding un.
Kuapeuh tawmchik tunga ginom lou tuh tampi tungah leng a ginom kei nak uhi.
Sum lem tunga bawn na ginom kei uleh, kuan ahia sum tak nou honkemsak ding?
Mi danga tunga bawn na ginom kei un, noumaua kuain ahia honpe ding?
Sikha kuamahin heutu nih na a sem kop theikei, khat huain khat a deih ding, a hihkeileh, khat gumin khat a musit ding, Pathian leh sum na na sem kop theikei ding uh a chi a.
Huan, Pharisai sum deihmiten huai thu tengteng a ja ua, a nuih san uh.
Huchiin, aman, a kianguah, Mi mitmuha kisiam tangsak na hi uh, himahleh, Pathianin na lungtang uh a thei a; mihing laka a pahtawi uh Pathian mitmuhin kihhuaipi ahi ngala.
Dan leh jawlneite thu Johan hong om tannin a oma; huainung siah Pathian gam Tanchin Hoih a gen ua, michih a pawnglut uhi.
Himahleh, dan thu sut vom neu chik leng a man sangin van leh khovel amanthat a baihlamjaw ahi.
Kuapeuh ji maa, zi dang nei tuh, angkawm ahi; kuapeuh mi ji maksa nei tuh angkawm ahi.
Huan, misumhau kuahiam a oma, puan sandup leh puan mal ngat a silha, nitengin nuamsa takin a om a.
Huan, a min Lazar, khutdoh khat meimaa pumdim, a kongkhak bulah a lum a,
mi sumhau dohkana khatehnen kia khawng nek a lunggulh a; ui khawngten lah a meima a liah sak sak uh.
Huan, hichi ahia, khutdoh tuh a si a, angelten a paipih ua, Abraham angsungah a koih ua. Mi sumhau leng a sia, vuiin a omta a.
Huan, misi khua ah gim thuakin a oma, a dak tou a, gamla pia Abraham leh a angsunga Lazar om toh, a muta a.
Huan, a kikou a, Pa Abraham, ka tungah zahngai inla, Lazar hon sawl in, a khut zungmuk tui ah diah henla, ka lei hihvotna din; hiai mei kuangah ka gim mahmah ahi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Abrahamin, Ka tapa, nang na damlaiin, na thil hoih na mu a, huchi mahbangin Lazarin thil hoihlou a muh thei tanla; himahlah tunah amah jaw hiai ah khamuang takin a oma, nang jaw gim nei ve.

Tua louleng, hiai akipana noukianga pai tumte tuh a pai theih louhna dingun leh, kuamah huaia kipana koukianga a hongkai theih louhna dingun, kou leh nou kikal ah guam thupi tak koihdenin a om hi, a chi a.
Huan, aman, A hihleh, pa, amah ka pa in ah paisak ding bekin, ka honngen ahi;
sanggam pasal nga ka nei ngala; hiai gimna mun ah a hongpai kha ding uh, phatuamngaitakin vahilh leh, a chi a.
Abrahamin bel, Mosi leh jawlneite a neive ua oi; huai mite thu ngai le uh ake, a chi a
Huan, aman, Pa Abraham, hilou e; misi laka mi hilhial a kiang uah hoh zo leh a kisik ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiangah, Mosi leh jawlneite thu a ngaih kei un jaw, misi laka mi thou nawn mahlehleng a taksang tuankei ding uh, a chi a, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, a nungjuite kiangah, Puknate omlou thei ahi kei; himahleh, pukna omsakpa tung a gik hi:
Hiai mi neute laka khat leng hihpuk sangin, a hihpuk ding ngawngah buh gawi janna suang ok sakin, tuipi ah khiakin omleh, amah a dingin a hoihzo ding.
Pilvang un, na unauin thil a hih khelh leh taihilh in; a kisik leh, ngaidam in.
Ni khatin na tungah sagih vei thil hihkhialin sagih vei, ka kisik, chia, nang lama a hongkihei nawn leh, na ngaidam ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, sawltakten, Toupa kiangah, Ka ginna uh khangsak in, a chi ua.
Huan, Toupan, Ankam tangkhat bang ginna na neih uleh, hiai singtheimukung kiangah, Na kibot inla, tuipi ah na kisuan in, na chi ding ua, na thu uh a mang mai ding.
Himahleh, nou lakah kuapeuhin lei letin hiam, belam chingin hiam sikha nei le uchinla, a hongvaipai takin, An honum pah aw, kua ahia nou lakah na chi ding?
Ka nek ding honbawl sak inla, puan teng inla, ka neka ka dawn zoh masiah ka nek bawl in; huai khit chiangin nang na nein na dawn nake, na lak ua kua ahia na chi zo lou ding?
Na thu bang ua a hih jiakin na sikha kiang uah kipah thu na gen ngei u hia?
Huchi mahbangin nouleng na kiang ua thupiak tengteng banga na hih nung un, Sikha phatuam lou ka hi uh; kahih ding him uh ahi ka hih uh, chi un, a chi a.
Huan, hichi ahia, Jerusalem khuaa a pai sin lai in, Samari leh Galili gam a kheng a.
Huan, koikhua hiama a lut dingin, mi phak ngenta, sawmin a nadawn ua, huaite tuh gamla takah a ding ua, huan, aw ngaihtakin,
Jesu, Heutupa, ka tunguah zahngai in, a chi ua.
Huan, aman amau a muhin, a kiang uah, Siampute kiangah vakilak un, a chi a. Huan, hichi ahia, a pai lai un a hongsiangthou chiat ua.
Huan, a lak ua khatin dam chih a kitheih takin, aw ngaihtaka Pathian phat kawmin a kik nawnta a;
huan, a khebul ah a khupboha, a kipahthu a gena; huai mi tuh Samari mi ahi a.
Huchiin, Jesun a dawnga, Mi sawm hong siangta hilou na hi umaw? kuate koi ah?
Pathian phat dinga kik nawn, hiai theihlouhmi kia loungal kuamah muha om lou uhia? a chi a.
Huan, a kiangah, Thou inla, pai in; na ginna na dampih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Pharisaiten Pathian gam hongtun hun ding a dot jiak un, a kiang uah, Pathian gam muh theihin a hongtung kei;
En un, hiai ah: hiam, Pam ah: hiam, a chi kei ding uh; ngai un, Pathian gam tuh na lak uah a om, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, nungjuite kiangah, Mihing Tapa damlai ni khawng ni khat bek na muh nop ni uh a hong om ding, himahleh na mu kei ding uh.
Huan, na kiang uah, En un, pam ah: En un, hiai ah: a honchi ding ua; pai khe kei unla, amau leng jui kei un;
vannuai lehlama khua aphiata, vannuai lehlam tanphaa a vak zel bangin Mihing Tapa a hong niin a om ding ahi ngala.
Himahleh, huai main thil tamtak a thuak ding a, tulai khangthakte deihlouhin a omding ahi.
Noa dam laia thil omdan bangin, Mihing Tapa a hongpai nawn hun chiangin a om sam ding.
Noa longa a luta, tui a hongleta, a vekua a hihlup khit ni a tun masiah, a ne un a dawn ua, ji leh tain a kinei uh.
Huchi mahbangin Lota dam laiin a hongom a; a ne un a dawn ua, a lei un a juak ua, a suan un a lam uh;
himahleh, Sodom khua a kipan Lota a pawt niin vana kipanin mei leh kat a zu a, a vek un a hihlumta.
Huchi mahbangin Mihing Tapa a hongkilak niin a om ding.
Huai niin kuamah a sum in sunga oma, amah in tunga om, vala dingin kum kei heh; loua om leng pai kei hen.
Lota ji theigige un.
Kuapeuh a hin humbitna zongin a tan dinga kuapeuh a hin tanin a humbit ding.
Ka hon hilh ahi, huai janin lupna khatah mi nih a om ding ua, khat lakin a om dinga, khat nutsiatin a om ding.
Numei nih buh gawi janin a om ding ua, khat lakin a om dia, khat nutsiatin a om ding.
