Pasal nih lou ah a om ding ua; khat lakin a om dia; khat nutsiatin a om ding, a chi a.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, Toupa, koiah eita? a chi ua, a dong ua. Huan, aman a kiang uah, Saluang omna peuhah musane leng a kikhawm ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, lungke louin a thum gige ding uh ahi chih theihna dingin akiang uah gentehna a gen a:
Koilai khua hiamah thukhenmi khat a oma, huai min Pathian a lau keia, mihing leng a khawksa kei;
huan, huai khuaah meithai khat a oma; aman, Ka lang tungah phu honlaksak in, chiin, a kiangah a hoh zihzeh a.
Huan, amah tuh sawt khop a ut keia; himahleh, a nungin a lungsimin, Pathian lau louin mihing khawksa kei mah leng;
hiai meithaiin honhihbuai jiakin a phu ka lak sak mai ding, huchilouin jaw, a hong zihzeh leh a honhih gim ek kha ding, a chi a.
Huan, Toupa mahin, Thukhenmi diktatlou thugen ja un.
A tunguah dohzou tadih mahleh leng a mitel, a sun a jana amah samte phu tuh Pathianin a lak sak kei dia hia?
Ka honhilh ahi, a phu uh a lak sak pah ding. Himahleh Mihing Tapa a hongpai hun chiangin leitungah tuabang ginna a honmu nadiam? a chi a.
Huan, mi diktat hih kigingta a, mi dang tengteng musit kuate hiam kiangah hiai gentehna thu leng a gen a:
Mi nih Pathian biakin ah thum dingin a hoh tou ua; khat tuh Pharisai ahi a, khat tuh siahkhonmi ahi.
Pharisai tuh a dinga, amah kiain hichibangin a thum a: Pathian, mi dang, a negute, dikloute, angkawmte bang ka hih louh jiak leh, hiai siahkhonmi bang leng ka hih louh jiakin na tungah ka kipak hi.
Nipikal khat tengin nihvei an ka ngawl jel; ka neih teng sawm ah khat ka pe jela, a chi a.
Siahkhonmin bel gamla taka dingin, van lam leng a dak ngam keia, Pathian, kei mi khial, ka tungah zahngai in, chiin, a awm a kitum a.
Ka honhilh ahi, a masa sangin huai mipen tuh siam tangin a in ah a pai kheta. Kingaithupi peuh a niam ding ua, kingainiam tuh pahtawiin a om ding, a chi a.
Huan, a khoih dingin a kiangah a naungekte uh a honpi ua; nungjuiten bel huai a muh tak un a natai ua.
Himahleh, Jesun amau a sama, Naupang neute ka kiangah honpai sak unla, kham kei un, Pathian gam huchibang mite a ahi ngala.
Chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Kuapeuh Pathian gam naupang neuin a kipahpih banga kipahpih lou tuh a sungah alut keihial ding, a chi a.
Huan, vaihawmmi kuahiamin, a kiangah, Sinsakpa hoih, khantawn hinna tanna dingin bang ka hih dia? chiin, a donga.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Bangdia hoih honchi? mi khat kia ngallou kuamah hoih a om kei, huai tuh Pathian ahi.
Thupiakte na thei vo oi, Angkawm ken, Tualthat ken, Gu ken, Hek ken, Na nu leh pa pahtawi in, chihte, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Huai thu tengteng ka naupan chik a kipan ka jui jel, achia.
Huan, Jesun huai a jakin a kiangah, Tuin leng thil khat na sam hi; na neih tengteng juak inla, tagahte kiangah hawm in, huchiin vanah gou na nei ding; huan, hongpai inla, honjui in, a chi a.
Aman bel, huai thute a jakin a lungkham mahmah a, a hauh mahmah jiakin.
Huchiin, Jesun amah tuh a ena, Sum haute Pathian gama lut haksa na e:
Mi sumhau Pathian gama lut sangin sangawngsau phim bila lut suak a nuam jaw ahi, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu zaten, Huchi a hihin kua hotdamin a om thei dia? a chi ua.
Aman tuh, Mihing hih vual louh Pathian hih theih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Peterin, ngai in, kou ka in uh leh lou pai sanin kon jui ua, a chi a.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Chih taktakin ka honhilh ahi, Kuapeuh Pathian gam jiaka, in hiam, ji hiam, unaute hiam, nu le pa hiam, tate hiam paisan photphot,
tu dam sung mahmahin a sanga tam jaw mu lou ding kuamah a om kei, hun hongtung lai dinga khantawna hinna toh, a chi a.
Huan, sawm leh nihte a kiangah api tuama, a kiang uah, Ngai un, Jerusalem khua a hoh tou ding i hi ua; jawlneite thu gelh tengteng Mihing Tapa tungah a tung ding.
Jentelte kiangah piakin a om ding a, nuihzabawlna din a zang ding uh, zumhuai takin a bawl ding ua, chil a siat ding uh;
Huan, a vo ding ua, a hihlum ding uh; huan, ni thum niin a thou nawn ding, a chi a.
Huan, huai thute himhim a theisiam kei ua, a thu gen tuh a lak uah selin a oma, bang gen ahia chih leng a theikei uh.
Huan, hichi ahi a, Jeriko khua a tun kuanin, mittaw kuahiam lam geiah khut dohin a na tu a;
huai min tuh mipi pai ging a ja a, bangchi thu a hitaa chih a donga.
Huan amau, Nazaret Jesu a pai ahi chih a hilh ua.
Huchiin, aman, Jesu, David Tapa, ka tungah zahngai in, chiin, a kikou a.
Huan, a masaten dai dingin a tai ua, himahleh, David Tapa, honhehpih in, chiin, a kinak kou semsem a.
Huchiin, Jesu a dinga, a kianga honpi dingin thu a pia a;
huan, a kiang a hongtun in, Na tungah bangchia ka hih ahia na deih? a chi a, a na donga. Huan, aman, Toupa, muh theih ka ut, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Mu thei ta in, na ginna na dampih ahi, a chi a.
Huan, thakhatin a mu thei pahtaa, Pathian phat kawm jelin amah a juita a; huan, mi tengtengin, huai a muh un, Pathian a phat uh.

Huan, Philipin a kiangah, Mi chihin tawm chika a tan chiat ding uleng, makhai zanih man tanghouin a chin kei ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, a nungjuite laka khat, Simon Peter anau Andru in a kiangah,
Barli-buh tanghou phel nga leh ngasa nih nei pasal naupang khat hiaiah a om hi; himahleh, mi hiai zah lawmlawm lakah huaite bangtham hi ding ahia? a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, Mite tu sak un, a chi a. Huan, huai lai ah loupa tampi a om hi. Huchiin, pichingte a tuta ua, a tam lam uh tuh sangnga khawng ahi uh.
Huan, Jesun tanghou phelte a la a, kipahthu a gen khit in a tute kiangah a hawma, huchi mahbangin ngasate leng a deih hun un a hawm sam hi.
Huan, a kham nung un, a nungjuite kiangah, Bangmah mang lou dingin a nente luak un, a chi a.
Huchiin, a luak ua, barli-buh tanghou phel nga nete nek bang nentein bawm sawm leh nih a hihdim uhi.
Huan, miten thillamdang a hih a muh tak un, Hiai mi, jawlnei, khovel a hong dingpa a nahi ngei e, a chi uh.
Huchiin, amah tuh kumpipa dia bawl dinga mat teitei tumin hongkuan a tum uh chih Jesun a theia, tangah amah kia in a pai tuam nawnta hi.
Huan, ni taklamin, a nungjuite dil ah a pai suk ua;
Longah a tuang ua, dil ah Kapernaum khua a juan ua. Huan, khua a mial ta a, Jesu lah a kiang uah a hongtung nai keia.
Huihpi hat tak a nun jiakin tui a kihawt sang hulhul ngala.
Huan, ching sawmnih lah ching nga hiam, ching sawmthum hiam a kalh un, Jesu dil tungah khea paia, long honnaihin a mu ua, a lauta uh.
Himahleh, aman a kiang uah, Keimah ka hi, lau kei un, a chi a.
Huchiin, longah tuansak a utta uhi; huan, longin, a zot gam uh a pha pahta hi.
A jingin dil gal leh lama mipi dingten, long khat lou ngal long dang a om keia, Jesu a nungjuite toh longah a tuang ton keia, a nungjuite amau kiain a pai uh chih a thei ua.
Himahleh Toupan kipahthu a gen nunga, tanghou a nekna mun kiang uah, Tiberia khua akipanin long neu chikchik a hongtung uhi.
Huchiin, mipin Jesu leh a nungjuite a om takei uh chih a theih un, amau leng long neute ah a tuang ua, Jesu zongin Kapernaum khua a hong tung ua.
Huan, dil gala a hongmuh un a kiangah, Rabbi, chikin ahia hiai lam nong tun? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, thillamdangte na muh jiak ua honzong na hi kei ua, tanghou phel na nek vah jiak uh ahi jaw.
An mang thei phet zongin phiaphia kei un, khantawna hin phaa om gige ding an, Mihing Tapain a honpiak ding zong in phe jaw un; Pa Pathianin amah achiamtehta ngala, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Pathian na ka sep theihna dingun thil banga hia ka hih ding uh? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Pathian nasep hiai ahi, a misawl gingta le uchin, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Chiamtehna bang ahia na hih ding, ka muh ua nang kon gintak theihna ding un? Thil bang ahia na hih ding?
Ka pipute un gamdai ah manna a ne ua, Van akipanin a kiang uah amau tanghou nek ding a pia, chih gelh bangin, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Van akipana tanghou na muh pen uh Mosi honpiak ahi kei, ka Pan tuh vana kipanin tanghou tanghou tak nou a honpia ahi.
Pathian tanghou tuh van akipanin a hongpaisuka, khovel kianga hinna pepa ahi, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Toupa, huai tanghou honpe gige in, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Keimah tuh hinna tanghou ka hi; kuapeuh ka kianga hongpai a gilkial kei ding, kuapeuh kei hon gingta tuh chik mahchiangin a dangtak kei ding.
Himahleh, nou non muh un leng non gingta sam kei uh chih kon hilhta ve.
Pain honpiak peuhmah ka kiangah a hongpai vek ding uh; kuapeuh ka kianga hongpai tuh ka delh khe kei hial ding hi.
Kei deihlam hih dingin van akipana hongpaisuk ka hi kei a, honsawlpa deihlam hih dinga hongpaisuk ka hi zo ngala.
Hiaipen hon sawlpa deihlam ahi, aman honpiak tengteng bangmah mangsak louin, ni tawpni chiang in kai thou zo leng.
Huan, hiaipen ka Pa deihlam ahi, kuapeuh Tapa mu a, gingtain khantawna hinna a neih; huan, ken ni tawpni chiangin amah ka kai thou ding, a chi a.
Huan, Van akipana tanghou hongpai suk ka hi, a chih jiak in, Judate a tungah a phun ua.
Hiai mi Joseph ta Jesu ahi ka hia, a nu leh a pa leng i theih? Van akipana hongpai suk ka hi, chih bangchi chiha chi ahia le? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Phun phun dah un.
Pa honsawlpan a hip kei leh kuamah ka kiangah a hongpai theikei; huan, ken ni tawpni chiah a hongpai tuh ka kai thou ding.
Jawlneite laibu ah, Pathian hilhin a om vek ding uh, chih gelh ahi. Mi chih Pa thu jaa thei peuhmah ka kiangah a hongpai nak.
Kuamahin Pa a mu ngei ka chi kei, Pathiana kipan pen loungal in; aman jaw Pa a mu hi.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, kuapeuh a gingtain khantawn hinna a nei hi.
Keimah tuh hinna tanghou ka hi.
Na pipute un gamdai ah manna a ne ua, a si uhi.
Hiai i chih van akipana tanghou hongpai sukpen ahi, min a nek ua, a sih louhna dingun.
Keimah tuh vana kipana tanghou hing hongpai suk ka hi, kuapeuhin hiai tanghou a nek leh khantawnin a hong gige ding; ahi, khovel hinna dia ka piak ding tanghou tuh ka sa ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin, Judate a kisel ua, Hiai min bangchin a sa nek dingin honpe thei ding ahia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa sa na nek ua, a sisan leng na dawn kei uleh, noumauin hinna neilou hive uchin.
Kuapeuh ka sa ne a, ka sisan dawnin khantawna hinna a nei; huan, nitawp ni chiang in amah ka kai thou ding.
Ka sa jaw an ahi taktaka, ka sisan leng dawnding ahi taktak.
Kuapeuh ka sa ne a, ka sisan dawn tuh, keimah ah a om gige a, keimah leng amah ah ka om gige ahi.
Pa hingin honsawla, Pa jiaka hing ka hih mahbangin, kuapeuhmah kei honne tuh keimah jiakin amah leng a hing ding.
Hiai tuh van akipana tanghou hongpai suk ahi; na pipute un tanghou a ne ua, a sih bang ujaw ahi kei; kuapeuh hiai tanghou ne tuh khantawnin a hing gige ding, a chi a.
Huai thute kikhopnain ah a gen a, Kapernaum khuaa thu a hilh laiin.
Huchiin, a nungjuite a khen tampiin, huai a jak un, Hiai thu haksa ahi, kuan a lasawn theidia? a chi ua.
Huchiin, huai thu ah a nungjuite a phun uh chih Jesun a lungsimin a theia, a kiang uah, Hiai thun honhih lunghilou hia?
Mihing Tapa tumalama a omna ngeia kah tou mu le uchin, bang na chih ding ua?
Hinna pia jaw kha ahi a, sa jaw bangmah din a phatuam kei; na kiang ua thu ka gente tuh kha ahi a, hinna leng ahi.
Himahleh, na lak uah a khen gingta lou om nahi uh, achia. Jesun a gingta loute leh a mansak dingpa a tunga kipanin a theigige ngala.
Huan, amah mahin, Huaijiakin ahi, na kiang ua, Pain a piak keileh, kuamah ka kiangah a hongpai theikei, ka chih, a chi a.
Hiai nungin a nungjuite a khen tampi a pai mang ua, amah a kithuahpih nawnta kei uh.
Huchiin, Jesun, sawm leh nihte kiangah, Nou leng pai mang sam na ut uhia? a chi a.
Huan, Simon Peterin a kiangah, Toupa, kua kiangah ahia ka pai ding uh? Nangman khantawn hinna thu na nei hi.
Nangmah Pathian mi siangthou na hi chih ka taksangta ua, theih leng ka thei uhi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Nou sawm leh nihte keimah hontel hi lou na hi umaw? Na lak ua mi khat diabol a hih laitei toh, a chi a.
Iskariot Simon tapa Juda, sawm leh nihte laka tel tei, huai thu a gen ahi, amah juausana mansakpa ding ahi ngala.
Huai khitin Jesu Galili gamah a vak a; Judaten amah hihlup a tup jiakun Judia gam a pha nuam kei hi.
Huan, Judate Biakbukte Ankuangluina a naita a. Huchiin, a unauten a kiangah,
Hiai akipanin Judia gamah vahoh in, na nungjuiten na thil hih a muh theihna ding un.
Kuamahin agukin thil bangmah a hih kei uh, amah min than ut ngalin. Hiai thilte khawng na hih tak ngal leh khovel kiangah kimusak in, a chi ua.
A unauten nangawnin leng amah a gingta ngal kei ua.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Ka hun a tung nai kei; nou hun jaw chikpeuhin a tung gige ahi.
Khovelin nou hon ho theikei hi, kei jaw honho nak uhi, a thilhihte uh a gilou chih ka hilh chet nak jiakin.
Nou ankuangluina ah vahohtou unla, kei jaw tu ankuangluina ah ka hohtou tadih kei ding, ka hun a tun nai louh jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, huai tuh a kianguah a gen a. Galili gamah a om nilouh a.
Himahleh, a unaute ankuangluinaa a hoh touh nung un, amah leng vantang theih louhin, a guk bangin a hoh tou sam a.
Huan, Judaten ankuangluina ah amah a zong ua, Kaw om ahia? a chi ua.
Huan, a tungah mipte laka mi a phunsim supsup ua, a khenin, Mi hoih ahi, a chi ua; khenkhatin, Hi dek kei e, mipi a pimang ahi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, Judate a kihtak jiakun kuamahin a tungtang thu a gen lang kei uh.
Huan, ankuanglui san lai takin, Jesu Pathian biakin ah a hoh tou a, thu a hilha.
Huan, Judaten, Hiai min zil ngeilou pia bang achia lai siam ahia? a chi ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uh.
Huan, Jesun amau a dawng a, Ka thu hilh jaw keia ahi kei, honsawlpaa ahi jaw;
kuapeuh amah deihlam hihutin, thu hilh tuh Pathian akipan hia, keimah phuahtawma ka gen, a thei ding.
Kuapeuh amah phuahtawm thu gen jaw, amah hoihna zong ahi; a sawlpa hoihna zong tuh, huai mi tuh mi tak ngial ahi, amah ah dik louhna himhim a om kei hi.
Mosiin dan na kiang uah honpe ka hia? Himahleh, na lak uah kuamahin Dan na jui kei uh. Nou bang achia honhihlup tum? a chi a.
Huan, mipin, Dawi jawl neive; kuan ahia honhihlup tum? a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, Jesun a dawng, a kiang uah. Thil khat ka hih nou tengtengin lamdang na sa uh.
Hiai jiakin ahi, Mosiin zeksum thu nou a honpiaka. (Mosi akipan ahi ngal keia, pipute akipan ahi zo ngala), Khawlnin leng mi zek na sum jel uhi.
Mosi Dana tatlek louhna dinga Khawlnia leng pasalin a zek a sum sak ngal a leh, ken Khawlnia mi ka hihdam vek jiakin ka tungah na heh tuam umaw?
A lat bangin ngaihtuah kei unla, diktat takin ngaihtuah jaw un, a chi a.
Huan, Jerusalem khuaa mi khen khatin, Hiai mi hihlup a tuppa uh hi lou hia?
En dih uh, hiaiah a langtangin thu a gen a, a kiangah lah bangmah a gen kei ua. Amah Kris ahi chih vaihawmten a thei taktakta ua eita maw?
Hiai mi a hongkipatna lam nangawnin I thei ngala. Kris bel a hongtun hun chiah a hongkipatna lam kuamahin a theikei ding uhi, a chi ua.

Huaijiakin Jesun Pathian biakina thu a hilh kawmin a kikou a, Nou non thei ua, ka hongkipatna lam leng na thei uh. Himahleh keimah thu a hongpai ka hi kei, amah kei honsawlpa tuh midik ahi, amah lah na thei ngal kei ua.
Ken tuh amah ka thei hi; amaha kipana hongpawt ka hia, aman lah honsawl ahi ngala, a chi a.
Huchiin, amah tuh mat a tumta ua, himahleh a hun a tun nai louh jiakin kuamahin a khoih kei uhi.
Mipi a khen tampiten bel amah a gingta ua, Kris a hongtun hun chiangin, hiai mi hih sanga tam jaw thillamdang a honhih dia hia? a chi uh.
Huan, Pharisaiten a tunga mipi phunna thute a ja ua; huchiin, siampu liante leh Pharisaiten amah man dingin heutute a sawlta uh.
Huan, Jesun, Sawt lou kal na kiang uah ka om phot dia, honsawlpa kiangah ka pai ding;
nou non zong ding ua, non mu kei ding uh; ka ommna ah leng na hong theikei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Judate a kihou ua, I muh louh dingin hiai mi kaw hoh dek a ding? Grikte laka Pemdalhte kianga hohin Grikte thu vahilh ding a diam aw?
Nou non zong ding ua, non mu kei ding uh, ka omna ah leng na hong theikei ding uh, a chih, bang a chihna a de aw? a chi ua.
Huan, ankuanglui ni nanungpen, ni thupiniin, Jesu a dinga, a kikou a, Kuapeuh a dangtak leh ka kiangah hong henla, dawn hen.
Kuapeuh kei hon gingta tuh laisiangthou genbangin tui hing luite a sungah a hongluang khe ding, a chi a.
Hiai thu tuh a gingtaten Kha a tan ding thu uh a genna ahi; Khalah piak ahi nai tadih keia, Jesu lah pahtawia a om nai louh jiakin.
Huchiin, mipi laka khenkhatin huai thu a jak un, Hiai jaw jawlnei hi petmah e, a chi ua.
Khenkhatin, Hiai jaw Kris ahi, a chi ua. Khenkhatin bel, Bangdin Kris Galili gamah a hongpawt tel dia?
Kris jaw David suante lakah, David omna khua Bethlehem ah a pawt ding ahi chih laisiangthouin a gen ka hia? a chi ua.
Huchiin amah jiakin mipi a kikhen ua, a kilangta uh.
Khenkhatin mat a ut ua, himahleh kuamahin a khoih tuankei uhi.
Huan, heutute, siampu liante leh Pharisaite kiangah a hohgpai nawn ua; huan, amau a kiang uah,
Bang achia honpi lou? a chi ua. Heututen, Huai mi bang himhimin kuamahin thu a gen ngei kei hi, a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Huan, Pharisaiten a kiang uah, Nou leng pimangin na om samta ua hia?
Vaihawmte leh Pharisaite laka mi himhim amah gingta a omta ahia?
Huai dan theilou mipite soplai, hamse thuak eive ua, a chi ua, a dawng uhi.
Nikodem, tumaa Jesu kianga hong, a lak ua pangsam ahi a, aman tuh a kiang uah,
Amah kam ngei a thu jak leh a thilhih theih main i dan un mi siamlouh a tangsak ngei ahia? a chi a.
Amau tuh a kiangah, Nang leng huai Galili mi na hi sam maw? Zong lechin, Galili gamah jawlnei kuamah pawt ding a om kei uh chih thei tanla, a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, mi chih amau in chiat ah a paita uh.
Jesu bel Oliv tang ah a hoh a.
Huan, jingin Pathian biakin ah a lut nawna, mi tengteng a kiangah a hongpai ua; huan, amah a tu a, amau thu a hilh a.
Huan, laigelhmite leh Pharisaiten numei khat a angkawm lai amat uh a honpi ua; huan, a lai ah a ding sak ua,
Jesu kiangah, Sinsakpa, hiai numei a angkawm lai a mat uh ahia, a angkawm lai takin.
Dan laibu ah, Mosiin hichibang mi jaw suanga denlup thu a honpia hi; nang bangchi na sa a? chi ua.
Huai thu tuh amah zeetna dia a chih uh ahi, hekna ding a muh theihna ding un. Huchiin Jesu a kuna, a khut zungin lei ah a gelha.
Huan, a dot lailai jiakun amah a ding a, a kiang uah, Na lakua khelhna neilou peuhin amah suangin deng masa heh, a chi a.
Huan, a kun nawna, a khutzungin lei ah a gelh nawna.
Huan, amau a thugen a jak un, upa penin a pana, a tawp phain, khatkhatin a gel khe jel ua; huchiin Jesu kia a om a, numei a laia a omna ngeia om toh.
Huan, Jesu a daktoua, a kiangah, Numei, kaw om ahi ua? Kuamahin siamlouh hontangsak lou hia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Toupa, kuamahin hontangsak kei, a chi a. Huan, Jesun, Ken leng siam louh kon tangsak kei; pai inla, tunungin hihkhial nawnta ken, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah thu a gen nawna, Kei khovel vak ka hi; kuapeuh honjui tuh mialah a khosa kei hial ding, hinna vak a nei zo ding hi, a chi a,
Huchiin Pharisaiten a kiangah, Nangmah thu theisak na hi; na thu theihsak a dik kei hi, a chi ua.

Jesun a kiang uah, Keimah thu theisak nahita leng zong, ka thu theisak a dik ahi; ken ka hongkipatna hiam, ka manohna ding hiam leng, ka thei hi; nouten bel ka hongkipatna hiam, ka manohna ding leng na theikei uhi.
Nou sa danin vai na hawmsak uh; ken jaw kuamah vai ka hawmsak kei hi.
Ahi, vaihawmsak nahita leng zong, ka vaihawmsakna a dik ding; keimah kia ka hi kei a, kei leh Pa honsawlpa ka hi zo ngal ua.
Ahi, na dan laibu uah leng, Mi nih thu a dik, chih gelh ahi.
Kei ka hih leh keimah thu theisakpa ka hia, Pa hon sawlpan ka thu a theisak hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Na pa koiah? a chi ua. Jesun, Nou kei non theikei uh, ka Pa leng na theikei uh; kei honthei hi le uchin, ka Pa leng na thei ding uh, chiin, a dawnga.
Huai thu tuh Pathian biakina thu a hilh kawmin, sum koihna muna a gen ahi; kuamahin amah a man sam kei uh, a hun a tun nailouh jiakin.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Ka pai mang dinga, nou non zong ding ua, na khelhna uah na si ding uh; ka hohna dingah na hong theikei ding uh, a chi nawna.
Huan, Judaten, Ka hohna dingah na hong theikei ding uh, a chih, a kihihlum dia a diam? a chi ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Nou nuai lama kipan na hi uh; kei jaw tung lama kipan ka hi; nou hiai khovela na hi uh, kei jaw hiai khovela ka hi kei.
Huaijiakin, na kiang uah, Na khelhna uah na si ding uh, ka chih, huai amah ka hi chih na gin kei ua leh, na khelhna uah na si ngeingei ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Kua na hi maia ahia? a chi ua. Jesun a kianguah, A tunga kipanin na kiang uah ka genta.
Nou tungtang thu ah thil tampi gen ding leh ngaihtuah ding ka nei; abangabang hi heh aw, honsawlpa jaw mi dik ahi; a kianga thu ka jak peuhmah khovel kiangah ka hilh hi, a chi a.
Pa thu a kiang uah a gen chih a theikei uh.
Huchiin, Jesu mahin, Nou mihing Tapa na khaikang nung un, amah ka hi chih leh, ken keimah thuin thil bangmah ka hih keia, Pa in honhilh bang jelin hiai thu ka gen jaw ahi chih na thei ding uhi.
Honsawlpa tuh ka kiang ah a oma, honensan kei hi; a thil kipahlam peuhmah ka hih jel jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu tuh a gen lain mi tampin amah a gingta ta ua.
Huchiin, Jesun a gingta Judate kiangah, Ka thua na om gige uleh, ka nungjuite na hi taktak ding uh;
huan, thutak na thei ding ua, thutakin a honsuaktasak ding, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Abraham suante keive ua, tu tannin kuamah salah ka om ngei kei uh, Suahtaksakin na om ding uh, bangchihchiha chi na hia? a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Chihtaktakin chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, kuapeuh thil hihkhial tuh, khelhna sal ahi,
Sal tuh chikpeuhin in ah a om gige kei; tapa tuh chikpeuhin a om gige hi.
Huchiin, Tapain sal apat a honsuahtaksak leh, na suakta petmah ding uh.
Abraham suante na hi uh chih ka thei hi, himahle-uchin, honthah na tum ngal ua, ka thuin nou ah omna a neih louh jiakin.
Ken ka Pa kianga thil ka muh ka gen a; nou leng na pa u kianga thil na jak uh na hih uh, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Kou pa Abraham ahi, a chi ua, a dawng ua. Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Abraham tate nana hile uchin, Abraham thil hih na hihta ding uh.
Himahleh, Pathian kianga thutak ka jak, nou honhilpa kei tun ah honthah na tum ngal ua; Abrahamin jaw hichibangin a hih kei. Nou jaw na pa uh thil na hih nak uhi, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Angkikawma piang ka hi kei uh, Pa khat kia ka nei uh, Pathian, a chi ua.
Jesun a, kiang uah, Pathian na Pa uh hita leh, nou kei non itta ding uh; Pathian apan hong pawt leh a kianga kipana hongpai ka hi ngala; keimah thua hong leng ka hi sam kei, aman a honsawl jaw ahi.
Bang achia ka pau omdan theilou? Ka thu na laksawn theih louh jiak uh ahi.

Nou jaw na pa uh diabol kianga pawt na hi ua, na pa uh duhgawlna hih na ut uhi. Amah jaw a tunga kipan tualthat ahi, thutak ah a om kei, a sunga thutak himhim a om louh jiakin. Juau thu a genin amaha ngei a gen ahi; juauthei ahi ngala, juaupa leng ahi.
Thutak ka gen jiakin nou hon gingta lou na hi uhi.
Na lak uah kuan ahia gilou lamah siamlouh hontan thei om? Thutak ka genin leng nou bang achia hon gingta lou?
Pathian apan pawtin, Pathian thu a pakta nak a; hiaijiakin na pakta kei uhi, Pathian apan pawt na hih louh jiakun, a chi a.
Huan, Judaten a kiangah, Samari mi dawi jawl na hi ka chi uh, ka chi dik ngel kei umaw? a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Jesun, Dawi jawl ka hi kei hi; ka Pa kapahtawi ahi jaw, nou ka min hihsia neive ua.
Himahleh, keimah kilawmna zong ka hi kei; a zongmi leh a ngaihtuahmi khat a om ahi.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, min ka thu a zop leh khantawnin sih ni mel a mu kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, Judaten a kiangah, Dawi jawl na hi chih tuin ka theita uh. Abraham a sita, jawlneite toh, nang. Min ka thu a zop leh, khantawnin sihna achiam kei ding, na chi ngala.
Ka pu uh Abraham sangin na thupijaw ahia? amah leng a sita a, jawlneite leng a sita uh; kuaa kibawl na hia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, Keimah kipahtawi leng ka kilawmna bangding mah ahi kei; ka Pathian uh, na chih uh ka Pa, hon pahtawipa ahi; nou amah na thei ngal kei uhi;
ken jaw amah ka thei; Amah ka theikei, chileng, noumau bang a juau thei mah ka hi ding: huchiin amah ka theia, a thu leng ka jui jel hi.
Na pu uh Abraham, ka ni mu ding a hih jiakin a nuam mahmah a, huan, a mu pet maha, a kipak mahmah hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Judaten a kiangah, Nang kum sawmnga leng hi nai lou piin, Abaham na mu ahia? a chi ua.
Jesun a kianguah, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Abraham om main leng ka om, a chi a.
Huchiin a denna dingin suang a tawm ua; himahleh Jesu a bu a, Pathian biakin a kipan a pawtta.
Huan, Jesun a pai kawmin a pian tunga kipan mittaw khat a mu a.
Huan, a nungjuiten a kiangah, Rabbi, mitto saa a pian kuan ahia thil hihkhial, hia mi hia, a nu leh a pan? a chi ua, a dong ua.

Sun a hihlaiin honsawlpa na I sep ding uhi; jan hi dekdekta ahi, huai hun chiangin kuamahin na a sem theikei ding uh.
Khovela ka om sungin khovel vak ka hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huchibanga a gen khitin, leiah chil a sia a, chilin tungman a bawla, huan tungman tuh a mit ah a nuha, huan, a kiangah, Siloam dil ah vasil in, a chi a. (Siloam tuh, Sawl, chihna a hi)
Huan, avapaia, a sila, mitvakin a hongkik nawnta hi.
Huchiin, a vengte leh tumaa khutdoha mumuten, Hiai mi tu kawma khutdoh dohpa ahi ka hia? a chi ua.
Midangin, Amah ahi vo oi, a chi ua. Midangin, A hi kei, a kibatpih ahi jaw, a chi ua. Aman, Huai amah ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Na mit bangchin ahia a hong vak? a chi ua.
Aman, Jesu a chih un tungman a bawla, ka mitah a nuih a, Siloam dil ah vahoh in silin, a honchi a, huchiin, ka vahoha, ka sil a, mitvakna ka muta ahi, a chi.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Amah kaw om ahia? a chi ua. Aman, Ka theikei, a chi a.
Huai maa mittopa tuh Pharisaite kiangah a honpi ua.
Jesun tungman a bawla, a mit a hihvak ni Khawlni ahi a.
Huchiin, Pharisaiten a mit a hongvak takdan a dong nawn ua. Aman a kiang uah, Ka mit ah tungman a koiha, ka sil, ka mu theita maimah hi, a chi a.

Huan, Pharisai khenkhatin, Huai mi tuh Khawlni a tan louh jiakin, Pathiana kipan ahi kei, a chi ua. Khenkhatin bel, Mi khialin bangchin hichi bang thillamdang a hih thei dia? a chi ua. Huan, a kikhen ua, a kilangta uh.
Huan, mittopa kiangah, Na mit a hihvak, nang bangchi bangin amah na ngaihtuah? a chi nawn ua. Huan, aman, Jawlnei ahi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Judaten a mit hongvak ta nu leh pa a sap masiah uh, mittaw a nahi hima, a mit a hongvakta chih, a tungtang thu a taksang kei uh.
Huan, a nu leh a pa kiangah, Hiai mi, na tapa uh mitto saa piang ahi na chih uh ahi hia? Bangchin ahia tua a muh theih tak? Chiin a dong ua.
Huan, a nu leh a pan. Hiai tuh ka tapa uh ahi chih ka thei uh, mitto sain a piang chih leng ka thei uh;
himahleh, bangchin ahia tua honmuh theih tak chih ka theikei uh, a mit hihvakpa leng ka thei sam kei uh; amah dong un; piching a hina; amah thu aman gen leh ake, a chi ua, a dawng uh.
Judate a kihtak jiak un a nu leh a pan tuh huai thute a gen uhi; Judaten, huai ma himin leng, Amah jaw Kris ahi, chia gum a om leh, kikhopna in a nong ding chih a lemsa chit ngal ua.
Huai jiakin ahi, a nu leh a pan, Piching ahi, amah dong un, a chih uh.
Huchiin, mittopa a sam nawn ua, a kiangah, Pathian phatin hiai mi jaw mi khial ahi chih ka thei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, Mi khial ahi hia hi lou ka theikei, thu khat ka thei, tumain ka mit a taw a, tuin ka mu theita hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, amau a kiang ah, Na tungah bangchin ahia a hih? Na mit bangchin ahia a hihvak? a chi ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Denin kon hilhta a ka, na thei nuam ngal kei ua; bang achia thei nuam nawn na hi ua? Nou leng a nungjuite hihsam na ut ua hia? Chiin, a dawng a.
Huan, amau atai ua, Nang amah nungjui na hi, kou jaw Mosi nungjuite ka hi uh.
Pathianin Mosi a houpih chih ka thei uh, hiai mi phiangsan koia hongkipan ahia ka theihsak kei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, huai min a kiang uah, Huaipen tak ahi, a lamdanna, koia hongkipan ahia na theih louh uh, kamit lah a hihvak ngei ngala.
Pathianin mi khial thu a ngaikhe kei nak chih I thei uh; himahleh, kuapeuhin Pathian a limsaka, a deihlam a hih leh, Pathianin amah a ngaikhe nak hi.
Khovel om tunga kipan kuaman mitto saa piang mit a hihvak nawn chih a kithei ngei kei.
Hiai mi Pathian kianga pawt a hih keileh, bangmah a hih theikei ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Nang khial lumleta piang naka, nang non hilh vial maw? a chi ua, a dawng ua. Huchiin, amah tuh a delhkhe ta uh.
Huan, a delh khia uh chih Jesun a naja a; huan, a zong khia a, Pathian Tapa na gingta hia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Pu, amah kua ahia, ka gintak theihna din? a chi a, a dawnga.
Jesun a kiangah, Amah na mu khinta a, nang honhoupihpa ahi, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Toupa, ka gingta hi, a chi a, amah a bia a.
Huan, Jesun, Thukhen dingin hiai khovel ah hong ka hi, mittawte a mit uh a hong vakna ding leh, mitvakte a mit uh a hongtawtna dingin, a chi a.
Huan, a kianga Pharisai omten, huai thu a jak un, a kiangah, Kou leng mittaw ka hi sam u maw? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Mittaw anahi tale uchiin khelhna na neikei ding uh, himahleh, Ka mu thei uh, tuin na chih jiakun na khelhna uh a om gige hi.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh belam huanga kongkhaka lut lou a, lam danga kah lut, huai mi mah tuh guta leh suamhat ahi.
Kuapeuh kongkhaka lut tuh, belam chingpa ahi.
Kongkhak ngakpan amah a na honsak a; belamten a aw a ja uh; aman belamte a min un a sam chiat a, a pi khe jel hi.
Amaha tengteng a pawt sak takin, ama uh a kaia, belamten amah a juijel uh, a aw a thei ngal ua.
Midang jaw a jui kei ding uh, a tai mangsan zo ding uh; mi dangte aw jaw a theih louh jiakun, a chi a.
Hiai gentehna thu tuh Jesun a kiang uah a gen hi; himahleh, bang thu ahia a kiang ua a gen chih a theikei uhi.
Huchiin, Jesun a kiang uah a gen nawna, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, kei belam kongkhak ka hi.
Ka maa hongpai tengteng gutate; suamhatte ahi vek uh; himahleh, belamten a thu uh a ngaihsak kei uhi.
Kei kongkhak ka hi; keimaha mi a lut leh, humbitin a om dinga, a lutin a pawt dinga, nek ding leng a mu ding hi.
Guta jaw, gu ding leh hihlum ding leh hihse ding louin a hongpai kei; kei jaw hinna a neihna ding ua, tampitaka a neihna ding ua, hong ka hi.
Kei belamchingpa hoih ka hi; belamchingpa hoihin belamte din a hinna a pe nak hi.
Kiloh, belamchingpa tak hilou, belamte amaha hilouin, ngia hongpai a muhin belamte a taisan nak; huan, ngiain amau tuh a keia, huchiin a hihdalh hi.
Kiloh ahia, belamte adinga deihsakna himhim a neih louh jiakin a tai mang nak ahi.
Kei jaw belamchingpa hoih ka hi;
Pa in a hontheih leh ken Pa ka theih bangin keia ka thei hi, keia in leng honthei hi; huan, belamte din ka hinna ka pia.
Huan, hiai belam huanga lou, belam dangte ka nei; amau leng ka honpi ding, ka aw leng a za ding ua; huchiin hon khatin a om ding ua, a chingpa khat toh.
Hiai jiakin Pain kei honit ahi; lak nawn dinga ka hinna ka piak ding jiakin.
Kuamahin honlaksak kei ding, keimah thuthuin ka pe zo ding ahi. Pe thei ka hi a la nawn thei leng ka hi. Hiai thupiak ka Pa kianga pat ka muh ahi, a chi a.
Hiai thu jiakin Judate a kikhen ua, a kilang nawnta ua.
A khen tampiin, Dawi a jawla, hai eive; bang dia a thu ngaikhia na hi uh? a chi ua.
A khenin, Hiai thu khawng dawi jawl thu hi kei e. Dawiin mittaw mit a hihvak thei ahia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jerusalem khuaa Tempul latna Ankuanglui lai ahi a; huai tuh phalbi lai ahi.
Huan, Jesu Pathian biakin ah, Solomon inlim ah a kivial lehleha.
Huan, Judaten hong-um pelpul ua, a kiangah, Bangtan ahia vanglaka nonbawl ding? Kris na hih leh, chiantakin honhilh in, a chi ua.
Jesun a kianguah, Ka honhilhta hi, na gingta tuan kei uh; ka Pa mina thil ka hih, hiaiten ka tanchin a theisak uhi.
Himahleh, na gingta ngal kei uh, ka belam laka mi na hih louh jiak un.
Ka belamten ka aw a ja uh, ken leng amau ka theia, amau a honjui jel uhi;
a kiang uah khantawna hinna ka pia; khantawnin a mangthang kei ding ua, kuamahin ka khut a kipan honsut sam kei ding.
Amau honpepa, ka Pa, mi tengteng sanga thupijaw ahi; kuamahin Pa khuta kipan a sut theikei ding hi.
Kei leh Pa lah pumkhat ka hi uh, chiin, a dawng a.
Huan, Judaten a denna dingin suang a tawm nawn ua.
Huan, Jesu amau a houpih a, Pa akipana pawt nasep hoih tampi ka honensaka, huai nasepte lakah bang nasep jiakin ahia suanga na honden dek uh? a chi a.
Judaten a kiangah, Nasep hoih tungah suangin ka hondeng dek kei uh; Pathian na gensiat tungah leh, nang, mihing hi ngala, Pathian a na kibawl jiak ahi jaw, chiin, a dawng ua.
Jesun a kianguah, Na Dan laibu uah, Pathiante na hi uh, ka chi, chih gelh ahi ka hia?
Pathian thu tunnate bawn pathiante a chih leh, (Laisiangthou tawp theih ahi ngal keia),
Pathian Tapa ka hi, ka chih jiakin, Pain a seha, khovela a sawlpa kiangah, Pathian na gensia, na chi uh ahi maw?
Ka Pa nasem ka hih kei leh, hon gingta kei un.
Ahihhangin, sem ka hih leh, kei hon gingta keimah le uchin nasepte bek gingta un; huchia Pa keimah ah a om chih leh, kei Pa ah ka om chih na theih ua, na theihsiam nadingun, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huchiin, amah mat a tum nawn ua, himahleh a khut ua kipan a suaktata.
Jordan lui galah, Johanin a tunga mi abaptisna lamah a paimang nawn, huaiah a omta nilouh a.
Huan, mi tampi a kiangah a hong ua, Johanin thillamdang bangmah a hih keia; himahleh Johanin hiai mi tungtang thu agen peuhmah a na dik mahmah hi, a chi ua.
Huan, huaiah mi tampiin amah a gingta ta uh.
Huan, mi khat, Mari leh a sanggam Martha omna khua Bethani mi, Lazar, damlouin om a.
Mari thau namtui Toupa nilha a sama a khe nulnu, huai sanggampa Lazar ahi, damlou tuh.
Huan, a sanggamnuten Jesu kiang ah, Toupa, ngai dih, na it a china hi, chiin, mi a sawl ua.
Huan, Jesun huai a jakin, Hiai natna sihna ding jen ahi kei, Pathian thupina ding ahi jaw. Pathian Tapa, hiai jiaka hihthupi a hih theihna dingin, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun Martha te, a sanggamnu te, Lazar te a it hi.
Huaijiakin a china chih a jakin, a omna ngeiah ni nih a tam lai hi.
Huan, huaikhitin a nungjuite kiangah, Judia gamah I hoh nawn ding uh, achia.
Huan, nungjuiten a kiangah, Rabbi, tuma zekin Judaten suanga honden a tum ua; huchipi in leng huaiah na hoh nawn himhimdia hia? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, Sunin dak kal sawm leh nih a om ka hia? Mi suna a vak leh, a hoi ngei keia, hiai khovel vak a muh jiakin.
Ahihhangin, mi jana a vak leh, a hoi naka; amaha vak a om louh jiakin, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huai thute a gen a; huan, huai khitin a kiang uah, I lawmpa Lazar a ihmuta; a ihmu phawng halh dingin ka hoh dek ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin, nungjuiten a kiangah, Toupa, a ihmut takleh a halh nawn nake, a chi ua.
Jesun a sih thu a gen hi; himahleh, amau a khawl sunga aihmut thu a gen hiam a sa ua.
Huchiin, Jesun chiantakin a kiang uah agen a, Lazar a si ahi.
Huai ka om louh nou jiakin ka kipak hi, na gintak theihna ding un; himahleh a kiangah I hoh ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, Thoma, Didum a chih un, a nungzuihpihte kiangah, A sihnaa I sih samna dingin i hoh ding uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, Jesun a tunin, ni li hanah a na omta chih a thei a.
Bethani khua tuh Jerusalem kho kianga om ahi a, ching sawm leh ching nga phiala gamla ahi;
huchiin a sanggampa uh sih tunga khamuangsak dingin Judate tampi Martha leh Mari kiangah a hong ua.
Huan, Marthain Jesu a hong dek chih a jakin a vadawn a; Mari bel in ah a tu lailai a.
Huan, Marthain Jesu kiangah, Toupa, hiaia om hi lechin, ka sanggampa si lou ding hi a.
Tun ah leng Pathian kianga na nget peuhmah Pathian in nang honpe ding chih ka thei, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Na sanggampa a thounawn ding, a chi a.
Marthain a kiangah, Ni tawp ni chiah, thohnawnna ah, a thou nawn ding chih ka thei, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Kei thohnawnna leh hinna ka hi; kuapeuh hon gingta tuh si mahleh a hing gige ding;
A hing peuhmaha, a hon gingta peuhmah khantawnin a si kei ding; huai thu na gingta hia? a chi a.
Aman a kiangah, Gingta e, Toupa; Kris, Pathian Tapa, khovela hongpai dingpa na hi chih ka gingta hi, a chi a.
Huan huai thu a gen khit takin a kuana, a sanggamnu Mari tuh a sim sapa, Sinsakpa hiaiah a om a, nang honsam hi, a chi a.
Huan, aman huai a jak takin, a dingkhe paha, a kiangah a vahoh a.
Jesun tuh khua ah a lut naikei a. Marthain a vadawn laia, a omna ngei ah a om lai hi.
Huan, in sunga a khamuana ompih Judaten Mari dingkhe paha, a pawt a muh tak un, hanah kap dinga hoh dek hiin teh, chiin, a jui ua.
Huan, Mari Jesu omna a vatunga, a muh takin a khebul ah a khupboha, a kiangah, Toupa, hiaia om hi lechin, ka sanggampa si louding hia, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun Mari kap leh a honjui Judate kap a mu a, a lung a khoih mahmaha, khain amau hi;
huan, aman amah kaw sial na hi ua? a chi a. Amau a kiangah, Toupa hongpai inla, en in, a chi ua.
Jesu a kapta.
Huan, Judaten, En di uh, Lazar it na tele; a chi ua.
Himahleh khenkhatin, Hiai mi, mittopa mit hihvakpan, hiai mi leng a si lou sak theikeia eita? a chi ua.
Huan, Jesu lungsung nakpi a khoiha om nawnin, han a tungta a. Huai han tuh kokhuk ahi a, suanga sit ahi.
Jesun, Suang hem un, a chi a. A si sanggamnu Marthain a kiangah, Toupa, tun jaw a namta ding, a sihna ni li a hita ngala, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Na gintak leh Pathian thupina na mu ding, kon chi ka hia? a chi a. Huchiin, suang a hem ua.
Huan, Jesu a vandak a, Pa ka thu na ngaih khiak jiakin na tungah ka kipak hi.
Ka thu na ngaikhe jel chih ka thei a; himahleh, mipi, ding diamduamte jiakin hiai ka chi ahi, nang non sawl chih a gintak theihna dingun, a chi a.
Huan, huchia a pau khitin aw ngaih takin, Lazar, hongpawt in, a chi a, a kikou a.
Huan, misi tuh a khut a khe, han puana tuam sain a hong pawtta a, a mai leng kinulna puana tuam ahi a. Jesun a kiang uah, Phel unla, pai sak un, a chi a.
Huaijiakin Mari kianga hong; Jesu thil hih mu, Judate a khen tampiin Jesu a gingta uhi;
himahleh, a khen Pharisaite kiangah a vahoh ua, a kianguah Jesu thilhihte a vahilh uh.
Huchii siampuliante leh Pharisaiten vaihawmte a sam khawm ua, Bangchibangin i hih ding ua? Hiai miin thillamdang tampi a hih ngala.
Hichi banga i khahzam injaw mi tengtengin amah a gingta ding ua; huan, Rome mite a hongpai ding ua, i mun leh i chite a honlak sak ding uh, a chi ua.
Huan, a lak ua mi khat Kaiaphain, huai kuma Siampu Lianpen ahi a, a kiang uah, Nou bangmah theikei uteh.
i chi tengteng manthat louhna dingin mi tengteng sika mi khat sih, nou a din a hoih chih leng na ngaihtuah kei uh, a chi a.
Huai thu tuh amah phuah tawmin a gen kei, huai kumin Siampu Lianpen ahi a, a chite uh sika Jesu a sih ding a genkhol ahi jaw hi.
Huai chite sik kia ahi keia, Pathian ta khovela dalhte tengteng pawl khata a pi khawmna dingin leng ahi sam hi.
Huchiin, huai ni akipan amah hihlum dingin a kihou jel uh.
Huaijiakin Jesu Judate lakah a langin a vak nawnta keia, huaia kipanin gamdai jul lama kho khat Ephraim a chih uah a vahoh zota hi; huaiah nugjuite toh a om nilouh ta uhi.
Huan, Judate Paikan Ankuangluina a naita a, mi tampi kisiangsak dingin, gam apat, Paikan Ankuanglui main, Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou ua.
Huchiin, Jesu a zong ua, Pathian biakin ah ding kawmin a kihou ua, Bang ahia na gintak uh? Ankuangluina ah a hongkei ding maw? a kichi ua.
Siampu liante leh Pharisaiten amah amat theihna ding un kuapeuhin a omna a theih uleh amaute theihsak ding thu a peta uhi.
Huan, Paikan Ankuangluina ding ni guk a om nalai a, Jesun misi laka kipana a kaihthoh Lazar omna Bethani khua a hongtung a.
Huan, huaiah amaha din nitakan a bawl ua, Marthain nek a bawl hi, Lazar bel a ankuang umpih khat ahi a.
Huan, Mariin buk kimkhat spiknardi that namtui manpha tak a hontawia, Jesu khete a nuih a, a samin a khete a nula, huchiin huai thau gimin in tuh a dimta hi.
Himahleh, Iskariot, Juda, a nungjui khat, a mansak dingpan,
Hiai thau namtui bangdia makhai zathuma juaka mi gentheite kianga pe zolou uh ahia? a chi a.
Mi gentheite a khotuah jiaka huai theu gen ahi kei; guta ahi a, dangka ip a kem a, a sunga koih a lak jel jiak ahi jaw.
Huan, Jesun, Hih hen aw. Ka kivui ni-a dinga a sit a zang ahi, sen hen aw.
Mi gentheite na kiang ua om gige ahi ua, kei bel na kiang ua om gige ding ka hi kei, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu huaiah a om chih Juda mipi vantangin a na theita ua; huan, a hong ua, Jesu jiak kia hi louin, misi laka kipan a kaihthoh, Lazar mah leng a muh nop jiak uh ahi.
Huan, siampu liante Lazar leng hihlum dingin a kikou ua;
amah jiaka Judate tampiin a langkai san ua, Jesun a gintak jiakun.
A jingin, ankuangluinaa hong mipi tampiin, Jesu Jerusalem khua ah a hong ding chih a jak un,
tum nahte a tawi ua, a dawn dingin a vapawt ua, Hosanna, Toupa mina Israelte Kumpipa hongpai a hampha e, chiin, a kikou ua.
Huan, Jesun sabengtung nou a mu a, a tungah a tuang a.
Lau ken, Zion tanu; en in, na Kumpipa, sabengtung nou tunga tuangin, a hongding, chih gelh bangin.
Huai thute a tungin a nungjuiten a theisiam keu ua; himahleh, Jesu pahtawia a om nungin, a tanchin ah huai thu gelh ahi chih leh, a tungah huai thilte a na hih ngei uh chih a theita ua.
Huan, Lazar hana kipana a sapkhiakpa, misi laka kipan a kaihthoh laia a kianga mipi omten, a thu a theihpih uhi.
Huaijiakin ahi, mipiten leng amah a vadawn uh, huai thillamdang a hih chih a thei ngal ua.
Huchiin, Pharisaiten, Thei un, bangmah na hih theih louh uh, en un, khovelin amah a juita hi, a kichi ua.
