huan huaite Galili gama Bethsaida khuaa mi Philip kiangah a hong ua, a kiangah, Pu, Jesu mu nuam ung, a chi ua, a thum un.
Philipin Andru a honghilha; huan, Andru leh Philipin Jesu a honghilh uh.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiang uah, Mihing Tapa pahtawia a omna ding hun a tungta.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Buh tang leia a kiak a, a sih kei leh, amah kiain a om tawntung hi; a sihin bel, tampiin a gah nak hi.
Kuapeuh a hinna itin a magsak a; kuapeuh hiai khovela a hinna ngaineuin khantawna hinna ah a vom gige ahi.
Kuapeuhin ka na a sep leh honjui hen; ka omna ah ka nasempa leng a om ding hi; kuapeuhin ka na a sep leh Pain amah a pahtawi ding hi.
Tun ah ka kha a mangbang hi; bang ka gen dia? Pa, hiai hun lakah honhondam in, ka chi dia hia? Chi lou e. Hiai dinga tu tana na om hiing a.
Pa na min pahtawi in, a chi a. Huchiin vana kipanin aw hongsuaka, Ka pahtawita, ka pahtawi lai ding achia a.
Huan, mipi a kianga dingten huai a ja ua, Vanpi ging ahi, a chi ua; midangten, Angelin amah a houpih ahi, a chi ua.
Jesun a dawnga, Huai aw keia dia hongsuak ahi kei, noumaua ding ahi jaw.
Tu tuh hiai khovel vaihawmsakna hun ahi; tuin hiai khovel lal paih khiak ahi ding.
Huan, leia kipana khai kanga ka om leh, mi tengteng kei mah kiangah ka hip ding, a chi a.
Huai thu tuh a sih dingdan theihsakna dia a gen ahi.
Huan, mipin a kiangah, Kris khantawnin a om ding chih dan bu ah ka thei uh, Nang, Mihing Tapa khaikanga om ding ahi, bangchi chiha chi na hia? Huai Mihing Tapa tuh kua ahia? a chi ua, adawng ua.
Huan, Jesun a kianguah, Vak na lak uah sawt lou a omtadih hi. Vak na neih lai un vak ah khosa un, huchilouin jaw mialin honlap ding hi. Kuapeuh miala khosain a paina a theikei.
Vak na neih lai un vak gingta un, vak tate na honghih theihna dingun, a chi a. Huai thute Jesun a gena; huan, apaia, amuh louh dingun a buta.
A ma uah huchi tela tam thillamdang hih mahleh, amah a gingta tuan kei ua:
Toupa, ka thu gen uh kuan ahia gingta? Toupa khut leng kua kiangah ahia latsaka a om? chih jawlnei Isai thugen a tun na dingin.
Hiai jiakin ahi a gintak theih louh uh, Isaiin.

Aman a mit uh a hihtaw a, a lung tang uh a hihkhauh a; huchilou injaw a mit un a mu khading ua, a lungtang un a thei kha ding uh, huan, hongkihei nawn khading ua, ken amau ka hihdam khading hi, chih, a gen nawn jiakin.
Isaiin a thupina a muh leh a tanchin thu agen jiakin huai thu a gen hi.
Himahleh, heutute laka nangawn tampiin Jesu a gingta ua; a hihhangin Pharisaite jiakin a kipulak nuam kei uh, huchilou injaw kikhopna in ah a nong kha ding uh:
Pathian pahtawina sangin mihing pahtawina a deih zo ngal ua.
Huan, Jesu a kikou a, Kuapeuh hon gingta tuh kei gingta ahi kei, honsawlpa gingta ahi jaw.
Kuapeuh kei hon mu tuh honsawlpa mu ahi.
Vak dia khovela hong ka hi a, kuapeuh kei hon gingta tuh miala a om louhna ding in.
Kuapeuh ka thu gen jain, gingta kei mahleh, ken siam louh ka tangsak kei: khovel siam louh tangsak dinga hong ka hi kei a, khovel humbit dinga hong ka hi zo ngala.
Kuapeuh kei hondeih lou a, ka thu gente pom louin, siamlouh tangsak khat a nei ahi, ka thu gen, huai thu mahmahin, ni tawpni chiah amah siamlouh a tang sak ding hi.
Keimah phuahtawmin ka gen ngal keia; Pa honsawlpan ka gen ding leh ka hih ding thu a honpe jaw ahi.
Amah thupiak khantawna hinna ahi chih ka thei; huaijiakin thu ka gen, Pa honhilh bang jelin ka gen ahi, a chi a.
Paikan Ankuanglui kipat main, Jesun, hiai khovel nusiaa Pa kianga a pai hun hongtungta chih a theia; hiai khovel amah-ate na itkhinin a tawp phain a it hi.
Huan, nitak annek laiin, diabolin Juda Iskariot, Simon tapa lungtanga Jesu juausana-matsak lungsim a koihsak khitnungin,
Jesun, Pa-in a khut ah thil bangkim a peta chih leh Pathian akipana hongpai ahia, Pathian kianga pai ding ahi chih theigigein,
A nitakan um tuh a dinga, a puante a koiha, kinulna puan a laa, tenga.
Huan, maiphiatkuangah tui a sunga, nungjuite khe a silta a, kinulna puan a tenin a nul jel hi.
Huchiin, Simon Peter kiangah a hong a. Aman, Toupa, nang telin ka khe na sil dia hia? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Ka thilhih tunah na theikei: himahleh tunung chiangin na thei ding, a chi a, a dawnga.
Peterin a kiangah, Ka khe na sil kei hial ding, a chi a. Jesun a kiangah, Kon sil kei leh ka kiangah tan na neikei ding, a chi a.
Simon Peterin a kiangah, Toupa, ka khe kia hilouin, ka khut leh ka lutang leng aw, a chi a,
Jesun a kiangah, Kisil khinsa a khe lou ngal sil a kiphamoh kei, a pumpiin a siang; nou na siang uh, na vek un jaw ahi kei, a chi a.
A mansakpa ding a thei ngala; huaijiakin, Na vek un na siang kei uh, a chi ahi.
Huchiin, a khe tuh a sila, a puante a laka, a tut nawn in a kiang uah, Na tung ua ka thil hih bang chhihna ahia?
Nou Sinsakpa leh Toupa non chi ua; na chi dik uhi, ka hi ngei tak a.
Kei Toupa leh Sinsakpan, na khe uh ka sil leh, nou leng na khe uh na kisil sak ding uh ahi.
Na tung ua ka hih bangin, nou leng na hih samna ding un, hihdingdan honhilh ka hi ngala.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Sikha a pu sangin a thupizo kei; sawltak leng a sawlpa sangin a thupizo sam kei hi.
Huai thilte na theih ua, na hih uleh hampha nahi uh.
Na vek ua thu ka gen kei a; ka telte ka thei; himahleh, huai tuh, Ka tanghou nepan ka tungah a khetul a likta, chih, laisiangthou a hongtun theihna ding ahi.
Tuin a hongtun main kon hilh ahi, a hongtun hun chia kei amah ka hi chih na gintak theihna ding un.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin, kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh ka sawl kipahpih tuh, keimah honkipahpih ahi; kuapeuh kei honkipahpih tuh, honsawlpa kipahpih ahi, a chi a.
Jesun huchi banga a genkhitin, a lungsim a mangbang a, Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, na lak ua mi khatin kei honmansak ding, chiin a theisakta a.
Huan, nungjuiten a chihtuampen a theikei ua, a kien chiat ua.
Huan, a nungjuite laka khat, Jesun a itpa, dohkan sikah Jesu angsung ah kingaiin a om a.
Huan, Simon Peterin huai mi kiangah, Kua thu pen ahia a gen, honhilh dih, chiin a mitmei a.
Huan, Jesu awm ngai mahin a awn pheia, a kiangah, Toupa, kuapen ahia? a chi a.
Huan, Jesun, Tanghou them ka diah saka, ka piakpa ahi ding, a chi a, a dawnga. Huchiin, tanghou them a diah nungin, Iskariot, Simon tapa Juda kiangah a pai a.
Huan, tanghou them a piak nungin Setan a sungah a lutta a. Huchiin, Jesun a kiangah, Na hih ding hih meng in, a chi a.
Huan, dohkan sika miten kuamahin bang jiaka chi ahi chih a theikei uh.
A khenin, Judain dangka ip a vom jiakin, Jesun, Ankuangluinaa dingin i thil kiphamoh peuh lei in, a chi hiam, mi gentheite kiangah banghiam piak ding, a chi hiam a sa uh.
Huan, aman tanghou them a la a, a pawt khe pah a; huai tuh jan lai ahi.
Huchiin a pawt nungin, Jesun a gen a, Tuin Mihing Tapa pahtawiin a om, huna, amah ah Pathian leng pahtawiin a om ahi.
Amaha Pathian pahtawia a om leh amah leng Pathianin amah ah a pahtwi ding, a pahtawi pah ngal ding hi.

Naute aw, sawt lou chik na kiang uah ka omlai tadih a. Nou non zong ding uh; huan, Judate kianga, Ka paina dingah nou na hongpai theikei ding uh, chih ka gen bangin, tuin huchi mahbangin na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Thuchiam thak kon pia ahi, kiit un; ken nou kon it bangin, nou leng kiit un.
Na kiit uleh, mi tengtengin ka nungjuite nahi uh chih huai ah a thei ding uh, a chi a.
Simon Peterin a kiang ah, Toupa, koia hoh ding na hia? a chi a, Jesun, Ka hohna dingah nang tuin non jui theikei ding; tunung chiah jaw nonjui ding, a chi a, a dawng a.
Peterin a kiangah, Toupa, bangdingin ahia tua leng kon zuih theih louh ding? Nangmah jiakin ka hinna ka pai ding, a chi a.
Jesun a dawnga, Keimah jiakin na hinna na pai ding maw? Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, nang thum vei non kitheihmohbawl main, ak a khuang kei ding.
Na lungtang uh hihmangbatin om kei hen; Pathian na gingta ua, kei leng hon gingta un.
Ka Pa in ah tenna mun tampi a om; a om lou hileh, ka honhilhta ding ahi; nou ading mun khat bawl dinga va kuan dek kahi ngala.
Huan, nou adia mun ka vabawl chian ka hong kik nawn dinga, ka kiangah nou ka honla ding, ka omnaa nou leng na om theih samna dingun.
Ka hohna ding a lampi na thei uhi, a chi a.
Thomain a kiangah, Toupa, koia hoh ding na hia ka theikei uh, a lampi bangchin ka thei ding ua? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Keimah tuh lampi leh thutak leh hinna ka hi; keimah a pai lou kuamah Pa kiang a tung ngei kei.
Kei nontheihtak uleh ka Pa leng na theita ding uh; tu-a kipan amah na thei ua, muh leng na muta uh, a chi a.
Philipin a kiangah, Toupa, huai Pa tuh kou hon ensak tanla, huchiin koudin a hun ding, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Philip, hiai tanpi na kiang uah ka om a, huchiin leng honthei lou maw? Kuapeuh kei mu tuh Pa mu ahi. Huai Pa tuh kou hon ensak in, bangchi chiha na chih ahia?
Kei Pa ah ka om a Pa keimah ah a om chih na ging kei ahia? Na kiang ua thu ka gen, keimah phuahtawm in ka gen kei; Pa keimah ah a om gige a, a thil a hih zo nak ahi.
Kei Paa ka om leh Pa keimaha a om hon gingta un; ahihkeileh thil hih jiak bekin hon gingta un.
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, Kuapeuh hon gingtain thil ka hihte a hih sam ding; hiai sanga thil thupi leng a hih ding, Pa kianga ka pai ding jiakin.
Huan, ka mina na nget peuhmah uh ka hih jel ding, Pa Tapaa pahtawia a om theihna dingin.
Nou ka mina bangpeuh non nget uleh, huai tuh ka hih jel ding hi.
Nou non it uleh, ka thupiakte na jui ding uh.
Huan, Pa ka ngen dia, aman Khamuanpa dang a honpe ding, khantawna na kiang ua om dingin; huai tuh thutak Kha ahi;
Khovelin huai a nei theikei hi, amah amuh louh a, a theih louh behlap jiakin; nou tuh amah na thei ua, na kiang uah a om gige ngala, noumau ah a om ding ahi.
Tagah din kon paisan kei ding hi; na kiang uah ka hongpaai nawn ding.
Sawt lou chikin khovelin honmu nawnta kei ding; himahleh nou jaw non mu ding uh; keimah ka hin jiakin nou leng na hing sam ding uhi.
Huai ni chiangin kei ka Paa ka om bang, nou, keimaha na om bang un, kei noumaua ka om bang na thei ding uh.
Kuapeuh ka thupiakte neia, jui tuh, kei honit ahi; kuapeuh kei honit tuh, ka Pain a it ding, ken leng amah ka it dinga, a kiangah kahihna ka kilak ding, a chi a.
Huan, Juda (Iskariot lou zopenin) a kiangah, Toupa, kou kianga na kilak dia, khovel kianga, na kilak louh se ding, bang achia? a chi a.
Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Min honit leh ka thute a jui dinga; ka Pan amah a it dia, a kiangah ka hongpai ding ua, a mah toh ka tengkham gige ding uh.
Kuapeuh honit louin ka thu a jui kei; na thu jakte uh keia ahi keia, Pa honsawlpaa ahi jaw hi.
Na kiang ua ka om takdih sungin, hiai thute kon hilh hi.
Huan, Khamuanpa, Kha Siangthou, Pain ka mina honsawl dingpan bangkim nou honsinsak dinga, na kiangua ka gen tengteng nou a honthei khe sak nawn ding hi.
Khamuanna kon nutsiat a; keimah khamuanna kon pia hi; khovelin a piak bangin kon pe keia. Na lungtang uh hihmangbatin om kei hen, lau leng lau kei hen.
Ka pai mang ding a, na kiang uah ka hongpai nawn ding, kon chih dan bang na theita uh. Nou honit hile uchin Pa kianga ka paiding jiakin na kipak ding uh ahi; Pa lah keimah sangin a thupizo ngala.
Tun ah a hongtun main ka honhilhta ahi, a hongtun chianga na gintak theihna ding un.
Na kiang uah thu ka gen nawn ngel kei ding, khovel lal a hongpai dek ngala; aman tuh keimah ah bangmah himhim a neikei hi;
himahleh, ken Pa ka it chih leh, Pain thu honpiak bang jelin thil ka hih chih, khovelin a theihna ding uh ei ve. Ding di ua, hiaia kipan i pai ding uh.
Kei grep gui dik tuh ka hi, ka Pa a Kempa ahi.
Keia hiang gah lou peuhmah a la manga; a gah peuhmah a hah siangthou a, a gah tam semna dingin.
Na kiang ua ka thu gen jiakin tun ah leng na sianghtou khin pah uhi.
Keimah ah om gige un, kei leng noumau ah ka om gige ding. Hiang, grep guia a om gige kei leh amah in a gah theikei bangin, nou leng keimaha na om gige kei uleh, na gah theikei ding uh.
Kei a grep gui tuh ka hi, nou ahiangte na hi uh; kuapeuh keimaha om gige a, kei leng amaha ka om gige na, huai mah tuh tampiin a gah nak hi; keimah louin lah bangmah na hih theikei ua.
Mi keia a om gige kei leh, hiang banga paihkhiakin a om a, a vuai nak hi; huan, a tom ua, mei ah a pai ua, a kang nak hi.
Nou keimaha na om gige ua, ka thu leng noumaua a om gige leh, na ut peuh uh ngen un, nou adia hihin a om jel ding hi.
Hiai jiakin ka Pa tuh pahtawiin a om, tampia na gah un; huchiin ka nungjuite na hi ding uh.
Pan kei honit bangmahin kon it hi; ka itna ah om gige un.
Nou ka thupiakte na zuih uleh ka itna ah na om gige ding uhi, ken ka Pa thupiakte ka juia, a itnaa ka om gige mah bangin.
Ka kipah noumaua a om gige theihna din leh, na kipah uh a kimna dingin, hiai thu na kiang uah ka gen ahi.
Hiai ka thupiak ahi, ken nou kon it bngin, noumau leng kiit unla.
Mihingin a lawm adia a hinna a piak vala itna thupijaw kumahin a neikei.
Thu kon piak peuhmah na hih uleh, ka lawmte na hi ding uhi.
Sikha kon chi nawnta kei dia; a pu thilhih sikhain a thei ngal keia; lawmte kon chi zota ding; Pa kianga ka thil jak tengteng na kiang uah ka hontheisakta ngala.
Nou non tel kei ua, ken kon tel jaw ahi, vagah ding leh na gah uh om gige dingin kon sep hi; ka mina Pa kianga na nget peuhmah uh nou a hon piakna dingin.
Na kiit theihna ding un hiai thu khawng kon pia ahi.
Khovelin nou a honhuat leh, nou a honhuat main keimah honho khinta chih na thei un.
Nou khovela hi le uchin, khovelin amaha a it ding; khovela kipan kon tel khiak jawk jiakin, khovelin nou a honhua ahi.
Sikha a pu sangin a thupizo kei, chih thu kon hilhta hi, theigige un. Amau kei honsawi uleh, nou leng honsawi ding uh; ka thu jui hita le uh, noumau thu leng a jui ding uhi.
Himahleh, hiai thil tengteng ka min jiakin na tunguah a hih ding uh, honsawlpa a theih louh jiak un.
Kei hongpai keiin a kiang uah thu gen kei leng, khelhna neilou ding hi ua, himahleh tuin a khelhna uh paulap ding a neita kei uh ahi.
Kuapeuh kei honhuain, ka Pa leng a hua ahi.
Thil, midang kuamah hih ngei louhte, a lak ua hih lou hita leng, khelhna neilou ding hi ua, himahleh tuin amau kei leh ka Pa ka nih un honmuta uh, huat leng honhota uh ahi.
A dan laibu uah, amau a jiak om louin honhua uh, chih, thu gelhpen, a hongtunna dingin a hih uh ahi ve.
Huan, Pa kiang akipan Khamuanpa na kiang ua ka honsawl ding, Paa kipan thutak Kha a hongtun hun chiangin, aman keimah hontheihpihnathu a gen ding;
nou leng theihpihte nahi uh, a tunga kipan ka kianga na om jiak un.
Lungkiaa na paimang louhna ding un hiaite na kiang uah ka genta ahi.
Kikhopnain ahte a honnong sak ding ua; ahi, kuapeuh nou honhihlum tuh Pathian tunga thil hoih hihin a kithei ding; huchi bang hun a tung ding ahi.
Huai thilte a hih ding uh, Pa leh kei hontheih louh jiakun.
Hiai thu khawng na kiang uah ka genta hi, a hun a hongtun chia, kon hilh khinta chih na theih nawnna ding un.
Hiai thil khawng a tung akipan kon na hilh louh him na hi uh, na kiang ua ka omtak dih jiakin. Tuin jaw honsawlpa kiangah ka pai dinga noute kuamahin, Koia hoh ding? Chiin, non dong tuan kei uh.
Hiai thute na kiang ua ka gen jiakin na lungtang uh lungkhamnain a dimzo hialtaa a.
Himahleh, thutak ka honhilh ahi; ka pai nou dingin a hoih hi; ka pai keileh, Khamuanpa na kiang uah a hongtung kei ding; ka pai lebel na kiang uah ka honsawl ding hi.
Amah a hongtun chiangin, khelhna thu ahte, diktatna thu ahte, vaihawmna thu ahte khovel a siamlouh dan a theisak ding hi;
Khelhna thu ahte siam louh a tang ding uh, kei hon gintak louh jiak un; diktatna thu ahte siamlouh a tang ding uh;
Pa kiangah ka pai dinga, nou kei non muh nawn tak louh ding jiak un;
vaihawm thu ahte siamlouh a tang ding uh, hiai khovel lal siamlouha a puktak jiakin.
Na kiang ua thu gen ding tampi ka nei laia, himahleh tuin jaw na chin tadih kei ding uh.

Himahleh, amah, Thutak Kha a hongtun chiangin, thutak tengteng ah nou a honpi ding; amah phuahtawmin thu a gen dek ngal keia; a jak peuhmah a gen zo ding, thil hongtung dingte leng nou a hontheisak ding.
Aman kei honpahtawi dinga; keia a la dinga, nou kiangah a hontheisak ding ahi ngala.
Pan thil a neih tengteng keia ahi; huaijiakin, Keia a la dinga, na kiang uah a hontheisak ding, ka chi ahi.
Sawtlou chikin nou kei non mu kei ding ua; sawtlou chik mahin nou kei non mu nawn ding uh, a chi a.

Huan, a nungjuite khenkhatin, I kianga a thugen bang ahi, Sawtlou chikin nou kei non mu kei ding uh, sawtlou chik mahin nou kei non mu ding uh, a chih, leh, Pa kianga ka hoh dek jiakin, a chih? a kichi ua.
Huan, amau mahin, hiai sawtlou chik, a chih bang chihna ahia? a thugen I theisiam kei uh; a chi ua.
Huan, amah dot a ut uh chih Jesun a thei a, a kiang uah, Sawtlou chikin nou kei non mu kei ding uh, sawtlou chik mahin nou kei non mu nawn ding uh, chia, hiai ka thugen na kidong umaw?
Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin ka honhilh ahi, Nou na khitui uh a ke dinga, na kap huahhuah ding uh, khovel bel a kipak ding; nou na lungkham ding ua, himahleh na lungkham uh kipah a suak ding hi.
Numeiin nau a veiin a lungkham naka, a hun a tuntak jiakin; himahleh, nau a suah takin a lunggimna a thei nawnta kei hi, khovela mihing hongpiang a kipah jiakin.
Huan, tuin nou na lungkham uh; himahleh ka honmu nawn dinga, na lungtang uh a kipak ding, na kipahna uh kuamahin honlaksak kei ding.
Huai ni chiangin nou kei bangmah nonngen kei ding uh. Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin, kon hilh ahi, Pa kianga bangpeuh na nget uleh, keimah minin nou a honpe ding hi.
Tu tanin ka minin bangmah na ngen nai kei uh; ngen un, huchiin na mu ding uh, na kipah uh a kimna dingin.
Huai thu khawng a hem-in na kiang uah ka genta hi; a hun a tung dek, huai hun chiangin na kiang uah a hemin thu ka gen nawn ta kei dinga, chian takin Pa tanchin ka honhilh ding.
Huai ni chiangin keimah minin thil na ngen ding uh; Pa kiangh ken ka honnget sak ding ka chi kei hi.
Pain amah ngeiin nou a honit ngala, nou kei non it ua, Pa a kipan ka hi chih non gintak jiakun.
Kei Pa kianga kipana hongpawta, khovela hongpai ka hi a; khovel paisana, Pa kianga pai nawn ding ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, a nungjuiten, Ngai dih tuin jaw tel takin thu na gena, a hem himhimin nagen ta kei hi.
Nang bangkim na theia, kuamah hondot na kiphamoh kei chih tuin ka theita uh; hiai jiakin Pathian kianga kipana hongpai na hi chih ka gingta uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun a dawnga, a kiang uah, Tuin na gingta u maw?
Ngai un, a hun a tung, ahi, tun ah a tungta, huai hun chiangin noumau in chiat ah na dalh vek ding uh, keimah kiain non nuse ding uh; himahleh Pa ka kianga a om jiakin keimah kiain ka om tuan kei hi.
Hiai thute na kiang uah ka genta hi, keimaha na khamuanna dingun. Khovel ah gimthuakna na neiding uh, himahleh khamuang takin om un, ken khovel ka zouta, a chi a.
Huai thute Jesun a gen khitin van lam ngain, Pa a hun a tungta; na Tapa pahtawi in, Tapain nang hon pahtawina dingin;
huchia mi tengteng tunga thuneia na bawlin, a kianga na piak peuhmahte khantawn hinna a piak theihna dingin.
Hiai khantawna hinna ahi, nang Pathian tak kia leh na sawl Jesu Kris theih.
Nang thil hihding non piak ka hih khina, khovel ah kon pahtawita hi.
Pa aw, khovel om maa na kianga kilawmna ka neihin, tuin nangmah kiang ngeingeiah hon pahtawi in.
Nang khovel akipana mi kei non piakte kiangah na min ka hihlangta; amau nanga ahi ua, nang amau kei non paik ahi uh; amau lah na thu a juita uh.
Nang thil kei non piak tengteng tuh, nanga kipan ahi chih tuin a theita uh.
Nang thu non piak a kiang uah ka peta ngala; huaite a kem ua, nanga kipan ka hi chih dik takin a theita uh, nang na honsawl chih leng a gingta uhi.
Amau dia ka nget sak jaw; khovel adia nget sak ka hi kei, nang non piakte ding ahi jaw; nanga ahi ngal ua.
Thil tengteng keia peuhmah nanga ahi a, nanga lah keia ahi a; amau jiakin pahtawi in ka om ahi.

Huan, kei jaw khovel ah ka omta kei ding, hiaite bel khovel ah a om ding uh; kei na kiangah ka hongpai dekta. Pa Siangthou aw, nang kei non piakte na minin hum in, pumkhat a hih theihna ding un, eimah pumkhat I hih bangin.
A kiang ua ka om sungin, nang kei non piakte na minin ka huma; amau ka don a, a lak ua khat leng a mangthang kei hi, mangthang tapa loungal, laisiangthou a tun theihna dingin.
Himahleh, tuin na kiang ah ka hongpai dekta; khovel ah hiai thute ka gen ahi, ka kipah amau ua a neih kimna ding un.
Na thu a kiang uah ka peta hi; huan, khovelin amau a hua a, khovela a hih louh jiak un, kei khovela ka hih louh mahbangin.
Nang amau khovela kipan na lak khiak dinga ngen ka hi keia, mi gilou lakah na hum ding ka chi a hijaw.
Amau khovela ahi kei ua, kei khovela ka hi lou mahbangin.
Amau thutakin hihsiangthou in, na thu tuh thutak ahi.
Nang khovela kei non sawl bangin, ken leng amau khovel ah ka sawl hi.
Amau jiakin ka kihihsiangthou a, amau leng thutaka a sianthouna dingun.
Hiai khawngte a ding kiaa ngetsak ka hi kei, a thu jiakua kei hon gingta lai dingte dingin leng nget sak ka hi hi; a vek ua pumkhat a hihna ding un;
Pa, nang keimaha na om leh, kei nangmaha ka om bangin, amau leng eimaha a omna ding un; nang kei non sawl chih khovelin a taksan theihna dingin.
Huan, nang thupina non piak ken amu ka peta; amau pumkhat a hihna dingun, ei pum khat i hih mah nangin.
Kei amau ah, nang kei ah, amau pumkhata a om ua a buchin theihna dingun; nang kei non sawl chih leh, non it bangin amaute na it chih, khovelin a theihtheihna ding in.
Pa, nang kei non piakte, ka omnaa ka kianga omdingin ka deih; leilung pian maa itnaa nang non piak ka thupina a muh theihna ding un.
Pa diktat aw, khovelin jaw nang honthei keia, ken jaw kon thei hi; hiaiten leng nang kei non sawl chih a thei uh.
Huan, a kiang uah na min ka theisaktaa, ka theisak ding, nang kei non itna bangbang na itna amaua a oma, kei leng amaua ka om theihna dingin, a chi a.
Jesun huai thute a gen khitin a nungjuite toh a pawt ua, Kidron luiguam a kan ua, huaiah huan a om a, hui ah a lut ua, amah leh a nungjuite toh.
Huan, a mansakpa Juda in leng huai mun a theita; Jesu a nungjuite toh huaiah a pawt jeljel ngal ua.
Huchiin Judain sepaih pawl toh, siampu liante leh Pharisaite kianga om heutute toh a pi a, khawnvakte, meiselte, galvante tawiin huaiah a hongpai ua.
Jesun a tunga thil tungding tengteng a thei gige a, a vapawta, a kiang uah, Kua ahia na zon uh? a chi a.
Amau a kiangah, Nazaret Jesu a chi ua, a dawng ua. Jesun a kianguah Keimah ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, a mansakpa Juda leng a lak uah a ding a. Huai Keimah ka hi, a chih takin, a nungtolh ua, leiah a puk duam ua.
Huan, aman a kianguah, Kua ahia na zon uh? a chi a, a dawng nawna. Huan, amau, Nazaret Jesu, a chi ua.
Huan, Jesun, Keimah ka hi chih kon hilhta a; nou kei honzong na hih uleh hiaite hoihtakin khah un, a chi a a dawng a.
Hiai tuh a thugen, Nang kei non piakte khat leng ka mangsaak kei, a chih, a tunna din ahi.
Huan, Simon Peterin namsau a voma, a doka, siampu lianpen sikha a sata, a bil taklam a sat khiak saka. Sikha min tuh Malka ahi.
Huchiin, Jesun Peter kiangah, Huai namsau a pai ah siatin; Pain nou kei honpiak ka dawn kei dia hia? a chi a.
Huchiin, sepaih pawl toh, heutupen u toh, Judate heutute toh Jesu a man ua, a hen ua.
Ana kiangah a pi masa ua, Kaiapha sungpa a hih jiakin. Kaiapha, huai kuma siampu lianpen ahi a.
Kaiapha, Mi tengteng sanga mikhat sih a hoih, chia, Judate hasuanpa ahi.
Huan, Simon Peterin Jesu a juia, a nungjui dang khat toh. Huai nungjuipa tuh siampu lianpen mel theih ahia, siampu lianpen in huangsung intual ah, Jesu kiang ah a lut sam a;
himahleh Peter jaw po lamah kongkhak bulah a ding hi. Huchiin nungjui dang siampu lianpen meltheih, a va pawta, kongkhak ngaknu a houpiha, Peter a pi luta.
Huan, kongkhak ngaknu nungakin Peter kiangah, Nang leng hiai mi nungjuite laka pangsam na hi hia? a chi a.
Aman, Ka hi kei, a chi a. Huan, sikhate leh heutute huaiah a ding diamduam ua, a vot jiakin meiholin mei a toh ua, a lum a awi uhi; Peter leng a kiangua a pang a, ding kawmin mei lum a awi sam hi.
Huan, siampu lianpenin Jesu a nungjuite tanchin leh a thuhilh dan a donga.
Jesun a dawnga, a kiangah, Khovel mi kiangah, vantang theihin, thu ka gen gige a; kikhopna in leh, Pathian biakin, Juda tengteng om khawmna ahte bang thu ka hilh jela, a simin bangmah ka gen kei hi.
Bang achia kei hondong? A kiang ua ka thu gendan ka thu zate dong in; ngaiin, huaiten ka thugen a thei uh a keihiam, a chi a.
Huan a gen takin a kianga ding heutu khatin Jesu a benga, siampu lianpen hichi bangin na dawng maw? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Thu gilou gen ka hih leh, a gitlouhna hontheisak in; himahleh, thu pha ka gen inleng bang achia honbeng? a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Anain hensain siampu lianpen Kaiapha kiangah a saw hi.
Huan, Simon Peterin dingin meilum a awi a. Huan, Nang leng a nungjuite laka pang sam na hi hia? a chi ua. Aman, Ka hi kei, chiin, a kitheihmohbawla.
Huan, simapu lianpu sikha khat, Peter bil sat khiak sanggamin, A kiangah, huan ah ka honmu kei maw? a chi a.
Huchiin Peterin a kitheihmohbawl nawn a; huan, ak a khuang pah ngal hi.
Huan, Jesu Kaiapha in a kipanin kumpipa in ah a pi nawn ua; jingsang ahi a; huan, amau jaw kumpipa in ah a lut kei uh, a lut un jaw a buah ding ua, Paikan Ankuanglui a ne theikei kha ding uhi.
Huan, Pilat a kiang uah a va pawta, a kiang uah, Hiai mi tungah hekna bang ahia na neih uh? a chi a.
Amau a kiangah, Hiai mi migilou hi keileh na kiang ah kon pi kei ding uh, a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, Pilatin a kiang uah, Nou pi unla, na dan bang un a thu vaihawmsak un, a chi a. Judaten a kiangah, Kou thuin kuamah hihlup dan ahi kei, a chi ua.
Hiai tuh a sih danding thu, Jesun a gen banga, a tuna dingin ahi.
Huchiin, Pilat a in ah a lut nawna, Jesu a sama, a kiangah, Judate kumpipa na hi ahia? a chi a.
Jesun, Hiai nangmah lungsim puak khiaka na gen hia, midang in honhilh, ka tungtang thu? a chi a, a dawng a.
Pilatin, Kei Juda mi ka hi ahia? Nangmah chite leh siampu lianten ka kiangah nang a honpi ua ahi; thil bang ahia na hih? a chi a, a dawng a.

Jesun, Ka kumpihihna hiai khovela ahi kei; ka kumpihihna hiai khovela hi leh, ka sikhaten gal a dou ding uh, Judate kianga piaka ka om louhna dingin; himahleh, ka kumpihihna jaw hiai khovela kipan ahi kei hi, a chi a, a dawng a.
Huan, Pilatin a kiangah, E, kumpipa na hi maw? a chi a. Jesun, Hi e, kumpipa ka hi. Thutak theihsak ka piansan leh khovela ka hongpai san ahi. Kuapeuh thutaka peuhmahin ka thu a sang uh, a chi a.
Pilatin, a kiangah, Thutak tuh bang ahia? a chi a. Huan, Huai thu a gen khit takin, Judate kiangah a vapawt nawna, a kiang uah, Bangmah a gitlouhna ka mu kei.
Himahleh, Paikan Ankuangluina ah mi khat kon pawtsak ding dan na nei uh; huchiin, Judate kumpipa honpawt sak leng na ut uhia? a chi a.
Huan, amau a kikou nawn ua, Hiai mi jaw hi kei henla, Barabba pen hi jaw heh a chi ua. Barabba tuh suamhat ahi.
Huan, huchihlaiin Pilatin Jesu a pi a, a jep a.
Huan, sepaihten ling lukhu a phan ua, a khusak ua, puan san dup leng a silh sak uh;
huan, a kiangah a hongpai ua, Chibai; Judate Kumpipa: a chi ua, a beng uh.
Huan, Pilat a pawt nawna, a kiang uah, En un, bangmah a gitlouhna ka mu kei chih na theihna ding un, na kiang uah ka honpi khia ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu linglukhu khuin leh puan sandup silh in a hong pawta. Huan, Pilatin a kiang uah, En un, Mihing! a chi a.

Huan, siampu liante leh heututen amah a muh tak un a kikou ua, Kros ah kilhlum in, kros ah kilhlum in, a chi ua. Pilatin a kiang uah, Noumau paipih unla, kros ah kilhlum un; ken jaw bangmah a gitlouhna ka mu ngal kei a, a chi a.
Judaten a kiangah, Ka dan uh khat a om, huai dan bang jelin Pathian Tapaa a kibawl jiakin a si ding ahi, a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, Pilatin huai thu a jakin a lau nawn semsema;
A in ah a lut nawna, Jesu kiangah, Koia kipan na hia? a chi a.
Himahleh, Jesun a dawng kei. Huan, Pilatin a kiangah, Nang kei honhoupih lou ding maw? Honkhah thei ka hi, krosa honkilhlum thei ka hi chih na thei ka hia? a chi a.
Jesun, Tunglam akipan piak hi kei lechin, ka tungah hih theih himhim na neikei ding; huaijiakin na kianga honpekhepan khelhna lianjaw a pua ahi, a chi a.
Huai nungsiah Pilatin khah a tuma; himahleh Judate a kikou ua, Hiai mi na khah leh Kaisar lawm na hi kei ding; kuapeuh kumpipaa kibawl tuh Kaisar dou ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, Pilatin huai thu a jak takin, Jesu a pi khia a, a min Suanglep, Hebru paua Gabbatha a chih uh, huai munah thukhenna tutphah ah a tu a.
Huan, huai ni tuh Paikan Ankuangluina kiginni ahi a, dak gukna khawng ahi. Huan, aman Judate kiangah, En un, na Kumpipa uh, a chi a.

Huan, amau a kikou ua, Hihmangthang in, hihmangthang in, kros ah kilhlum in, a chi ua. Pilatin a kiang uah, Na Kumpipa uh kros ah ka kilhlum ding maw? a chi a. Siampu lianten, Kaisar loungal kumpipa dang ka neikei uh, a chi ua, a dawng uh.
Huchiin Pilatin krosa kilhlup dingin amah a kiang uah a peta hi.
Huchiin Jesu a pita ua; huan, aman kros kipuakin Luguh Mun, a chih uh, Hebru paua Golgotha a chih uah, huai mun tan a paia;
huaiah kros ah a kilhlum ua, mi dang nih toh, a sik ah khat tuaktuakin, a lai ah Jesu.
Huan, Pilatin lai a gelha, kros ah a suanga, NAZARET JESU JUDATE KUMPIPA, chia, gelh ahi.
Huan, huai lai tuh Judate a khen tampiin a sim ua; Jesu kros a kilhlupna mun uh khopi kiang ahi a; Hebru pau bang. Rome pau bang, Grik pau banga gelh ahi ngala.
Huchiin, Judate siampu lianten Pilat kiangah, Judate Kumpipa, chiin, gelh ken; Judate Kumpipa ka hi, a chi, chiin, gelh jawin, a chi ua.
Pilatin, Ka gelh khit tuh ka gelhkhit ahita, achia, a dawnga.

Huan, sepaihten Jesu krosa a kilhlup khit un a puansilh a la ua, phel liin a bawl ua, sepaihten phel khatin a tang chiat ua; a puannak leng a la uh. Puannak khui louh puannak ahi a a ngawng a kipan a puma gat vek ahi;

huaijiakin amau, I bot kek kei dia, kuaa pending a hihiam ai i san zo ding uh, a kichi ua. Laisiangthoua, Ka puansilhte a kihawm ua, ka puannak din ai a san uh, chih a tunn dingin. Huai thil tuh sepaihten a hih uhi.
Huan, Jesu kros kiangah a nu leh a nu sanggam, Mari Kleopa ji leh Mari Magdalini a ding ua.
Huan, Jesun a nu leh nungjui a itpa a kianga ding a mua, a nu kiangah, Numei, en in, na tapa; a chi a.
Huan, nungjuipa kiangah, En in, na nu; a chi a. Huan, huai nungsiah, huai nungjuiin amah in ah amah a pita hi.
Huai nungin, Jesu thil bangkim tunah hih zoh a hita chih a thei a, (laisiangthou a tuna dingin) Ka dang a tak, a chi a.
Huaiah bel khat uain thuka dim a tung ua, huchiin spanji khat uain thuka diah dimin, husop chiangah a tak ua, a muk ah a tun tou ua.
Huan, Jesun uain thuk a na dawn khitin, Zoh a hita, a chi a. Huan, a lu a kuna, a kha a khahta hi.
Huan, kiginni a hih jiakin, luangte khawlnia krosa a om nilouh louhna dingin, (huai Khawlni ni thupi ahi ngala), Judaten Pilat kiangah a khete uh hihtana a luang uh paipih dingin a ngen ua.
Huan, sepaih a hongpai ua, a kianga krosa a kilhlup uh mi tuah masak leh mi khat a khe uh a hihtan ua;
himahleh, Jesu kiang a hongtun un, a na sita chih a thei ua, a khete a hihtan tuanta kei uh.
Himahleh, sepaihte laka mi khatin a nakah teiin a suna, huchiin sisan leh tui a pawt pah hi.
A mupan a theisakta, a thu theihsak a dik ahi; a gen dik chih a kithei-nou leng na gin takna ding un.
Laisiangthou, A guh khat leng hihtan ahi kei ding, chih, tuna dingin huai thil a hongomta hi.
Huan, laisiangthou dangin, Amah a sutpa uh a en ding uh, leng a chi hi.

Huan, huai thil hih khitin, Joseph, Arimathai mi, Jesu nungjui, Judate kihtak jiak a sim om in Jesu luang paipih dingin Pilat kiangah a ngena; huan, Pilatin a phala, Huchiin, a hongpaia, a luang a paipihta.
Huan, Nikodem, atunga jana a kianga hongin, murra leh aloe kihelsa buk sawmnga khawng tawiin a hong sama.
Huan, Jesu luang a la ua, Judate kivui dan bangin gimlimte toh puan malngat hoihin a tuam uh.
Huan, krosa a kilh lupna mun uah huan khat a oma; huan ah kuamah sialna ngei nailouh han thak khat a om hi.
Huan, Judate kiginni a hih jiakin, han a kiang chin uh a hih toh, huaiah Jesu a sialta uh.
Huan, ni sagih ni masapenin, jingin, khua a mial laiin, Mari Magdalini han ah a va hoha, suang tuh han akipan lak suanin a mu a.
Huchiin a tai a, Simon Peter leh nungjui dang Jesun a itpa kiangah a hongpaia, a kiang uah, Hana kipan Toupa a pai mangpihta uh, a koihna uh ka theikei uh, a chi a.
Huchiin, Peter a pawta, nungjui dang toh, huan, han lam a juan ua.
Huan, a tai tuak ua; nungjui dangin Peter a makhelh a, han a tung masa a.
Huan, a kun a, a en a, puan malngat hoih om tuh a mu a; himaleh a sungah a lut kei hi.
Huan, Simon Peterin leng a nungah a honjui a, han sungah a luta;
puan malngat hoih om leh, a lu-a kinulna puan om, puan malngat hoih laka om loua, jial saa mun tuama om a mu a.
Huchiin nungjui dang, han tung masa leng a lut sama, a mu a, a gingtata hi.
Misi laka kipan a thou nawn ding ahi chih laisiangthou a theigige nawn ngal kei ua.
Huchiin, nungjuite amau in ah a pai nawnta uhi.
Himahleh, Mari tuh a pua ah han kiangah kap kawmin a dinga; huan kap kawmin a kuna, han sung a en a;
huan, angel nih puan ngou silhin, Jesu luang sialna munah, khat a lu lamah, khat a khe lamah tu a mu a.
Huan, amau a kiangah, Numei, banga chia kap na hia? a chi ua. Aman a kiang uah, Ka Toupa a pai mang pih ua, a koihna uh ka theih louh jiakin, a chi a.
Huan, huchia a gen takin a nung lam a nga a, Jesu ding tuh a mu a, himahleh Jesu ahi chih a theikei.

Jesun a kiangah, Numei, Bang dia kap na hia? Kua ahia na zon? a chi a. Aman, huanpu hiam a sa a, a kiang ah, Pu, amah hiaia kipan na pai mang pih a hih leh, na koihna honhilh tanla, huchiin ka la ding, a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Mari, a chi a. Amah a kiheia, a kiangah Hebru pauin, Rabboni, a chi a; (huai tuh Sinsakpa, chihna ahi a).

Huan, Jesun a kiangah, Hon len ken, tu tan inleng Pa kiangah ka kah tou nai kei ahi; a hihhangin ka unaute kiangah vahoh inla, a kiang uah, Ka pa, na Pa uh, ka Pathian, na Pathian uh kiang ah ka kah tou dek, a chi hi, chiin, a chi a.
Mari Magdalini a va hoha, nungjuite kiangah, Toupa ka muta, a chi a, a kianga thu a gendante leng a hilh a.

Huan, huai ni, ni sagih ni masapenin, nitak lama hong hihin, Judate kihtak jiaka nungjuite omna kongkhakte a khak nung un, Jesu hongpaia, a lak uah a hongdinga, a kiang uah, Na tunguah khamuanna om hen, a chi a.
Huan, huai a gen khitin a khut leh a nak a kiang uah a laka. Huan, Toupa amuh tak un nungjuite a kipakta uh.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Na tunguah khamuanna om hen, Pan kei honsawl bang mahin nou ka honsawl ahi, a chi nawna.
Huan, huai thu a gen khitin amau a hat khuma, a kiang uah, Kha Siangthou tang un,
kua khelna leng na ngaihdam peuh uh ngaihdam ahi ding; kua khelhna leng na ngaihdam louh peuh uh, ngaihdam louh ahi ding, a chi a.
Huan, Jesu a hong lain sawm leh nihte laka pangsam Thoma, Didum a chih uh, a kiang uah a om sam keia.

Huchiin, nungjui dangten, a kiang ah, Toupa ka muta uh, a chi ua. Himahleh aman a kiang uah, A khut sik khetna pawn khawng ka muha, ka khut a ka khoih a, a naka ka khut ka koih hial keileh, ka gingta kei ding, a chi a.

Huan, ni giat nungin, a nungjuite in sungah a om nawn ua, Thoma leng a kiang uah a om sama. Huan kongkhakte khak hinapiin, Jesu hongpaia a lak uah a hong dingta, a kiang uah, Na tunguah khamuanna om hen, a chi a.
Huan, Thoma kiangah, Na khutzungin honsawk inla, ka khutte en in; na khutin ban inla, ka nak khawngah sawk in; gingta louin om kenla, gingtain, a chi a.
Thomain a kiangah, Ka Toupa leh ka Pathian na hi, a chi a, a dawnga.
Jesun a kiangah, Nang jaw non muh jiakin na gingta ahi; mu loua gingta peuhmahte a hampha uhi, a chi a.
Huan, Jesun nungjuite maah chiamtehna dang tampitak a hiha, huaite hiai laibu ah gelh ahi kei hi;
himahleh hiaite Jesu, Kris, Pathian Tapa ahi chih na gintakna ding uleh, na gintak ua a mina hinna na neihna ding ua gelh ahi.
Huai nungin, Tiberia dilah Jesu a nungjuite kiangah a kilak nawna; hichi bangin a kilaka;
Simon Peter te, Thoma Didum a chih te uh, Galili gama Kana khuaa Nathanael te, Zebedai tapa nihte, a nungjui dang nihte toh a om khawm ua.

Simon Peterin a kiang uah, Ngasa beng dingin ka kuan dek, a chi a. Amau a kiangah, Kou leng na kiangah ka hong sam ding uh, a chi ua. Huan, a pawt khia ua, longah a tuang ua, huai janin bangmah a man kei uhi.
Huan, phalvakin Jesu piautak ah a dinga; himahleh a nungjuiten Jesu ahi chih a theikei uh.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Naute aw, nekding banghiam na nei uh hia? a chi a. Amau a kiangah, Nei lou, a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, Long sik taklamah len pai le uchin khenkhat na man ding uh, a chi a. Huan, a pai ua, ngasa tam jiakin a kai khe zouta kei ua.
Huchiin, nungjui Jesun a itpan, Peter kiangah, Toupa ei ve, a chi a. Huchiin, Toupa ahi chih Simon Peterin a theih takin, a puannak a tenga, (vuaktanga om ahi ngala), dilah a tawm kheta hi.
Himahleh, nungjuiten long neu chikin, len ngasa a dim toh kai kawmin a honjuan ua, gama kipanin a gamla ngal kei ua, tong zanih hiam phet ahi a.
Huan, gama a suah tak-un, huai ah meihola mei tohsa a mu ua, a tunga ngasa leh tanghou em toh.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Tuin na ngasa mat uh a khen honla tou un, a chi a.
Huchiin Simon Peter a va tuanga, len ngasa lian pipia dim tui geiah a kai khiaa, ja leh sawmnga leh thum ahi; huchi lawmlawm om mahleh len a kek tuan kei a.
Huan, Jesun a kiang uah, Jingan na ne un, a chi a. Huan, nungjuite lakah kuamahin a kiangah, Kua na hia? chiin a dong ngam kei uh, Toupa ahi chih a thei ngal ua.
Huan, Jesu a hongpaia, tanghou a la a, a kiang uah a pia a, ngasate leng huchi bangmahin a pe sam a.
Huai tuh Jesu misi laka kipana a thohnawn nunga, a nungjuite kianga a kilak a thum veina ahi.

Huan, jingan a nek khit un, Jesun, Simon Peter kiangah, Simon, Johan tapa, nang hiaite sangin kei non it jaw hia? a chi a. Aman a kiangah, He, Toupa, kon it chih na thei hi, a chi a. Aman a kiangah, He, Toupa, kon it chih na thei hi, a chi a, Aman a kiangah, Ka belamnoute vak in, a chi a.
Huan, a nihveina din, a kiangah, Simon, Johan tapa, nang kei non it hia? a chi nawna. Aman a kiangah, He, Toupa, kon it chih na thei hi, a chi nawna. Aman a kiang ah, Ka belamte chingin, a chi a.

Huan, a thumveina din a kiangah, Simon, Johan tapa, nang kei non it hia? a chi a. Huan, thumveina a, Nang kei non it hia? a kianga a chih jiakin Peter a lungkhama, a kiangah, Toupa, bangkim na theia, kon it ahi, chih na thei hi, a chi a, Jesun a kiangah, Ka belamte vak in.

Chihtaktakin, chihtaktakin kon hilh ahi, na naupan laiin na taiah na kigaka, na utna peuhah na hoh a; himahleh, na upat hun chiangin na khut na jak dinga, mi dangin a hon gak sak ding uh, na ut louhna lam ah a honkai ding uh, a chi a.
Huai thu tuh bangchidana siin ahia Pathian a pahtawi ding chih theihsakna dinga a gen ahi. Huan, huai a gen khitin, a kiangah, Honjui in, a chi a.
Huan, Peter a kiheia, Jesun nungjui a itpa, nitakan nek laia a awm ngaia hongawn phei a, a mansakpa ding kua pen ahia? chipan, a honjui a mu a.
Huan, Peterin amah a muh takin, Jesu kiangah, Toupa, hiai min bang a hih dia? a chi a.
Jesun a kiangah, Ka hongnawn tana om nilouh din houh deih leng, huai nang bang lunghimoh zenzen? Nang honjui mai in, a chi a.

Huchiin, huai nungjuipa tuh si lou dingin a thu unaute lakah a thangta a; himahleh, Jesun a si kei ding chih a kiangah a gen ngal keia, Ka hong nawn tana om nilouh din houh deih leng huai nang bang lunghimoh zenzen? a chi lel ahi ngala.
Huai nungjui tuh hiai thu theisakpa leh gelhpa ahi; huan a thu theihsak a dik chih I thei uhi.
Huan, hiaite lou Jesu thilhih a dang tampi a om lai; huaite gelh siang vek ding hi leh, laibu gelh ding tengteng khovel ah leng tain ka gingta kei hi.
Theophil, tumaa lai ah, Jesu thilhih leh a thuhilh pattung tengteng thu ka gelh ahi;
Kha Siangthou panpiha a sawltak telte kianga thu achiam khita vana pi touha a om ni tana thu.
Huai sawltakte kiangah gimna a thuak nungin theihna juaulou tampiin a kimusaka, ni sawmli hial a kiang uah a kilaka, Pathian gam thu a gen gen hi.
Huan, a om khawm uh a kithuahpih sama, Jerusalem khua paisan kei un, Pa thilchiam ka gen na jak uh na ngak un, a chi chiltela.
Johanin tuiin a baptis jela, himahleh, ni sawt lou chikin Kha Siangthoua baptisin na om ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, amau, a hongkikhop un, a kiangah, Toupa, tuin hia Israelte kianga gam na piak nawn ding? a chi ua, a dong uh.
Huan, aman, a kiang uah, Pain a hun leh a ni amah thuthu a om dia a seh, nou na theih ding ahi kei.

Abangabang hileh, Kha Siangthou na tung ua a hongtun chiangin thilhihtheihna na nei ding uh; huchiin, Jerusalem khua khawngah, Judia leh Samari gam khua tengah, kawlmong phain leng ka thu theihpihte na hi ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a gen khitin a muh laipi un, vana pi touhin a oma, huan, meiin a muh phak louh uah a pi touta hi.
Huan, a pai touh laia vanlam a et nilouh lai un, ngai in, mi nih, puan ngou silhin, a kiang uah a hongding ua;
huai miten, Galili gama mite aw, bangdia vanlam en a ding? Hiai Jesu na kiang ua kipana vana pi touha om, vana a pai tou na muh mahbang un amah mah a hongkik nawn ding, a chi ua.
Huan, Olive tang a chih ua kipat Jerusalem khua ah a kik nawnta uh hi; huai tang tuh Jerusalem kho kiang ahi a, Khawlni a hohna hun lel ahi.

Huan, a lut un, a omna dantan tungnung uah a paitou ua- Peter leh Johan toh, Jakob leh Andru toh, Philip leh Thoma toh Bartholomai leh Matthai toh, Alphai tapa Jakob leh, Simon Zelot Pawla leh, Jakob tapa Juda toh ahi uh.
Huaite tengteng numei kuate hiam leh Jesu nu Mari toh, Jesu unaute toh, lungsim munkhata, phatuamngai taka thumin a om nilouh ua.
Huan, huai niin unaute lakah Peter a ding a (a vek un ja leh sawmnih khawng ahi uh, )
Unaute aw, Kha Siangthouin, David kama, Jesu mante makai Juda thu a genkholh laisiangthou thu a hong tung ding him ahi a.
Amah jaw i laka simtel ahi a, hiai nasepna ah tan leng a nei sam ngala.
(Huan, huai miin a khelhna manin mun khat a leia, a khupin a kia a, a laiah a a puakkhama, a gil tengteng a pawt vek a.
Huan, huai thu tuh Jerusalem khua a omte tengtengin a naja ua; huchiin, huai mun tuh, amau pauin, Akeldama, a chi ua, huai tuh, Sisan Mun, chihna ahi.
Sam bu ah hiai thu gelh ahi. A omna hihgamin om heh, a sungah kuamah om kei heh, chih leh, A heutu hihna mi dangin tang heh, chih.
Huchiin, Toupa Jesu i lak ua lut jel pawt jela a om sung tenga
Johan baptisma nung siah, i lak ua kipan vana pi touha a om ni tan-hiai honkithuahpihpihte laka mi khat a thohnawnna hontheihpih dingin a om ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, mi nih a sepkhia ua, khat tuh Joseph Barsaba a chih uh, (a min dang Justa a chih uh) huan khat tuh Mathia ahi.
Huan, a thum ua, Nang Toupa, mihing tengteng lungtang thei, hiai nihte akua jaw ahia na tel honhilhin,
Judain amah omna apai dingin hiai nasepna leh sawltakna a kiaksan a sika dingin, a chi ua.
Huan, ai a sansak ua, a aisan u tuh Mathia tungah a tu a; huchiin, amah sawltak sawmlekhatte laka sim tel a hita.
Huan, Pentikost ni a hongtunin, a vek un mun khat ah a omkhawm ua.
Huan, thakhatin van akipn ging huihpi nung bangin a hongom guih a. Huan, huaiin a tutna in uh a hihdim vekta a,
huan, leite, amah leh amaha kihawmin, mei bangin a kiang uah a hongkilakta a.
Huan, a tunguah a tuang chiata, a vek un Kha Siangthouin a dimta uh, Khain a pausak bangjelin pau dangin a hongpauta uh.
Huan, van nuaia nam chih lak akipan Pathian limsak Judate Jerusalem khua ah a tam ua.
Huan, huai ging a jak tak un mipi a hongkikhawm ua, mi chihin a pau uh amau pau chiatin a honjak jiak un a lungsim un a hongbuai ua.
Huan, a vek un a mangbang ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uhi, Endih uh, hiaia pau tengteng Galili gama mi ahi kei ua hia?
Bangchin ahia i vek ua i pau pianpih banga i jak chiat?
Khenkhat Parthai nam, Medai nam, Elamitai nam; khenkhat Mesopotamia gama om, Judia gama om, Kapadosia gama om, Pento gama om, Asia gama om,
Phrugia gama om, Pamphulia gama om, Aigupta gama om, Kurini kho kiang khawnga Libua gama om i hi ua; khenkhat Rome kho khual Judate leh a phungkaite utoh I hi ua;
Khenkhat Krit tuikulha leh Arab gama i hi ngal ua; himahleh, Pathian thilhih thupite a gen uh eimau pau chiatin i za ngala! a chi ua.
Huan, a vek un lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a khiakna a theikei uhi. Hiai bangchidan ahia? a chi ua.
Khenkhatin a nuihsan ua, Uain thak a kham ua hi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, Peter tuh sawmlekhatte toh ding khawmin, aman aw ngaih takin a kiang uah a gen a, nou Judi agama mite aw, nou Jerusalem khua a om tengteng aw, hiai thei unla, ka thu leng ngai un,
Hiaite na gin bang un a kham kei uh, vaihomsanlai khawng ahi.
Hiaite jawlnei Joelin a gen ahi jaw.

Pathianin, Ni nanungte ah hichi ahi ding, mi tengteng tungah ka kha ka buak dinga; huchiin, na tapate, na tanute un ka thu a hilh ding uh; na tangvalte un kilaknate a mu ding ua, na putekte un mang a nei ding uh.
Ahi, huai ni khawngin ka sikhapate, ka sikhanute tungah leng ka Kha ka buak dinga, ka thu a hilh ding uh.
Huan, tunglam van ah thillamdang nuailam lei ah chiamtehna ka musak dinga; sisan, mei, meikhu hu toh:
Ni mial a suak dinga, kha sisan a suak ding, Toupa ni thupitak leh minthang tak a hongtun main.
Huan, hichi ahi dinga, kuapeuh Toupa min lou tuh a bit ding uh, a chi, a chih.
Nou Israel mite aw, hiai thu ja un: Nazaret Jesu, Pathianin amah zangin na lak uah thil thupite, thillamdangte, chiamtehnate a hihin a hontheichiansak hi; nou ngeiin tuate na thei ngal ua.
Huai mi Pathian vaihawm tel leh theihkholh bangin a mansak ua, nou migiloute khutin kros ah na kilhden ua, na hihlumta uh.
Huai mi, Pathianin sihna gaknate a phelsak, a kaithouta a; amah sihna letden vual a hihlouh jiakin.
Huan, Davidin a thu a gen a, Ka maah chiklai peuhin Toupa ka mu gige a. Ka mangbat louhna dingin ka taklam ah a om ahi;
Huaijiakin ka lungtang a nuama, ka lei leng a kipaka, ka sa lamen takin a om behlap lai hi.
Misi khua ah ka kha na nuse kei dinga, muatna na mi siangthou na musak sam kei ding hi.
Nangman hinna lamte nontheisaka; nangman na melin kipakin na honhih dim ding, chiin.
Unaute aw, chi khahpa David thu lau louin na kiang uah ka gen thei hi; amah jaw a si a, vui leng a vui khin ua, a han leng tutanin i kiangah a om lailai hi.
Amah tuh jawlnei ahi a, Pathianin a khala mi kuahiam a tutphah tungah a tusak ding chih kichiamin a gen chih a theia;
huchiin, huai tuh a theihkholh him jiakin Kris thohnawn ding thu a gen ahi, Misi khuaa nutsiatin a om keia, a luangin leng muat a mu sam kei hi, chiin.
Huai Jesu tuh Pathianin a kaithou nawnta ngeia, huai a theite i vek un i hi uh.
Pathian khut taklam ah pahtawiin a oma, Kha Siangthou chiam Pa kianga kipanin a mu a, na muh uh leh na jak uh a honbuak ahi.
David jaw van ah a kah tou kei, amah ngeiin. Jehovahin ka Toupa kiangah, Ka taklam ah tu kinken in.
Na melmate na khepek ngakna dia ka bawl masiah, a chi, a chi jaw hi.
Huchiin, Jesu, na kilhden mah uh, Pathianin Toupa leh Kris hi khawm in a bawlta chih, Israel nam chihin kichiantakin thei u heh, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a jak un a lungtang ua sut bang a honghita ua, Peter leh sawltak dangte kiangah, Unaute aw, bangchibangin ka hihta ding ua? a chi ua.
Huan, Peterin, a kiang uah, Na khelhnate uh ngaihdamna dingin lungsim khek unla, Jesu Kris minin baptisma tang chiat un; huchiin, Kha Siangthou piak na tan ding uh.
A chiam tuh nou ading leng, na tate uh ding leng, gamlapia mi tengteng ading leng, Toupa i Pathianin a kianga a sap peuhmate ading ahi, a chi a.
Huan, thudang tampiin a hilhchiana; Tulai khangthak thulimloute lakah kihumbit un, chiin a hasuana.
Huan, a thu jui peuhin baptisma a tang ua, huai niin mi sang thum khawng behlapin a om uh.
Huan, sawltakte hilhin, kithuahin, tanghou balkhamin, thumin phatuamngai takin a om nilouhlouh uhi.
Huan, mi chihin a lauta ua: sawltakten thillamdang leh chiamtehna tampi a hih ua.
Huan, a gingta peuhmahin bangkim a kikop khawm uh.
a goute uh, a thilneihte uh a juak ua, a deihdong ching lel chiatin a vek ua kiangah a hawm jel uhi.
Huan, niteng lungsim munkhatin Pathian biakin ah phatuamngai takin a om jeljel ua, a in lam uahte leng tanghou balkhamin, nuam leh lungkimin, a an uh a ne jel ua,
Pathian a phat ua, mi tengteng kipahlamin a om uh. Huan, a hotdam lel peuhmah Toupan nitengin a kiang uah a behlap sak jel a hi
Huan, Peter leh Johan, dak kuana ah, thum hun laiin, Pathian biakin a lut dingin a hohtou ua.
Huan, piching kuahiam a pian tung apat khebai a honjawng ua, huai mi tuh, biakina lutte kianga khutdoh dingin, biakin kongkhak, Kilawm, a chih bul uah ni tengin a lumsak jel uhi.
Huaiin Peter leh Johan Pathian biakina lut ding a mu a, khut a doha.
Huan, Peterin amah a en gigea, Johan inleng; huan, Peterin, Hon en in, a chi a.
Huan, aman a lak ua banghiam muh a lamena, a en a.
Himahleh, Peterin, Dangka leh dangkaeng bangmah ka neikei; himahleh ka neih sun ka honpe ding, Nazaret Jesu Kris minin khein paita in, a chi a.
Huan, a khut taklam a lena, a kaithouta a; huan, thakhatin a khete leh a siakmit guhte a honghat pahta hi.
Huan, amah tuh a tawm tou a, a dinga, khein a pai pan ahi. Huan, khea paipai leh, diang diang leh, Pathian phat kawmkawmin biakin ah a lut hi.
Huan, khea a pai leh Pathian a phat mi tengtengin a mu ua;
Biakin Kongkhak Kilawm bula khutdoha tu jel pa ahi chih a thei ua; a tunga thiltung lamdang a sa mahmah ua, a buai ngial uhi.
Huan, aman Peter leh Johan a let laiin, mi tengtengin lamdang a sa mahmah ua, inlim Solomona a chih uah a kiang uah a hongtai khawm ua.
Huan, Peterin huai a muhin, mite a houpiha, Nou Israel mite aw, hiaite bangdia lamdang sa? Koumau thilhihtheihna leh Pathian ka limsak jiak ua amah ka paisak bang jen ua bangachia honen gige?
Abraham te, Isaak te, Jakob te Pathian, i pipute Pathianin, a Sikha Jesu a pahtawita ahi; amah na mansak ua, Pilatin khah a tupin leng a maah na ut kei uh.
Mi Siangthou leh Dik na deih kei ua, tualthatpa na kiang ua piak na ngen zota ua.
Hinna Siampa tuh na that ua; himahleh Pathianin amah misi laka pat a kaithou nawna; huai theihpihte ka hi uhi.
Huan, amah min gin jiakin a minin hiai mi na muh uh leh na theih uh a hihhatta uhi; ahi, amah jiaka ginna a hongomin na vek ua mitmuhin a hihdam vilvelta ahi.
Himahleh, unaute aw, na heutute un leng a hai jiak ua a hih bang un, na hai jiak un hiai khawng na hih uh ahi chih ka thei.
Himahleh, Pathianin, jawlnei tengteng kamin, a Krisin gim a thuak ding thu a theikholsak hi, huchibangin a tungsak zota ahi.
Huaijiakin na khelhna te uh thaimang ahih theihna dingin lungsim khek unla, kihei nawn un, huchiin Toupa kiang apat halh hun khawng a hongtung thei dinga.
Kris Jesu, nou adia a seh mahleng, a honsawl thei ding;
Ahihhangin, bangkim bawlhoih hun a hongtun masiah vanin amah a kem tadih ding ahi; huai bawlhoih ding thu tuh Pathianin leilung pian tunga kipana a jawlnei siangthou omte kama a gen khit ahi.
Mosi ngeiin, Toupa Pathianin keimah a honbawl bangin na unaute lakah jawlnei khat a honbawlsak ding; aman thu tengteng na kiang ua a gen peuh na ngaihkhiak sak ding uh;
huan, mi kuapeuh, huai jawlnei thu ngaihkhiak sak lou tuh, mi lak akipana hihmangthang ahi ding uh, a chih.
Ahi, Samuel om akipan jawlnei tengteng, a nung ua mite toh, thugen peuhten, tulai tanchin a genkhol sam uhi.
Noute jawlneite leh thukhun tate nei ve ua; Pathianin, Abraham kiangah, Na suante jiakin khovela nam chih a navak ding uh, chiin, na pipute uh kiangah achiam hi.
Pathianin a Sikha a sehna, na khelhnate uh kiheisan sak dinga vualjawlsak dingin noumau kiangah a honsawl masapen ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Peter leh Johanin mite kianga thu a gen lai un, siampute, biakin heutute leh Saddukaihon a kiang uah a hongtung guih ua,
mi a hilh uh leh Jesu jiaka misi laka kipan thohnawnna thu a hilh jiak un a lungkimkei hial ua.
Huan, a man ua, nitaklam a hih jiakin a jing phain suangkulh ah a khumta uh.
Himahleh, thu ngaikhete akhen tampiten a ging ua; a tamlam uh tuh piching ngen leng sang nga khawng a ching uh hi.
Huan, a jingin a heutute uh, upate, laigelhmite,
siampu lianpen Ana te, Kaiapha te, Johan te, Aleksandar te, Siampu Lianpen chia tengtengte leng Jerusalem khua ah a om khawm ua.
Huan, Peter leh Johan a laiah a dingsak ua, Bang hihtheih nain ahia kua minin ahia hiai khawng na hih uh? a chi ua, a dong ua.
Huchiin, Peter Kha Siangthouin a dima, a kiang uah, Mi tengteng heutute aw, upate aw,
mi hatlou hihhoih thu ah, Hiai mi bangjiakin ahia a hongdam tak? chiin tuniin na honsalh u leh, nou tengtengin thei un,
Israel mi tengtengin leng thei heh, kros a Nazaret Jesu Kris na kilhden uh, Pathianin misi lak apanin a kaithou nawna, amah min ngeiin hiai mi hiaiah na ma uah damin a dingta ahi.
Nou in lamte aw, na suang paih uh, a ninga, suang phatuampen a honghita, amah ahi.
Mi dang kuamah kiangah hotdamna a om kei, van nuaia, mihing sak lakah, hon hondam ding min dang himhim a om kei, a chi a.
Huan, Peter leh Johan hansandan a muh un, laisiamlou mi leh namtom maimai ahi uh chih a theih un, lamdang a sa mahmah ua; Jesu kiangah a om khin uh chih a theita uhi.
Huan, mi a hihdam uh a kiang ua ding a muh un, bangmah a gense thei tuankei uhi.
Huchiin, a vaihawmna ua pata a pai tuam sak nungun, a kihou ua,
Hiai mite bangchiin i hih dia? Thillamdang minthang a hih uh Jerusalem khua a om tengtengin tel takin a theita uh; en leng i sel thei tuan kei hi.
Himahleh, mi kianga a than semsem louhna ding un tunung siah kuamah kiangah hiai mina thu a gen louhna ding un I vau ding uh, a chi ua.
Huchiin, amau a sam ua, Jesu mina thugen hetlouh ding leh hilh hetlouh ding, a chi chiltel ua.
Himahleh, Peter leh Johanin, a kiang uah, Pathian mitmuhin Pathian thu man sangin noumau thu man a dik jaw hia ngaihtuah un.
Kou jaw ka thil muh uh leh ka jakte uh gen louin ka om theikei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, amau tuh a vau semsem ua, a khahta uh, mipi jiakin gawtna lemtang a mu kei uhi; a thilhih jiak un mi tengtengin Pathian a pahtawi ngal ua.
Thil lamdanga a hihdam uh kum sawmli sanga tamjaw hial ahi ngala.
Huan, Peter leh Johan a pawt un amau lawmte kiangah a vahoh ua, siampu lalte leh upaten a kiang ua a gen peuh uh a hilh vek ua.
Huchiin, a ngaikheten a kituakin aw ngaihtakin Pathian kiangah, Toupa, nang tuh van te, lei te, tuipi te, a sunga omte tengteng Bawlpa na hi;
Nang Kha siangthouin, ka pu uh na sikha David kamin, hiai thu na gen ahi: Jentelte bangchin eita a heh uh? Nam chihin bangchin ahia thil phatuam lou a ngaihtuah uh?
Khovel kumpipate a ding ua, heutute leng a kikhawm ua, Toupa leh a Kris kalhin, chiin.
Hiai khua ah na Sikha Siangthou, na thaunilh Jesu tungah, Herod leh Pontia Pilat toh, Jentelte leh Israel mite toh a kikhawmta uhi.
Na khut leh na lungsima hongtung dinga na sehkholh peuh hih dingin.
Huchiin, tunah, Toupa, a honvau dan uh ngaiin; na sikhate kiangah na thu hangsantaka gen theihna pia in,
damsak dinga na khut na jaka, na sikha Jesu mina chiamtehnate leh thillamdangte hih a hih laiin, a chi ua.
Huan, a thum khit un a omkhawmna uh a honglinga, a vek un Kha Siangthouin a hongdim ua, hangtakin Pathian thu a hilhta uh.
Huan, a gingta mipite lungsim munkhat leh ngaihtuah munkhatin a om ua: a lak ua khatin leng a sumneih, keia tuam ahi, a chi kei; thil tengteng a kikop zo jel uhi.
Huan, sawltakten thilhihtheihna thupi takin Toupa Jesu thohnawn thu a hilhhilh ua; a vek ua tungah hehpihna thupitak a om hi.
Huan, a lak uah leng tasam kuamah a om kei uh; gam khawng, in khawng nei peuhin a juak ua, a thil khotte uh a man a hontawi ua, sawltakte khe bul ah a koih jel uh;
a deihdong ching hun chiatin a hawm chiat jel uhi.

Kupra tuikulh mi ahi a, a gam neih a juaka, a man a hontawia, sawltakte khe bulah a koihta.
Himahleh, mi khat a min Anania, a ji Sapphira toh a om ua; Ananiain a neih uh a juaka, a ji theihin a man a khen a imta a;
huan, a khen a hontawia, sawltakte khebul ah a koih a.

A om laiteng nanga ahi gige ka hia? na juak nungin leng na thuthuin a om ka hia? bangachia hiai thute na lungtanga ngaihtuah? Mihing khem na hi kei, Pathian khem na hi jaw, a chi a.
Huan, Ananiain huai thu a jak takin a puka, a sita a; huan, a za peuhin a lau mahmahta uh.

Huan, Peterin a kiangah, bangachia Toupa Kha zeet dinga kithutuak na hi ua? Ngaiin, kongkhak bul ah na pasal vuite khepek a hongomta, nang leng a honjawng khe ding uh, a chi a.

Mi dang bel kuamah a lak uah a pang ngamta kei uh; himahleh, min amaute a phat ngal ua.
Huan, a gingthak hon numei leh pasal tampi takin Toupa kiangah a honbehlap tuantuan uh.
Huchiin mi damloute leng kongzing khawngah a lumsak ua, Peter pai kawma a lim bekin a lak ua khat bek a liah theihna ding in, a chi ua.
Huan, Jerusalem kho kim khua akipan mipite leng huai damloute dawi nin hihgimte honpiin a hongkhawm ua; huaite leng a hongdam chiatta uh.
Huan, siampu lianpen leh a lawmte tengteng a hongkisa ua, (huai a lawmte tuh Saddukai pawl ahi uh) a haza mahmah ua.
Sawltakte a man ua, vantang khumna ah a khumta uhi.
Himahleh, janin Toupa angel khatin kongkhakte a honhonga, a pikhia a.
Pathian biakin ah vading unla, mi kiangah hiai hinna thute vagen un, a chi a.

Huan, huai thu a jak un khovak hun laiin, Pathian biakin ah a valut ua, thu a vahilhta uh. Himahleh, Siampu Lian leh a lawmte a hong ua, vaihawmte leh Israel suante upate tengteng a sam khawm ua, sawltakte hon pi sak dingin suangkulh ah mi a sawl uhi.
Himahleh, upate a vahoh ua, suangkulh ah lah amau a mu kei ua; huchiin a kik nawn uh.
Suangkulh bit tak a kikhakin, a vengte leng kongkhak bulah dingin a mu ngal ua, himahleh, ka hong ua, a sungah kuamah ka mu sam kei ua, chiin a gen ua.
Huan, Pathian biakin upa leh siampu lalten, huai thute a jak un, Hiai bang, bangchi phetin a thang de aw? chiin, a thu ah a mang uh a bang petpeta.
Huan, mi khat a honga, a kiang uah, Ngai un, suang kulha na mi khumte un Pathian biakina dingin mi a hilh uh, ka chi! chiin a honggen a.
Huchiin upa tuh upate toh a vahoh ua vantang a kihtak jiak un, hiamgamna om louin a honpi ua, huchi hikei leh suanga den ahi kha ding uh.
Huan, a honpi tun tak un, vaihawmmite maah a dingsak ua. Huan, siampu lianpenin, a kiang uah,
Huai minin thu hilh louh ding ka honchita ua; thei un, na thuhilh un Jerusalem khua a hihdim vekta uh, hiai mipa sisan honkhuksak tum nei ve ua, chiin a sal a.
Himahleh, Peter leh sawltakten, Mihing thu sangin Pathian thu i man a kiphamohjaw hi.
Nou singah Jesu khaikangin na hihlumua, i pipute Pathianin a kaithou nawnta ahi.
Amah mah tuh Pathianin Kumpipa leh Hondampa a om dingin a taklam ah a hihlianta a, Israelte khelhna pan kiheisak ding leh ngaidam dingin.
Huai thute kou a theihpihte ka hi ua; Kha Siangthou, Pathianin a thu jui peuhte kianga a piak tak, a theipa ahi nawn lai, a chi ua, a dawng ua.
Huan, amau, huai thu a jak un a sin uh a thak mahmaha, hihlup a tumta uh.
Himahleh, vaihawmte lakah, a min Gamaliel, Pharisai, Dantheimi, mi tengteng laka minthangpi mi khat a dinga, tua mite khah takdih ding thu a pia a.
Huan, vaihawmte kiangah, Nou Israel mite aw, hiai mite tunga na thilhih tup uh pilvang un.

Tumalamin leng, Theuda, mi lian kichiin, a hongoma, huai mipa kiangah mi tampi, za li phial, a na awn ua, amah tuh hihlupin a omta a; a thu jui peuhmah a vek un a dalhjakta uh, bangmah a hita kei uhi.
Huai mi om nungin min gelh laiin, Galili gama mi huai Juda a hongom nawna; a lamah mi khenkhat a hip nawna; himahleh amah leng a sita a, a thu jui peuhmah tuh a vek un a dalhjakta uh.
Huai jiakin tuin ka honhilh ahi, hiai mite khoih kei unla, amau om omin omsak un; hiai a thiltup uh leh a thilhih uh mihing akipan ahihleh a mang ding;
ahihhangin Pathian akipan ahihleh amau na hihmang theikei ding uh; huchilouin jaw Pathian dou na nahi zenzen kha ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, a gen tuh lem a sata ua; huchiin, sawltakte tuh a sam ua, a vua ua; a vuak khit un, Jesu mina thu gen louh ding chi bikbekin a khahta uh.
Huchiin, vaihawmte laka kipan a pawtkhia ua, tua Min jiaka daina thuak taka she ahihjiak un a kipak mahmah uhi.
Huan, nitengin Pathian biakin ah leh amau in khawng bangah, Jesu tuh Kris ahi, chiin, thuhilh leh gen a tawp tuan kei uhi.
Huan, huai laia, nungjuite a pun a pun lai un, a niteng thil hawm uah amau meithaite a limsaklouh nak jiak un Hebrute tungah Grik-Judate a phunta ua.
Huan, sawm leh nihten nungjui mipite a sam ua, Pathian thugen tawpsana, dohkana nektak ka bawl uh a hoih kei ding hi.
Huaijiakin, unaute aw, na lak uah Kha leh pilna dim mi minhoih ngen sagih tel un, amau hiai thil gel dingin ka bawl ding uh;
kou tuh thum leh thu nasemin ka om nawn zo ngitnget ding uh, a chi ua.

Huai thuin mi tengteng a kipaksaka; huchiin ginna leh Kha Siangthoua dim Stephen toh, Philip toh, Prokora toh Nikanor toh, Timon toh, Parmena toh, Judate phungkai Antiokei khua a mi Nikola toh a tel ua;
Tua mite sawltakte maah a dingsak ua: huan, amau a thum ua, a tunguah a khut uh a koih uh.
Huan, Pathian thu a hongdalha; Jerusalem khua ah nungjuite a pungta mahmah uhi; siampute lakah leng mi tampi ginna lam a hongngata uhi.
Huan, Stephen hehpihna leh thilhihtheihnain a dima, mi lakah thillamdang leh chiamtehna thupipi a hih jela.
Himahleh, Sal Suakte, Kurini khua te, Aleksandria khua te kikhopna a chih ua mi khenkhat leh, Silisia gama te; Asia gama te kikhopna a mi khenkhatte a hongkisa ua, Stephen a hong kiselpih ua.
Himahleh, a pilna leh a genpihpa Kha tuh a selkhe theikei uhi.
Huan, mi bang a golh ua; huai mitten tuh, Mosi leh Pathian a gensiat ka ja uh, a chi ua.
Huan, mite, upate leh laigelhmite a hasuan ua, Stephen a sual ua, a man ua, vaihawmte kiangah a pi uhi;
huan, theihpih takloute a bawl un, huaiten tuh, Hiai min hiai In Siangthou leh Dan a gense gige hi;
Hiai Nazareth Jesun hiai In a hihse dia, Mosiin honpiak dante a hihlamdang ding chih, a gen ka ja uh, a chi ua.
Huan, vaihawmte tengtengin Stephen a ensal chiat ua, a mel tuh angel mel bangin a mu uh.
Huan, siampu lianpenin, Hiai thute a dik ahi na hia? a chi a.
Huan, Stephenin, Unaute aw, pate aw, ngai un. I pu Abraham, Haran khua a a om ma a, Mesopotamia gama a om laiin, Thupina Pathian tuh a kiangah a hongkilaka, a kiangah,
Na kholam leh na chite lak akipan pawt inla, gam ka honetsak ding lamah hongpai in, a chi a.
Huan, amah tuh Kaldaite gam akipan a paikhia a, Haran khua ah a vaomta hi; huan, a pa a sih nungin huai akipanin hiai tua na omna kholam uah Pathianin a pemlut sak hi.
Huan, hiaiah jaw bangmah mun luah ding, a khe ngakna tham leng, a pe keia; himahleh, amah leh a nunga a suante phaa gou dingin piak achiama, ta a neih ma nangawnin.
Huan, Pathianin hichibangin a gen; A suante mi kholam ah kum za li a tam ding uh, min sikhain a bawl ding ua, a sawi behlap ding uh.
Huan, Pathianin, Sikhaa nei dingte nam keiman ka honngaihtuah dinga, huan, huai khit chiangin a hongpawt ding ua, hiai mun ah ka na a sem ding uh, a chi behlap hi.
Huan, Pathianin a kiangah tua zeksum thu a khung hi; huchiin, Abrahamin Isaak a honneia, a ni giat niin a zek a suma, huan, Isaakin Jakob a neia; huan Jakobin chisuang ding sawmlehnihte a honnei hi.
Huan, tua chisuang dingten Joseph a haja ua, Aigupta gam lamah a juak ua; himahleh Pathian a kiangah a om a,

a gimthuak tengteng ah a honkhe jela, Aigupta gam kumpipa Pharo leng a hehpih saka, mi piltak ahi chih a theisak behlap hi; huchiin, aman Aigupta gam leh a ina mi tengteng tungah gamukpain a bawlta hi.
Huan, Aigupta leh Kanan gam tengteng ah tam a hongtunga, gimthuakna thupitak a hongtungta hi; I piputen nekding himhim a muta kai ua.
Himahleh, Jakobin Aigupta gamah buh a om chih a jak takin i pipute a sawlkhia a; tua bel a hohpat tungna pen uh hiven.
Huan, a nihvei hohna uah, Joseph a unaute a kitheisakta a, huan, Joseph chite tuh Pharo kiangah a kitheisakta uhi.
Huan, Josephin a pa Jakob leh a unau tengteng a samsaka; amau tuh sawmsagih leh nga ahi uh.
Huchiin, Jakob tuh Aigupta gamah a hohsuk a; huan, amah leh i pipute a sita ua,
Sikem khua ah a jawng tung ua, Abrahamin Sikem khua a Emmor tapate laka dangka suma a lei han ah a vuita hi.
Huan, Pathianin Abraham kianga thu achiam a tun hun a hongtun dingin mite tuh Aigupta gamah a hongpung ua, a hongtam deuhdeuhta ua;
Joseph theilou kumpipa dang a hongom masiah.
Huai miin i chite a zekhema, i pipute a sawia, a naungekte uh hinglou dingin a paikhe saksaka.
Huai laiin Mosi a hongpianga, Pathian muhin a mel a hoih mahmaha; a pa in ah kha thun a vak ua;
huan, a paihkhiak un Pharo tanuin a la a, amah ta dingin a khoita hi.
Huan, Mosi tuh Aigupta gama mite pilna tengteng a hilh ua, a thu ah leh a thilhih ah a thupi mahmah hi.
Huan, amah tuh kum sawmli a chin kuan laiin, a unau, Israel suante, veh a tuma.
Huan, a lak ua mi khat hihgim thuak lai a mu a, a hona, hihgim thuakpa tuh a phu a laksaka, Aigupta mi tuh a hihlumta hi.
Mosiin amah khutin Pathianin amaute a hondam chih a unauten theina uhiam a sa a, himahleh a theikei hial uhi.
Huan, a jingin a lak ua mi nih a kilai un a kiang uh a hong tunga, Pute aw, unau nei ve ua; bangdia diklou taka kibawl na hi ua? chiin, lep a tum a.
Himahleh, a invengpa tunga thugilou bawl zopan Mosi tuh a sawn hanga, Kou tungah heutu leh vaihawm dingin kuan a honbawla?
Jana Aigupta mi na hihlup banga, honhihlup tum na hi maw? a chi a.
Huan, huai thu jiakin Mosi a tai mangta a, Midian gamah a tam nilouhta hi, huaiah tapa nih a vanei hi.
Huan, kum sawmli a chin nungin Sinai Tang gamdai ah; loubuk ah mei kuang lakah, angel khat a kiangah a hongkilaka.
Huan, Mosiin a muhin a thil muh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah; huan en dinga a vakuan laiin, Toupa awin,
Kei na pipute Pathian ka hi, Abraham Pathian, Isaak Pathian, Jakob Pathian, a nachi a. Huchiin, Mosi a linga, a en ngamta kei hi.
Huan, Toupan a kiangah, Na khepek akipan na khedap phelin; na dinna mun lei siangthou ahi.
Aigupta gama om ka mite gimdan ka mu gige hi, a thum uh leng ka za gige, amau honkhe dingin ka hongsuk ding hi. Hongin, Aigupta gamah ka honsawl ding, a chi a.
Huai, Mosi, Heutu, leh vaihawm dingin kuan a honbawla, chia a huat uh, loubuka angel a kianga kilakin a huha, Pathianin amah mah heutu leh honkhepa hikhawm dingin a sawlta hi.
Aman Aigupta gam bangah, Tuipi San bangah, gamdai bangah, kum sawmli sungin thillamdang leh chiamtehnate a musak phot a, amaute a pikheta ahi.
Israel suante kiangah, Pathianin keimah a honbawl bangin, na unaute lakah mi jawlnei khat a honbawlsak ding, chipa ahi, huai Mosi tuh.
Huai mi tuh gamdaia saptuamte laka ompa, Sinai Tanga angelin a houpihpa leh, i pipute kianga ompa ahi; huai mi tuh honpiak sawn dinga thu hingte khawng lapa amah ahi.
I piputen amah thu a mang nuam kei ua, a hua ua, Aron kiangah,
I makai dingin pathiante honbawlsakin; Aigupta gam akipan a honpi khepa hiai Mosi lah, a tanchin ka thei nawnta kei ua, chiin, a lungtang uh Aigupta gam lam ah a nga nawnta a.
Huan, huai laiin bawngnou lim a bawl ua, a lim tuh gan gouin a bia ua, amau khutsuak tungah a nuamta uhi.

Huchiin, Pathianin a lehngatsana, vana aksi khawng chibai a buk theihna ding un amaute a tawpsanta hi; jawlnei laibu a, Israel chite aw, gamdai ah kum sawmli sungin sa leh gan gohin kei non bia ua eita?
Molok puanin leh na pathian uh Remphan aksi mah leng, chibai buk dinga a limn a bawlte uh, na zong zo nak ua; huaijiakin, Babulon kho khenlam ah kon pi mang ding, chih gelh bangin.
A lim a muh banga bawl dinga Mosi hilhpan a seh bangin, i piputen huai gamdai ah theihsakna puanin a nei ua.
Huai mah tuh i pipute suan nawnten leng a nei sawn jel ua, Pathian in i pipute maa Jentel a delhkhiakte gam a luah lai un, Joshua lut laiin a lutpih ua; David hongom tannin huaiah a om gigeta hi.
Huai David tuh Pathian mitmuhin deihsak takin a oma, Jakob Pathian adingin omna bawlsak a ngen hi.
Himahleh, Solomonin huai in tuh a lamsak zota hi.
Himahleh, Tungnungpen tuh khuta bawl in peuh ah a om kei hi; jawlneiin.
Toupan, Van ka tutphah ahi, lei ka khepek ngakna ahi: in bangchibang in non lamsak ding ua? Ka khawlna mun leng bang ahia?
Keimah khutin hiai thil bangkim ka bawl kei ahia? a chi, chi a, a gen bangin.
Mi genhakte, lungtang leh bila zeksumlouhte aw, chiklaipeuhin Kha Siangthou na dal gige uh; na pipute uh hih bangbangin na hih nilouhlouh uh.
Na pipute un jawlneite lakah kua ahia a sawi louh uh? Mi Diktak hongding thugen khawlte a hihlum ua; huai Mi Taktak tuh mansakte leh thatte noumu tuin na hi uhi.
Dan, angelte piak sawn, mu masa a jui loute aw, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a jak un a sin uh a thakta a, Stephen tungah a ha uh a gawita uhi.
Himahleh, amah tuh Kha Siangthou dim ahia, vanlam a ena, Pathian thupidan leh Pathian taklama Jesu ding a mu a;
Ngai un, van kihong ka mu a, Pathian taklam Mihing Tapa ding leng ka mu, a chi a.
Huchiin, amau tuh aw ngaihtakin a kikou ua, a bil uh a hum ua,
Kituaktakin a pang ua, khua akipan a delhkhia ua, suangin a deng ua, a theihpihten tangval khat a min Saula khe bul ah a puante uh a koih khawm chiat uh.
Huchiin, Stephenin, Toupa Jesu, ka kha la in, chia Toupa a sap laiin suangin a deng lumlum ua.
Huan, a khukdin a, aw ngaihtakin a kikoua, Toupa, hiai a khelha uh a tunguah moh posak ken, a chi a, Huan, huai thu a gen zoh takin, a ihmuta a. Saulain leng a sih tuh hoih a sa hi.
Huan, huai niin Jerusalem khua a saptuam omte khawng, min nak pitakin a sawi panta ua; huchiin, sawltakte kia loungal Judia leh Samari gam kho tengah a dalhjakta vek uhi.
Huan, Pathian limsak kuate hiamin Stephen a vui ua, nakpi takin a kah uh.
Saulain bel saptuam pawlte a sawia, in tengah a luta, numei pasal a kaikhia a, suangkulh ah a khum hi.
Huan, a dalhjakte kho teng ah a paita ua, thu tuh a gen jel uh.
Huan, Samari khua ah Philip a hohsuk a, a kiang uah Kris thu a tangkoupih hi.
Huan, a thillamdang hihte a jak ua, a muh un, mipiten lungsim mun khatin, Philip thugente a limsakta uhi.
Banghanghiam i chih leh, dawininte mi tampi a matte sung ua kipanin aw ngaihtaka kikou in a pawt ua; jaw leh khebai tampi hihdamin a om uhi.
Huchiin tua khopi ah nakpitaka kipahna a om hi.
Huan, mi khat a min Simon a oma; aman, Mi lian ka hi, chiin, tumalamin huai khua ah mitkhialdawiin Samari khuaa mite lamdang sa takin a bawl nilouhlouha.
Mi tengtengin, tagahpen akipan lalpen tanin, Hiai mi Pathian thilhihtheihna thupi a chih uh, ahi tham, chiin, a thu a limsak chiat ua.
A mitkhialdawiin sawtpi lamdang sa taka a bawl nak jiakin a thu a limsak uhi.
Himahleh, amau tuh Pathian gam tanchin hoih leh Jesu Kris min tanchin hoih Philip gen a gintak un, anumei apasalin baptisma a tangta ua.
Huan, Simon nangawnin leng a gingtata a, huan, baptisma a tan zohin Philip kiangah a omgige a, chiamtehna leh thillamdang thuipite a mu a, lamdang a sa thei mahmah.
Huan, sawltak Jerusalem khuaa omten Samari khuaa mitten Pathian Thu a gingta ta uh chih a jak un, a kiang uah Peter leh Johan a sawl ua;
huai mite tuh a vatun suk uleh Kha Siangthou a muh theihna ding un a thumsak ua.
Huai main a lak uah kuamah tungah a tung nai kei; Toupa minin baptisma a tang phet uh ahi.
Huan, sawltakten a tunguah a khut uh a koih ua, Kha Siangthou a muta uhi.
Huan, sawltakte khut koih jiaka Kha Siangthou piak ahi chih Simonin a muhin.
Hichibang thuneihna honpe sam un, kua tung peuh aleng khut ka koihnain Kha Siangthou a muh samna dingin, chiin, a kiang uah dangka piak a tum hi.
Himahleh Peterin a kiangah, Na dangka nang toh mang heh, Pathian thilpiak dangka suma lei na tup jiakin.
Hiai thu ah nang jaw na pang kei, tan leng na neikei hi; na lungtang Pathian ngaihin a dikkei ahi.
Huaijiakin, hiai na gitlouhna tawp san inla, Toupa kiangah thumin, huchiin na lungtanga na ngaihtuah a honngaidam kha moh ding hiam.
Thil khakna sinkha ah leh gitlouh gaklopna ah na om chih ka thei hi, a chi a.
Huan, Simonin, Na thil gen uh bangmah ka tunga hongtun louhna dingin noumauin Toupa kiangah honthumsak un, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huchiin, amau Toupa thu a theihsak ua, a gen zoh nung un. Samari gama mite kho tampi kianga Tanchin Hoih a gen jel in, Jerusalem khua ah a pai nawn uh hi.
Huan, Toupa angel khatin Philip a houpiha, Thou inla, simlama Jerusalem khua akipana Gaza kho sunsuk lampi huai gamdai ah hoh in, a chi a.
Huchiin, a thou a, a paita. Huan, ngaiin, Ethiopia gama mi khat, Ethiopia kumpipa Kanda nuaia mi chilgeh laltak, a gou tengteng kempa, Jerusalem khua ah Pathian be dingin a hoh tou a,
a pai lamin a kangtalaia tu kawmin jawlnei Isai laibu a simsim hi.
Huan, Khain, Philip kiangah, Huai kangtalai vanaih inla, vakithuahpih in, a chi a.
Huan, Philip tuh mi chilgeh kiangah a vataia, jawlnei Isai laibu a sim a ja a, Na sim a omdan na thei hia? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Kuamah honhilhchet louhin bangchin ka thei dia? a chi a. Huan, a kianga tu paisuak dingin Philip tuh achialta a.
Huan, laisiangthou a sim lai tuh hiai ahi: Gohding belam bangin amah a pi ua; Belamnou a mulmetpa ma a a daidinden bangin aman leng a kam a ka kei;
A vuallelh laiin a tungah thu gen a phal kei uh; a suante tanchin kuan a hongen ding ua? khovel akipanin a hinna a laksak ngal ua, chiin.
Huan, mi chilgehin, Philip a houpiha, a kiangah, Jawlneiin hiai thu khawng kua thu a genna ahia, amah thu hia, midang thu? ka hondong ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Philipin a gena, huai laisiangthou thu abul ah panin, a kiangah Jesu thu a hilh a.
Huan, lampia a pai kawm un tui banghiam a tung ua; huan, mi chilgeh in, Endih, hiaiah tui a om, baptisma tanna ding bangin a hondal khola ahia? a chi a.
Huan, Philipin, Na lungtang tengtenga na gintak leh, na hi thei, a chi a. Huan, amah a dawnga, Jesu Kris tuh Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta, a chi a.
Huan, kangtalai a khawlsak ua, a nih un, Philip leh mi chilgeh, tui ah a hoh khawm suk ua; huan, Philipin amah a baptista hi.
Huan, tui apat a pai touh tak un Toupa Khain Philip tuh a la mangta hi; huan, mi chilgehin amah a mu nawnta kei, nuamsa takin a paita jel hi.
Himahleh, Philip tuh Azota khua ah muhin a om nawnta hi; huan, a pai suak a, Kaisaria khua a tun masiah kho tengah Tanchin Hoih a gen jeljel hi.
Saulain bel Toupa nungjuite a vau thu leh thah a tup thu a se khe nalailai hi.

Siampu Lianpen kiangah a hoha, Damaska khua a kikhopna in tengtenga mite kianga piak dingin lai a ngena, Lama mi kuapeuh a muh leh, numei leng, pasal leng, Jerusalem khuaa hensa a a honpi theihna dingin.
Huan, a pai lain, Damaska khua a tun kuanin, thakhatin van akipan vak a kimah a hongvak puapa.
Huan, lei ah a puka a kiangah, Saula, Saula, Bangachia nang honsawi na hia? Chiin, aw a ja a.
Huan, aman, Toupa, kua na hia? a chi a. Huan, Toupan, Jesu, na sawi ka hi;
himahleh, thou inla, khopi ah lut in, huchiin na hihding hilhin na om ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, a kianga paite pau theihloin a ding ua, aw jaw a zana ua, himahleh kuamah a mu kei uhi.
Huan, lei akipanin Saula a thou a; huan, a honghaka bangmah a mu theita keia; huchiin a khutin a kai ua, Damaska khua ah apilut uh hi.
Huan, ni thum kho mu louin a oma, bangmah a dawnin a ne kei hi.
Huan, Damaska khua ah a min Anania nungjui khat a om. Huan, Toupan mengmu bangin a kiangah, Anania, a chi a.
Huan, aman, En in, Toupa, hiaiah ka om, a chi a. Huan, Toupan a kiangah, Thou inla, kongzing Tang a chih uah hoh inla, Juda in ah, Tarsa khuaa mi, a min Suala, kankhia in;
ngaiin, a thum laitak ahi; a min Anania mi khat luta, a mit hihvak dingin a tungah khut koihin a muta hi, a chi a.
Huan, Ananiain, Toupa huai mi Jerusalem khua a na mi siangthoute tunga a tatsiat thu mi tampi kam ah ka ja a.
Huan, hiaiah leng na min lou peuhmah henna dingin siampu lalte kianga kipanin thu a mu a, a chi a, a dawng a.
Himahleh, Toupan a kiangah, Hoh mai in; Jentelte, kumpipate, Israel suante kianga ka min puaklutna dia ka bel-she ahi;
Ka min jiakin gimna bangchia thupi ahia a thuak ding a kiangah ka theisak ding ahi, a chi a.

Huan, Anania tuh avahoha, in ah a luta, huan, a tungah a khut a koiha, Unau Saula, na mit vakna ding leh, Kha Siangthou dima na om theihna dingin, Toupa, na hongna lampia na kianga kilak Jesuin, a honsawl ahi, a chi a.
Huan, thakhatin a mit akipan lip bang a keta a, a mit a vak nawnta hi; huan, a thou a, baptisma a tangta hi.
Huan, an a ne a, a halhta hi. Huan, Damaska khuaa nungjui omte kiangah ni bangjah hiam khawng a oma.
Kikhopna in khawngah Jesu tuh Pathian Tapa a hihdan thu a tangkoupih pah ngala.
Huan, a thu zate tengtengin lamdang a sa mahmah ua, Hiai mi Jerusalem khua ahiai min loute sawi jelpa ahi ka hia? Huai mite siampu lalte kianga hensa a pi, a hongna pen ahi, a chi ua.
Saula bel a honghat diaka, huai mi tuh Kris ahi taktak chih a hilhchiana, Damaska khuaa Juda omte khawng gending beiin a koih hilhial hi.
Huan, ni sawttak nungin Saula hihlum dingin Judate a kihou ua;
Himahleh, aman a thutup uh a na theia. Huan, hihlum dingin kulh kong tengah a sun a janin a tang uh.
Himahleh, a nungzuiten amah a pi ua, janin kulh tohlet ah bawmin a khaikheta uhi.
Huan, Saula Jerusalem khua a tun takin nungjuite kithuahpih a tuma; amau bel avek un amah a kihta uhi, nungjui a hih sam a ging kei uh.
Barnabain amah a pi a, sawltakte kiangah a honpaipiha, lampia Toupa a muha, a houpihdan bang, Damaska khua a Jesu mina hangtaka thu a hilh dan bang leng a kiang uah a genta a.
Huchiin, Saula tuh Jerusalem khua ah a kiang uah lut jel pawt jelin a omta hi, Toupa minin hangtakin thu a gen jel a.
Huan Grik-Judate kiangah thu a gena, a sela; amau bel amah hihlup a tum uhi.
Huan, unauten huai a theih tak un, Kaisari khua ah a pi suk ua, Tarsa khua ah a sawl mangta uh.

Huchiin, saptuamte tuh Judia gam kimah, Galili gam kimah, Samari gam kimah a kip deuhdeuh ua, muangtakin a omta uhi; huan, Toupa laudan siamin, Kha Siangthou khamuanin, a om ua, a hongpung deuhdeuh uhi.
Huan, Peterin khokim a tot vialvial kawmin, Lidda khua a mi siangthou omte kiangah leng a hoh suk a.
Huaiah mi khat a min Ainisi a jawt jiaka kum giat lupna a lum nilouh a mu a.
Huan Peterin a kiangah, Ainisi aw, Jesu Krisin a honhihdam, thou inla, na awngphah jial in, a chi a. Huchiin, a thou pahta ngala.
Huan, Lidda khua leh Saron phaia omte tengtengin Ainisi a mu ua, Toupa lam a nga duam uhi.
Huan, Joppa khua ah a min Tabitha nungjui khat a oma, (Tabitha omdan tuh Dorka ahi); huai numeiin thilhih hoih leh thilpiak a hau mahmah hi.
Huan, huai lain, a chi a na a, a sita a; huan, a silsiang ua, indan tungnung ah a lumsak ua.
Huan, Lidda khua tuh Joppa khokiang ahihjiakin, nungjuiten Peter huaiah a om chih a ja ua, sawt hal louin ka kiang uah hongpai in, chia vathum dingin a kiangah mi nih a sawl ua.
Huan, Peter a thou a, a kiang uah a paita hi. Huan, a tun takin indan tungnung ah a pi ua; meithai tengteng dingin Dorka a kiang ua a om laia a puannak bawlte a puan bawlte lak kawmin a kap chiat ua.
Himahleh, Peterin a vek un a pawtsaka, a khukdina, a thumta hi; huan, luang lam a nga a, Tabitha, thou in, a chi a. Huchiin, a mit a honghaka, Peter a muh takin a tu touta a.
Huan, Peterin a khut a pia a, a kaithouta a; huan, mi siangthoute leh meithaite a sama, damin a peta hi.
Huan, huai tuh Joppa khua tengtengin a thei vek ua; mi tampiin Toupa a gingta uh.
Huan, Joppa khuaah savun bawlpa Simon in ah ni tampi tak Peter a tam nilouh a.
Huan, Kaisaria khua ah mi khat a min Kornelia a om a; Itali pawl a chih uh, huai pawla sepaih zaheutupa ahi a,
Pathian limsakmi ahi a, a inkuanpihte tengteng toh Pathian laudan a siam uhi, mite kiangah thil tampi a pe jela, Pathian kiangah leng a thum gige hi.
Hiai miin sun dak kuana khawng dingin manglam bangin chiantakin Pathian angel khat a kianga luta, Kornelia, chiin, a mu a.
Huan, Korneliain amah a naen kilkela, a lau a, Toupa, bang ahia? a chi a. Huan, aman, a kiangah, Na thumnate leh na thilpiak thute theih gigena dingin Pathian maah a tungtouta.
Tunah Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, mi khat Simon Peter a chih uh, va pi sak in;
savun bawlpa Simon kiangah a tunga, a in tuipi geiah a om, a chi a.
Huan, angel a houpihpa a pai takin, Korneliain a sikhate laka mi nih leh a nek bawl gigete laka Pathian limsak sepaih khat a sam a,
huan, thu tengteng a kiang ua a hilh khitin Joppa khua ah a sawlta hi.
Huan, a jinga a pai lai un, kho kiang a tun kuan un, Peter tuh thum dingin, dak gukna khawngin, in tungah a kahtou a;
Huan, a gil a hongkiala, annek a utta a; himahleh nekding a bawl lai un mengmu bangin a hongom a.
Huan, van kihongin, banghiam bawm, puan liantak bang, a ning lia khiha, lei a luai khiain a mu a.
Huai sungah leitunga khelinei chi chih leh, gamsa leh, ganhing bokvak, tungleng vasa chi chihte a om ua.
Huan, a kiangah awin, Peter, thou inla gou inla, ne in, a honchi a.
Himahleh, Peterin, Toupa hi lou e; sianglou leh nin bangmah himhim ka ne ngeikei, a chi a.
Huan awin, a nihveinain, Pathianin a hihsiangthousa nang sianglou chi ken, a chi a.
Huchi bang ngenin thumvei a hongoma; huan, bawm tuh vana khaitouhin a om nawnta hi.
Huan, Peterin mengmu banga a muh theisiamlou a, a buai lain, Kornelia mi sawlten Simon in a nakankheta ua.
Kongkhak bulah a nading ua, a sam ua, Simon, Peter a chih uh, huaia a tun leh tun louh a nadong uhi.
Huan, Peterin mengmu banga a muh a ngaihtuah lain, Khain a kiangah, Ngai in, mi thumin a hongzong uh.
