Huchiin, thou inla, kum inla, bangmah ginglel louin amau jui in; amau ka sawl ahi uh, a chi a.
Huchiin Peter tuh huai mite kiangah a hoh sukta a, a kiang uah, Ngai un na zon uh ka hi; bang ahia na hongna uh? chi a.

Huan, amau, Angel siangthou khatin, Kornelia sepaih zaheutupa, mi diktak, Pathian laudansiam, Juda nam tengteng laka mi hoih kiangah, na thugen a jakna din, a in ah nangmah sam dingin, a hih hi, a chi ua.
Huchiin mite tuh a sam luta, a giaksakta hi. Huan, a jingin Peter a thou a, a kiang uah a paia, Joppa khuaa mi unau kuate hiam leng a kiang uah a pai sam uhi.
Huan, a jing nawnin Kaisaria khua ah a lutta ua. Huan, Korneliain, a sanggamte leh a lawm deihpente samkhawmin, amau a na ngak nilouh a.
Huan, Peter a honglut dek laitakin Korneliain a nadawna, a khebula khupbohin, Pathian chibai buk bangin a buk a.
Himahleh, Peterin amah a kaithou a, ding in, kei leng mihing ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, a kiangah thu gen kawmin a luta, mi tampi omkhawm a vamu hi.
Huan, a kiang uah, Juda mi nam dang toh kithuah leh pai a sianlouh dan noun a thei ua; himahleh, kuamah sianglou leh nin ka chih ding ahi kei chih Pathianin a hontheisak ahi.
Huaijiakin na hongsap takin sellouin ka hongpai ahi. Huchiin ka hondong ahi, bangdia honsam na hi ua le? a chi a.
Huan, Korneliain, Ni li ahita, tu hun bangtanin, ka in ah, dak kuana hun thumna ah ka thuma; huan, ngai in, puan vaktak silhin mi khat ka maah a hong dinga,
Kornelia, na thumna jakin a omta, mi kianga na thilpiakte leng Pathianin a theigige hi.
Huaijiakin, Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, Peter a chih uh, na kiangah samin; amah tuh tuipi gei ah savun bawlpa Simon ina tungahi, a chi a.
Huaijiakin na kiangah mi ka honsawl pah ahi; na hong a hoih ahi. Huchiin Toupan thu a honpiak peuhmah thei dingin tun ah Pathian mitmuhin i vek un hiaiah i om hi, a chi a.
Huan, Peterin a gena, Pathianin mi deihsak tuam a neikei chih, diktakin ka thei hi;
ahihhangin, nam chih lakah kuapeuh amah kihtakdansiama, diktaka gamta peuhmah, a pahtak mi ahi naknak uhi.
Aman tuh khamuanna Tanchin Hoih Jesu Kris kama genin, Israel suante kiangah thu a khaka (Jesu tuh mi tengteng Toupa ahi a),
Johanin a tangkou pihpih baptisma nungin, thu, Galili gam akipan a hongthang pana, Judia gam tengteng ah a thangsuaka, noumau leng na thei uhi;

Nazaret Jesu tungtang thu, huchia Pathianin amah Kha Siangthou leh thilhihtheihna a a vuh dan, amah tuh mi tunga hih hoih leh diabol gawt tengteng hihdamin a vialvak vaka, Pathian a kianga a om jiakin.
Judate gamah leh Jerusalem khua a a thilhih tengteng theihpih te ka hi uhi, amah lah sing dawnah khaiin a hihlumta ua.
Pathianin nithum niin a kaithou nawna, chiantakin a kitheisak hi,
ahihhangin mi tengteng kiangah ahi keia, Pathianin theihpih dia a seh kholhte kiang kia ah ahi koute, misi lak akipan a thohnawn nunga a kianga nea dawnte kiangah.
Amah tuh misi leh mihingte tunga Vaihawmpa dia Pathian seh ahi chih, mi kianga tangkoupih leh theisak dingin Pathianin thu a honpia hi.
Kuapeuhmah amah gingta tuh a min jiakin khelhnate ngaihdamin a om ding uh chih hiai a tanchin tuh jawlnei tengtengin a natheihsaksak uh ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Peterin huai thu a gen laitakin thu zate tengteng tungah Kha Siangthou a hongtungta hi.
Huan, Zeksumte laka a gingtate Peter honjui peuhmahin Kha Siangthou piak Jentelte tungah leng buak ahih jiakin lamdang a sa mahmah uhi.
Pau theihlouha thu genin Pathian phatin a za ngal ua.
Huan, Peterin a phuanga, hiai mite, eimah banga Kha Siangthou tang sam, baptis nadingin tuizat kuaman a kham thei dia hia? a chi a.
Huchiin, Jesu Kris mina baptisma tan ding thu a pia a. Huan khitin ni bangzah hiam tam dingin a khou uh.
Huan, Judia agama sawltak leh unau omten Jentelten leng Pathian thu a gingta uh chih a zata ua.
Huchiin, Peter tuh Jerusalem khua a tun touh takin, Zeksumten a kiangah,
Zeksumloute in ah na luta, a kiang uah nane viala, a chi ua, a kalhta ua.
Himahleh, Peterin a bul akipanin kizom jelin a kiang uah a hilhchian a:
Joppa khua ah thumin ka oma, huan, mengmu bangin ka oma, banghiam bawm puan liantak banga ningli a khiha, van akipana khiak suk bangin ka mu a; ka kiang ngeingei ahongtunga.
Huai tuh ka en kilkela, ka ngaihtuah a, leia gan kheli neite, gamsate, ganhingte leh tungleng vasate ka mu a.
Huan, awin, Peter, thou inla; gou inla; ne in, honchiin, ka ja a.
Himahleh, ken, Toupa, hi lou e, sianglou leh nin bangmah himhim ka kam ah a lut ngeikei, ka chi a.
Himahleh, van akipanin awin, a nihveinain, Pathian in a hihsiangthousa nang sianglou chi ken, chiin a hondawnga.
Huchibang ngenin thumvei a hongoma: huan, bangkim van ah khaitouh in a om nawnta hi.
Huan, ngai in, mi thum Kaisari khua akipan ka kiangah a honsawl ua, ka omna in mai uah a nading nilouh ua.
Huan, Khain kuamah khentuam neiloua amau jui dingin a honsawl hi. Hiai unau guk inleng a honjui sam ua, mi in ah ka lut ua.
Huan, aman ka kiang uah, a ina angel ding a muhdan leh, angelin a kianga, Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, Peter a chih uh, honpi sak in;
aman thu a honhilh dinga, huai mi thuin nang leh na inkuanpihte hotdamin na om ding uh, a chihdan leng a honhilh hi.
Huan, thu ka gen tungin, Kha Siangthou ka tunguah a hongtungta.
Huan, Toupa thu, Johanin tuiin a baptis jel; ahihhangin nou jaw Kha Siangthoua baptisin na hongom ding uh, a chihdante, ka hontheikhe nawnta a.
Huchiin Toupa Jesu Kris I gintak ua, Pathianin thilthawnpiak a honpiak bang, a kiang ua a piak sam nung tuh, kei soplai Pathian sel vual ka hi hia? a chi a.
Huai thu a jak un a daita ua, huchi ahihleh Pathianin Jentelte leng hing dinga kisik phalta ahi ngei vo oi, chiin, Pathian a phatta ua.
Huan, Stephen jiaka a sawi uh dalhte, Phinisi gam bang, Kupra tuikulh bang, Antiok khua bang phain a pai ua, Judate kiang kia ah loungal kuamah kiangah thu a gen kei uhi.
Himahleh, a lak ua akhen tuh Kupra tuikulh leh Kurini khua a mite ahi ua, huai mitten Antiok khua a tun un Grikte leng a houpih ua, Toupa Jesu Tanchin Hoih a hilh samta uhi.
Huan, Toupa khutin amaute a panpiha; mi tampiin a gingta ua, Toupa lam a hongnga chiatta uhi.
Huan, a tanchin thu uh Jerusalem khuaa saptuam omte bil ah a lutta a: huchiin Antiok kho phain Barnaba a sawlkhia ua.
Huan, amah a vatunga, Pathian hehpihdan a muhin a kipak mahmah hi, phatuamngai takin Toupa tuh len gige dingin a vek un a hasuanta hi.
Barnaba tuh mi hoihtak ahia, Kha Siangthou leh ginnaa dim ahi. Huan, mi tampiin Toupa kiangah a beh, lapta uhi.
Huan, Barnaba tuh Saula zong dingin Tarsa khua ah a hoha, huan, a muhin Antiok khua ah a honpi a.
Huan, kum khat hilhial saptuamte kikhopna ah a pang jel ua, mi tampi leng thu a hilh uhi. Antiok khua ah ahi, nungjuite, Kristian, a chih masak pen uh.
Huan, huai lain jawlnei kuahiam Jerusalem khua akipanin Antiok khua ah a hoh suka.
Huan, a lak ua mi khat, a min Agaba, a dinga, khovel tengteng ah tam thupitak a tung dek chih Kha hilhin a theisaka; huai tam tuh Klaudia lal lain a hongomta.
Huchiin nungjuiten, a theihdan chiat un, Judia gama unau omte kiangah panpihna khak a tum ua;
huai tuh a hihta ngei uhi, Barnaba leh Saula khut ah upate kiangah a khakta uh.
Huan, huai lai khawngin Kumpipa Herodin saptuamte laka kuate hiam hihgim tumin a khut a likta a.
Huan, Jakob, Johan unau, temsauin a sat lum hi.
Huaiin Judate a kipaksak chih a theihin, Peter leng mat a tum jel a. (Huai nite tuh tanghou silngou sohlouh ni ahi).
Huan, a mat nungin suangkulh ah a khuma, sepaih pawl li, li chiat jelin, a ven khel saka; Paikan Ankuanglui nungin mi tengteng kiangah pi khiak a tum a.
Huaijiakin Peter tuh suangkulh ah a omsak tadih hi; himahleh, saptuamten amah a dingin phatuamngaitakin Pathian kiangah a thumsak sak uh.
Huan, Herodin a pi khiak dingin, huai jan takin Peter tuh sepaih nih kikalah khainiang nih bunin a ihmu a; a vengte leng kongkhak bul ah a om uhi, suangkulh a veng uh.
Huan, ngai in, Toupa angel khat a kiangah a hong dinga, suangkulh sungah vak a hongtangta a; huan, Peter nak ah a beng halha, Thou meng in, a chi a. Huan, a khainiangte a khut akipan a ke suk a.
Huan angelin a kiangah, na puan silh inla, na khetuam bun in, a chi a. Huan aman huchibangin a hih a. Huan, angelin, a kiangah, na puan silh hoih inla, honjui in, a chi a.
Huan, Peter a pawta, a juita a, a ngel tatdan a tak a hih a theikeia, mengmu banga a muh ahia eita a chi a.
Huan, chingmi masa leh a zom a khen nung un khopi lutna sik kongpi a vatung ua, huai tuh amau adingin a kihong tawmta a; huan, a pawt ua, kongzing khat a kheng ua; huah, angelin a paisan pahta hi.
Huan, Peter a halh takin, Toupan a angel a sawlkhia a, Herod khut leh Juda mite lametna teng teng akipanin a honhumhingta chih tuin diktakin ka theita, a chi a.
Huan, a kingaihtuah khitin, Johan, Marka a chih uh, huai nu Mari in ah a vahoh a; huaiah tuh thumin mi tampi a naom khawm ua.
Huan, kongpi kongkhak a kiuh takin, a min, Roda, nungak khat a dawng dingin a va hoha.
Huan, Peter aw a jak takin, a kipah jiakin kong hong louin a tailut nawn zosopta a, kongkhak bul ah Peter a ding chih a vagen a.
Himahleh, amau, a kiangah, hai neita ve, a nachi ua. Aman bel, hi petmah ahi, chiin, a pang teitei a. Huan, amau a angel hiin teh, a chi ua.
Himahleh, Peterin a kiukiu a; huan, a hon uleh, amah a mu ua, lamdang a sa mahmah uh.

Huchiin, aman a daihna ding un, khutin a japa, Pathianin suangkulh akipan amah a pikhiak dan khawng a hilhta a. Huan, hiai thute Jakob leh unaute kiangah vahilh un, a chi a. Huan, a pawta, mun dangah a vapai a.
Huan, ni a suah takin, sepaihte tuh Peter koia om ahia, chiin buai chihtakin a buai uhi.
Huan, Herodin a zonga, a mu keia, a chingte a enchiana, thah dingin thu a peta ahi. Huan, Judi agama kipan Kaisari khua ah a hoh suka, huaiah a om nilouh hi.

Huan, Tura leh Sidon khuaa mite tungah a lunghikei mahmaha, huan, amau, Blasta, kumpipa lupna ngakpa, a jawlin a bawl ua, thu khat satin a kiangah a hongpai ua, a kho lamte uh kumpipa kholama pukto jel ahih jiak un kituahna a ngen ua.
Huan, a ni chiam niin kumpipa Herodin kumpipa puan a silha, a kiang uah thu a gena.
Huan, mi tengtengin, Pathian ahi, mihing aw ahi kei, a chi ua, a kikou ua.
Huan, aman Pathian kianga pahtawina a piak louh jiakin Toupa angelin amah a man pah ngala, hutin ane a, a sita hi.
Pathian thu bel a dalha, a pung jela.
Huan, Barnaba leh Sualain na a sep khit un, Jerusalem khua akipan a kik nawnta ua, Johan, Marka a chih uh, a tonpih uh.

Huan, Antiok khuaa saptuam omte lakah jawlnei kuate hiam leh, thuhilhmi kuate hiam a om ua; huaite tuh Barnaba bang, Sumeon Niger a chih bang uh, Kurini khuaa mi Lusia bang, kumpipa Herod unau ding Manaen bang, Saula bang ahi uh.
Huan, Toupa na a sem ua, an a ngawl lai un, Kha Siangthouin, Barnaba leh Saula amaute ka sehna hih dingin honhih khensak un, a chi a.
Huchiin, an a ngawl ua, a thum khit un a tunguah a khut uh a koih ua, a paisakta uh.
Huchiin, Kha Siangthou sawlkhiak in a pai ua, Seliusia khua ah a hoh suk ua, huai akipanin Kupra tuikulh ah longin a pai uh.
Huan, Salami khuaa a om lai un Judate kikhopna in ah Pathian thu a gen ua; Johan leng a nek uh bawl dingin a pi ua.
Huan, tuikulh tuh Papho khua phain a nawk suak ua, bumsiam, jawlnei taklou, Juda mi khat a mu ua, a min tuh Bar-Jesu ahi.
Huai mi tuh gamukpa Serjia Paulus -mi piltak kianga om ahi. Huai gamukpa Barnaba leh Saula a sama, Pathian thu jak a tum a.
Himahleha, bumsiam Elima, (Bar-Jesu min omdan ahi a); huaiin gamukpa ginlouhsak tumin, amau tuh a na khak hi.
Huchiin, Saula, Paula a chih mah uh; Kha Siangthouin a dima, amah tuh a ensala.
Nang mi khem leh huathuai chitenga dimpa, diabol tapa aw, nang diktatna teng teng melmapa aw, Toupa lam diktakte hihsiat na tawp kei ding maw?
Theiin, tuin Toupa khut na tungah a tu ahi, na mita hongto dinga, khovak na mu tadih kei ding, a chi a. Huchiin mei leh mialin amah a boh pah ngala, khuta kai ding zongin a vak a vakta hi.
Huan, gamukpan huai thilhih tuh a mu a, Toupa thuhilh tuh lamdang a sa mahmah hi, a gingtata hi.
Huan, Paula tuh a tonpihte toh Papho khua akipanin longin a pai ua, Pamphilia gama Perga khua a tung ua; huan, Johanin amau a paisana, Jerusalem khua ah a kik nawnta hi.
Himahleh, amau Perga khua akipan a pai jel ua, Pisidia gama Antiok khua a tung ua; huan, Khawlniin kikhopna in ah a lut ua, a tu ua.
Huan, Dan laibu leh jawlneite laibu a sim khit un, kikhopna in upaten a kiang uah mi a sawl ua, Unaute aw, mite hasotna thu banghiam na neih uh leh gen un, a chi ua.
Huan, Paula a dinga, khutin a japa, a gen a; Israel mite leh Pathian laudansiamte aw, ngai un.
Hiai Israel chite Pathianin I pipute a tela, Aigupta gama a tam lai un a hihthupi a, tungnung khutin huaia kipanin a pikheta.
Huan, kum sawmli khawng gamdai ah a thilhihte uh a thuak theitheia.
Huan, Kanan gama nam sagih a hihsiat khitin, a gam uh luah dingin a pe jela, kum za li leh kum sawmnga sung teng.
Huai nungin vaihawmmite a pe jela, jawlnei Samuel tannin.
Huan, huai nungin kumpipa a ngen ua; huchiin Pathianin, Saula, Kish tapa, Benjamin chia, amau a pia a, kum sawmli sung dingin.

Huan, amah a suan mang nungin a kumpipa ding ua om dingin David a bawlta a; Pathianin huai thu theihsakin, David, Jesai tapa, ka lungtang bang pu mi ka mukheta, aman ka deihlam peuh a hih ding, a chi a.
Huai suante lakah Pathianin, thuchiam bang jelin, Israelte kiangah Hondampa Jesu a hontuna;
A hongpai main Johanin kisikna baptisma thu Israel mi tengteng kiang ah a na hilh msask hi.

Huan, Johanin a lam a tot khit kuan lain, Nouten kua dingin non sep ua? Amah jaw ka hi kei. Himahleh, ngai un, ka nungah mi kuahiam khat hongpai dek ahi, kei jaw a khepeka khetuam phel tham leng ka hi kei, a chi a.
Unaute aw, Abraham suana tate aw, na lak ua Pathian laudansiamte tengteng aw, eimahte kiangah hiai hotdamna thu a honkhakkhia uhi.

Jerusalem khuaa omten a makaite utoh, amah tuh a theih louh jiak uleh, jawlneite thu, Khawlni peuhmahai a sim jel uh, a theih louh jiak un, amah tuh siamlouh tangsakin, huai thu ana hihtangtungta uh ahi.
A sihna ding khop a tungah bangmah a muh louh un leng, Pilat kiangah hihlup dingin a ngen ua.
Huan, a thu jawlneiten a gelh kholh tengteng uh a hihtangtun khit un, singa kipanin a lakhia ua, han ah a sialta uhi.
Himahleh, Pathianin misi lak akipan a kaithou nawnta a;
huan, Galili gam akipan Jerusalem khuaa amah toh hohtoute kiangah ni sawtpi tak a kilak ngitngeta; huai mite tun ah mi kianga a thu theihpihte ahi uh.
Kou leng pipute kianga chiamsa huai thuchiam a tanchin kipahhuai ka honhilh uhi;
huchia Pathianin Jesu a kaihthoh, I tate kiangah huai tuh a hihtangtung ahi; Sam nihna ah, Ka tapa na knahi a, tuniin kon suang, chih gelh bangin.
Muatna muna pai nawn lou dingin Pathianin amah misi akipan a kaihthoh dingdan thu sehsa bangin a gen, David kianga hehpihna ka chiamte nangmah ka honpe ding, chiin.
Huaijiakin Sam dangah, Na Mi Siangthou muatman na phal kei ding, a chi behlap hi.
David jaw, Pathian vaihawm sak bangin a hinpihte na a sep khitin, a ihmu a, a pipute kiangah a sial ua, a muat mangta ahi;
himahleh Pathian kaihthohin jaw muatna a mu kei hi.
Huchiin, unaute aw, thei un; amah jiakin khelhna ngaihdamna thu na kiang ua gen ahi;
kuapeuh a gingta tuh bangkim ah amah siamtan sakin a om, huaiah tuh Mosi danin siamtansakin na om theikei uh.
Huaijiakin pilvang un, huchilou in jaw jawlneite laibu a a gen uh na tunguah a hongtung ding hi,
Musitte aw, en un, lamdang sa unla, mangthang un; na damsung un na khat ka sem hi, huai na tuh, min nou honhilh mahle uh, na gingta kei hial ding uhi, chih, a chi a.
Huan, a pawtun, Khawlni nawn chianga huai thute gen nawn dingin a ngen uh.
Huan, kikhawmte tuh a kikhen tak un, Judate leh phungkaite Pathian limsak laka mi tampiin Paula leh Barnaba a jui jel ua; amau a na houpih ua, Pathian hehpihna ah om gige dingin a hasuan uh.
Huan, Khawlni nawnin, a khojang phialin Pathian thu ngaikhe dingin a hongkikhawm ua.
Himahleh, Judaten mipite a muh tak un a haza mahmah ua; Paula thugen a kalh ua, a gensia uhi.

Huan, Paula leh Barnabain hangtakin a genkhia ua, Pathian thu jaw noumaute kiangah gen masak ding him ahi; himahleh, na nial ua, khantawna hing tak loua na kisehkhit nung un, thei un, Jentelte lam ka ngata uh.
Huchibangin Toupan thu a honpia hi, Jentelte hihvakpa din ka honsep a, kawlmong pha a Hondampa dia na om theihna dingin, chih gelh bangin, a chi a.
Huan, Jentelten huai thu a jak un, a kipak ua, Pathian thu a pahtawi ua, huan, khantawna hing dinga she peuhmahin a gingta uhi.
Huan, Toupa thu tuh, huai gam khokim khovel ah a dalhta a.
Himahleh, Judaten numei zahtakhuai Pathian limsakte leh khua upahonte a hasuan ua, Paula leh Barnaba a sawisak ua, a gam ua kipan a delhkhia uh.
Huan, amau a tunguah a khepek ua leivui a singkhia ua, Ikoniam khua a tung uh.
Huan, nungjuite kipahna leh Kha Siangthouin a dim chiat uh.
Huan, Ikoniam khua ah Judate kikhopna in ah a lut tuak ua, thu a gen jel uh, huchiin Juda leh Grik tampiin leng a gingta hialta uh.
Himahleh, gingta nuamlou Judaten Jentelte lungsim a hihthou ua, unaute a hosak uh.
Huaijiakin, Toupa ah hangtaka thu genin huaiah sawt sim a om ua, aman tuh chiamtehna leh thillamdangte a khut ua hihsakin, a hehpih thu a theihsak jel hi.
Himahleh, khua a mipite a kilangta ua, a khenin Judate a gum ua, a khenin sawltakte a gum uh.
Huan, Jentelte, Judate a heutute uh toh sawltakte zahhuaitaka bawl leh suanga den tuma a hih dek laiun,
amau a na thei ua, Likaonia gam mah ah Listra leh Darbi khua ah leh, a kim gamah a tai mang ua;
huaiah Tanchin Hoih a gen jel uh.
Huan, Listra khua ah khe jaw kuahiam a tu a, a pian tung apat khebai him ahi a, khein a pai ngeikei hi.
Huai min Paula thugen a ngaikhia a; huan, Paulain a en gige a, damna dingin ginna a nei chih a theia, aw ngaihtakin, Na khein ding tang in, a chi a.
Huan, amah a tawma, khein a paita.
Huan, mipiten Paula thilhih a muh tak un, Likaonia Pauin, ngaihtakin, Pathiante mihing banga i kiang ua hongsukta uh hi e! a chi ua.
Huan, Barnaba, Jupiter, a chi ua, Paula bel, thugenpen a hihjiakin Merkuri, a chi uh.
Huan, Jupiter, siampu a biakin polama om tuh, bawngpate leh pak khigui limte tuh kongkhak kiang khawnga hontawiin, mipite toh biakna dingin oh a tumta a.
Himahleh sawltak Barnaba leh Paulain huai a jak un, a puan uh a botkek ua, mipi lakah a dianglut ua, a kikou ua.

Pute aw, hiai thilte bangdia hih na hi ua? Kou leng, noumau nuntakdan bang pu mihing ka hive ua le: hiai thil ginaloute khawng na kiheisan ua, van khawng, lei khawng, tuipi khawng, a sung ua om tengteng toh bawlpa Pathian hing kianga nong kaina ding un Tanchin Hoih kon tun uh ahi.
Huai Pathianin nidang laiin nam chih amau lam chiat zuih a phal a,
Himahleh, amah theihsakna om louin a kibawl kei hi, huchiin thil a hih hoih jela, van akipanin vuahtui khawng a honpia a, na lungtang uh nekding leh kipahnain a hihdim gige a kei hiam, a chi a.
Huan, huai thuin mipiten amaute biakna dia gan a goh ding uh a kham zou teitei hi.
Himahleh, Antiok leh Ikoniam khua a mi Juda kuate hiam huaiah a hong ua, mipite a khempukta uh; huchiin suangin Paula a deng ua, sia a gintak jiak un khua akipan a kaikheta ua.
Himahleh, nungjuite a kima a din lai un, a hongthou a, khua ah a lut nawnta hi. Huan, a jingin Barnaba toh Darbi khua ah a hohta ua.
Huan, huai khuate kiangah Tanchin Hoih a hilh ua, nungjui tampi a bawl nung un, Listra khua ah, Ikoniam khua ah, Antiok khua ah, a kiknawn jel uhi.
Gim tampi thuakin Pathian gamah i lut ding ahi him ahi, chiin, nungjuite lungsim a hihkip ua, ginna ah om gige dingin a hasuan jel uh.
Huan, saptuam pawl tengah upate a sehsak ua, anngawl kawma a thum khit un, a gin uh Toupa kiangah a kemsak jeljel uhi.
Huan, Pisidia gam a tawnsuak ua, Pamphilia gam a tung uh.
Huan, Perga khua a a thu a genkhit un Attalia khua ah a hoh suk ua;
huai akipanin longin a pawt ua, Antiok khua a hongtung nawnta ua, huai tuh a thilhih khitsa uh hih dinga unauten Pathian hehpihna kemsaka a pawtna uh ahi.
Huan, a tun nung un a saptuamte a sam khawm ua, Pathianin, amau zang a thil a hih tengteng leh, Jentelte dia ginna kongkhak a honsakdan khawng a hilh uh.
Huan, nungjuite kiangah sawt sima omte uhi.
Huan, mi kuate hiam Judia gam akipanin a hongsuk ua, Mosi dan banga zek na sum kei uleh hotdam na hi theikei ding uh, chiin, unaute a hilh ua.

Huchiin, Paula leh Barnaba amau toh kisel petmaha a kisel ua a kilan jiak un, Paula leh Barnaba amau tuh a lak ua kuate hiam toh, huai thubuai tungah, Jerusalem khua a sawltakte leh upate kiangah hohtou dingin a sep ua.
Huchiin, Saptuamten a vakha ua, amau Jentelte kihei kik nawndan thu gen jelin, Phinisi gam leh Samari gam a tawnsuakta uh; huchiin unaute tengteng a kipaksak mahmah uhi.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a tun touh uh saptuam pawlte, sawltakte, upaten a na kipahpih uh; huan, Pathianin amau zanga thil a hih tengteng khawng a gen uhi.
Himahleh, Pharisai pawl gingta sam kuate hiam a kisa ua, Jentelte zek sum ding ahi, Mosi dan zuih leng a lak uah chiam chitchiat ding ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, sawltakte leh upate, huai thu ngaihtuah dingin a kikhawm ua.
Huan, a kisel ek nung un Peter a kisa a, a kiang uah, unaute aw, Jentelten keimah kama Tanchin Hoih thu ja a gingta dinga, Pathianin nidang laia na lak ua kipana a honsehdan na thei uhi.
Huan, lungsim theipa Pathianin eite honpiak bangmahin Kha Siangthou a kiang ua pe samin a tunguah a kipak chih a theisaka;
huan, eite leh amau khentuam neilouin ginin a lungsim uh a hihsiangthou hi.
Huchiin, i pipute leh eiten I zoh louhsa hakkol tunah nungjuite tunga ngak tuma bangdia Pathian kalh na hi ua leh?
Amau gintak bangmahin eiten leng Toupa Jesu hehpihna jiaka hotdam ding hiin i kigingta ngal ua, a chi a.
Huchiin, mipi tengteng a dai dide ua, Barnaba leh Paulain Pathianin amau zanga Jentelte laka chiamtehna leh thillamdang a hih thu a gen lai siah uh a ngaikhia ua.
Huan, a gen khit un Jakobin a gen sam a,
Unaute aw, ka thu ngaikhia un, Pathianin amah min pu dingin a lak ua kipan mite lakhe dingin a lak ua kipan mite lakhe dingin Jentelte a kan tungthu Sumeonin a gen hi.
Huan, huai thu leh jawlneite thu a kituak hi:
Huai khit chiangin ka kik nawn dinga, David biakbuk chim ka bawl nawn dinga, a siatna lai ka puah tou nawn ding;
Mi dang, Jentel tengteng ka min honkikoppihten, Toupa a zonna ding un huai biakbuk tuh ka tungding, chiin.
Khovel siam chil akipan hiai thu theisakpa Toupan a chi hi, chih gelh ahi.
Huaijiakin hichiin ka sep ahi, Jentelte laka Pathian lam ngate hihgim kei lehang,
milim biakna thilnin nek khawng kingaih khawng, sa heklup leh sisan nek khawng tawpna dingin a kiang uah gelh zo lehang, ka chu pen ahi.
Mosi in nidang lai akipan kho tengah a thu tangkoupihpa a nei jela, kikhopna in peuhah Khawlni tengin a thu sim ahi jel hi, a chi a.

Huan, sawltakte, upate, saptuam tengteng toh, a pawl ua mi tel, Paula leh Barnaba kiangah Antiok khua a hohsak hoih a sa ua; a telte uh min tuh Juda (Barsaba a chih uh, ) leh Sila ahi ua, huai mite tuh unaute laka heutu deuh ahi uhi.
Huan, hichibangin a gelh ua, a khut uah a khak uh: - Sawltakte leh unaute laka upaten Antiok khua ah, Suria gamah leh Silisia gama Jentel unaute chibai a buk uh.
Ka pawl lak ua mi kuate hiamin thu genin nou a honhihbuai ua, na lungsim uh a honmangbangsak uh chih ka ja ua, a kiang uah thu bangmah ka pen gal kei ua.
Huaijiakin thu khat sata ka kikhop un, ka deihtak uh Barnaba leh Paula,
Toupa Jesu Kris min jiaka sih khawk saloute toh, mi telte na kiang ua honsawl hoih ka sa uhi.
Huchiin, Juda leh Sila ka honsawl uhi, amau leng hiai thu mah kamin a honhilh ding uh.
Kha Siangthou leh kou hiai thu poimohte chihlouhngal, puakgik tuan na tunguah bangmah nga kei le ung hoih ka sa uhi:
milim biakna sa nek khawng, sa sisan nek khawng, kingaih khawng tawp le uchin ka chi uh; hiaite na tawp uleh nou adingin a hoih ding hi. Damtakin om un, chiin.
Huchiin, a sawl un a kuan ua, Antiok khua ah a tung suk ua; huan, mipi a sam khawm ua, lai tuh a pia ua.
Huan, a simkhit un lungmuanna thu jiakin a kipak mahmahta uhi.
Huan, Juda leh Silain, jawlnei leng ahi ua, thu tampiin unaute tuh a khamuan ua, a hihkip uhi.
Huan, huaiah sawt khop a om nung un amau honsawlte kianga pain awn dingin,
unauten khamuangtakin a pawtsak nawnta uhi.
Paula leh Barnaba bel Antiok khua ah Toupa thu hilh leh genin a om nilouh ua, mi dang tampite toh.
Huan, ni bangzah hiam nungin Paulain Barnaba kiangah, Tuin hoh nawn lehang, kho tenga Toupa thu i genna peuha unau omte vaveh jel lehang la, a omdan uh va en leng, a chi a.
Huan, Barnabain Johan (Marka a chih uh) a kiang ua tonpih a tum a;
Paulain bel amah a kiang ua a tonpih uh hoih a sa keia, Pamphilia gamah amau a kiksana, nasepna a a kiang ua a hoh sam tak louh jiakin.
Huchiin, nakpiin a kiselta ua, huan, a kikhen ua, Barnabain Marka a kiangah a tonpih a, Kupra tuikulh lamah longin a hohta hi.
Paulain tuh Sila a tela, unauten Toupa hehpihna a kepsak nung un a paikheta hi.
Huan, saptuam pawlte hihkip jelin Siria leh Silisia gam a tawn suak uh.
Huan, Darbi, khua leh Listra khua ah leng a hoh a; huaiah nungjui khat a min Timothi a oma; amah tuh gingta sam Juda numei tapa ahi, a pa bel Grik ahi a;
Listra leh Ikoniam khua a unau omten amah a phat mahmah uhi.
Paula in amah tuh a kianga hoh sam dingin a deiha; huchiin huailama Juda omte jiak in a zek a sumsaka, a pa Grik ahi chih a thei vek ngal ua.
Huan, kho tenga a paikawm un Jerusalem khua a sawltak leh upa omte vaihawm jui dingin unaute kiangah a pe jel uhi.
Huchiin, ginna ah saptuam pawlte a kipta ua, nitengin a khang deuhdeuh uhi.
Huan, Kha Siangthouin Asia gama thugen a kham jiakin Phrigia leh Galatia gam a tawn suakta ua.
Huan, Missia gam kiang a tun un Bithinia gama lut a tum ua; himahleh Jesu Khain a phal kei hi.
Huchiin, Missia gam a kheng ua, Troasi khua ah a hoh sukta uhi.
Huan, janin Paulain mengmu bangin Masidonia gama mi khat dinga, Masidonia gamah hongkai inla, honghuh in, chia thumthumin a mu a.
Huan, huai mengmuhna a neih khit takin Masidonia gamah hoh ka tum pah ua, a kiang ua Tanchin Hoih gen dingin Pathianin a honsam ahi chih kichian taka theiin.
Huan, Troasi khua akipan longin ka pawt ua, tang takin Samothrasi khua ah ka pai ua, a jingin Neapoli khua ah ka pai nawn ua;
huan, huai akipanin Phillippi khua ah ka pai ua, huai khua tuh Masidonia gam a khua khat Rome khua a mi pemte khua ahia, huai uk a kho poimoh pen ahi. Huai khua ni tam sim ka tamta ua.
Huan, Khawlniin kulh kongkhak polam ah luigei ah, thumna mun hia ka gintak uah ka hoh ua; huan, ka tu ua, numei hongpai khawmte kiangah thu ka gen uhi.
Huan, a min Lidia, puansan dup juak, Thiatira khua te, Pathian bia numei khatin ka thu a ja a; huan, Paula thugen jui dingin Toupan a lungtang a hihvaksakta hi.
Huan, amah leh a inkuanpihten baptisma a tan khit un, Toupa a ginoma non seh uleh, ka in ah hongtung un, chiin, a honngen ngen a, a honkhouta a.
Huan, thumna muna ka hoh lai un, nungak kuahiam dawi aisansiam jawlin a honkituahpih a, aman tuh a aisan jiakin a pute sum tampi a muhsak jela.
Huai miin Paula leh kou a honjuia, hiai mite, hotdamna lampi nou honhilhte, Tungnungpen Pathian sikha ahi uh, chiin, a kikou a.
Huchi bangin ni tampi a hih a. Huchiin, Paula a lungkimta keia, a kiheia, dawi kiangah, Jesu Kris minin a sunga kipan pawt thu ka honpia, a chi a. Huan, huchih laitakin, a pawt pah a.
Huan, a puten a summuhna uh a mang chih a theih tak un, Paula leh Sila a man ua, heutute maah dawl munah a kailut uhi.
Huchin, vaihawmte kiangah a pi ua, hiai mite Judate ahi uh, ka khua uh a hihbuai mahmah ua;
Dan bang hiam ka kipahpih louh uh leh zuih siangloute a gengen uh, Rome khote ka hi ngal ua, a chi ua.
Huchiin, mipite leng sawltakte sual dingin a hongkisa sam ua, vaihawmten a puan khawng uh a sahkeksak ua, chianga sat dingin thu a pia uhi.
Huan, tamvei pi a sat khit un suangkulh ah a khum ua, a vengpa kiangah bittaka ven ding a chi bikbek uhi.
Huchitela thu a piak jiak un aman tuh tanna sungnungjaw ah a khuma, a khe uh singkol a bunsak hi.
Himahleh, jan lain, Pathian kiangah Paula leh Sila a thum ua, la a sa ua, hentaten a ngaikhia ua;
huan, thakhat in jin nakpitakin a honglinga, huchiin, suangkulh suangphumte tannin a ling hi; huan, kongkhak tengteng a kihong pah a, mi chih kolbutte a hongkiphel vekta hi.
Huan, a vengpa ihmu a honghalha, suangkulh kongkhakte tuh kihongin a mu a, hentate tuh taimang uh a sa a, a temsau a doka, a kihihlum dek tak hi.
Himahleh Paula aw ngaihtakin a kikou a, bangmah kichih ken, ka vek un hiaiah ka om lai ve ua oi, a chi a.
Huan, a vengpan a khawnvakte a kana, a tawmluta, laua ling kawmin Paula leh Sila maah a khupboh a;
huan, amau a pi khia a, Pute aw, hotdama om dingin bang ahia ka hih ding? a chi a.
Huan amau, Toupa Jesu ging inla, huchiin hotdamin na om ding, nang leh na inkuanpihte toh, a chi ua.
Huan, a kiangah leh a ina om tengtengte kiangah Toupa thu a gen uhi.
Huan, huai janin, huailai tak mahmahin a pia, a satna golhte uh a sil sianga; huan, amah leh a inkuanpihte tengtengin baptisma a tang pah ngal uhi.
Huan, a in ah a pitou a nekding a luia, huan, Pathian a gintak jiak un, amah, a inkuanpihte tengteng toh, a kipak mahmah uhi.
Huan, ni a suahin, vaihawmten, huai mite khahin, chiin, mi manmite a sawl ua.
Huan, suangkulh vengpan, Paula kiangah a thu uh a hilha, Vaihawmten, nou khah dingin, mi a honsawl uhi; huaijiakin tunah hongpawt unla, khamuangtakin pai un, a chi a.

Himahleh, Paulain, a kiang uah, Rome khote ka hi ngal ua, ka siamna uleh siamlouhna uh theilouin vantang mitmuhin non sat ua, suangkulh ah na honkhum ua; tunah aguka hondelhkhe dek na hi vial u maw? ahi kei hial ding; amau mahmah hong uhenla hongpikhia uheh, a chi a.
Huchiin mi manmiten huai thute tuh vaihawmte kiangah a hilh ua. Huan, Rome khua a mi ahi uh chih a jak un a lauta uhi;
huan, a vahoh ua, a khemkhem ua, a pi khia ua, khua akipan paimang dingin a ngen uhi.
Huan, suangkulh akipan a pawt ua, Lidia in ah a lut ua, a khamuan ua, a pawtta uhi.
Huan, Amphikoli khua leh Appolonia khua a kheng ua, Thessalonika khua a tungta uh, huaiah Judate kikhop in a om hi;
Huan, Paula, a dan ngeinain, a kiang uah a luta, Khawlni thumvei Laisiangthou akipanin teltaka sutpihin,

Kris tuh gimthuak ding him a hihdan khawng, misi lak akipana leng thou nawn ding him a hihdan khawng a hilhchiana, a hihlang jel hi. Hiai Jesu, a thu ka honhilh, amah Kris tuh ahi, chiin a gen behlap hi.
Huchiin, a lak ua khenkhatin a ging ua, Paula leh Sila a kithuahpihta uhi; Pathian limsak Grik mipi thupi tak leh numei makai tampi toh.
Himahleh ginglou Judaten a mullit ua; dawl mun a mi gilou thadah kuate hiam a kiang uah a tonpih ua, mipi a sam khawm ua, khua pumpi a tokbuai ua, Jason in a luh ua, vantang kianga pikhiak a tum uhi.
Huan, amau a mu kei ua, Jason leh unau ding kuate hiam kho heutute kiangah a kailut ua, a kikou ua, Khovel tokbuaite hiaiah leng a hong ua,
Jasonin a nazintun viala; hiaite tengteng tuh, A min Jesu, kumpipa dang a om chiin, Kaisar thu kalhin a om uhi, a chi ua.
Huan, mipi leh kho heututen huai thu a jak un a buaita ua.
Huan, Jason leh midangte kiang akipanin, a sik ua hen dingin bang hiam a la ua, amau tuh a khahta uhi.
Huan, unauten ajan ajanin Beria khua ah Paula leh Sila a hohsak pah uh; huailai a vatun un Judate kikhopna in ah a lut ua.
Huai mite tuh Thessalonika khuate sangin a na hoihjaw ua, huchiin lungsim kipaktakin thu a pom ua, a thugen uh a dik leh diklouh theihna dingin nitengin laisiangthou a zong jel uhi.
Huchiin, huaite mi tampiin a gingtata uhi; Grik numei zahtakhuai leh pasalte leng duaisanin a gingtata kei uhi.
Himahleh, Thessalonika khuaa Judanten, Paulain Beria khua ah Pathian thu a gen chih a jak tak un, huaiah leng a vahoh ua, mipite a hasuan gawp ua, a hihbuai nawnta uhi.
Huchiin, unauten tuipi tana hoh dingin Paula a sawlkhe pah ua, Sila leh Timothi bel huaiah a om tadih uhi.
Huan, Paula piten Anthen kha tannin a pi ua; huan, Sila leh Timothi tuh theihtawpa a kianga hongpai mengna ding thukhah puain a paita uhi.
Huan, Paulain Athen khua a amau a nangak lain, huai khua pathian lima dimin a mu a, a lungsimin a hehta a.
Huchiin, kikhopna in ah Judate leh Pathian limsakte a sel jela, dawl mun ah leng huaia naom peuhmahte tuh nitengin a sel jel hi.

Huan, Epikuria mi leh Stok mi laka mi pil kuate hiam in leng amah a hongkiselpih ua. Hiai mi tamtamin bang ahia gen a tup? a chi ua. Akhenin, Jesu thu leh Thohnawnna thu a gen jiakin gam dang pathiante thugenpa a hih tuak e, a chi ua.
Huan, amah a len ua, Areopaga ah a honpi ua, a kiangah, hiai thuhilhna thak na gengen non theisak thei diam?
Thil lamdang banghiam ka bil uah na hontun ahi; huchiin, hiai thil omdan theih ka ut uh, a chi ua.
Athente tengteng, a khua ua mikhual omte leng, a man chiang peuh un thu thak photphot genin hiam, a ngaikhe bekin hiamin a om uhi.
Huan, Areopaga laitak ah Paula a dinga, a gena, nou Athen khua a mite aw, bangkim ah sabiak limsaktak mi na hi uh chih ka thei hi.
Ka vak kawma, na chibai bukte uh ka et lain, maitam khat, a tunga, Theihlouh Pathian Ading, chia gelh, ka mu ahi. Huchiin, theiloua chibai na buk uh, huai thu tuh ka honhilh ahi.
Pathian khovel leh a sunga thil tengteng siampa, lei leh van Toupa a hihjiakin khuta lam in ah khawngpeuh a om kei hi;
thil tasam bangin mihing khuta nasep sakin leng om kei, amah mah tuh bangkim kianga hinna, hatna leh thil tengteng pepa ahi jaw hi.
Huan, leitung maikaih tengtenga om dingin bul mun khat vekin nam chih mi a siama, amau adingin hun bisehte a sehsaka, a omna gi uh leng a khunsak.
Pathian a zon ua, a mai a mai ua, a muh teiteina ding un; himahleh aman lah hongamlat kei chiat ngala.
Amah vangin i hingin i tangin, i om uh ahi ngala; Noumau laphuahsiam kuate hiamin leng, ei leng a suante i hi ngal ua, chia a gen bang un.
Huchiin, Pathian Suante i hih nung, Pathian tuh dangkaeng peuh, dangka peuh, suang peuh, mihing khutsiam leh suktuaha sekte bang hiam ahi, chih, i gingta ding ahi kei.
Huchiin, Pathianin i theihlouh laikhawng bang a kitheihmohbawla; himahleh, tunah jaw gam chiha mi tengteng kisik ding thu a peta hi, ni achiam jiakin;
huai ni chiangin Pathianin a mi seh zangin diktatnain khovel a vaihawm ding; huan a miseh tung thu tuh amah misi laka kipana kaithouin, mitengteng kiangah a theisakta hi, chiin.
Huan, misi laka kipana thohnawnna thu a jak tak un, a khenin a nuihsan ua; a khenin, hiai thu na kiangah ka ngaikhe nawn ding uh, a chi ua.
Huchiin, Paula tuh a lak ua kipan a pawtta hi.
Himahleh, mi kuate hiam amah lamah a pang chinten ua, a gingtata ua, huai laka khenkhat tuh Areopaga mi Dionisia leh, numei khat a min Damari leh, a kiang ua midangte toh ahi uh.
Huai thil zohin Athen khua akipan Paula a pawta, Korinth khua ah a hohta a.

Huan, a min Akuila, Juda khat a mu a, huai mi tuh Ponta gama piang ahi a, Klaudiain Juda tengteng Rome khua akipan pawt thu a piak jiakin a ji Priscilla toh Itali gama kipan hongtung phet ahi ua. Huan, Paula tuh huai mite kiangah a tungta hi,
huan, a nasep bang uh sem ahih jiakin amau a kikoppih a, a semkhawm uhi; a nasep uh tuh puanin bawl ahi.
Huan, Khawlni peuhin kikhopna in ah chitaktakin thu a gen jela, Judate leh Grikte thuzoh a tum jel hi.
Huan, Masidonia gam akipan Sila leh Timothi a hongsuk un, Paula tuh thugen kiain a omta hi, tua Jesu Kris tuh ahi chih Judate kiangah a hilhchian jel hi.
Himahleh, a kalh un a gensia ua, Paulain a puan a singa, a kiang uah, na sihna moh uh noumau pua un; kei jaw ka hula hi; tuban Jentelte kiangah ka pai ding, a chi a.
Huan, huai akipan a paia, a min Tita Justa mi khat in ah a lut a, huai min Pathian a be jel hi, a in leng kikhopna in toh a kizom ahi.
Huan, Krispa, kikhopna in heutuin a inkuanpihte tengteng toh Toupa a gingta a, Korinth khua a mi tampi inleng jain a gingta ua, baptisma a tangta uhi.
Huan, janin Toupan Paula kiangah mengmu bangin. Lau kenla, dai louin thu gen jel in;
Kei na kiangah ka om a kei hiam, sihna dingin kuamahin na tungah khut a kha kei ding uhi; hiai khua ah mi tampi ka nein gala, a chi a.
Huan, Paula huaiah a lak uah Pathian thu hilhin kum khat leh kha guk a omta hi.
Huan, Gallio tuh Akaia gamukpa a hih lain Judaten kituakin Paula a sual ua, vaihawmna tutphah maah a pi ua;
Huai mi phiangsanin dan lou bangin a Pathian be dingin mi a khempuk ahi, a chi ua.
Huan, Paulain a dawn dek leh, Gallioin, Judate kiangah, Judate aw, hiai khawng thil diklou thu hiam, thil hihkhelh thu hiam bek hileh, pel louin kon awlmoh dinga;
himahleh, thute, minte, noumau dante tungthu lel ahihleh jaw moumau kingaihtuah jaw un; ken jaw huchibang thu ngaihtuah ka ut kei, a chi a.
Huan, vaihawm tutphah akipanin amau a delhkheta hi.
Huan, Grik mi tengtengin kikhopnain heutu Sosotheini a man ua, vaihawm tutphah maah a vua ua. Gallioin huai a thilhih uh khawk a sa kei hi.

Huan, huai zohin Paula ni sawttak a tam nilouha; huai zohin unaute kamphain a khena, huai akipan Suria gam lam ah longin a paita, a kiangah Priscilla leh Akuilla leng a pai sam uhi, Paulain thuchiam a neih jiakin Kenkriai khua ah sam a met phot a.
Huan, Ephesa a tung ua, huaiah amau a nuseta; amahbel kikhopna in ah a lut a, Judate kiangah chitaktakin thu a gen tadih hi.
Huan, sawt deuh tam dingin a khou ua, himahleh a kiawi kei,
Pathianin a phal leh na kiang uah ka hong nawn ding, chiin, kampha in a khena, Ephesa khua akipan longin a paita.
Huan, Kaisaria khua ah a hongkaia, Jerusalem khua ah a hohtou a, saptuamte chibai a buka; huai khitin Antiok khua ah a hohsukta hi.
Huan, huaia sawt ngial a om nungin a pai nawna, nungjuite tengteng hihkipin Galatia gam leh Phrigia gam a tawnsuak vek hi.
Huan, Juda khat, a min Apollo, Aleksandria khua a piang, mi piltak, Ephesa khua ah a hohsuka; aman laisiangthou a nak theih mahmah a.
Huai mi tuh Toupa Lampi thu zilsa ahia, lungsima phatuamngaitak a hih jiakin Jesu a hilh jel hi, Johan baptisma thu kia a thei lel a.
Huan, kikhopna in ah hangtakin thu a gen panta a. Huchiin Priskilla leh Akuilain a thugen a jak un, a in uah a kiangah Pathian Lampi thu kichian semin a hilhchianta uhi.
Huan, aman Akai agama paikai a tup takin unauten a hasuan ua, amah a nakipahpihna ding un nungjuite kiangah lai a gelhsak uhi; huan, a tunin, Pathian hehpihna jiaka gingtate nakpitakin a panpih a;
vantang theihin Judate nakpitakin a seldonga, laisiangthou zangin tua Jesu Kris tuh ahi chih a theisak hi.
Huan, Paulain kho sak uk a tawnsuak masa a, Korinth khua Apollo a om kalin Ephesa khua a tunga, nungjui khute hiam a mu a.
Huan, aman a kiang uah, na gintak tung lai un Kha Siangthou na tang u hia? a chi a. Huan, amau, a kiangah, tang lou, Kha Siangthou a om chih himhim jak leng ka za kei uh, a chi ua.
Huan, aman, bang baptisma ah ahia na tan uh? a chi a. Amau, Johan baptisma ah, a chi uh.
Huan, Paulain, Johanin jaw a nunga hongpaipa -huai tuh Jesu ahi- gingta dinga mite hilhin kisikna baptismain a baptis jel ahi, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a jak tak un Toupa Jesu minin baptisma a tangta uh.
Huan, Paulain a tunguah a khut a koiha, kha siangthou a tunguah a hongtungta a; huchiin pau theihlouhin thu a gen ua; Pathian thu leng a hilhta uhi.
A vek un, piching sawm leh nih khawng ahi uh.
Huan, Paula tuh kikhopna in ah a lut jela, kha thum phial hangtakin thu a gena, Pathian gamlam thu ah a sela, mi a thuzoh jel hi.
Himahleh, a khen a chihmoh ua, a gingta nuam kei ua, mipi maa Lam tuh a gensiat tak un, aman amaute a paisana, nungjuite a pituama, nitengin Tairanna thuhilhna in ah a sel jel hi.
Huchibang ngenin kum nih phial a hiha; huchiin Asia gama om tengteng, Judate leh Grikten leng, Toupa thu a zata uhi.
Huan, Pathianin Paula khutin thillamdang taktak a hihsaka;
huchiin a sa akipan kinulna puan khawng hiam, tenthuah khawng hiam damloute kiangah a hontawi ua, a natnate uh a bei jel hi, a sung ua kipan dawite leng a pawt jel uhi.
Huan, Juda vakvai dawithuthei kuatehiam, Paulain a thu a tangkoupih jel Jesu minin kon vau ahi, chiin, dawi paite tungah Toupa Jesu min a lou vial nak ua.
Huan, Judami, siampu lian khat, Skevain huchibang hih sam tapa sagih a neia.
Himahleh, dawiin, a kiang uah, Jesu ka gingta hi, Paula leng ka thei hi, nou jaw kua na hi ua? a chi a, a donga.
Huan, dawi pain a honboh a, a nih un a zou a, a nuaisiahta hi, huchiin huai mipa in akipan vuaktang leh liamin a taikheta uhi.
Huchiin, Ephesa khua a om tengteng, Judate leh Grikte kiangah leng, huai mi thu a thangta a; huan, a vek un a lau ua, Toupa Jesu min a lianta hi.
Huan, a gingtate leng a khen tampi a hong ua, a thilhihte uh thupha a tawi ua, a kipulak uh.
Mitkhialdawi hihmi akhen tampiin leng a laibute uh a hontawi khawm ua, mi tengteng mitmuhin a halta uh; huan, a man a sut ua, dangka sing nga hiin a thei uhi.
Huchi lawmlawma thupiin Toupa thu a dalh a, a zou jel hi.
Huan, huai khitin, Paulain, Masidonia gam leh Akaia gam totsuak takdih a, Jerusalem khua a hoh a tuma. Huaia, ka hoh khit chiangin Rome khua ka sik sam ding ahi, a chi a.
Huchiin, amah nasepsakte nih Timothi leh Erasta tuh, Masidonia gamah a paisak phota, amah bel Asia gamah a om tadih hi.
Huan, huai lai khawngin Lam jiakin mi buai petmahin a buaita ua.
Mikhat a min Demitria, dangkachi-a Diana lim bawlpan, a khutsiamte kiangah kilohna tampi a pe jel a.
Huai miin amaute a sam khawma, a nasep bang uh semte toh; huan, a kiang uah, Pute aw, hiai nasepna i hauhna uh ahi chih na thei uhi.

Hiai Ephesa khua kia hilouin, Asia gam kho kim tengteng phial ah leng, hiai Paulain, khuta bawl pathiante Pathian ahi kei uh, chiin, mi tampi a thuzoh a, a kiheisak khinta ahi chih, noumau ngeiin leng na mu un na ja ua. 2

Huachiin i nasep uh a suan ding chih a lauhuai kia hilouin, pathiannu thupitak Diana biakin leng a honngaineu ding uh. Asia gama mi tengteng leh khovela min a biak jel uh, a thupipi toh, a neu ding chih a lauhuai ahi, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a jak tak un, a heh mahmah ua, Ephesa khua a Diana thupitak ahi, chiin, a kikou uhi.
Huchiin a khuain a buai vekta ua, Gaia leh Aristarkha, Masidonia gama mi, Paula nungjuite, a man ua, kituaktakin etnop in ah a taipih kheukhou uhi.
Huan, Paulain mi laka lut a tup leh nungjuiten a phal kei ua.
Huan, Asia gama heutu pente laka khenkhat kuatehiam Paula lawmte ahi ua, a kiangah mi a sawl ua, etnop in ah lut teitei lou dingin a kunkun uhi.
Huan, omkhawmte a nuai ua, mi tamjawin a kikhop san uh leng a theikei uh, khenkhat thu khatin a kikou ua, khenkhat thu dangin a kikou uhi.

Huan, mipi laka mi khenkhatin Aleksandar a siamna thu gendan ding a hilhta ua, Judaten amah mi malam ah a sawn phei ua. Huan, Aleksandarin a khutin a jap a, mi tengteng kiangah a siamna thu gen a tum a.
Himahleh, amah Juda mi ahi chih a theihtak un, dakkal nih khawng, aw kituak takin, Ephesa khua a Diana thupitak ahi, chi ngenin a kikoukou uh.
Huan, kho laigelhpan mipi a sukdaih khitin, Ephesa khua a mite aw, Diana Thupitak biakin leh van akipana milim kia, Ephesa khuate vengmi na hi uh chih, kua ahia theilou om?
Huchiin hiai thu sel vual ahih louh nungin, na dai dide ding uh ahi, thu nungveng louin bangmah na hih ding uh ahi kei hi.
Hiai mi hiaia non pite uh, biakin lokmi ahi kei ua, i pathiannu gensete leng ahi kei uh.
Huchiin, Demotria leh a lawm khutsiamten leng kua lakah leng thubuai a neih uleh, thubuai genna inte honsain a om ve le, gam ukpate leng a om uhi; kihek uheh.
Thil dang buaina nei him na hih uleh, kikhopna ngeina ah a lem ding uh.
Tunia buaina jiakin salh lauhuaiin i omta uhi, a bul om ngellouin; huchi ahi ngala, hiai kikhopna san bangmah gen theilou ding i kei uhiam, a chi a.
Huan, huchibang thu a gen khitin omkhawm heutute a kikhenjak sakta hi.
Huan, buaina daih khit nungin, Paulain nungjuite a samsaka, a hasuana, kamphain a khaha, Masidonia gama hoh dingin a pawtta a.
Huan, thu tampia nungjuite hasuan jelin huai gam tuh a tawn suaka, Grik gam a tungta hi.
Huan, huaiah kha thum a tam nungin Siria gamlam ah longin a hoh deka, Judaten amah a sawm jiak un Masidonia gamah paisuak a tum nawn zota hi.
Huan, Pirha tapa Sopater Beria khuate, Thessalonia khuate Aristarkha leh Sekunda te, Darba khua te Gaia, Timothi te, Asia gama Tikika leh Trophima te a kiangah Asia gam phain a hoh uhi.
Huaiten ka ma uh a kai ua, Troasi khua ah a honna ngak uh.
Kou bel tanghou silngou sohlouh ni tengteng khitin Philippi khua akipan longin ka pawt ua, ni nga nungin Troasi khua ah a kiang uah ka tung ua; huaiah ni sagih ka tam uhi.
Huan, ni sagih ni masa penin, tanghou balkham dinga ka kikhop lai un, Paulain ajinga pai a tup jiakin a kiang uah chihtaktakin thu a gen a; jan lai tanin thu a gen jel uhi.
Huan, indan tungnung ka omkhawmna uah khawnvak tampi a om a.

Huan, a min Iutika tangval khat tohlet ah a tu a, a na lusu, a na lusa a. Huan, Paulain thu a gen sawttak jiakin aman a ihmut suak a thuakzouta keia, inchial thumna akipanin a keta a, a sisain a tawm uhi.
Himahleh, Paula a kumsuka, a tungah a bohkhuma, a poma, lunglau kei un, a laitat kei lai hi, a chi a.
Huan, Paula a kahtou nawna, tanghou a balkhama, an a ne a, sawtpi, khovak pha hialin, a kiang uah thukhotang a gena, huai nungin a paita hi.
Huan, valnoupa tuh damin a pi ua, khamuan petmahin a khamuangta uhi.
Huan, kou bel, long ah ka napaita ua, Asso khua juan dingin longin ka napawt masa ua, huaiah Paula tuansak ding ka tum ua; aman khea hong a tup jiakin huchi bangin aman a chi him ahia.
Huan, Asso khua a a hontuah chiangin, ka tuangsakta ua, Mitilini khua ka tung ua.
Huan, huai akipanin longin ka pain awn ua, a jingin Kio tuikulh jawn ka tung ua; huan, a jing nawnin Samo tuikulh ka tawn ua, huan, a jing nawn in Milita khua ka tung nawn uh.
Huan, Paulain Asia gam a om sawt a ut louh jiakin, Ephesa khua longin khen a tupsa him ahia, a theih leh Jerusalem khua ah Pentikost ni huam a tuma, a kin pai ahi.
Huan, Milita khua akipanin Ephesa khua ah mi a sawla, saptuam upate a kiangah a samsaka.
Huan, a kiang a hongtun un, aman, a kiang uah, Asia gam ka tot chil ni akipan na kiang ua ka om sung tengin ka omdan na thei ua;
thunuailut pen kawm leh, Judaten hon sawm jiak ua khitui kai leh, thil haksa ka tunga tungte thuak kawmin,
Toupa na ka sem hi; huchibangin a phatuam ding thu na kiang uah bangmah im ka neikeia, vantang lakah bang, in tengah bang thu kon hilh jel,
Judate leh Grikte kiangah leng Pathian lama lungsim ngat thu leh, i Toupa Jesu Kris lama ginna thu ka theisak jel ahi.
Huan, thei un, tuin, lungsima hoh lou theiloua ka kitheih jiakin, Jerusalem khua a hoh dia kisa ka hi, huaiah ka tunga thil hongtung ding khawng ka theikei;
Kha Siangthouin, Henna leh haksatnain nang hondawn hi, chiin, kho tengah a honhilh jel hi, tuate kia ka theih ahi.
Himahleh, ka kitaitehna lam ka maban tun ding leh, Toupa Jesu kianga huai nasepna ka muh, sem khin phot leng, ka hinna leng khiaklah tuakin ka sep kei hi.
Huan, thei un, nou tengteng, Pathian gam thu tangkoupih jela ka vakvaknaten ka mel na mu nawnta kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Huaijiakin, mi tengteng sisan ah ka hula hi chih tuniin ka hontheisak hi.
Pathian vaihawm tengteng avekin na kiang uah im ka nei hi.
Pathian saptuamte, amah sisana a leite, vak dingin, noumau leh na heute uh tengteng tungah pilvang un, Kha Siangthouin a tunguah nou heutuin a honbawl hi.
Ka pai nungin nge hangte na lak uah a honglut ding ua, pawlte a hawi kei ding uh chih ka thei hi.
Noumau laka mi nangawn, nungjui pawlte amau lama kai mang dingin thu tuam gen na hongom ding uhi.
Huaijiakin limsak unla; kum thum hilhial, khitui ke kawma, sun leh jana mi chih taihilh ka tawp louhdan, thei gige un.
Tunah Pathian leh a hehpihna thu kiangah nou ka honkemsak hi, huaiin nou a honbawllian theia, mi lungsim siangthoute lakah goutan a honneisak thei lai hi.
Kuamah dangkate, dangkaengte, puansilhte ka eng ngeikei hi.
Hiai khutten keimah leh ka lawmte taksap a khoihkhiak jel dan, noumau ngeiin na thei uhi.

Bangkim ka hih peuhmah na chinding ua ka hih ahi, huchibanga sem gim leh, Toupa Jesu thu theigige kawmin mi hatloute na panpih ding uh ahi; amah mahin, Bangkhat lak sangin, piakin lukhawng a nei jaw, a chih, a chi a.
Huan, huchibang thu a gen khitin, a khukdina, a vek un a thumpih ua.
Huan, a vek un a kap huphup ua, Paula ngawng ah kunin amah a tawp ua,
a mel a muh nawn tak louh ding uh, thu a gen tuh a lungkhamna pen uh ahi. Huan, long phain amah a vakhata uhi.
Huan, amaute toh ka kikhen ua, longin ka pawt ua, huai khitin tangtakin Kos tuikulh ka tung ua, huan, a jingin Rodi tuikulh ka tung nawn ua, huai akipanin ka pai jel ua, Patara khua ka tung ua.
Huan, Phinisia gam kai ding long khat ka mu ua, ka tuang ua, ka pai jel ua,
Huan, Kupra tuikulh ka mu ua, veilam pangah ka kheng ua, Suria gam lamah ka pai jel ua, Tair khua ah ka kumta dih ua; huaiah long van nawn khiak ding ahi a.
Huan, nungjuite ka zongkhia ua, huaiah ni sagih ka tam ua; huan, amau Kha hilhin, Paula kiangah, Jerusalem khua tot louh ding chih, a chi ua.
Himahleh, huai ni khitin ka pawt ua, ka paita ua, unauten a vek un, a ji a tate utoh dainawl phain hongkha ua; huan, tuipi geiah ka khukdin ua, ka thum uhi.
Huan, Mangpha, ka kikhak ua, long ah ka tuang ua, amau bel a in uah a pai nawnta uh.
Huan, Tair khua akipan longa ka pai khit un Tolemai khua ka tung ua, unaute chibai ka buk ua, a kiang uah ni khat ka nituang uh.
Huan, a jingin ka pawt ua, Kaisaria khua ka tung ua, huan, Tanchin Hoih genpa, Philip in ah ka lut ua, amah tuh sagihte laka khat ahi a, a kiangah ka tam ua.
Huai miin tanu li a neia, nungak siangthou ahi ua, Pathian thu a gen jel uhi.
Huan, huaiah ni tampi tak ka tam ua, huai lain Judia gam akipan a min Agaba jawlnei khat a hongsuk a.

Huan, ka kiang uah a honga, Paula kawnggak a la a, a khete, a khutte amahin a kigaka, huan, Jerusalem khua a Judaten hichi bangin hiai kawnggak neipa a gak ding uh, Jentelte khut ah a pe lai ding uhi, Kha Siangthouin a chi hi, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu ka jak tak un, kou leh huai khua a mitten Paula Jerusalem khua a hohtou lou dingin ka ngen chiat ua.
Huan, Paulain, a dawnga, Bangchi na hi ua, na kahlah uh, na honkhasiatsak uh? Toupa Jesu min jiakin Jerusalem khua a hen kia hilouin, sih leng ka ngap ahi, a chi a.
Huan, khem zoh vual ahih louh takin, Toupa thuthu hi heh aw, ka chi ua, ka tawpta uhi.
Huan, huai nungin ka van uh ka bawl ua, Jerusalem khua ah ka hohtou ua.
Kaisaria khua a mi nungjuite kuate hiam, ka kiang uah a pai ua, amau, a min Mnason, nungjui masa pawl Kupra tuikulh a mi khat ka tuna dingpa uh a pi sam uhi.
Huan, Jerusalem khua ka tun uh unauten nuam takin a honna kipahpih ua.
A hingin Paula toh Jakob kiangah ka lut ua; huaiah saptuam upate tengteng leng a om uh.
Huan, Paulain amau chibai a buk khitin, a nasepna zanga Pathianin Jentelte laka thil a hihsak peuhmah anen ahamin a gena.
Huan, unauten huai thu a jak un Pathian a pahtawi uh; huan Paula kiangah, Unaupa, Judate laka gingta mi tamdan na mu a; a vek un dan tungah phatuam a ngai lai uhi;
huan, nang Jentelte laka Juda omte tengteng kiangah a tate uh zeksum louh ding leh, dan banga om louh ding, chiin, Mosi paihkhiakna ding na thuhilh jel chih mi kam ah na thu a thei uh.
Bangchi hita ding ahia le? Na hongtung chih a za ngal ding ua.
Huaijiakin na kianga ka gen bang un hihin; Thuchiam nei pasal li ka kiang uah a om ua;

huai mite piin la, a kiang uah kisiangsak sam inla, a sam uh a met theihna ding un amau din sum sengin; huchiin, mi tengtengin, mi kama na thu a jak teng uh; chihtak ahi kei chih a thei ding ua, nangmah mah Dan zomin kichian takin na om jaw chih a thei ding uhi.
Jentelte laka gingtate thu jaw, milim biakna thil neklam ah, sa sisan neklam ah, sa heklup nek lam ah, kingaihlam khawng akipanin a kihulsak ding uh ahi, chiin, ka gen ua, ka gelhta uhi, a chi ua.

Huan, a jingin Paulain pasalte a pia, a kiang uah a kisiangsaka, Pathian biakin ah a luta, amau dia sa goh chiat ding a piaksak masiah kisiansakna ni a nei phot ding uh ahi chih, siampu kiangah a hilh a.
Huan, ni sagih a chin dekdek takin Asia gama Judaten Pathian biakin ah Paula a mu ua, mipi tengteng a hasuan ua, amah a man ua, a kikou ua..

Israel mite aw, honghuh un! Hiai mi, gam tenga mi tengteng kianga, Juda mite, dan te, hiai inte khawng gensepa ahi; huai lou leng, Pathian biakin ah Grik mite a lutpiha, hiai in siangthou a hihbuah khin ahi, a chi ua.
Huai main khua ah Ephesa khua a mi Trophima a kiangah a mu ua, Paulain huai mi Pathian biakin ah a lutpih a gingta uhi.
Huan, a khuain a kissing kheukhou ua, mite khawng a tai khawm ua; Paula a man ua, Pathian biakin akipan a kaikhia ua; kongkhakte a khak pah ngal uhi.
Huan, amah hihlup a tup laitak un Jerusalem khua a mi tengteng a buai uh chih sepaih pawl heutu lalpen kiang a tungtou a.
Huan, aman sepaihte leh sepaih za heutute a pi pah ngala, a kiang uah a tai suk ua; huan, amau heutu lianpen leh sepaihte a muh tak un Paula vuak a tawpta uhi.
Huan, heutu lalpenin a honnaiha, Paula a lena, khainiang nih butsak ding thu a pia a; kua ahia a hih a, bang ahia a hih, a dong a.
Huan, mipi lakah a khen thu khatin a kikou ua, a khen thu dangin a kikou uh; huan, buai jiakin a dan a theikeia, kulha pilut thu a pia hi.
Huan, Paula kellei a tun lain mipi ahiamgam jiak un sepaihten amah a domkang jel uhi;
Mi tengtengin, hihmangthang un, chia kikouin, a jui huthut ngal ua.
Huan, Paula tuh kulhpi a a pilut dek laitak un, aman, sepaih heutu lalpe kiangah, na kiangah thu kam khat ka gen thei diam? a chi a.
Huan, aman, Grik pau na thei maw? Tuma a mite hasuana, mihing suamte sang li gamdaia pi heap Aigupta mi na hi kei maw? a chi a.
Paulain Juda mi, Silisia gama Tarsa khua a mi ka hi, kho namai a om ka hi kei; honhehpih inla, mi tengteng kiangah thu hon gensakin, a chi a.
Huan, a lemsak takin, kellei ah Paula a dinga, mi tengteng daihna dingin a khutin a japa; huan, a daih duamtak un Hebru pauin a kiang uah,
Unaute aw, pate aw, tun ah na kiang uah ka siamna thu ka honhilh ding hi, ngaikhia un, a chi a.
Huan, Hebru pauin a kiang uah thu a gen chih a jak tak un, a dai nawn sem ua; huan, aman,

Juda mi ka hia, Silisia gama Tarsa khua a piang ka hi a, himahleh hiai khua ah Gamaliel khe bula zila khanglian ka hi, i pipute Dan omdan kimtak zil jela om ka hia, tunia noumau tengteng bangtakin Pathian adinga phatuam ngai sam jel ka hi.
Huan, hiai Lama mite hihlum hial khopin ka sawi jela, numei-pasal ka hena, suangkulh ah ka khumsak jel ahi.

Siampu Lianpen leh upate tengtengin leng huai thu hontheihpih thei hi, amau akipanin leng unaute piak dingin lai ka mu hi, huan, Damaska khua a om peuhmah, a sawi ding un, hensa a Jerusalem khua a pi dingin ka hoh hi.
Huan, kapaia, Damaska khua kiang ka tunin, sun annek hun lain, thakhatin van akipan vak thupitak ka kim ah a hongvak puapa,
lei ah ka puka, ka kiangah, Salua, Saula, nang bangachia honsawi? chiin aw ka ja a.
Huan, ken, Toupa kua na hia? chiin, ka donga. Huan, aman ka kiangah, Nazarit Jesu na sawi ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, ka lawmten vak jaw a mu ua, honhoupihpa aw jaw a za kei uhi.
Huan, ken, Toupa, bang ka hih dia? ka chi a. Huan, Toupan, ka kiangah, Thou inla, Damaska khua ah lutin, thil tengteng na hihding a chih peuhmah a honhilh ding uh, a chi a.
Huan, huai vak thupi jiakin khua ka mu theita keia, ka lawmten khutin a honkai ua, Damaska khua ah ka lutta ahi.
Huan, mi khat, Anania, Dan lama Pathian limsak leh, huai Juda omte tengteng kianga min hoih,
ka kiangah a honga, ka kiangah a dinga, ka kiangah, Unau Suala, mit vak nei in, a honchi a. Huan, huai laitakin amah ka mu touta hi.
Huan, aman I pipute Pathianin a deihlam thei leh Mi Kichian mu a, a kamsuak za dingin a honsepta hi.
Na muh leh na jak thu ah mi tengteng kiangah amah thutheihpihpa na hi ding.
Huan, bangdia omom na hia? thou inla, amah min lou kawmin baptisma tang inla, na khelhna hihsiang tanla, a honchi hi.
Huan, Jerusalem khua a ka pain awn nungin, Pathian biakina ka thum laiin, mengmu bangin ka oma.
Huan, Kin inla, Jerusalem khua akipan pawtin; ka tanchin nag en ding a pom tuak kei uh, a honchih lai ka mu a.
Huan, ken, Toupa kikhopna in tenga nang gingta peuhmah ka hentasak a, ka vuak jel dan a thei ngal ua.
Huan, na thu theihpihpa Stephen sisan a suah lai un kei leng a kiang uah ka dinga, ka nalemsa a, a hihlumte puan khawng leng ka nakem ahi, ka chi a.
Huan, aman, Pai in, hiai akipanin gamla taka Jentelte kiangah ka honsawl ding ahi, a honchita a, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu tanin a ngaikhia ua; huan, aw ngaihtakin, Mi hichi bang phiangsan khovel akipan hihmangthang un; hingtak ahi kei hi, a chita ua.
Huan, a kikou ua, a puan khawng uh a hawk ua, a pai ua, leivui a vik ua,
huchiin, sepaih heutu lalpenin Paula kulh sunga pilot thu a pia a, a tungah huchi tela a kikouna uh a theihna dingin vuak kawma dottel ding, a chi a.
Huan, savun khaua a lehhensawm khit un, Paulain, a kianga ding sepaih zaheutu kiangah, Rome mi himhim na vo thei ua hia? siamlouh tansak nung leng lah hilouin? a chi a.
Huan, sepaih zaheutuin huai a jak takin, sepaih zaheutu lianpen kiangah a hoh a, na thilhih ding pilvang dih aw; hiai mi Rome mi a na hi e, a chi a, a hilh a.
Huan, sepaih heutu lianpen a honga, a kiangah, Rome mi na hi maw? honhilh in, a chi a.
Huan, aman, Hi e, a chi a. Huan, sepaih heutu lianpenin, hiai khomi hihna ken sum tampia ka lei ahi, chiin, a dawnga. Huan, Paulain, kei jaw Romemi a piang him kahi, a chi a.
Huchiin, dottel tumten amah a paisan pah ngal ua; sepaih heutu lianpenin leng Rome mi ahi chih a theihin a kihta a, a hen jiakin a lau hi.

Huan, a jingin, Judaten bangjiakin ahia Paula a hek uh chih theihtel tumin, sepaih heutu lianpenin amah a phela, siampu liante leh vaihawm tengteng kikhop ding thu a pia a, Paula a pi suka, a ma uah a dingsakta hi.
Huan, Paulain vaihawmte a en gige a, Unaute aw, tuni tanin Pathian mitmuha hoih lama ka theih peuhmah hihin ka om jeljel hi, a chi a.
Huan, Siampu lianpen Ananiain, Paula kianga dingte kiangah, a kama betsak ding a chi a.
Huan, Paulain, a kiangah, nang suang dai nuhngoupa, Pathianin a honbeng zo ding hi, nang, Dan banga mi ngaihtuah dingin na tu a, Dan lou banga mi bet ding na chi vial maw? a chi a.
Huan, a kianga mitten, Pathian Siampu Liangpen na tai viala? a chi ua.
Huan, Paulain, Unaute aw, Siampu Liangpen ahi chih ka theikeia ahi; na chihpihte heutu tungah thu hoihlou gen ken, chih, gelh ahi ngala, a chi a.

Huan, Paulain a khen Saddukaite, a khen Pharisiate ahi uh chih a theihin, vaihawmte lakah a kikou a, Unaute aw, Pharisai ka hi, Pharisai tapa leng ka hi; misi lametna leh thohnawnna thu ah phula om ka hi, a chi a.
Huan, huai a gent akin, Pharisiate leh Saddukaite a nakisel ua, vaihawmte a kilangte uhi.
Saddukaiten, misi thohnawnna himhim a om kei, angelte, khate leng a om tuan kei, a chi uh; Pharisaiten bel huai tegel tuh a om chih a gen ngal ua.

Huaiin nakpitakin a buaita ua; Pharisaite lama mi laigelhmite khenkhat a ding ua; a sel ua. Hiai mi bangmah a gitlouhna i theikei; khain leng, angelin leng amah bia hile zong, bang a poi dia, a chi ua.
Huan, kituahlouhna lianpi a hongom takin, sepaih heutu lalpenin Paula a bohjan uh a laua, sepaihte kiangah, a vahoh suka, a lak ua kipan kulha vapi tou teitei dingin a chi a.
Huan, a janin Toupa Paula kiangah a dinga, khamuangtakin om in, Jerusalem khua a ka thu na theihsak bangin Rome khua ah leng na theisak ding ah, a chi a.
Huan, ni a suahin Judate a panghuan ua, Paula a thah masiah uh bangmah nea dawn lou dingin a kichiamta uhi.
Huai thubawlte sawmli sanga tamjaw ahi uhi.
Huan, amau tuh siampu liante leh upate kiangah a hoh ua, Paula ka thah masiah uh bangmah chiam lou dingin ka kichiam ek uhi.

Huaijiakin, nou vaihawmte toh a thu kichian nawn sema ngaihtuah tum bangin, na kiang ua pikhe dingin sepaih heutu lalpen kiangah a hem deuhin vagen tou un; na kiang nai uh a tun main leng, kou amah that dingin ka mankhin uhi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, Paula sanggam nu tapain a sawmna thu a naja a, kulh ah a valuta, Paula a vahilhta hi.
Huan, Paulain sepaih zaheutu khat a sama, hiai tangval sepaih heutu lalpen kiangah pi in, a kiangah thu banghiam gen ding a nei a hihtuak, a chi a.
Huchiin, sepaih heutu lalpen kiangah a pi a, Paula, hentapan, honsam a, hiai tangval na kianga honpi dingin a honsawla, na kiangah thu banghiam gen ding a nei a hihtuak, a chi a.
Huan, sepaih heutu lalpenin a khutin a lena, a simin a tuam paipih a, bang ahia honhilh ding naneih? chiin a donga.
Huan, aman, Paula thu kichian nawn sema na ngaihtuah ding mahbangin, jingchiah vaihawmte kiangah pi suk dingin Judaten honnget hoih a sa chiat uh.

Himahleh, a thu uh na gingta ken; a lak ua mi sawmli sanga tamjaw in a sawm ua, huai mitten amah a thah masiah uh bangmah nea dawn lou dingin a kichiam uh; tuin na thu ngakin mansain a om uhi, a chi a.
Huan, sepaih lalpenin tangval a paisaka, hiai thute non theisak chih kuamah hilh ken, a chi bikbek hi.
Huan sepaih zaheutu nih a sama, Jan ihsip hunin Kaisaria kho pha a pai dingin sepaih za nih toh, sakol tungtuangmi sawmsagih toh, teitawimi za nih toh bawl un, a chi a.
Huan, Gamukpa Felik kiangah bita a tunsak theihna dingin Paula a tuansakna ding un gan bang na bawl dingin leng a chi a;
Huan, hichibangin lai a gelhta hi.
Klaudia Lisiain Felik Gamukpa hoihpa chibai a buk hi.
Hiai mi Judaten a mu ua, a thah dek lai un a kiang uah sepaihte piin ka hoh a, Rome mi ahi chih ka theihin ka honkheta hi.
Huan, a hekna pen uh theih ka ut a, a vaihawmte uh kiangah ka pi suka,
huchiin, a dan thu uh banghiama hek ahi chih ka theia, himahleh a hekna thu uah sihna leh henna ding jen bangmah ka thei ngal keia.
Huan, Judaten amah a tang uh chih min a hontheihsak tak un, na kiangah amah ka honsawl pah ngal ahi, a hekte leng a tung a thubuai a neih peuh uh na ma a gen dingin, thu leng ka pia hi, chiin.
Huchiin, sepaihten a thupiak bangin Paula a-jan a-janin a pi ua, Antipatri a tunpih ua.
Huan, a jingin sakol tungtuangmite a kianga pai jel dingin a kiksan ua, kulh ah a hoh nawnta uh;
Huan, amau, Kaisaria khua a tung ua, Gamukpa kiangah lai tuh a pia ua, Paula leng a maah a ding sak uhi.
Huan, Gamukpan, a sim khitin, Paula omna gam a donga. Huan, Silisia gama ahi chih a theihtakin,
nang honhekte a hongtun chiang un na thubuai ka ngaihtuah ding, a chi a. Huan, Herod ina vending thu a pia hi.
Huan, ni nga nungin Siampu Lianpen Anania a hongtung suka, upa kuate hiam toh, a min Tertulla thugensiam khat toh; huan, Paula tunga thubuai tuh Gamukpa kiangah a gen ua.
Huan, Paula a sapkhiak nung un Tertulla in amah a hek pana: Felik hoihpen, nangmah vanga khamuang petpeta ka om jiak un leh, non kepna jiaka hiai chite adinga giloute kham hoiha om jel jiakin,
chiklaipeuhin koipeuh ah leng lungkim takin ka kipak gige uhi.
Abang abang hitaleh, nang adia chimtakhuai lua hih ka ut kei hi, na migitnain thu kam khat ahihleh honngaihkhiaksak dingin ka honngen ahi.
Hiai mi huathuaipi, khovel Judate tengteng tokbuaipa leh, Nazarit mite pawla a makaipen khat uh ahih ka thei uh.
Pathian biakin hihbuah leng a tuma; huaijiakin ka man ua,

ka dan bang ua a tunga vaihawm tum hi unga, himahleh sepaih heutu lalpen Lisia hongkuana, ngongtat kawmin amah tuh ka khut ua kipan a lamanga, a tunga thubuai neite na kianga hongpai dingin thu a pia hi.
Nangmah ngeiin amah dongtelin ka hekna tengteng uh na theithei ding hi, a chi a.
Huan, Judaten leng, Huai thu huchibang ahi, chiin, a panpih uhi.
Huan, Gamukpan thug en dinga Paula khuta a jap takin, aman, nang kum tampi hiai chite vaihawmsakpa na hih ka theih jiak kipak takin ka siamna thu ka gen ding ahi.
Jerusalem khua a Pathian be dinga ka hoh touh nung ni sawmlenih lou val ahi nai kei ding chih na na thei ding;
Pathian biakin ah leng, kikhopna in ah leng, khua ah leng kuamah ka sel leh mipi ka hasot amau zong a honmu kei uh;
Tunah leng a honhekna thu uh na theihin a bul a suikhe theikei ding uh.
Himahleh, hiai thu tuh na kiangah ka genkhe ding, Lam dan, pawl tuam a chih uh bangin ka pipute uh Pathian ka be jel -Dan leh Jawlnei te Laibu gelh tengteng gingtain;
huan, mi diktatte leh diktatloute thohnawnna a om ding chih Pathian lamah ka lamena, hiai khawngten leng huai tuh a gingta sam ngal ua;
Tua jiakin Pathian lamah leh mihing lamah leng lungsim gilou lou mahmah neih nilouhlouh ka tum nak hi.
Huan, kum tampi nungin ka chipihte kiangah thilpiak ding leh sagoh ding hontawiin ka honga;
huan, huai thil ka piak lain, mipi bang louin buai louin, Pathian biakin ah kisiangsakin a honmu uhi.
Himahleh, huaiah Asia gama mi Juda kuate hiam a om ua, huaiten ka tungah thu a neih uleh, hiai na maah omin a honhek ding uh ahi.
Ahihkeileh, hiai mite ngeiin vaihawmte maa ka din lain, ka hihkhelh bang ahia a muh uh, gen uheh.
Hiai thu kam khat jiak houh ahih kei ngalleh, a lak ua dingin, Misi thohnawnna thu ah tuniin na ma uah salhin ka om ahi, ka chih, a chi a, a dawnga.
Huan, Felikin Lam thu a theihtel deuh jiakin, Sepaih heutu lalpen Lisia a hongtun suk hun chiah na thu uh ka lem ding, chiin, a koih tadih a.
Huan, Paula deihbawl deuha, a lawmten a nektak a bawlsak uh kham loua, vensak dingin sepaih za heutu kiangah thu a pia hi.
Huan, ni bangzah hiam nungin Felik a hong nawna, a ji Drusilla Juda numei toh, Paula a samsaka, Kris Jesu ginna thu a ngaikhia a.

Huan, Paulain diktatna thute, kidek thute, thukhen-vaihawmna hongtung dingte a suipih detdet lain, Felikin lauhuai a sa mahmaha, pai nawn phot tadih inla, hun lem ka neih hun chiangin ka honsam ding, a chi a.
Paulain dangka a piak peuh a lamen a, huaijiakin a sam mun sima, a houpih zihzeh ahi.
Himahleh, kum nih a bei nungin Porsia Festain Felik a honkhengta a; huan, Felikin, Judate lakah min hoih a deiha, Paula hensain a nuseta hi.
Huchiin, Festain gam tuh a ukta; huan, nit hum nungin Kaisaria khua akipanin Jerusalem khua ah a hoh tou a.
Huan, siampu lalte leh Juda makaiten a kiangah Paula tungtang thu a selamin a na theisak uhi.
Jerusalem khua a pitou sak dingin hehpihna leng a na ngenngen ua; lampia na buka thah a tum uhi.
Himahleh Festain, Paula, tuh Kaisaria khua a kep ding hi, keimah leng huailam ah ka hoh pah ding.
Huaijiakin, huai miin gitlouhna a neih leh na lak ua thu nei peuhmahin honjui suk uhenla, hek uheh, chiin, a dawnga.
Huan, a lak uah ni giat hiam, ni sawm hiam val a tam keia, Kaisaria khua ah a paikhe sukta; huan, a jingin thukhenna tutphah ah a tua, Paula honpi dingin thu a pia hi.
Huan, amah a hongtunin, Jerusalem khua a mi Juda hongsukte a kim ah a ding ua, a tungah thubuai tampi gik taktak a gen a gen ua, a bulb el a suikhe thei sam kei uhi;
Paulain a siamna thu a gena, Judate Dan tungah khawng, Pathian biakin thu ah khawng, Kaisar tungah khawng leng, thil himhim ka hihkhial kei hi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Festain, Judate laka min hoih a deiha, Paula kiangah, Jerusalem khua a hoh touha, huailaia ka ma ahiai thu lep na deih hia? a chi a, a donga.
Paulain Kaisar thukhenna tutphah maa, vai hawm saka om dingin ka ding hi; Judate tungah thil bangmah ka hihkhial kei, nang leng huai lah na theichian mahmah ngala.

Migilou ka hiha, sihna khop hial thil hih ka hih leh, sih leng ka nial kei; himahleh hiaite honhekna uh a bul bangmah a om kei leh, kuamahin a kiang uah honpekhe theikei ding. Kaisar kiangah ka tun ding, a chi a.
Huan, Festain a vaihawmpihte a houpih kimvel nungin, Kaisar kiangah tun na tum viala, Kaisar kiangah na hoh mahmah ding, chiin a dawng hi.
Huan, ni bangzah hiam nungin kumpipa Agrippa leh Barnisi tuh Kaisaria khua a hongtung ua, Festa chibai a buk uh.
Huan, ni tampi huaia a tam jiak un Festain Paula thubuai kumpipa kiangah a gena, Felikin mi tang kuahiam a nusia a;
Jerusalem khua a ka om lain siampu liante leh Juda upaten a tungtang thu a honhilh ua, siamlouh tansak a ngen uh.
Huan, ken, a kiang uah, a hekpa uleh a hekte a kimatuah ua, a hekna thu ua a siamna thu gen sam na lemtang a neih sam main, mi himhim gawt dinga khah Rome mite dan ahi kei hi, chiin, ka dawng hi.
Huan, hiai lai ka hongtun un, sawt hallouin a jingin thukhenna tutphah ah ka tu a, huai mi tuh honpi dingin thu ka pia hi. 1
Huan, a hekte a din lai un, ka gintak bang ngeiin a tungah gitlouhna thubuai bangmah himhim lah a gen kei ua;
a sabiak dante uleh, Jesu, mi khat sisa, Paulain, a hing nawn ahi, chiin, a gena, huchi ahih jiakin a tungah thubuaite a nei uh a nahi jaw hi.
Huan, ken huai thute ngaihtuah dingdan himhim ka theikeia, Jerusalem khua a hoha, huailaia huai thu lepsak a ut le hut louh ka donga.
Himahleh, Paulain Kumpipa lep dia sit a ngen zota a. Huaijiakin Kaisar kianga ka hohsak theih masiah veng dingin thu ka pia a, a chi a.
Huan, Agrippain, Festa kiangah, ka na ut gige him ahi, a chi a. Huan, aman, jingchiah a thugen na ngaikhe na ke, a chi a.
Huchiin, a jingin Agrippa leh Barnisi thupi takin a hong ua, thugenna in ah a lut ua, sepaih heutu lalte toh, khua a mi lian deuhte toh; huan, Festa thuin Paula tuh a pilut sak uh.

Huan, Festain, Kumpipa Agrippa leh hiailaia i laka om tengtengte aw, hiai mi na muh uh ahi, a tungtang thu a Judate tengtengin a vek ua, hing nawn lou ding chi a, kikoua, Jerusalem khua leh hiailaia ka kianga a hekna uh.
Himahleh, sihna ding khop bangmah a hih kei chih ka theia; huan, aman Kumpipa kianga tut a tup jiakin sawl ka tum ahi;

Himahleh, a thu gina takin bangmah gelh ding lah ka theikeia. Huaijiakin na ma uah ka honpikhia ahi, Kumpipa Agrippa nangmah maa honpi tuan se ka hi a, etchet nungin banghiam bek gelh ding ka muh theihna dingin.
Hentapa, Kumpipa kianga sawla, a tunga a hekna uh thu theih khawm sak louh jaw, haihuai hiin ka thei ngala, a chi a.
Huan, Agrippain, Paula kiangah, Na siamna thu na gen thei hi, achia. Huan, Paulain a khut a jaka, a siamna thu a gen a;
Kumpipa Agrippa, Judaten a honhekna tengteng ua ka ka siamna thu tunia na maa ka gen ding jiakin kipakin ka kithei hi;
Hiai ka kipahna pen ahi, Judate lakah dan leh thubuai tengteng thu a na pil mahmah jiakin; huaijiakin muangtaka non ngaihkhiaksak dingin ka honngen ahi.
A tunga ka naupan laia kipan, ka chite lakah leh Jerusalem khua a ka omdan Judate tengtengin a thei uh.
A tunga patin ka tanchin a thei uh, huchia ka sabiak dan ua ngentel pen angeina a Pharisai hi inga, a ut uleh a hon genpih thei uh ahi.
Huan, Pathianin ka pipute uh kianga thu achiam lametna jiakin hiaiah tuin vaihawm sakin ka ding ahi,
huai thuchiam, ka nam uh sawmlenihin, sun leh janin Pathian na phatuamngai taka semin, muh a lamen uhi. Kumpipa aw, huai lametna tungthu ah Judaten a honhek uhi.
Pathianin misite a kaithou chih bangchin gintak huailou a sep na hi ua?
Ken leng Nazaret Jesu min kalh lamin thil lampi hih leng hoihin ka nagingta naka.

Huai bang Jerusalem khua ah leng ka hih jel ahi; huan, siampu liante kiangah thu ka mu a, mi siangthoute laka mi tampi suangkulh ah ka khum jela; huan, a hihlup lai un, lemsa lamah leng ka napang jel ahi.
Huan, kikhopna in tengah ka sawi gige a. Jesu thu gensiatsak ka tum teitei nak hi, huan, a tunguah ka gilou mahmah, gamdang kho pha hialin leng ka sawi jel ahi.
Huchibang hih dingin, siampu lalte thu muin leh, a sawlna lai uh tawiin, Damaska khua ah ka hoha.
Huan, i aw, Toupa, ka pai lain, sun annek hun ahi a, van akipan vak banghiam, ni vak sanga vakjaw, keimah leh ka paipihte kimah vakin ka mu a.
Huan, ka vek un lei ah ka puk ua, Hebru pauin, Saula, Saula, nang bangachia honsawi? Sutna chiangzumte suih nanga dia na ahi, honchiin ka ja a.
Huan, ken, Toupa, kua na hia? ka chi a. Huan, Toupan, Jesu, na sawi ka hi.
Himahleh, thou inla, dingin; hiai na thil muhte leh, na kianga ka hongkilakna dingte toh, huai na sem ding leh theihpih dia nang honbawl dingin na kiangah ka hongkilak ahi;
Mi tengteng leh Jentelte khut akipan ka honhum hing ding;

A mit uh hihvak dingin a kiang uah ka honsawl ahi, huchiin mial tuh vaklam a ngatsan ding ua, Setan thuneihna Pathian lam a ngatsan ding uh, khelhna ngaihdamna a muhna ding uleh a hon gintak jiak ua siangthou kaite laka goutan a neihna ding un, a chi a.
Huaijiakin, kumpipa Agrippa aw, vana mi kilak ka sel kei hi,

Atungin, Damaska khua a mite kiangah, huan Jerusalem khua ate kiangah, huan, Judia gam chih a mite kiangah leh, Jentelte kiangah leng, kisik minpu thama thil hiha, kisika, Pathian lam a ngatna ding un, ka hih zo jel ahi.
Huaite jiakin Judaten Pathian biakin ah a honman ua, hihlup a hontum ua.

Himahleh, Pathian kiang akipana panpihna ka muh jiakin tuni tanin mi neute leh mi liante kianga thu theisakin ka om nalai hi, jawlneite leh Mosiin hongtung ding a chih thu kia uh loungal thu dang gen louin.
Huchia, Krisin gim a thuak dinga, hua misi laka kipan a thohnawn jiaka mi tengteng kianga leh Jentelte kianga leng vak musakpa masapen ahi ding, a chih thu uh, a chi a.
Huan, huchibanga a siamna thu a gen lain, Festain, aw ngaihtakin, Paula, na hai ahi; na theih tamnain nang honhaisak hi, a chi a.
Himahleh, Paulain, Festa hoihpen, hai kei veng e; thu diktak leh thu piltak ka gen jaw ahi.
Hiai thu khawng kumpipan a thei vo-oi, a kiangah leng lau louin ka gen hi; hiai thil khawng bangmah a kiangah im ahi kei chih diktakin ka thei hi; hiaite, inning peuha hih ahi ngal keia.
Kumpipa Agrippa, jawlneite thu na gingta chih ka thei hi, a chi a.
Huan, Agrippain, Paula kiangah, sawtlou chik phet khema, Kristiana honbawl tum neive! a chi a.
Huan, Paulain, sawtin, sawt kei leh, nang kia ka chi kei, tuni a ka thu ja tengteng leng, keimah banga om dingin Pathian kiangah ka ngen ahi, kol khawngte bel bun tuan louin, a chita.
Huan, kumpipa toh, gamukpa toh, Barnisi toh, a kiang ua tute toh a ding chiat ua;
huan, a pai tuam ua, a kihou ua, hiai miin sihna leh kol butna khop hial thil bangmah a na hih kei hi, a chi uhi.
Huan, Agrippain, Festa kiangah, hiai min Kaisar kianga tut ding na nachi keileh, pawt mai ding hiven, a chi a.
Huan, Itali gama longa pai ding thu a hihpuk tak un, Paula leh henta dang kuate hiam Awgasta pawla mi sepaih zaheutu a min Julia a kemsak ua.
Huan, Adramitiam kho long, Asia gam tuipi piau a kho omte tawn ding ah, ka tuang ua, tuipi ah ka paita uhi; Masidonia gama mi Aristarkha, Thessalonika khua mi, ka kiang uah a oma.
Huan, a jingin Sidon khua ka tawn ua. Huan, Juliain Paula a limbawl ngiala, kihihhalh dingin a lawmte kiangah a pawtsaka.
Huan, huai akipanin tuipi ah ka pai nawn ua, huihin a hilou lama honsawn hiakin Kupra tuikulh jul huih hatlouhna lam ah ka tai ua.
Huan, Silisia gam leh Pamphilia gam jul tuipi ka khen nung un, Lidia gama Mira khua ka tung ua.
Huaiah sepaih zaheutupan Aleksandria kho long Itali gam tawn ding a mu a; huaiah a hontuangsak a.
Huan, ni tampi tak awlawlin ka pai ua, Knida kho jawn haksapiin ka tung teitei ua, huihin hon sawnkik jiakin Salmoni juanin Krit tuikulh jul huih hatlouhna lamah ka tai ua.
Huan, haksatakin tui geigei ah ka pai ua, long khawlna kilawm a chih mun uh ka tungta ua; huai kiangah Lasia khua a om hi.
Huan, ni tampi a beitak jiakin leh, longa pai a lauhuai jiakin, (An Ngawl Ni a khengta ngala), Paulain amau a thuhilha, a kiang uah,
Pute aw, longa tua pai siatna leh manthatna thupitak tung ding ahi chih ka theia, a sum leh long tungah kia ka chi kei, eimah tungah kia ka chi ahi, a chi a.
Himahleh, sepaih zaheutuin Paula thugen sangin longpu leh long neipa thu a ging jawa.

Huan, phalbi douna dingin longkhawlna a ginat louh jiakin a tamjawin, huai akipana tuipi a pai khiaka, Phinisi khua tun teiteia, huailaia phalbi dou a sawmpih ua; Phinisi tuh Krit tuikulha longkhawlna khat ahi, mal sak leh sim sak lam ahi a.
Huan, sim huih awlawla a hongnun takin, a deihlam uh mu a kisa ua, sikkip a khai khia ua, Krit tuikulh gei juljul ah ka pai uhi.
Himahleh, sawtlou chik nungin gam lam akipanin huih hattak a hongnung sukta a, huai huih tuh Euroklidon a chi jel uhi.
Huan, long a honsawnkhata a, huihlam a ngat theihlouhtakin ka khahta ua, honmut leng honmut lengta a.
Huan, a min Klauda tuikulh neuchik petmah pansanin huih hatlouhna lamah ka tai ua, haksatakin long neu tuh ka bitsak thei geigei ua;

Huan, a kaihkhiak nung un panpihna khaute khawng a zang ua, long nuailam ah a vial ua, a khih ua, huan, puanjakna bangkim a puksak ua, huchilouin jaw Sirti a lenlut a lau ua, huchiin a honmut leng a honmut lengta hi.
Huan, a jingin, tuikihawtin honsep ek jiakin, longa van khawng tui lakah a paikhe panta ua.
Huan, a jing nawnin amau khut ngeiin long van a paikhe nawnta uhi.
Huan, ni tampi, nil eng, aksi leng a kimu keia, huihpi petmahin honnuaia, hin himhim ka lamen nawnta kei uhi.
Huan, an ne loua sawttak a om nung un, Paula a lak uah a dinga, Pute aw, Krit tuikulha phel loua, ka thu man a, hiai siat leh manthatna tun louh ding hina jena.
Himahleh, tunah leng khamuangtaka om dingin kon hasuan ahi; na lak uah kuamahin henna na mangsak kei ding uh, long jaw a mangthang ding.
Amah Pathiana ka hih, a na leng ka sep, amah angel tuh tujanin ka kiangah a hongdinga, ka kiangah,
Paula, lau ken, Kaisar maah na ding ding; huan, ngai in, longa na kianga pai tengteng leng Pathianin a honpia hi, honchi ahi.
Huaijiakin, Pute aw, khamuangtakin om un, Pathian ka gingta hi, honhilh bangbangin a om ding.
Himahleh, bang tuikulh hiam ah honlenkhe ding ahi, a chi a.
Huan, Adria tuipi ah huihin lehlam lehlam ag a honmutleng a honmut lenga, jan sawm leh jan li a chin janin, janlai hiamin, long mitten koi gam hiam tung dekin a kithei ua;
Huchiin, tui thukdan a the ua, lam sawmnihin a thei ua, huan, sawtlou chikin a teh nawn ua, lam sawm lem lam ngain a thei ua.
Huan, longmeilam ah sikkip li a khia ua, huchilouin jaw suang se munah honlenkhe zenzen kha ding, chih, a lau ua; huan khovak kal a ngaklahta uhi.
Huan, longmiten long malama sikkipte kikhiak ding bawl khempeuhin, long neu tuh tuipi ah a khia ua, long taisan a tum ua.
Hiai lain Paulain, sepaih zaheutu leh sepaihte kiangah, hiaite longa om gige kei uleh bit kei nuteh, a chi a.
Huchiin, sepaihten longneu khaute a attat ua, a khahta uhi.
Huan, khovak kuanin, Paulain an ne dingin mi tengteng a sawla, tuni ni sawm leh li a hita, bangmah ne louin na ngak ua, na ngawl nilouh uhi.
Huaijiakin, an ne dingin ka honsawl chiat ahi; na damna ding uhi; na lak uah kuamah a samzang khat leng a mangthang kei ding, a chi a.
Huan, huai thu a gen khitin tanghou a la a, mi tengteng maah Pathian kiangah kipahthu a genta a; huan, a balkhama, a ne panta hi.
Huan, amau leng khamuang takin a om ua, an a ne samta uh.
Huan, long a mi tuh ka vek un za nih leh sawmsagih leh guk ka hi ua.
Huan, an a nek kham khit un, buh tuh tuipi ah a pai ua, long a hihjang deuh uhi.
Huan, ni a suahin, koilai gamahia chih a theikei ua; himahleh, koilai longkhawlna hiam piautak nei khat a mu ua, huai tungah, a hih theih uleh, long taikhiak sak a tum uhi.
Huan, sikkip khihnate a attat ua, tuipi ah a nusia ua; tua lai mahin kaihheina khihnate a phel ua, malam puanjak tuh huih mut ding danin a kaitou ua; piautak a juanta uhi.

Himahleh, tuikihawt khauh nih kituahna munah ka lutkha zenzen ua, long tuh lei a susakta ua; huchiin, long malam a tang bikbekta a, hihtat zoh louhin a oma, a meilam bel tuikihawt a hat jiakin a kek gawp panta hi. 4
Huan, sepaihten hentate hihlup a sawm ua, huchilouin jaw tui liau galkai khattou a om kha ding ua, a taimang kha ding uh chih a lau ua.
Himahleh, sepaih zaheutuin Paula humhing a uta, a thiltup uh a kham a; tuiliau siam peuhmah tuipi ah tawm khiaka gam nakaimasak ding leh,
mi dang, a khen singpek tung khawnga, a khen long van tung khawnga galkai dingin thu a pia hi. Huchiin, a vek un gamah bittakin a galkai vekta uhi.
Huan, ka galkai khit un, tuikulh min tuh Melita ahi chih ka theita uhi.
Huan, melmakten hehpihtak ngelin honna hehpih ua; vuah a hongzuk jiak leh vot jiakin mei a toh ua, ka vek un a honna kipahpih uhi.
Huan, Paulain sing lom khat a toma, mei ah a chiha, a sat jiakin gul a hongpawt khia a, a khut a tu a, a kipden a.
Huan, melmakten ganhing a khuta kikhai den a muh un, hiai mi tualthat ahi ding, tuipi akipanin taikhe mahleh diktatnain a hin a phalta lou ahi, a chi ua.
Himahleh, aman ganhing tuh mei ah a singkhia a, bangmah a chi kei hi.
Amau bel a bawk hiam, thakhata sia puk pah hiam dingin a gingta ua; huan, sawtpi a ngak nilouh ua, bangmah a chi kei chih a theih un a lungsim uh a kheng ua, Pathian ahi, a chi jaw uhi.
Huan, huai min kiangah huai tuikulh a hausapa a min Publia a oma, huai miin a hon naompiha, nit hum kipaktakin a hontungsak hi.
Huan, Publia pa khosik leh santen veiin a nalum a; huan, Paula a kiangah a luta, a thuma, a tungah a khut a koiha, a hihdamta hi.
Huai a hih khitin huai tuikulh a mi dang natna nei peuhmah a hong ua; a dam chiatta uhi.
Huai mitten nakpi takin a honna pahtawi ua; huan, ka pai ding un ka vante uh long ah a koih uhi.
Huan, kha thum nungin, Aleksandria kho long a min, Unau-Phik, a chih uh, phalbi tuikulh a omsa, huai long ah ka paita ua.
Huan, Sirakasi khua ka tawn ua, huaiah ni thum ka tam uh.
