Huai akipanin ka pai kawi ua, Rejiam khua ka tung ua; huan, ni khat nungin sim huih a hongnunga, a jing nawnin Puteoli khua ka tung nawn uhi;
Huaiah unaute ka mu ua, a kiang uah ni sagih tam dingin a honkhou ua; huchibangin Rome kholam ah ka pai jelta uhi.
Huan, unauten, ka tanchin uh a jak tak un huai akipanin Appia Dawl leh Khualbuk thumte chiangah hongdawn dingin a hongkuan ua; Paulain huai mite a muhin Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gena, a muangta hi.
Huan, Rome khua a ka lut un Paula bel a vengpa sepaih kianga amah kia a om a phal ua.

Huan, ni thum nungin, Paulain Judate heutu deuh peuhmah a samkhawm a; huan, a kihoukhawm ua, a kiang uah. Unaute aw, mi tengteng leh i pipute dan tungah bangmah ka hih louhin leng Jerusalem khua akipanin Rome khua a mite kiangah a honhentasak uhi.
Huan, amau a honetchet khit un sihna khop hial ka tungah bangmah a om louh jiakin khah a hontum ua.
Himahleh, Judaten huai a sel jiak un Kaisar kiang tun lou thei ka hita keia; himahleh, ka chite hekna neia hih ka hi kei ahi.
Huailam thua noumau honmu ding leh, honhoupih dingin ka honsam ahi; Israelte lamet ka kikoppih jiaka hiai khainiang bun ka hi ngala, a chi a.
Huan, amau, a kiangah, na tanchin Judia gama kipan lain ka mu tuankei uh, unaute kuamahin hiaia hongom na tungah, thubuai bangmah leng a pulak kei ua, gen leng a gen ngeikei uhi.
Himahleh, hiai pawl jaw gam tengah gensiat ahi ngal ua, nang bangchin ahia na ngaih? theih ka ut uhi, a chi ua.

Huan, ni achiam ua, huai a tuna ah a kiangah mi tampi a hong ua; jinga kipanin nitaklam phain a kiang uah huai thu a hilhchiana, Pathian gam thu a theisaka, Mosi dan laibu thu leh Jawlneite laibu thuin Jesu lamah amau a thuzoh jel hi.
Huan, a khenin a thugen a gingta ua, a khenin a gingta kei uh.
Huan, a kituakta kei ua, Pualain thu a gen khitin a paikhe ta uhi. A thugen tuh hiai ahi, Kha Siangthouin jawlnei Isai kama na pipute uh kianga a gen mah, a dik mahmah.
Hiai chite kiangah vagen in, Bilin jaw na za na ding ua, a ngaihna jaw na theikei hial ding ua; muh jaw na mu ding ua, theih jaw na theikei hial ding uh:

Hiai chite lungtang a na takta a, a bilte uh a nangong deuha, a mit uh leng a si ua, huchilouinjaw a mit un a mu ding ua, a bil un a za ding ua, a lungtang un leng a thei ding uh, akiheikik ding ua, ken ka hihdam kha ding hi, a chi a, a chihpen.
Huaijiakin Pathian hotdamna thu Jentelte kianga khakkhiak ahi chih thei un, amau jaw ngaih leng a ngaikhe ding uh, a chi a.
Huchia hiai thute a gen khit nungin, Judate tuh a pawtkheta ua, amau lakah nakpitaka kiselna a nei uhi.
Huan, Paula kum nih vengveng amah in khelhah oma, a kianga hoh peuhmah a nakipahpih a,
Pathian gam thu a hilha, Toupa Jesu Kris thu leng hangsan takin a gen jela, kuamahin amah lah a kham kei uh.
Paula, Jesu Kris sikha, sawltak hi dinga sap, Pathian Tanchin Hoih lama khenkhiak,
huai tuh Pathianin tuma lama laisiangthoua a jawlneitea achiamsa,
A tapa, sa lama David suana piang tungtang tanchin hoih.
Siangthouna kha lam thua misi laka thohnawnnaa Pathian Tapa thilhihtheihna toh hi dinga genkhiak thu; Jesu Kris i Toupa ngei tuh,
a min jiaka ginna nam chih laka mi gingta sak dingin, amah jiakin hehpihna leh sawltak hihna i tangta hi;
huai lakah nou leng Jesu Kris sapte na hi uhi:
Rome khua Pathian deihtak, mi siangthoua om dinga sapte tengteng kiangah: Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Khovel tengtengah na ginna thu uh a than jiakin na vek ua tungah ka kipahnathu Jesu Kris jiakin ka Pathian kiangah ka gen masa phot ahi.
Ka thumnate ah, tawplouin na min uh ka lou nilouhlouh hi, chih, a Tapa Tanchin Hoiha ka khaa a na ka sep gige Pathian tuh kei hontheihpihpa ahi ngala;
Tu beka na kiang ua ka hongna dingin Pathian thuthua zin hun lemtang ka muh teitei theihna ding ngenin.
Na kipna ding ua kha lam thilpiak bang hiam nou ka honpiak theihna dingin nou honmuh ka ut thei mahmah ngala;
Huai tuh na ginna uh leh ka ginnaa i kikhamuan tuah theihna dingin, ka chihna ahi.

Huan, unaute aw, Jentel dangte kianga ka sep gim gah ka muh tak bangmahin, noumau lakah leng gahte ka muh theihna dingin na kiang uah tamvei pi hong ka tumta chih na theih louh uh ka deih kei hi; himahleh, tuma tengin dalin ka om gige nak hi.
Grik mite leh melmakte kiangah bat ka nei a; mi pil leh mi pilloute kiangah leng.
Huchiin, nou Rome khuaa omte kiang ah leng Tanchin Hoih gen ka ut mahmah hi.
Tanchin Hoih tuh ka zahpih keia; kuapeuh a gingta phota dingin hotdamna dinga Pathian thilhihtheihna ahi ngala; atungin Juda mi adin ahi a, huan, Grik mi adingin leng a honghi nawn hi.
Huaiah tuh gin semsemna dingin, ginnain Pathian diktatna latsakin a om; Ginna jiaka midiktat tuh a hing ding, chi-a gelh bangin.
Thutak diklou taka dalte Pathian limsaklouhna leh diktatlouhna tengteng tungah van akipanin Pathian hehna a hongkilangta ngala;
Pathianin a theihsak tak jiakin Pathian tanchin theihtheih ding tuh a lungsim uah chiangtaka theih sakin a om ngala.
Khovel siamtunga kipan a pianken muhtheihlouh, a tangtawn thilhihtheihna leh a Pathianna, thilsiam te achiantaka muh ahi; huaijiakin paulam ding a neikei uh;
Pathian theingala Pathian bangin a pahtawi kei ua, kipahthu leng a gen sam kei uhi; thil thulimlou a ngaihtuah zota ua, a lungtang hai uh a hongmialta hi.
Pil kisa khemin mihai a hongsuak ua,
sitheilou Pathian thupina sethei mihingte leh vasate, gamsate leh bokvak ganhingte limin a suaksak uhi.
Huaijiakin a sa uh zumhuaipia kibawltuah dingin a lungtang uh duhgawlna banga thilnin hih phalin Pathianin a lehngatsan hi.
Pathian thutak tuh juaua tangsakin, a Bawlpa biak sangin a bawl niain a na a sem zota uhi. A Bawlpa tuh khantawna phat tuak ahi, Amen.
Huai jiakin Pathianin zahhuaipia huk phalin lehlam a ngatsan ahi; a numeite nangawn un leng a omdan pianpih uh danlou banga om dingin a kibawl lamdang ngal ua;
pasalten leng numei zatdan ngeina tawpsana, hukin a kienlah ua, pasal leh pasal zummoh thil hihin a om ua, a gitlouh man muh ding uh tuh a satung uah a mu uhi.
Huan, Pathian theih a ut louh jiak un, thil kilawmloute hih dinga a deih louhlam lungsim neih phalin Pathianin a lehngatsante;
Huchin diktatlouhna tengteng, gitlouhna tengteng, huaihamna tengteng, huatna tengteng khawng in, a nadim ua; hajatna te, tual thahna te, kiselna te, khemna te, nundan hoih lou tein a dim ua;
gensiatna te, migenna te, Pathian huat lam te, kisaktheihna te, kisatheimite, thil gilou bawlkhete,
nu leh pa thu mangloute, theihna beite, thuchiam susete, itna pianpih neiloute, hehpihna neiloute ahi ua.
Huchi banga hihte tuh si tak him ahi uh chih Pathian dan tuh thei gigein, amau kiaa hih leng hi louin, mi dang hih jelte tungah leng a kipak uhi.

Huaijiakin, mihing aw, mi selhat kuapeuh himahlechin, pau lam himhim na neikei hi; midang na selna mahah nangmah leh nangmah siamlouh kitang sak na hi; nang selhatin leng huchibang thilte tuh na hih sam ngala.
Huchibang thil hih nakte tungah Pathian vaihawmna tuh diktak in a tung chih i thei ngala.
Mihing aw, huchibang thil hih nakte gensia, nang leng huchibang na hih sam ngal naka Pathian vaihawmna pelh na kigingta ahia?
A hihkeileh, Pathian hoihna tuh kisiknaa nang honpi dinga om ahi chih theilouin, a hoihna, a thuaktheihna leh, a dohtheihna hauhnate na ngaineu ahi a?
Na chihmoh leh na lungtang khauh jiakin, hehna leh Pathian vaihawmna diktat hongkilatna ni chiang adingin, na tungah hehna na kikhol khawm tawm ahi.
Pathianin mi chih a thil hih bang jel un a hawmsak dinga;
thil hoih hih teiteia, thupina leh pahtawina leh manthat theihlouhna zong mite kiangah, khantawn hinna a pe ding;
a hihhangin, genhaka, thutak jui lou a, gitlouhna jui zote tungah, hehna leh thangpaihna te, haksatna leh lungkhamna thupitakte a om dia;
mihing thil hihkhial tengteng kha tungah a om ding, Juda mi kha tungah a masa dia, huan, Grik mi kha tungah a om nawn ding.
Ahihhangin, thil hoih hih peuhmah kiangah thupinate, pahtawina te, khamuanna te piak ahi ding, Juda mi kiangah piak ahi masa dia, huan, Grik mi kiangah ahi nawn ding.
Pathianin mi deihsk tuam a nein gal keia.
Kuapeuh dan neiloua thil hihkhial tuh, dan louin a mangthang ding hi; huan, kuapeuhmah dan neia thil hihkhial tuh, dana vaihawmin a om ding.
Dan zami phette tuh Pathian mitmuhin mi dik ahi kei ua; dan juite tuh mi dik a hizo ding uh.
Dan neilou Jentelten amau pianpiha dan thilte a hih un, huaiten dan neikeimahleh uh, amau leh amau danin a kinei tawm ngal ua.
A lungtang uah dan thilhih gelh ahi chih a ensak uh, huai tuh a sia leh pha theihna un a theihpih hi; a lungsimte uh tuh a kisela, a thupukna-un siamlouh a tan hiam siam a tan hiam ahi ding,
ka Tanchin Hoih gen banga, mihingte thugukte Pathianin, Jesu Krisa, a ngaihtuah ni chiangin.
Himahleh, nang Juda kichi na hi a, dan na muanga, Pathian na suanga,
a deihlam na theia, thil hoihjaw te hoih na saa, dana hilhin na om a,
nangmah mah mittawte pipa, mial laka omte vakna hiin na kigingta a;
dan ah pilna leh thutak omdan na theih jiakin, mi pilloute hilhpilpa, naungekte hilhpain nakigingta hi;
huchibang na hih ngal leh, nang, midangte hilhpa, nangmah na kihilh ka hia? Nang, mi guta lou dia hilhpa, nang nag u nak maw?
Nang, angkawm lou dia hilhpa, nang ang na kawm nak maw? Nang, milim hopa, nang milim biakina thilte nag u nak maw?
Nang, dan suangpa, nang dana na tatlek jiakin Pathian na hihminse jel ahi maw?
A gelh bang ngei un Pathian min tuh noumau jiakin Jentelte lakah hihsiatin a om ta hi.
Dan juipa na hih leh zeksum a phatuam ngial hi; dana talekpa na hih lebel, na zeksum tuh sum louh bang phet a honghita hi.
Huaijiakin, zeksum lou miin dan thu sehte a zuih leh, a zeksum louh tuh sum banga sim ahi kei dia hia?
Huan, amau saa zeksum louhin dan a zuih kim uleh, nang, danthu gelh leh zeksum nei ngala, dana talekpa a honmohpaih kei ding ua hia?
Alang lela Juda mi hi jaw Juda mi tak ahi kei hi; a langa sa lela zeksum jaw zeksum tak leng ahi sam kei hi.

Ahihhangin, a lang lel hi loua, Juda mi hi, Juda mi tak ahi; huan, zeksum tak tuh, lungsim lama sum ahi, lai thu phetah hi louin, kha ah ahi; huai miin tuh mihing phat a loh keia, Pathian phat a loh jaw ahi.
Ahihleh, Juda min hamphattuamna bang ahia a neih tuan? Zeksum leng bang ahi a phattuamna?
Koi lam peuhah a phattuam hi; Pathian thute a kiang ua kep saka a om jiak ahi pen.
Mi khenkhatten ginna neikei mahle uh, banga hi tuana eita? A gintak louhna un Pathian muanhuaidan bangmah louin a bawl tuan ahia?
Bawl tuan lou hial; Pathian tuh mi diktak hita hen, mi chih tuh juauthei hi uheh; Nang na thu genin siam na tan theia, vaihawm na omin leng na zoh theihna dingin, chih gelh bangin.
Himahleh, i diktatlouhnain Pathian diktatna a hihlat hoih sem leh, bang i gen dia? Pathianin mi a gawtin, mi diktat lou ahi hia? (Mihing dan bangin ka gen a hi).
Hilouhial; huchibang hih leh, Pathianin khovel vai bangchin a hawm dia?
Himahleh ka juauthu gen jiaka Pathian thu dikdan amah hihthupi khophiala a lat sem ngal leh, bangachia kei leng mi khial banga siamlouh tan saka om lai ka hia?

Bang a chi a (hon hek ua, mi khenkhatin gen louhpi hon gen sak bang un). Thil hoih a hongtun theihna dingin thil gilou i hih ding uh, chia i gen jawk louh? Huchibang miten huchibang tuh siamlouh a tan dik him uhi.
Ahihleh amau sangin i hoih zo khol ua hia? Hoihzo lou hial; Judate leh Grikte khelhna sikhaa om vekin tumalamin leng i ngohta vele;
Kuamah mi diktat himhim om kei uh, khat lel leng om het kei uh;
Kuamah theisiam himhim om kei uh, kuamah Pathian zong himhim om kei uh.
A hilou lamah a pial khinta ua, bangmaha phatuam lou in a naom khin vek ua, kuamah thil hoih hih himhim a om kei uh, khat lel leng a om kei uh.
A gawl uh han kihong ahia; a lei un khemna thu a gen ua. A kam sung uah gul gu a om hi.
A kam uh hamse lohna leh thu khain a dima.
A khe uh sisan suah dingin a kin suan uhi;
A lampi uah manthatna leh gimthuakna a om a;
Khamuanna lampi leng a theikei uhi.
A mit uah Pathian laudansiamna himhim a om kei, chih gelh bangin.
Danin bangpeuh a gen, dan thuthua omte kiangah a gen ahi chi hi thei ngala; kam chiteng a chih theihna dingin leh khovela mi tengteng Pathian vaihawma a om theihna ding un.
Huchiin, dan thil hih jiakin mi kuamah a mitmuhin siamtangin a om kei ding uh; dan jiakin khelhna theih kimna a hongom ahi ngala.
Ahihhangin, tun bel dan leh jawlneite natheihsak Pathian dikna tuh dan tellou-a hihlatin a omta;
huai tuh Jesu Kris gintak jiaka, a gingtate tengteng adia Pathian diktatna ahi. Lamdanna himhim a om kei:
mi tengtengin thil a hihkhelh ua, Pathian thupina a tan zohlouh nungun,
Kris Jesu-a om tatna jiakin, a hehpihnaa a thawna siamtansakin a om uh;
amah tuh a sisan jiaka thuphatawina hiin, ginnaa muh dingin Pathianin a luikheta. Hiai tuh Pathian dikna latsakna ding ahi, aman a dohtheihna jiaka nidanglai khelhnate a paikan tak jiakin;
huan, amah ngei tuh a dika, chih leh Jesu-a ginna nei mi tuh siam a tangsak chih chetna dingin.
Na otna uh koia om ahia leh? Posiahin a omta. Bang danin ahialeh? Thil hihna danin hia? Hi lou hial, ginna danin ahi jaw.
Huchiin, dan thilhih hi louin, ginnaa min siam tangin i sep uhi.
Pathian, Judate Pathian ka hia? Jentelte Pathian leng ahi sam ka hia? Hi e, Jentelte-a leng ahi.
Pathian khat kia a hih jiakin; huan, aman zeksumte a ginna jiakun, huan, zeksumlouhte a ginna jiakun siam a tangsak ding.
Huchi a hih leh dan tuh bangmah louin i bawl ua hia? Bawl lou hial. Dan tuh i hihkip jaw uhi.
Ahihleh, Abraham sa dana I pu un, bang ahia a muh i gen ding?
Abrahamin thilhih jiaka siam a tan ngalleh, suan ding a nei ahi, Pathian maah jaw hi hetlouin.
Laisiangthouin bang a gena ahia? Abrahamin Pathian a ging taa, huan, huai ginna tuh a diknaa seh ahi, chiin a gen ahi.
Huan, nasemmi loh tuh hehpihna a seh ahi keia, bata seh ahi jaw hi.
Ahihhangin, na sem loua, Pathian limsaklou siamtangsakpa gingta zomi ginna tuh, amah diktatna a seh ahi.
Mi, a thilhih ngaihtuah loua, Pathianin diktata a seh, vual a jawl sak thu David in leng,
A tatleknate uh ngaihdama om leh, a khelhnate uh khuha omte, a hampha uhi,
Toupan khelhna neia a seh louhte a hampha uhi, chia a gen bangin.
Ahihleh, huai hamphatna zeksumte tungah kia hia a om, zeksumloute tungah leng? Abraham ginna a diktatna seh ahi, i chi ngala.
Huai bangchi seh ahia leh? A zeksum nungin hia, a zeksum main? A zeksum nungin ahi keia, a zeksum ma in ahi jaw hi.
Huchiin, zeksumlouh a hih laia ginna jiaka diktatna a muh chiamtehna dingin zeksum tuh a mu hi. Huchi-a amah tuh zeksumlouhte, ahihhanga gingtaa diktatna sehsaka omte, tengteng pa ahih theihna ding.
Huan, huchimah banga, zeksumte, ahihhanga zeksum phet hilou-a i pa uh Abrahamin zek a sum maa ginna a neih bang ginna neite pa a hihtheihna ding ahi.
Abraham; leh a suante kianga, khovel gouluah ding ahi ding uh chih thuchiam jaw dana kinga ahi keia, ginna jiaka diktatna a kinga ahi jaw hi.
Dan nei mite gouluahte hi ding hile ubel, ginna bangmahin a phatuam keia, thuchiam leng thuchiam ahita kei hi.
Danin hehna a tun nak ngala; himahleh dan omlouhna ah tatlekna leng a om kei hi.

Huaijiakin, thuchiam tuh hehpihna a piak a hihtheihna dingin ginnaa kinga ahi, suante tengtengin thuchiam pellou-a a luah theihna dingun. Dan nei mite kian a luah kei ding ua, Abraham neih bang ginna neiten leng a luah sam ding uhi; amah tuh i vek ua pa ahi ngala.
Nam tampite pain ka honbawlta, chia gelh bangin, misite hihhingpa leh thil omloute om bang a genpa a gin Pathian mitmuh ah eite paa bawlin a om hi.
Lamet tuaka a om louhin leng aman jaw lamen takin a gingta a, chi tampite pa a honghih theihna dingin: Tua bangin na suante a honghi ding uh, chia hilha a om bangin.
Huan, ginna kiplou tuan louin, a pumpi sisa banga om tuh a ngaihtuaha, (amah kum ja khawng mi ahi ngala), Sara ching leng a ngaihtuah sama.
Himahleh, ginna tasamin Pathian thuchiam a ging lel keia, Pathian a pahtawia,
A thuchiam a lohching sak thei chih leng a gingta mahmaha, a ginna a hongkip zota hi.
Huaijiakin a ginna tuh a diktatna a seh ana hita.
Huchiin, a ginna tuh a diktatna seh ahi chih amah jiak kiaa gelh ahi keia, eite jiakin leng ahi.
Jesu i Toupa misi laka kipana kaithoupa gingtate i hia. I ginna tuh diktatna a seh ahi ding hi.
Huai Jesu tuh i tatlekna jiaka matsaka om a, siam i tanna dinga kaihthoha om ahi.
Huaijiakin, ginna jiaka siamtansaka omin i Toupa Jesu Kris pansanin Pathian toh kilemin i om uhi.
Amah pansan mahin hiai hehpihna ah I lut ua; huaia dingin Pathian thupina i tan ding lametna ah kipakin i om uhi.
Huai kia leng hilou in, I gimthuakna ah leng kipakin I om uh, gimthuaknain kuhkalna a tuna,
Kuhkalnain theihtelna a tuna, theihtelnain lametna a tun chih theiin;
Huan, lametnain tuh honzahlaksak kei, huai Kha Siangthou i kiang ua honpiak pansana Pathian itna i lungtang ua suna a om tak jiakin.
I hat nai louhlaiin, a hun takin Kris tuh Pathian limsakloute sikin a hongsita ngala.
Mi dik sika sih, mi a ut ngel kei hial ding ua, mi hoih sikin bel mi kuahiam bekin sih a ngap khamoh kei ding.
Himahleh, Pathianin a hon itna a langsakta mi khialte i hih laia Kris I sika a sihna ah.
Huchiin, a sisana siamtan saka i om khit nungin, amah jiakin Pathian hehna laka kipan hotdamin i om mahmah ngei ding hi.
Melma i hih laia bawn a Tapa sihna jiaka Pathian toh nakitam khin i hih ngal un tuh, kitama i om khit nung un a hinna jiakin hotdamin i om sem ding hi.
Huchi kia leng ahi keia, kitamna tua honmu sakpa i Toupa Jesu Kris jiakin Pathian ah leng i kipak ahi.
Huchiin, mi khat jiakin khelhna khovelah a luta, khelhna jiakin sihna a luta, huchimahbangin mi tengtenga jelsuakta hi.
Dan om ma in khovel ah khelhna a om khin ngala; dan a om louh laiin khelhna tuh khelhna a sim ahi kei hi.
Himahleh, Adam oma kipan Mosi om phain Adam tatlekna banga thil hih khial loute tungah leng sihnain vai a hawm jel hi. Adam tuh hongpai ding tehpihna ahi.

Himahleh, thilthawnpiak jaw tatlekna toh a kibang kei. Mi khat tatlekna jiaka mi tampi a sih ua leh Pathian hehpihna leh mi khat Jesu Kris hehpihna thilthawnpiak tuh a kiching zosema mi tampi tunga vuhin a om.

Huan, thilthawnpiak tuh mi khat tatlekna gah toh leng a kibang sam kei. Mi khat tatlekna tunga vaihawmna in siamlouh tansakna a tuna, mi tampi tatlekna tunga thilthawnpiakin bel siam tansakna a tun hi.
Mi khat tatlekna jiaka sihnain huai mi khat mah pansana vai a hawm leh, hehpihna kiningching mahmah leh diktatna thawnpiak tangten mi khat Jesu Kris pansanin hinna a vai a hawm zosem ding uhi.
Huan, mi khat tatleknain mi tengteng adinga siamlouh tansakna a tut mah bangin, mi khat diktatna thilhih-in mi tengteng adingin suahtakna leh hinna a hontun hi.
Banghanghiam i chih leh, mi khat thumanlouhna jiaka mi tampi mikhiala bawl ahih bangun, mi khat thumanna jiakin mi tampi mi diktata bawl ahi ding uhi.
Khelhna latsak sem nadingin Dan a hongom behlapa; Ahihhangin khelhna a khanna peuh ah hehpihna a khang sem,
Huchia, khelhnain sihnaa vai a hawm bangtaka, hehpihna inleng i Toupa Jesu Kris pansana diktatna jiaka khantawn hinna donga vai a hawm theihna dingin.
Bang i genta dia leh? Hehpihna a khan sem theihna dingin khelhna ah i om nilouh ding ua hia?
Om nilouh lou hial ding. Eite khelhna lama sisa, khelhna ah bangchin i hing thei lailai dia?
Eite Kris Jesu-a baptis luta om tengteng a sihna ah baptis lutin i om chih na theikei ua hia?
Huaijiakin a sihna a baptis luta omin amah toh vuikhawmin i om uhi, huchia Pa thupinain misi laka kipana Kris a kaihthohtak banga eite leng hinna thaka i khosak theihna dingin.
A sihna ki batpih a amah toh i kizop khit ngal un tuh, a thohnawnna kibatpihin leng i kizom sam ding hi.
I mihing lui a kiangah kilhdenin a om samta chih i thei; huchia khelhna pumpi hihmanthata a om theihna ding leh tua kipana khelhna sikhaa i om louhna dingin.
Kuapeuh sisa tuh, khelhna lakah a suakta ta ngala.
Huan, Kris kianga I suh sam tak aleh, a kiangah I hing sam ding chih I gingta ahi;
Kris tuh misi laka kipan kaihthohin a oma, a si nawn kei ding chih i thei ngal ua; sihnain amah tungah thu a neita kei hi.
A sihna tuh khelhna lam thu ah khantawna din khat vei kia a si ahi, a hinna bel Pathian lam thu ah a hing ahi.
Huchi mahbangin nou leng khelhna lam thu ah sisain kisep unla, Pathian lam thu ah bel Kris Jesu ah hingin kisep un.
Huaijiakin, na pumpi uh duhgawlna thu mang dingin na pumpi si thei uah khelhna vaihawm sak kei un.

Na pumpi hiangte uh leng diklouhna vanzat dingin khelhna kiangah pe phal sam kei un; a hihhangin misi laka kipan hing nawn bangin Pathian kiangah kipia unla, na pumpi hiangte uh leng dikna vanzat dingin Pathian kiangah pe phal jaw un.
Banghianghiam i chih leh, khelhnain na tunguah thu a nei takei ding, dan vaihawma om na hi kei ua, hehpihna vaihawma om na hi jaw uhi.
Bangchin ahi dia leh? Dan vaihawm a om i hih kei ua, hehpihna vaihawma om i hih jawk jiakin i khial ding uh ahi diam?

Hilou hial ding. Kua kiang peuhah leng a thu mang dinga a sikha dia na lut un tuh sihna khopa khelhna sikha hiam, dikna khopa thu mang sikha hiam, a thu na man uh sikha na hi uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Ahihhangin, khelhna sikha nahita mahle uchin, thuginpi huaia na kipiakna uh, lungtang taktakin na juita ua, Pathian kiangah kipahthu om heh;
Khelhna laka kipan suahtak sakin nong om ua, dikna sikhate na honghita uhi.

Na sa uh hat louh jiakin mihing danin thu ka gen hi; na sa hiangte uh nitna kiang leh, tatlekna dinga tatlekna kianga sikha dia na piak phal bang un, tuin na sa hiangte uh sangthouna dingin dikna kiangah sikha dingin pe phal un.
Khelhna sikhate na hih lai un dikna lakah na siang ua.
Tua na thil zahpih sate uah, huai laiin gah bang ahia nanamuh jel uh?
Huai thil tawpna jaw sihna a nahi nak ahi. Tunah bel khelhna laka hihsianga omin, Pathian sikhate na honghih un, siangthouna mu khopin na gah uh na nei uh a keihiam, huai tawpna khantawna hinna toh.
Khelhna man tuh sihna ahi ngala Pathian thilthawnpiak bel i Toupa Kris Jesu jiakin khantawna hinna ahi.
Ahihleh, unaute aw, danin mi a dam sung teng a tungah vai a hawm nak chih na theikei ua hia? - dan thei mite kiangah ka gen ahi.
Numei, pasal nei a pasal a dam sung teng dana a pasala henkhawmin a om ahi; himahleh, a sihin, pasal lamah dan akipan khahin a om ahi.
Hichiin, a pasal dam sunga mi dang a kitenpih leh, Angkawm, chih ahi ding hi; a pasal a sihin bel huai dan akipan khahin a oma, huchiin, mi dang nei leh leng angkawm ahi kei hi.
Huan, ka unaute aw, Pathian lama i gah theihna dingin midang, misi laka kipan kaihthoh ngeingei na kitenpih theihna ding un, Kris pumpi pansanin dan lamah hihsihin na omta uhi.
Sa a i om lai un dan jiaka khelhna utna hongsuakten, i sa hiangte ah, sihna khopa gah dingin, a sem naka.
Tuin bel honlenpa lakah sikhinin, dan akipan khahin i omta, laigelh lui bang lel hi loua, Khaa hinna thaka na i sep theihna dingin.
Bang i genta dia leh? Dan khelhna hia? Hi lou hial. Himahleh, dan jiaka theih hi keileh, khelhna theilou ding hi ing a; danin, eng ken, chi kei leh, eng chih theilou ding hi inga.
Himahleh, khelhnain, thupiak jiakin, lemtan lai muin enna chiteng ka sungah a om saka.
Dan lou injaw khelhna si ahi. Huan, tumalamin kei dan louin ka hinga; himahleh thupiak a hongom takin khelhna a honghalh a, kei ka sita hi.
Huan, hinna thuchiam nei thupiak tuh keidin sihna a honghi chih ka na theita.
Khelhnain thupiak jiakin, lemtan lai muin honkhema, thupiak zangin a honhihlumta hi.
Huchiin, dan tuh a siangthou ahi, thupiak leng a siangthou a, adika, a hoih ahi.

Ahihleh, thil hoih keia din sihna a honghi ahia? Hilou hial. Khelhna kei sin sihna a honghi zo ta ahi. Huchiin, khelhna tuh khelhna ahi chih a lat theihna dingin thil hoih zangin a honhihlum ahi; thupiak jiaka khelhna tuh khelhna thupitak a honghih theihna dingin.
Dan tuh khalam thil ahi chih i thei ngal ua, kei bel sami khelhna a khotsa ka hi.
Thil ka hihpen, a dan ka theikei; ka thil hih jelpen, ka thihih utlam ahi ngal keia, ka thil huatlam tak ka hih zo nak ahi.
Ka hih ut louh lam ka hih ngalin, dan a hoih chih pompih ka hi ta hi.
Huaichiangin, ka thilhihpen keimah hih a hita keia, khelhna keimaha om hih ahi jaw hi.
Keimah ah, huai tuh ka sa ah, thil hoih himhim a teng kei chih ka thei: thil hoih hih utna jaw keimah ah a om na a, thil hoih ka hihthei kei.
Hoihna hih ka ut pen ka hih keia, khelhna hih ka ut louhpen, ka hih zo naka.
Ka utlouh lam pen ka hih ngal chiangin, a hihpa tuh kei ka hita keia, khelhna keimaha ompen ahi jaw hi.
Huchiin, hiai dan ka hontheita; thil hoih hih ka ut laiin gitlouhna ka kiangah a hongom nak ahi.
Ka lungsim taktakin Pathian dan tungah ka kipak ngal naka;
Himahleh, ka sa hiangte ah dan tuam a om chih ka thei, huaiin ka lungsim dan a dou a, ka sa hiangtea khelhna dan om kiangah salin a honpi nak hi.
Mi genthei hina lawmlawm ing e! Hiai sihna pumpi lakah kuan ahia honsuakta sak ding?
Jesu Kris i Toupa jiakin Pathian kiangah kipahthu ka gen ahi. Huchiin, keimah takin jaw ka lungsimin Pathian dan ka sema, ka sain tuh gitlouhna dan a sem hi.
Huaijiakin, tun jaw Kris Jesu a omte adingin, siamlouh tansakna himhim a omta kei hi.
Kris Jesu a Hinna Kha dan in khelhna leh sihna dan akipan honsuakta sakta ngala.
Sa jiaka dan a hat louh a, ahihtheih vual louh tuh, Pathianin, amah Tapa ngei, khelhna sa gilou bang puin, khelhna thoihna dia honsawlin, sa a khelhna om tuh siamlouh a tangsakta ahi,
Sa dan juilou a Kha dan jui zote eimaha danin a ngiat diktatna tuh tangtuna a om theihna dingin.
Sa dana omten sa lam thilte a lunggulh nak uh; Kha dana omten bel Kha lam thilte a lunggulh nak uhi.
Sa lam thilte deih jaw sihna ahi ngala, Kha lam thil deih bel hinna leh khamuanna ahi;
Sa deihdan jaw Pathian douna a hih jiakin. Huai tuh Pathian danin a om ngal keia, om leng a om theikei himhim ahi.
Huchiin, saa omten Pathian a kipaksak theikei uh.
Himahleh, Pathian Kha noumaua a om taktak leh, saa om na hi kei ua, Khaa om na hi jaw uhi. Ahihhangin kuapeuh Kris Kha neilou jaw amaha ahi kei.
Kris noumaua om ngal leh, khelhna jiakin pumpi a si ahi; kha tuh dikna jiakin a hing ahi.
Himahleh misi laka kipan Jesu kaithou nawnpa Kha nou maua a om leh, misi laka kipan Kris Jesu kaithou nawnpan, noumaua om a Kha pansanin na pumpi sitheite uh a hihhing sam ding hi.
Huaijiakin, unaute aw, bat i nei; sa dana om dingin sa lakah bel ahi kei;
Sa dana na om u leh, na si mahmah ding uhi; ahihhangin pumpi thilhihte Kha a na hihlup jel u leh na hing ding uhi.
Pathian Kha pia om peuhmah te jaw, Pathian tate ahi ngal ua.
Laua om nawn dingin sikha hihna kha na tang uh ahi ngal keia; ta hihna kha na tang uh ahi jaw. Abba! Pa! chia, i kikou chiangin,
Kha mahmahin, eimah kha toh, Pathian tate i hi chih hontheisak hi;
Huan, tate i hih leh, gou luahpihte i hi hi; Pathian gouluahte, Kris luahpihte i hi a; a kianga pahtawia i om sam theihna dinga amah i thuakpih taktak leh.
Tulai a thuaknate peuh denchianga i tunga thupina hihlat ding toh tehpihthamin kasep kei.
Thilsiam tengteng ten, lamen mahmah in, Pathian tate honglatna a ngaklah mahmah ngal ua.
Thilsiam tengtengte thil thulimlou thuthua om sakin a omta uh; a ut ua om ahi kei ua, lametnaa a omsakpa jiak ahi jaw hi;
Thilsiam tengteng leng siatna sikhaa kipan suahtaksakin a om ding ua, Pathian tate noplenna thupia lut ding ahi ngal ua.
Thilsiam tengteng tu tanin thum leh nauveina thuakin a om uh chih i thei ngal ua.
Thilsiamte kia hilou-in, eite ngei, Kha gahmasa tengte leng, ta hihna kilatna, i pumpi tatna ngakin i lungsimin i mau sam ngal ua.
Hiai lametnaa hotdam i hi ngal ua. Himahleh muh theih gige lametna jaw lametna ahi kei. Kuan a muh theih gige a lamena?
I muh louhpen i lamet lebel i ngak teitei hi.
Huchimahbangin, Khain i hatlouhna ah hon huh jel; bangchia thum ding ahia chih i thei ngal kei ua; himahleh Khain mauna gen vuallouhin honthum sak jel hi.
Huan, Pathian deihlam bang jelin misiangthoute a thum sak jel jiakin, lungtang Enpan Kha deihlam a thei jel ahi.
Huan, Pathian itte, aman a seh banga a sapte adin, a hoihna ding un bangkimin a sep sak chiat chih i thei hi:
A theih kholhte amah Tapa bang taka om dingin a sep khol ngala, a Tapa tuh unau tampite laka ta masapen a honghih theihna dingin.
Huan, a seh kholhte tuh a sam laia; huan a sapte tuh siam a tangsak laia; huan, siam a tansakte tuh a pahtawi lai hi.
Huai thu ah bang i gen dia leh? Pathian ei lama a pan leh kuan ahia hondou thei ding?
Amah Tapa ngei leng hawi loua, i vek ua dinga pepan thil tengteng leng a thawnin a honpe tawk kei dia hia?
Pathian mi telte kuan ahia hek ding? Siamtangsakpapen Pathian ahi ngala.
Kuan ahia siamlouh tangsak ding? Si pen Kris Jesu ahi ngala; ahi, thou nawn zotaa, Pathian taklama oma hon-gensakpa ahi.
Kris itna akipan kuan ahia honkhen ding? Gimthuaknain hia, lungngaihnain hia, sawina in hia, tamin hia, vuaktanna in hia, lauhhuaina in hia, temsauin hia honkhen ding?
Nangmah jiakin ni tumin thahin ka om uh; belam goh dingte banga sim ka hi uh, chih gelh bangin.
Khen lou hial ding, huaite tengtengah, honitna jiakin, vualtungtuangte sanga tungtuang jaw i hi hi.
Sihna hiam, hinna hiam, angelten hiam. Lalnate hiam. Thilomlelte hiam, thilhongomdingte hiam, thilhihtheihna hiam,
Sanna hiam, thukna hiam, thilsiam dangte himhim hiamin leng, i Toupa Kris Jesua om Pathian itna akipan, honkhen theikei ding chih diktakin ka thei ngala.
Kris ah thu taktak ka gen ahi, ka juau kei, kha Siangthou ah ka sia leh pha theihnain leng hontheihpiha,
Ka lungtang ah haksakna thupitak leh lunggaihna dai theilou ka pai ahi.
Ka unaute sa lama ka chi pihte sikin, kei pen Kris kianga kipan hihtuam khop hialin hamse thuakin om hial leng ka chi ngala.
Isreal mi ahi ngal ua; ta hihna bang, thupina bang, thukhun tengteng bang, dan piakna bang, Pathian nasepna bang, thuchiam tengteng bang, amaua ahi a;
Pipute leng amaua ahi ua, sa lam thu ah Kris leng amau laka kipan a hongpawt ahi a; amah thil tengteng tunga om, khantawn phat tuak Pathian ahi. Amen.
Himahleh, Pathian thu bangmahlou banga omta ahi keia. Isreal suante Isreal mi ahi vek kei uhi;
Abraham suante a hih jiak un a vek un a tate leng ahi kei uhi; Isaak ah na suante a kiminloh ding, chih ahi jaw hi.
Huai tuh, sa tate Pathian tate ahi kei ua, thuchiam tate Abraham suana seh ahi jaw uh, chihna ahi.
Thuchiam pen tuh hiai ahi: Tu hun bangin ka hong dia, Sarain ta a nei ding chih.
Huai phet ahi kei Rebekain leng i pu Isaak laka nau a pai laiin,
Naupangte a pian ma un, sia leh pha a hih ma un, thilhih jiak hilou in, a sampa deih jiak hi jawin, tel lam thu ah Pathian thu seh tuh a kip theihna dingin-a kiangah;
A upa jawin a naupang jaw na a sem ding, Pathianin a chi ahi.
Jakob ka it a, Esau jaw ka hua, chih gelh bangin.
Bang I genta ding ua leh? Pathian ah diktatlouhna a om ahia?
Om lou hial. Aman, Ka hehpih peuhmah ka hehpih dia, zah ka ngaihna tung peuhmah ah zah ka ngai ding, chiin, Mosi kiangah a genta ngal a.
Huaijiakin, a deihpa jiak ahi keia, a taipa jiak leng ahi sam keia, a hehpihpa Pathian jiak ahi jaw hi.
Laisiangthou in Pharo kiangah, Hiai jiak takin ka hontungding ahi, nanga ka thilhihtheihna ka taklat theihna ding leh, leitung tengtenga ka min a than theihna dingin, achi ngal a.
Huchiin, Pathianin a ut peuhpeuh a hehpiha, a ut peuhpeuh leng a genhak sak ahi.
Nou, ka kiangah, Bangdia hondem ahia? A deihlam kuan ahia kalh? Non chi ding uh a hih tuak.
Ahi, himahleh, mihing aw, Pathian nial vialpa kua na hia leh? Thilsiamin, a siampa kiangah, Bang achia hichi banga honsiam? A chi dia hia?
Bellei tang khat apan bel khat kilawm taka, bel khat zatna niama zat ding a bawl din belvelpan bellei tungah thu a neikeia hia?
Hehna bel mangthang dia kilawmte tunga, Pathianin a hehna leh a thilhihtheihna latsak uta, a thuakzoh teitei leh, bang a poi dia, huchia,
Hehpihna bel, thupi dinga a nabawl kholhte tunga, a hehpihna hauhdan a latsak theihna dingin.
Huaite tuh eite i hi-huai hehpihna belte Judate laka kipan kia hilou a, Jentelte laka kipana leng sapte.
Hosia laibu ah, Ka mite hi ngei lou, ka mite, ka chi dia; huan, it ngei louhnu leng Itnu, ka chi ding.
Huan hichi a honghi dia, a kiang ua, Ka mite na hi kei uh, chihna mun ah ngei Pathian hing tate sakin a om ding uh. chih gelh bangin.
Isai in leng Isreal mite thu kikou pihin, Isreal mite jaw tuipi puiaunel zahin tam mahle uh, a gawt bang kia hotdamin a om ding uh.
Toupan kintaka hihzou vekin leitungah a gawt ding thu a tangtun dek ngala, a chi.
Isai mahin, Mipite Toupan chi suah ding honna hawi saklou hileh Sodom khua bangin i naomta ding ua, Gomorra khua banga bawlin i naomta ding, chia a agen kholh bangin.
Bang i genta dia leh? Jentel, diktatna delh louten, diktatna a naphata uh ahi, -ginna jiaka diktatna tuh.
Isreal, diktatna dan delhten, diktatna dan pen a pha zouta kei uh.
Bang hang ahia? Ginnain a delh kei ua, thilhiha muh theih bangin a delh jiak uh ahi. Pukna suangah a pukta ngal ua.
Ngaiin, Zion ah kisuihna suang leh pukna suangpi ka koiha, kuapeuhmah amah gingta tuh a zahlak kei ding, chih gelh bangin.
Unaute aw, ka lungtang deihlam leh amau adia Pathian kianga ka thumna pen jaw, hotdam a hong hihtheihna ding uh ahi
Pathian lamah phatuam a ngai uh chih ka theihpih ahi, himahleh theihna ahihvakin jaw ahi kei uh.
Pathian diktatna theilou in, amau diktatna lamkhiak a tum ua, Pathian diktatna ah a kipe lut samkei uhi.
Kris bel a gingta peuhmahte adin diktatna a muh theihna ding un dan tawpna ahi ngala.
Mosi in, Dana diktatna jui jaw, huai diktatna jiakin a hing ding, chiin, a gelh.
Ginna a diktatnain bel hichin a gen: Na lungsimin, Kua ahia van ah kah ding? Hiam (huai tuh tunglama kipan Kris va pi suk ding, chihna ahi);
Kua ahia khukthuk ah hoh suk ding? Hiam (huai tuh misi laka kipan Kris pi tou nawn ding chihna ahi) chi ken, chiin.
Ahihleh, bang ahia a gen? Thuin a honnaih hi, na kam leh na lungtang ah a om, chiin, a gen ahi; (huai tuh ginna thu ka gengen a hi).
Na kama Jesu Toupa ahi chih na gupa, misi laka kipan Pathianin a kaithou chih na lungtanga na gintak leh hotdamin na om ding, chih.
Min lungtangin a gingta ua, diktatna a mu jel uh; kamin a gum ua, hotdamna leng a mu nak uh ahi.
Laisiangthouin, kuapeuh amah gingta a zahlak kei ding, achi hi.
Juda leh Grik mite bangmah ah a lamdanga tuan kei ua, Toupa khat a vek ua tungah Toupa ahi a, a min lou peuhmahte tungah hoihna a hau ngala.
Kuapeuh Toupa min lou tuh hotdamin a om ding hi.
Ahihleh, a gintak louhpi uh bangchin a lou ding ua? A thu a jak louhpi uh bangchin a gingta ding ua? Thuhilhmi om louin bangchin a za ding ua?
Sawl a hih kei uleh bangchin thu a hilh ding ua? Thil hoih tanchin kipahhuai tunte khe kilawm natel e! chih gelh bangin.
Himahleh, Tanchin Hoih tuh a vek un a ngaikhe kei uhi. Isaiin, Toupa, ka thugen uh kuan ahia gingta? A chi ngala.
Huchiin, ginna tuh jakna jiakin a hong oma, huan, jakna tuh Kris thu kigen jiakin a hongom hi.
Ahihleh, a bil un a za kei ua hia? Za nake; A husa uh gam chih ah a thanga, a thu uh kawlmong phain a thangsuakta. Chih ahi.
Ahihleh, Isreal mitten a za kei ua hia? Chi dia gen thamlouhte ka honhaza sak dinga; chi pilloute zangin ka honsuheh ding, chiin, Mosiin a gen masapen hi.
Huan Isai in hangtakin, hon zongloute muhin ka omta; hon kanloute ka kimusakta, chiin a gena.
Ahihhangin Isreal mite thu ah, mi chihmoh leh selhatte din sun nilouh in kaban ka jak hi, achia.
Ahihleh, Pathianin a mite a pai khia ahia? Pai khelou hial. Kei leng Israel mi, Abraham suan, Benjamin nam ka hi ngala.
Pathianin a mi a theihkholhte a pai khe kei hi. Laisiangthouin Elija thu a gen na theikei ua hia? Aman Israel mite tungthu Pathian kiangah a tuna,
Toupa, na jawlneite a hihlum ua, na maitamte a hihchim ua; keimah kia nutsiatin ka om, kei leng honhihlup a hontum uhi, a chih.
Himahleh, Pathianin bangchin a dawnga? Baal maa khukdin ngeilou mi sang sagih keimah adingin ka hawi ahi, chiin, a dawng hi.
Huchibangin, tulaiin leng a sibang, hehpihna a tel a om.
Hehpihnajiak a hih leh, nasep jiak a hita kei, huchi ahihkeileh, hehpihna tuh hehpihna a hita kei ding.
Bang chi a hita dia leh? Israel mitten a zon uh a mu kei uh. Telten bel a mu uh, a dangte tengteng a nanggawpta uhi.
Pathianin tuni tanin a kiang uah lusukna kha a pia a, muh theihlouhna mitte, jak theihlouhna bilte toh, chih gelh bangin.
Huan, Davidin, A dohkan uh amau adingin thang leh pial leh, pukna leh, phulakna honghi heh;
A theihlouhna ding un a mitte uh hongmial heh, nanga a nungjang uh kun sak gige in, a chi a.
Ahihleh, a kisuih uh a kipuk denna ding uhia? Hilou hial ding. A puk jiak un Jentelte kiangah hotdamna a hong tungzota ahi, Israel mite hajat dingin.
Huchiin, a pukna u bawn khovel hihhauhsakna a hiha, a kiamna uh bawn Jentelte hauhsakna leng a hih leh, a buchin nawn na uh bangchi pheta hamphatna lianjawin a jui de aw!
Huchiin, nou Jentelte kiangah ka gen ahi. Kei Jentelte kianga sawltak ka hih jiakin, ka nasepna pen ka pahtawi ahi,
Huchi-a ka chipihte ka hajat sak theih teiteina ding leh a lak ua khenkhatte ka hotdam theihna dingin.
Amau paih khiakna bawn khovel toh kituah nawn na ahihleh, amau deih nawn na ding sihna akipan hin nawna loungal bang ahi dia?
Huan, gah masa thillat, tangbuang mek them a sianthou leh huchimah bangin a beupi a siangthou hi; huan, a zungpi a siangthou leh ahiangte leng huchi mahbang ahi uh.
Huan, ahiang khenkhat te hih tana a om in, nang, oliv taklou, amau laka phuhlutin na oma, oliv singa hauhna zung kikoppih sam na hih manin,
Hiang dangte lakah kisathei ken. Kisathei mahle chin, nang a zung vakpa na hi keia, huai a zung tuh nang honvakpa ahi jaw hi.
Huan, nang, Phutluta ka om theihna dingin hiangte hihtanin a om khinta vo oi, nachi dia.
Ahi, a gintak louhna jiak un hihtanin a om ua, nang na ginna jiakin na ding ahi, Uang kenla, lau jaw in:
Pathian in hiang taktepen bawn a hawi keingal leh, nang leng a honhawi tuan kei ding hi.
Huchiin, Pathian hoihna leh a thukhauhna ngaihtuah i: a pukte adingin a thukhauhna; nang adingin bel a hoihna, hoihnaa na om gige leh; huchi a hihkeileh, nang leng sat khiakin na om sam ding.
Huan, amau leng, gingta loua a om nilouh kei uleh, phuhlutin a om ding uh; Pathian in amau a phutlut nawn thei ngala.
Nang piandana oliv taklou akipana sat sup bawn, pian dan lou banga oliv sing hoiha phutluta na om leh, tua ahiang taktakte pen, amau oliv sing ngeingeiah phutlut ding nak hih natel unchia!
Unaute aw, hiai thuguk na theih louh uh ka ut keia, huchilou injaw na kipil sak ding uh: Jentelte buchinna a hongtun matan Israel mi khenkhatte tungah siatna a hongtung tadih ahi,
Huchiin, Israel mi tengteng hotdamin a om ding uh; Zion akipanin Hondampa a hong suak dinga, Jakob kianga kipan Pathian limsaklouhna a hihmang ding;
Huan, hiai a kiang ua ka thu khun ding ahi, a khelhnate uh ka lakmang chiangin, chih gelh bangin.
Tanchin Hoih lam ngaihtuah in, nou jiakin melma ahi ua; tel thu lam ngaihtuahin bel a pipute uh jiakin deihtakte ahi uhi.
Pathianin a thilthawnpiak ah leh a sapna ah a lungsim a khel ngei kei hi.
Nidanglaiin Pathian thu na ging kei ua, himahleh tuin amau a gin louh jiak un zahngaihna na mu ngal ua.
Huchi mahbangin, tuin, Pathian in nou a honhehpihna jiak a, zahngaihna a muh theihna ding un amau leng ging lou eita ve ua.
Pathianin a hehpih vek theihna dingin mi tengteng ginlouhnaah a khum vekta ngala.
Pathian pilna leh theihna hauhdan thuk hina tele! A vaihawmnate theihtheih vual leh, a lampite sui theih vual hi keina tele!
Toupa lungsim kuan ahia thei? Kuan a vaihawm saka?
A dit nawn dingin leng a kiangah kuan ahia thil pe masa?
Amah akipan leh, amah jiak leh, amah adingin thil tengteng a hongom ahi ngal a; amah kiangah khantawnin thupina om hen. Amen.
Huchiin, unaute aw, Pathian zahngaihna jiakin, kithoihna hing leh siangthou leh Pathian lungtuak dingin na pumpi uh kilan dingin ka hon ngen ahi; huai tuh na biakna dan ding him uh ahi.
Hiai khovel dan bangin om kei unla; Pathian deihlam a hoih leh, lungtuah huai tak leh, hoihkim, na theihtel theihna ding un, na lungsim uh a thaka omin honglamdang zota un.
Na lak uah kuamah na kilet sak ding hun val ua kilian sak louin, Pathianin mi chih kianga ginna hun a piak bang jela diktaka ngaihtuah zo dingin Pathianin honpiak hehpihna jiakin kon chi chiat ahi.
Pumpi khatah hiang tampi i nei ua, hiang tengteng nasep bel a kibang kei hi,
Huchi mahbangin, eite tampi himah lehang, Kris ah pumpi khat ihi ua: a tuamtuamin I kihiang tuah chiat uhi.
Hehpihna a honpiak dan bang jelin thilthawnpiak tuamtuam i nei chiat uh: thugen ding a hih leh i ginna toh kihunin i gen ding u;
Nasepna ding ahihleh, na i sem chiatchiat ding uh; thuhilhmin leng hilh hiathiat hen;
Taihilhmin leng taihilh geihgeih heh; thilpemin it louin pia heh; vaihawmmin thanuam takin hawm heh; mi hehpihin kipaktakin hehpih heh.
Itna ahihleh lepchiahna tel louin hi heh. Gilou lam hua unla, hoih lam len chinten un.
Unaute it lamah, it takin kilainat tuah chiat un; pahtawi lamah, kideihsak tuah chiat un.
Thanop lamah, thadah kei un; Kha a vakna toh phatuamngaiin Toupa na sem un.
Lametna lamah, kipak unla; gimthuakna lamah, kuhkal unla; thumna lamah, thum teitei unla;
Misiangthoute taksapna ah taksap awnghu unla; mikhualte kipahpihin om nilouh un.
Honsawite vualjawl sak unla, vualjawl unla, hamsiat kei un.
Kipakte kipahpih unla, kapte kahpih un.
Ngaihtuah kibangin om chiat un, Kingaihtuah sang lo kei unla, mi neuneu kithuahpih jaw un. Kipil sak kei un.
Kua gitlouh leng gilouin thuk kei un. Mi tengteng muhin thil kilawm ngaihtuah un.
A theih liai leh, noumau lambek, mi tengteng toh kituakin om un.
Deihtakte aw, phu kila kei unla, Pathian tuh hehna awn jaw un, Phulak himhim kei lak ding ahi, ken ka thuk ding, Toupan a chi, chih gelh ahi ngala.
Huaijiakin, na melma a gilkial leh nek ding pia inla; adangtak leh dawn ding pia in; huchibang na hih leh a lu tungah meiam na sekkhawm ahi ding hi.
Gitlouh zohin om kenla, hoihnain gilou zou jaw in.
Mi chih a tung ua vaihawmte thuthuin om heh. Pathian thu louin kuamah vaihawm a om ngal kei ua; vaihawmmi-a omte Pathian seh ahi uh.
Huaijiakin, kuapeuh vaihawmmi sel tuh Pathian seh kalh ahi; a selten amau tungah vaihawmna a mu ding uhi.
Vaihawmmite thil hoih hihte dingin kihtakhuai ahi kei uhi; thil hoihlou hihte dingin bel kihtakhuai ahi uhi. Ahihleh, vaihawmmi kihtaloua om na ut uhia? Thil hoih hih le uchin a phat na loh ding uh;
Amah tuh na hoihna dingua Pathian nasemmi ahi ngala. Himahleh, kihta un. temsau lah a mawk tawi ngal keia; amah Pathian nasemmi, thil hihkhial tunga heha phulami ahi ngal a.
Huaijiakin, Pathian hehna kihtakna jiak kia hilouin, na sia leh pha theihna jiakun leng vaihawmmi thuthuin na om ding him uh ahi.
Hiai jiakin siah leng na liau jel ve ua leh; huchibang thil ngei hih teitei dingin Pathian nasemmite ahi ngal ua.
Mi tengteng kiangah piak ding peuhmah pia un; leiman piakna dingpa kiangah leiman pia unla, siah liauna dingpa kiangah siah liau unla; kihtak dingpa leng kihta unla; zahtak dingpa leng zahtak un.
Kiittuahna loungal, kuamah bangmah ba kei un; amau mihinpih itpan dan a jui kimta ngal a.
Hiaite, Angkawm ken, Tualthat ken, Gu ken, Eng ken chih leh, thupiak dang om nalai himhimte, Nangmah na kiit bangin na invengte na it ding hi, chihin a khaikhawm vek ngala.
Itna in innvengte a hihse ngeikei a; huaijiakin itna jaw dan zuih kimna ahi.
Huailou -in, tu bang hun ahia chih na thei ua, ihmu khanloh a hun mahmahta chih na thei uh. Tun jaw i gintak tung lai sangin i hotdamna a nai zota ngala;
Jan a bei dekdektaa, khua a vak dekta hi; huaijiakin miala thil hihte paiin vak thuamin i kithuam ding uh.
Sun-a om bangin kilawm takin i om ding uh, zu dawn buai leh zu khama om louin, huk leh kingaihhata om louin, kilai leh kihajaa om louin.
Toupa Jesu Krisin kithuam jaw inla, na sa duhgawlna uh pichin dingin bangmah kibawl kei un.
Huan, ginnaa hatlou mi, a ngaihdante gense louin ngai un.
Mi khatin thil bangkim ne thei din a kigingtaa mi hatlou inbel antelouhing kia a ne hi.
Bangkim neten a neloute simmoh kei henla; nelouten leng a nete gense kei heh; Pathianin amah a kipahpih khin ngala.
Mi dang sikha gensepa kua na hia? a din leh a puk amah toupa ading ahi. Himahleh, amah jaw dinsakin a om ding, Toupan a dingsak thei ngala.
Mi khatin ni khat ni dang sangin a sep thupi tuama, mi dangin ni tengteng kibang chiatin a sep. Mi chih amah lungsim ah kitheichian heh aw.

Ni tangpan Toupa pahtawina dingin a tang ahi. Huan, bangkim nepan, Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gen jiakin, Toupa pahtawina dingin a nea; a neloupan leng Pathian kiangah kipahthu a gena, Toupa pahtawina dingin a ne kei a ahi.
Kuamah eimah adia hing i hi kei ua, kuamah eimah adia si leng i hi sam kei hi.
I hin leh, Toupa adingin i hinga; i sihin leng Toupa adia si ihi ngala: huaijiakin, i hin inleng, i sihin leng Toupaa i hi uhi.
Kris sihna leh honghinnawnna pen tuh, mi hing leh misi Toupa a hih theihna ding ahi ngala.
Himahleh nang bang achia na unau gensia na hia oi? Ahihkeileh, nang bang achia na unau simmoh na hia oi? Pathian thukhenna tutphah maah i vek un i ding ding ua.
Toupan, mi tengteng ka maah a kun ding ua, lei tengteng leng Pathian kiangah a kipulak ding uh, chiin, ka chiam ahi, achia, chih gelh ahi ngala.
Huchiin, i vek un Pathian kiangah eimah tanchin i gen chiat ding uh ahi.
Huaijiakin, kigense nawn kei ni, kuapeuhin a unau lampi ah kisuihna hiam dalna hiam koih louh tum jaw hen.
Amah mawngmawng ah sianglou bangmah himhim a om kei chih Toupa Jesu ah ka thei mahmah ahi; bangkhat siangloua sehpen bel, aseppa adingin a sianglou ahi hi.
Na bangkhat nek jiaka na unau lungsim a nat leh, itna danin na gamta kei ahi. A sih sik Kris in a sih sakpa tuh na bangkhat nekin hihmang kei hen;
Huchiin, nou adia hoihna gilou lama genin om kei hen.
Pathian gam tuh nek leh dawn lam thu ahi ngal keia, diktatna khawng, kituahna khawng, Kha Siangthoua kipahna khawng ahi jaw hi.
Kuapeuh huai thu ah Kris nasem tuh Pathian kipahpih leh, mihing phatin a om nak ahi.
Huchiin, kituahna ding leh, kihihhat tuahna ding thilte i delh ding uh.
Na bangkhat nek jiakin Pathian nasep hihse ken. Thil tengteng a siangthou ngei a, himahleh a bangkhat nekin mi a hihpuk leh a nepa adingin gilou ahi.
Na unau pukna ding a hih leh, sa nek louhte, uain dawn louhte, thil bangpeuh hih louh a hoih ahi.
Ginna na neih Pathian maah nangmah kia theihin nei maiin. Amah hoih sak lama siamlouh kitangsak lou tuh a hampha hi.
Ahihhangin, ginglelpan a nek leh, ginnaa a nek louh jiakin, siamlouh a tang ahi; bangpeuh ginna loua hih jaw khelhna ahi ngala.
Huchiin, ei mi hatten, eimah kipahna zong louin, mi hatloute hatlouhnate i thuak pih ding uh ahi.
Eimah innvengte hihphatuamna dingin a hoihna ding un kipahsak i tum chiat ding uh.
Kris in leng amah kipahna a zong ngal keia; Nang hontaite taina tuh ka tungah a tuta, chih gelh bangin ahi jaw.
Laisiangthoua kuhkalna leh khamuanna mua lametna i neih theihna ding un, nidanglaia gelh peuhmahte eite hon hilhna dinga gelh ahi ngal ua.
Huchiin, kuhkalna leh khamuanna Pathianin, Kris Jesu gen bangin, lungsim munkhat puin honom sak hen:
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pathian leh a Pa, lungsim munkhat leh kithutuaka i pahtawi theihna dingin.
Huaijiakin, Krisin Pathian hihthupina dia a honkipahpih mahbangin, kipahpihtuah chiat un.
Huai ahi ka gen; pipute kianga thuchiamte hihkip dingin Kris tuh Pathian thutakdan theihsakna dingin zeksumte nasempa a honghita chih:
A hehpihna jiaka Jentelten Pathian a pahtawina ding un, Huaijiakin, Jentelte lakah kon phat dia, na min phatawina dingin la ka sa ding, chih gelh bangin.
Huan, Nou Jentel tengteng te aw, a mite toh kipak un, a chi nawna.
Huan, Nou Jentel tengteng te aw, Toupa phat un, mi tengtengin leng amah phat uhen, a chi nawna.
Huan, Isaiin, Jesai zung jam a hongpai ding a, Jentelte tunga vaihawm dingpa; amah ah Jentelten a lametna uh a nga ding uh, leng a chi laia.
Kha Siangthou thilhihtheihna jiaka lametna na hauh theihna ding un, lametna Pathian, na gin jiak un, kipahna leh kituahna chitengin honhihdim hen.
Huan, ka unaute aw, nou tungthu jaw, noumau mah hoihnain na dim ua, na kihasuantuah thei uh chih keimahtakin leng diktakin ka thei hi.
Himahleh Pathianin a honpiak hehpihna jiakin nou hontheihpih dingin koi kalkal hiamah hangtakin ka gelh ahi,
Jentelte laka Kris Jesu nasema ka om theihna dingin, ka Jentel piakte, Kha Siangthou hihsiangthou a hih ua, pom tak a hih theihna dingun. Pathian Tanchin Hoih lamah siampu na ka sem ahi.
Huchiin, Pathian na ka sep lam thu ah Kris Jesu ah kisaktheihna ding ka nei ahi.
Krisin Jentelte thumang sak dingin, thugen leh thilhihin, keimah zanga a thilhihte loungal bangmah ka gen ngam ngal keia.

Chiamtehna te leh thillamdang te thilhihtheihna ah, Kha Siangthou thilhihtheihnaah Jerusalem khua leh a kim gam akipanin, Illirikam gam phain, Kris Tanchin Hoih gam chihah ka hilh kimta; keimah honzanga a thilhih tuh huchitel ahi.
Ahi, mi dang suangphum tunga lem ka hih louhna dingin, Tanchin hoih Kris min lohkhitna muna gen louin.
A tanchin gen ngei nailouhnaten a mu ding ua, za ngei nailouten a za ding uh, chih gelh bangin, gen ka tum jaw ahi.
Huaijiak takin ahi, na kiang ua hong ka kikhel sak naknak.
Tuin bel hiai gam kim khawngah sepna mun himhim ka neita keia, kum tampi na kiang ua hong utin leng ka omta a;
Spain gama ka hoh chiangin ka pai kawma nou honmuh ka kilamen ngala, noumau honkithuahpih kham photin, tua lama ka hohna ah nouten non vakhak suk uh leng ka lamen ahi.
Tuin bel, mi siangthoute nasem dingin Jerusalem khua ah ka hoh tadih dinga.
Masidonia leh Akaia gama miten lungdamtakin Jerusalem khuaa mi siangthoute laka gentheite adin sum a tuak chiat ta ngal ua.
Ahi, lungdam takin ahih ua ahi, a lak uah leng a ba gige him uhi; Jentelten a kha lam thilte uh a kikoppih ngal un, khovel lam thilin amaute taksap awng a huksak sam uh a kiphamoh him ahi.
Huaijiakin, huai tuh ka hiha, gah leng amaute dik taka ka muhsak nungin, noute hontawnin, Spain gamah ka pai jel ding.
Huan, na kiang ua ka hong chiangin, Kris vualjawlna kim puin ka hong ding chih ka thei hi.
Unaute aw, Pathian kianga non thum sakna uah, honthum pih teitei dingin Toupa Jesu Kris leh Kha Siangthou itna in nget petmahin ka honngen ahi;
Juda gama gingloute laka ka bit theihna ding leh, Jerusalem khua a dia huhna ka tawi misiangthoute kipahna lam tak a hihtheihna dingin.
Pathian hoihsak banga nuamtaka na kiang ua ka honga, i halh khawm vek theihna dingin.
Lemna Pathian na vek ua kiangah om hen. Amen.
I sanggamnu, Phoibi, Kenkriai khuaa saptuamte nasem,
Toupa mina misiangthoute banga nana kipahpihna ding uleh, na huh uh a kiphatmohna peuha na nahuh ding un honmel theihsak ka ut ahi. Amah mahin leng mi tampi a nahuha, kei ngei leng a honhuh jel ahi.
Kris Jesu-a honpanpihte Prisila leh Akuila chibai honbuk sak un.
Amau ka hinna adingin amau ngawng a peta ua: amau tung kiaah kipahthu ka gen kei hi, ahihhangin Jentel saptuam tengteng tungah leng, ka gen sam hi.
A in ua saptuam kikhawmte leng chibai honbuk sak un aw. Ka deihtak, Epainita, Asia gama Kris gingta masapen, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Mari, nou dia semgim, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Ka chipih leh ka hentak pih, Andronika leh Junia, chibai honbuk sak un; amau tuh sawltakte laka minthang tak ahi ua, kei sanga Krisa om masa jaw ahi uh.
Ampliata, Toupa a ka deihtak, chibai honbuk sak un aw.
Kris a I naseppih uh Urbana leh ka deihtak Stakhi chibai honbuk sak un.
Kris mi tak, Apelli, chibai honbuk sak un. Aristobula inkuanpihte laka mite chibai honbuk sak un.
Ka chipih, Herodion, chibai honbuk sak un. Narkissa inkuanpihte laka mi, Toupaa om, chibai honbuk sak un.
Triphaina leh Triphosa Toupa a semgimte, chibai hon nabuk sak un aw. Deihtak Persi, Toupa a semgim mahmahsa chibai honna buk sak un.
Toupa a tel Rufa leh a nu, kei nu sam leng, chibai honna buk sak un.
Asinkaraita te, Phligon te, Herma te, Patroba te, Hermi te a kiang ua unau omte toh, chibai honna buk sak un aw.
Philologa leh Julia, Neria leh sanggamnu, Olimpa leh, a kiang ua mi siangthou om tengteng, chibai honna buk sak un.
Tawp siangthouin chibai kibuk un. Kris saptuam pawl tengtengin chibai hon buk chiat uhi.
Huan, unaute aw, thuhilhnathu noumau hilh louh lama kikhenna leh pukna siamte apan kiveng ding leh kiheisan dingin kon ngen ahi.
Huchibang mitten i Toupa Kris na a sem kei ua, amau gilpi na a sem jaw uhi; a kam phat uleh a kam siam un mi pilloute lungsim a khem nak uhi.
Na omdan uh mi tengteng lakah a thangkheta ngala. Huaijiakin noumau tungthu ah ka kipak ahi; a hihhangin, hoih lamah na pil ua, gilou lamah na pil louh uh ka deih ahi.
Huan, lemna Pathianin na khepek nuai uah Setan a honsik den sak zok ding ahi. I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na kiang uah om heh.
Ka naseppih Timothi leh ka chipih Lusia te, Jason te, Sosipater te khawngin chibai a honbuk uhi.
Kei, Tertia, hiai lai gelhin, Toupa minin chibai ka honbuk ahi.
Ka tunnapa Gaia leh, saptuam tengteng in chibai a honbuk uhi. Huaia sum kempa Erata leh, unaupa Kuartain chibai a honbuk uhi.
I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na vek ua kiangah om hen. Amen.
Tuin, Amah, ka Tanchinhoih gen bang leh thuguk kilakna bangbanga Jesu Kris ka tangkoupih banga noute honhihhatthei-pa, -huai thuguk tuh tanglai sawtpi mahmah sung selguka na om himahleh.
Tun bel ginna thumanna piangsak dingin jawlnei laibute zanga nam tengteng kianga theihsak leh tangtawn Pathian thupiak bangin taklatin a hongomta hi
Pilna Pathian kiang kia ah, Jesu Kris jiaka, thupina tangtawn dongin om hen! Amen.
Paula, Pathian deihlama Jesu Kris sawltaka sap leh i unaupa Sostheni,
Korinth khua a Pathian saptuam omte, Kris Jesu a sehtuam, gam chiha I Toupa, amau leh eite Toupa, Jesu Kris min lou tengteng toh misiangthou hi dinga sapte kiangah:
Pathian I Pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
Kris Jesu a Pathian hehpihna na kiang ua hongkipia jiakin na tung thu uah Pathian kiangah kipahthu ka gen gige hi;
Bangkimah thugen peuhmah ah leh theihna chi tengah, amaha hihhauhin na om uh.
Huchibangin Kris thu ka theihsak pen noumau ah hihkipin a om hi;
Huan, i Toupa Jesu Kris kilakna ngak kawmin, khalam thilpiak himhim na tasam kei uhi;
Aman, i Toupa Jesu Kris ni chia gensiat beia na omna ding un, a tawp phain a honhihkip behlap ding hi.
Pathian, a Tapa Jesu Kris i Toupa kithuahpihnaa nou honsam lutpa, a muanhuai hi.

Huan, unaute aw, na vek un thu kibang na gen ua, na lak ua kikhenna himhim a om louhna dingin lungsim munkhat leh ngaihtuah munkhata diktaka na kizop chinten jawkna ding un Toupa Jesu Kris minin kon ngen ahi.
Ka unaute aw, na tungtangthu uh, na lak uah kiselna bang a om chih Kloi inkuanpihten honhilh ua.
Hiai ka chihna ahi, mi tengtengin, Kei Paula pawl ka hi, Kei jaw Apolla pawl ka hi, Kei jaw Kifa pawl ka hi, Kei jaw Kris pawl ka hi, na chih vengvung uh.
Kris khenin a om ahia? Paula na sik un kilhdenin a om ahia? Ahihkeileh Paula mina baptisin na om ua hia?
Krispa leh Gaia loungal na lak uah mi kuamah kon baptis louh jiakin Pathian kiangah kipahthu ka gen jel ahi;
Huchi hikei leh jaw min keimah mina baptis na hi uh a chi kha ding uhi.
Stephan inkuanpihte bel ka baptis ngeia, tuate loujaw mi dang ka baptis hiam ka theikei.
Kris in baptis dingin honsawl ngal keia, Tanchin Hoih gen dingin honsawl jaw ahi; thu pila gen louin, huchilou injaw Kris kros thilhihtheihna bangmah lou a suaksak kha ding uhi.
Kros thu jaw mangthang lelte adin haina ahi ngala; eite hotdam lelte adin bel Pathian thilhihtheihna ahi jaw hi.
Mi pil pilna ka hihmang dinga, lemthei lemtheihna leng ka paikhe ding, chih gelh ahi ngal a.
Mipil koiah ahia? Laigelhmi koiah ahia? Hiai khovela selhatmi koiah ahia? Pathianin khovel pilna haihuai ahi chih a theisak kei ahia?
Pathian pilna ah bel, khovelin a pilna zanga Pathian a theihtheih louh nungin thugen haihuai zanga a gingtate hotdam tuh a kipahlam ahi.
Judaten chiamtehnate a phut nak ua, Grikten pilna a zong nak uhi.
Eiten bel Kris kilhden thu i gen jel ua; huai tuh Judate adin pukna, Jentelte adin haina ahi a;
Himahleh Judate leng hi hen aw, Grikte leng hi heh, sapte adin jaw Kris, Pathian thilhihtheihna leh Pathian pilna pen ahi.
Pathian haina mihing sangin a piljaw a, Pathian hatlouhna leng huai mihing sangin a hat jaw nak nak hi.
Unaute aw, a honsapna ngaihtuah dih ua, salama mi pil tampite, mi hat tampite, mi hoih pipite, sap a hih louhdan uh:
Himahleh, Pathian in khovel thil haite a tel jaw a, mi pilte a zahlaksak theihna dingin; huan Pathianin khovel thil hatloute a tela, a hatte a zahlak sak theihna dingin;
Khovel thil niam leh thil siammohhuaite, thil omloute toh tanin Pathian in a tela, thil omte bangmah loua a bawl theihna dingin;
Huchiin, Pathian maah mi kuamah a kiuangsak theikei ding uh.
Amah tuh Kris-a noute hinna nak ahi; huan Pathianin Kris tuh i pilna bang, I diktatna bang, i sianthouna bang, i tatna bang hi dingin a bawlta;
Huaijiakin, gelh ahih bangin, a suang peuhmahin Toupa suang hen.
Huan, unaute aw, kei jaw Pathian thuguk nou honhilh dinga na kiang ua ka hong laiin, thu gen thupi leh pilna thupi toh hong ka hi kei hi.
Jesu Kris, amah mah kilhdena om thu kia loungal na lak uah bangmah himhim theih ka tum kei a.
Huan, hatlou leh lauin, nakpi taka lingkawmin na lak uah ka om a.
Ka paukam suak leh ka thu gente thu pila khemna thuin ahi kei hi. Kha leh thilhihtheihna theihsaknain ahi jaw hi.
Huchia, na ginna uh mihing pilnaa kinga loua, Pathian thilhihtheihna a kinga a a om theih jawkna dingin.
Ahihhangin pichingte lakah ahihleh thu pil i hilh jela, himahleh hiai khovel thupil jaw ahi kei; hiai khovel vaihawmte mangthang dingte thupil leng ahi sam kei hi:
Pathian pilna guk leh kisel, i thupina dinga Pathianin khovel om maa a sehkholhsa pen i hilh zonak.
Huai tuh hiai khovel vaihawmte himhimin a theikei uh; thei le ujaw thupina Toupa kilhden lou ding hi ve un.
Mita muh ngei louh, bila jak ngeilouh, mihing lungtanga lut ngeilou, Pathianin mah itte adia a bawl, chih gelh bangin.
Pathianin Khain huaite ei a honthei sakta ahi; Khain bangkim a sui khe vek ngala; ahi, Pathian thugil leng.
Mihing ngaihtuahte mihing lungsim a sunga om mah louin, kuan ahia thei ding? Huchimahbangin Pathian ngaihtuahte Pathian Kha mahlouin kuamahin a theikei uhi.
Huan, a thawna Pathianin thil honpiakte i theihna dingin, eiten jaw khovel kha hi louin, Kha, Pathian kianga ngei, i mu jaw uhi
Hiai tuh mihing pilnaa sinsak thute-a hilh louin Kha sinsakin i hilh jaw ua, Kha neite kiangah khalam thutakte i hilhchian uhi.
Khovel min Pathian Kha thilpiakte a sang kei nak hi, amah ngaihdanin haihuai ahi ngala, kha a theihchet ahihjiakin a theithei kei himhim ahi.
Khamiin bel thil bangkim achian jela, amah lah kuamahin achian kei uhi.
Kuan ahia Toupa lungsim theikhin a, amah thuhilh thei ding? Eiten bel Kris lungsim i pu ahi.
Huan, unaute aw, kha mite kianga gen bangin na kiang uah thu ka gen theikei hi; sa mite kianga gen bangin ka gen jaw, Kris a naungekte kianga gen bang lel in.
Ann gum hilouin, nawituiin kon vaka, a ann gum na nek theih nailouh jiak un; ahi, tuin leng na nethei naikei lailai uh, sa mi na hih lailai jiak un.
Na lak uah kihajatna leh kiselna a om nak jiakin sa mi hi laiin mihing banga omlai hilou na hi u hiam?
Mi khatin Paula pawl ka hi, mi dangin, Kei jaw Apollo pawl ka hi, na chih laiteng uh mihing lel hilai hilou na hi uhiam?
Apollo kua ahia leh? Paula leng kua ahia? Nasemmi, noumau hon gingta sakmi lel ei ve ua, huai leng Toupan a piak bang jelin ahi.
Ken ka suana, Apolloin tuiin a vaka, himahleh Pathianin a khang sak ahi.
Huchiin, a khangsakpa Pathian kia loungal, a suanpa lah bangmah ahi kei, tuia vakpa leng bangmah ahi tuan kei.
Huan, a suanpa leh tuia vakpa pumkhat ahi ua, himahleh, amau sep gim bang jelin, amau kipahman a mu tuaktuak ding uh.
Koute jaw Pathian na seppihte ka hi ngal ua, nou bel Pathian louma na hi uhi, Pathian inlam leng na hi uhi.
Pathianin hehpihna honpiak bang jelin innlam heutupen piltak bangin ken suangphum ka lema, mi dangin a tungah inn a lam uhi. Himahleh mi chih a tunga a lamdan ding uah pilvang chiat uhen.
Suangphum lepkhitsa loungal suangphum dang kuamahin a lem theita kei ua, huai suangphum tuh Jesu Kris ahi.
Huan, suangphum tuangah kuapeuhin dangkaeng in hiam, dangkain hiam, suang mantamin hiam, singin hiam, loupain hiam, buhpawl hiamin lam leh,
Mi chih nasep tuh a honglang ding hi; Niin a hihlang ding ahi ngala, meia a kilak dingjiakin; mei ngeingeiin mi chih nasep bangchibang ahia chih a hihchian ding hi.
Kua nasep leng a tunga a lampen a omgige leh, huai miin kipahman a mu ding.
Kua nasep leng a kat leh, huai miin a tan ding hi; amah taktak jaw hotdamin a om ding, himahleh, meia pai suak bangin.
Pathian temple na hih uh leh Pathian Kha noumau ah a om gige chih na theikei ua hia?
Kuapeuhmahin Pathian temple a hihsiat leh huai mi tuh Pathianin a hihse ding; Pathian temple tuh a siangthou ngala, huai temple tuh noumau na hi uhi.
Kuamah amah leh amah kikhem kei hen. Na lak ua kuapeuh hiai khovela pil a kisak leh, a hongpil theihna dingin mi hai hongsuak hen.
Hiai khovel pilna tuh Pathian ngaihdanin haina ahi. Aman tuh amaute a pillepchiahna uah a man hi, chih gelh ahi ngala:
Toupan mi pilte ngaihtuahna a thawn ahi chih, a thei chi-a gelh ahi nawn laia.
Huaijiakin kuamahin mihingte suang kei uhen; bangkim noua ahi vekta ngala;
Paula hiam, Apollo hiam, Kifa hiam, khovel hiam, hinna hiam, sihna hiam, thil omsa hiam, thil hongom ding hiam;
A vekin noua ahi vek hi; noumau leng Krisa na hi ua; Kris leng Pathiana ahi.
Koute jaw Kris nasemtein leh Pathian thuguk kemte bangin min honthei uhen.
Hiaiah kempa tuh mi muanhuai hih a kiphamoh ahi.
Himahleh nou non zeetna u leh mihing ngaihtuahnain non zeetna utuh kei adingin thil neu chik ahi.
Keimah leng ka kizeet ngei tuan kei. Bangmah kimohsakna ding ka kithei keia; himahleh, huaiin siam hontang sak tuan kei hi; honzeetpa tuh Toupa ahi jaw.

Huchiin, ahun main bangmah zeet kei un, Toupa hong masiah, aman tuh miala thil selgulte vakah a honla khe ding hi; lungtanga tupte leng a hihlang lai ding hi; huai hun chiangin mi chihin Pathian akipanin amau tan hun chiatin phatna aloh chiat ding uh.

Unaute aw, na phattuapihna dingun hiai thu Apollo leh kei tungah ka belh ahi, huchi-a laisiangthou banga hindan koute akipana na sin theihna ding uleh na lak ua kuamah mi khat midang sanga ngaina jaw-a na kisaktheihpih louhna dingun.
Kuan ahia nou-a thil tuam deuh oma mu? Na muhsawn louh ngal uh bang ahia na neih uh? Huchia-a a musawn lel na hih uleh na muhsawn uh a thawna piak hilo bangtaka bangdia kisathei zenzen?
Tuin na vahta ua! Tuin na honghauta ua! Kou louin vai na hawmta uhi! Ahi, vaihawm taktak le uchin ka vaihawm sam theihna ding un.
Pathianin kou sawltakte, si dinga sehsa bangin a nanungpenin honsep khia hiin ka thei ahi; khovelte leh angelten leh mihingte mitmuha etnopa bawlin ka om uhi.
Kou jaw Kris jiakin mihai ka hi ua, nou bel Kris ah mipil na hi jaw uhi; kou jaw kahat kei ua, nou bel nahat uhi; nou jaw mi pahtawiin na om ua, kou jaw mi simmohin ka om jaw uhi.
Tutanin leng ka gilkial un ka dangtak ua, puansilh ka kiching kei ua, mi khut thak nuhna ka hi ua, mun leh mual ka neikei ua;
Koumau khuta semin ka gim mahmah uhi; min hontai uleh ka vualjawl ua; min honsawi uleh ka thuak teitei uhi;
Min hon gensiat uleh ka khem ua; tutan inleng khovel ninnok thil tengteng nin bangin a honbawl uhi.
Na zumna ding un hiai thu ka gelh ahi keia, ka ta deihtakte banga hontaihilh dingin ka gelh ahi jaw hi.
Kris ah heutu sing khat nei mah le uchin, pa jaw tampi na nei tuan kei uhi; ken Kris Jesu ah Tanchin Hoihin ka honnei ahi.
Huaijiakin, ka omdan jui dingin ka hon ngen ahi.
Hiaijiakin, Timothi, Toupa a ka ta deihtak leh muan huai, na kiang uah ka honsawl ahi; aman Kris a ka omdan, gam chiha saptuamte teng thu ka hilh jeldan khawng a honthei sak nawn ding hi.
Huan, kei na kiang ua hong nawn lou ding bang jenin khenkhat nana ki uangsak ua.
Himahleh, Toupan hoih a sakleh, sawt lou chik nungin na kiang uah ka hongding, huchiin mi kiuangsakte kamhat thu hilouin, a thilhihtheihna uh ka thei zota ding hi.
Pathian gam jaw kamhat thu ah a om keia, thilhihtheihnaah a om jaw ahi.
Bang na deih jaw ua? Chiang toh hia na kiang ua ka hong ding itna leh lungsim nemna toh?
Na lak uah kingaih a om chih thu a thang vengvung ahi; huchibang kingaih Jentelte laka leng om ngeilou, na lak ua mi khatin amah pa ji a kitenpih.
Huan, huai thil hihpa tuh na lak ua kipan delh khiakna dinga lungngaih naksangin na kisaktheih pih jaw uhi.
Kei mahmah, pumpiin ka pang kei naa, kha ah jaw ka panga, thil huchitel hihpa tuh tuin leng Toupa Jesu minin na lak ua pang bang takin ka ngaihtuahkhinta hi,
Noumau leh ka kha i Toupa Jesu thilhihtheihnaa kikhawmin,
Mi huchibang jaw, a kha Toupa ni chia hotdama a om theihna dingin a sa tuh hihmang dingin, Setan pe lehang ka chi ahi.
Na kisaktheihna uh hoihlou hi. Silngou tawmchikin tanghou beu a pumin a jel sual nak chih na theikei ua hia?
Silngou panglou na hih mahbang un tanghou beu thak na honghih theihna ding un silngou luipen paisiang un. I paikan Ankuangluina ding leng a gouta ngal ua, huai Kris tuh:
Huaijiakin, ankuanglui ni hang silngou luia ankuanglui louin, nunsia leh gitlouhna silngoua leng ankuanglui sam lou in, takna leh thutak tanghou silngou soh louhin ankuang i lui zo ding uh.
Ka laikhak ah kingaihhatte kithuahpih lou dingin na kiang uah ka gelh a;
Hia khovel a kingaih hatte hiam, huaiham lah lepgute hiam, milimbete hiam kithuahpih hetlouh ding chi ka hi kei a; huchibang hileh khovela kipan na pai khiakuh kul ding ahi ngal a.

Tun bel, kuapeuh, Unau min po ngalin, kingaihhatmi hiam, mi huaiham hiam, milim bemi hiam, hanhatmi hiam, zukham hatmi hiam, lepgumi hiam hileh, kithuahpih lou dingin na kiang uah ka gelh ahi; mi huchibang kiangah nek leng ne lou dingin.
Po lama mite lah, ken banga hia ka ngaihtuah ding om? Nou sung lama mite hilou hia na ngaihtuah ding uh?
Po lama mite bel Pathianin ngaihtuah jel hilou hia? Huai mi giloupa tuh na lak ua kipan delh khia un.
Na lak uah kuapeuhin midang toh thubuai neita le uchin, mi siangthoute maa tun louin, mi diktatloute maah na tun ngam ding ua hia?
Ahihleh, misiangthouten khovel a vaihawm ding uh chih na thei ua hia? Huan, khovel bawn na vaihawm ding u leh, thil neupente leng ngaihtuah dia kilawmlou na hi ua hia?
Tulai damsung thute gen louh, angelte nangawn i vaihawm ding uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Hichiin, tulai damsung thute ngaihtuah ding na neih un bangdia saptuamte ngaihsanglouhpente ngaihtuah sak nahi ua?
Na zumna ding un ka gen ahi, A unaute kala thu hihpuk thei mi pil, khat bek na lak uah na mu kei ua a ding maw?
Unau in a unau vaihawmna a tut jawk nak, ginglou maah a hih behlap toh?
Hilou, hiai na kizen zoh louhna khat uh ahi pah hi, thubuai na kineih tuah nak uh. Bang dia diklou pia hihna nathuak zo lou? Bang achia kijang sak zo mailou oi?
Hilou, noumau ngeiin na unaute uh tungah leng na hih dik kei ua, na jang sak nak uhi.
Ahihleh, mi diktatlouten Pathian Gam a luah kei ding uh chih na theikei ua hia? Khemin om kei un, kingaihhatte hiam, milim bete hiam, angkawmte hiam, mi hukte hiam, tohukte hiam,
Gutate hiam, mihuaihamte hiam, zukhamhatte hiam, salhhatte hiam, lepgute hiamin Pathian Gam a luah kei ding uh.
Huan, noute khenkhat huchi bang na hi uhi; himahleh, Toupa Jesu Kris min ah leh i Pathian Kha ah siansak na hita ua, hihsiangthou na hita uh, siamtang na hita uhi.
Thil bangkim hih kei dingin a sianga, himahleh thil bangkim hih a hoih kim khol kei; thil bangkim hih kei ding in a sianga, himahleh bangmah sikha din ka kiphal kei hi.
Nek dingte khawng gila ahi a, gil khawng leng nek dinga ahi; himahleh Pathianin ahihmang tuaktuak ding. Huan, pumpi pen kingaihna ding ahi keia. Toupa ading ahijaw hi; Toupa leng pumpi ading ahi hi:
Huan, Pathianin Toupa a kaithoua, eite leng a thilhihtheihnain a honkaithou sam ding hi.
Na pumpi uh Kris hiangte ahi chih na theikei ua hia? Kris hiangte laksakin kijuak hiang ding peuhin ka bawl dia hia leh?
Bawl lou hial ding. A hihleh, kijuak zop pen, amah toh pumkhat ahi uh chih na theikei ua hia? A nih un sa pumkhat a hong hita ding uh, a chi ngala.
Toupa zop bel amah toh kha pumkhat ahi uhi.
Kingaih taisan un. Mihing thil hihkhelh chiteng pumpi po lamah ahi; mingaihhat inbel amah pumpi tungah thil a hihkhial ahi.
Ahihleh, na pumpi uh, na sung ua om Pathian kianga kipana na muh uh, Kha Siangthou temple ahi chih na theikei ua hia? Noumaua leng na hi kei ua, mana leisa na hita uh.
Huaijiakin, na pumpi un Pathian pahtawi un.
Huan, na thil gelh thute ujaw: Pasal adingin numei khoih louh a hoih hi.
Himahleh, kingaihnate a om nak jiakin pasal chihin amah ji chiat nei henla, numei chihin leng amah pasal chiat nei heh.
Pasalin a ji kiangah a tan ding hunhun pia hen; huchi bangmahin jiin leng a pasal kiangah a tan ding hunhun pe sam heh.
Jiin amah pumpi tungah thu a neikeia, a pasalin thu a nei jaw hi; huchi bamgmahin pasalin leng amah pumpi tungah thu a neikeia, a jiin thu a nei jaw hi.

Thum dinga na kipiak theihna ding uleh, na kikholh nawn theihna ding ua sawt lou kal adia pha na sak tuaktuak keingal uleh a kuamahmah kijang sak kei un, huchilou injaw na kidek zoh louh jiak un Setanin a honkhem khading hi.
Himahleh, hiai thu thupe danin ka gen keia, phal lam thuin ka gen jaw ahi.
Himahleh, mi tengteng keimah bang taka a om vek uh ka deih ahi. A hihhangin michih Pathian kianga kipan thilpiak amau muh lam a nei chiat uh ahi, khatin lam tuamin, khatin lamdangin.
Himahleh lengkulte leh meithaite kiangah hichiin ka chi ahi: Keimah bang takin om le uh amau din a hoih ding hi.
Kidek theihna a neih kei ua lelah kiteng uheh; huk sangin kiten a hoih ngala.
Huan, kitengsate kiangah thu ka pia, keimah bel hilouin, Toupa piak ahi jaw; Jiin a pasal khen kei heh;
A khen vanglak leh pasal nei nawn louin om vanglak heh, a hihkeileh, a pasal toh mah kituak nawn uheh; huan pasalin a ji ma kei heh.
Mi dang kiangah ahihleh Toupa hi louin keimahin ka gen: Unau kuapeuhin ji, ginglou mi kitenpih leh, aman a kianga om gige a ut leh, ma kei heh.
Huan, numei pasal ginglou kitenpihin, a pasalin a kianga om gige a ut leh, ma kei heh.

Pasal ginglou mi tuh a ji jiakin hihsiangthouin a om a, ji ginglou mi leng a pasal jiakin hihsiangthouin a om sam ahi; huchi hita keilah, na tate uh a siangthou kei ding uhi; himahleh a siangthou na-uhi.
Himahleh, a gingloupenin a khen leh, khen mai heh, huchi bangah jaw unaupa hiam, unaunu hiam, hen a hita kei ding. Pathianin lemna ah a honsam ahi ngala.
Ji aw, na pasal na hotdam ding leh ding louh bangchin na theia eita? Pasal aw, na ji na hotdam ding leh ding louh bangchin na theia eita?
Abang abang hileh, Toupan mi chih kianga a piak bang chiat leh, Pathian in mi chih a sap laia a omdan bang chiatin om heh. Huchibangin saptuam pawl tengteng ah ka hikip hi.
Zeksum sate sap a om u hia? Zeksum lou honghi tuan kei uheh. Zeksum loua om sap a om u hia? Zeksum tuan dah uheh.
Pathian thupiakte zuih lel louhngal zeksum i chih bangmah ahi keia, zeksum louh leng bangmah ahi kei hi.
Mi chih sapa a om lai ua a tan ngeina uah om chiat u heh.
Sikha hi saa sap na hi hia? Khawksa tuan ken. Na hongsuahtak theih leh, sen sukin.
Sikha saa om Toupa sap tuh Toupa sikha suakta ahi ngala; huchimah bangin suakta saa sap tuh Kris sikha ahi hi.
Mana lei na hita uh; mihingte sikha ah lut kei un.
Unaute aw, mi chih sapa a om lai bangbangin, huaiah Pathian kiangah om gige hen.
Huan, nungak siangthou lam thu ajaw Toupa thupiak himhim ka neikei; himahleh, muanhuaia omdingin Toupa kianga kipan zahngaihna mu ka hih jiakin ka ngaihtuah dan ka gen ding.
Huchiin, tulai haksatna jiaka hiai tuh hoihin ka gingta ahi, mi a om ngeia a om gige.
Zi-a hen louh na hi hia? Kisut khiak tumken. Zi-a ehn louh na hi hia? Zi zong ken.

Himahleh, ji na neih leh thil na hih khial kei hi, nungak siangthou inleng pasal a neih leh thil a hihkhial sam kei hi. A hihhangin, hichi bang mitten sa ah gimna a thuak ding uhi; Himahleh ken jaw honthuak sak louh ka ut hi.
Ahihhangin, unaute aw, hiai ka chi ahi: hun seh a tomta; ji neite neilou banga a om theihna ding un;
Kapte kap lou banga a om theihna ding un, leh kipakte kipak lou banga a om theihna ding un;
Khovel zangte zang lojen loua a om theihna ding un: hiaa khovel omdan lah a mangthang ngitnget ahi ngala.
Lungjinna neiloua na om uh kon deih hi. Zi neilou pasalin Toupa lungkimsak dingdan, Toupa lam thilte a limsak;
Zinei pasalin bel a ji lungkimsak dingdan, khovel lam thilte a limsaka.

A lunglutna a kikhen hi. Huan pasal neilou numei hiam nungak hiamin pumpi leh kha sianthou dingdan, Toupa lam thilte a limsak; pasalnei numeiin bel a pasal lungkimsak dingdan, khovel lam thilte a limsak.
Nou phattuamna dingin hiai ka gen ahi; na tung ua khamna nga hilouin, navaka na omna ding uleh Toupa kianga na kipiakna uh bukimna dingin ahi jaw.
Kuapeuhin a zikham tunga gamta diklou hi-a a kigintaka, a lung-gulhna a let ngala, a kul leh, hoih a sak bangin hih hen aw: kiteng uhen, khelhna ahi kei.
Himahleh kuapeuh lungtang kiptak pu-a loutheilou khopa kulna nei hilou, amah kithuzohmiin khama koih kinken a tup chinten leh a hih hoih ding.
Huchiin, a khamnu kitenpihpan ahih hoih; huan zi neilou dia amah kikhamain a hih hoih zo ding.
Zi jaw a pasal a dam laiteng hen ahi; himahleh, a pasal a sih aleh, a deih peuh a nei thei ding a, ahihhangin Toupa a om mi ahi ding ahi.
Himahleh, kei ngaihdan in, a om ngeiin om gige leh nuam a sa zo ding; ken Pathian Kha nei samin ka kithei hi.
Huan, milimte laka kithoihna tungtang jaw: I vekin theihna i nei chiat uh chih i kithei hi. Theihnain mi a kisathei saka itna inbel mi a bawlhoih nak hi.
Kuapeuhin thil bang ahi hiam theia a kigintak leh, a theih ding thei nailou hi.
Ahihhangin, kuapeuhin Pathian a it leh, huai mi mah amah theih ahi
Huchiin, milimte laka kithoihna thil nek thu jaw, khovel ah milim himhim bangmah ahih louhdan uleh, khat kia loungal Pathian dang himhim a om louhdan i thei hi.
Van ah hiam, lei ah hiam, Pathian min pute om mahle uh, -huchi bang Pathian tampi leh toupa tampi a om ngal ua-

Eite adingin bel Pathian khat kia, Pa, a oma, amah kiang akipanin bangkim a pawta, eite leng amah adia om i hi; Toupa khat kia, Jesu Kris, a om hi, amah jiakin bangkim a om hi, eite leng amah jiak maha om i hi uhi.

Ahihhangin, huai theihna mi tengteng ah a om kei hi; huchiin khenkhatin, tutanin milim be sasa a hihjiak un, milim laka kithoihna thil bang taka theiin a ne nak uhi; huchiin, a sia leh pha theihna uh a hat louh jiak a thanghuai nak uhi.
Himahleh, nek dingin Pathian mit hontung sak tuan kei ding ne kei mahlehang i se tuan keia. Ne mah lehang leng i hoih tuan sam kei hi.
Himahleh, pilvang un, huchilou injaw na noplenna uh bang chichi hiamin mi hatloute adin pukna a hong hi kha ding.
Nang, theihna nei mi, kuapeuhin milimbiakna inn a ankuang uma a honmuh ngal un, amau mi hatlou na hita le uh, milim laka kithoihna thil ne dingin a sia leh pha theihna hong maingal lou ding hia?
Huchiin na theihna jiakin mi hatlou, unau a sih sika Kris in a sih sakpa, a mangthang ding ahi.
Unaute tuanga huchi bang thil na hihkhelh ua, a sia leh pha theihna uh, a hatlouh naklaia, na liamsak behlap un, Kris tuangah thil na hihkhial uhi.
Huaijiak takin nekdingin ka unau a hihpuk leh, ka unau ka hihpuk louhna dingin kumtawnin sa himhim ka neta kei ding.
Noplen ka hi ka hia? Sawltak ka hi ka hia? I Toupa Jesu ka muta ka hia? Noute Toupa a ka nasep gah na hi kei ua hia?
Mi dangte din sawltak hi kei mah leng, nou ading bekin jaw ka hi; Toupa a ka sawltak hihna chiamtehna noumau neive ua.
Hiai honsengte ka dawn na ahi,
Ne ding leh dawn dingin thu ka neikei ua hia?
Sawltak dangte leh Toupa unaute leh Kifa bangin ji gingtami pi vialvial dingin thu ka neikei ua hia?
Ahihkeileh, koumau kivakna ding khut nasem lou dingin kei leh Barnabain thu ka neilou tuam ua hia?
Sepaih kua ahia amah kivaka gal kap ngei? Kuan ahia, a gah leh ne loua, grep huan bawl ngei? Ahihkeileh, kuan ahia, ganhon nawitui neloua, ganhon vul ngei?
Huai thute mihing bangmaiin ka gen hia? Dan thu mah inleng huai ngei a gen sam ka hia?
Mosi dan Laibu ah, Bawngtalin buh a chil laiin a muk gak ken, chih gelh ahi ngala. Pathianin bawngtal ading kia hia a ngaihtuah sak?
Eia ding kia gen ahi hia? Hi e, eia dinga a gelh ahi; leiletpan lamet neia leh ding ahi a, buhvopan leng tan neih sam lamenin vuak ding ahi ngala.
Kouten khalam thilte na kiang ua ka tuh ngal uleh, na salam thilte uh at mahle ung, thil kilawmlou ahi dia hia?
Midangin bawn, na tung ua thuneihna a tan uleh kou tang sem lou ding ka hi uh maw? Himahleh, huai thuneihna ka zang kei uh; Kris Tanchin Hoih ka dal louhna ding un bangkim ka thuak teitei jaw uhi.
Thil tan bawl vialvialten Pathian biakin a om thil a nek uleh, maitama nasemten maitam toh tan a nei uh chih na theikei ua hia?
Huchi mahbangin, Toupan Tanchin Hoih gente Tanchin Hoih thu a nek muhna ding un a sep ahi.
Himahleh ken jaw tuate khat leng ka zang kei hi; ka tunga huchi na hihna ding un hiai thu ka gelh sam kei hi; kuapeuhin ka suanpen bangmah loua a bawl sang un, si mai leng kei dingin a hoihzo ngala.
Tanchin Hoih gen mahleng, huai jaw kisaktheih nading san ahi kei. Hihlouh theihlouh ka tungah a kinga ahi; Tanchin Hoih gen kei leng, ka tung gik ding ahi ngala.
Huai tuh keimah thuthua hih hi leng, kipahman ka nei hi; himahleh, keimah thuthu a hih keingal leh Tanchin Hoih kepnana kemsak a om ka hi.
Ka kipahman bang ahia leh? Tanchin Hih ka genin, loh loua, Tanchin Hoih athawna pia ka hehtheihna tuh ahi.
Kuamah sikha hi kei mah leng, mi tam sem ka lak theihna dingin mi tengteng sikhain ka kibawlta.

Huchiin, Judate ka laklut theihna dingin Judate kiangah Juda mi bangin ka om jel; dan nuaia omte ka lak lut theihna dingin dan nuaia omte kiangah dan nuaia om bangin ka om jel, dan nuaia om tuanlouin;
Dan neilou te ka lak lut theihna dingin dan neiloute kiangah dan neilou bangin ka om jel, Pathian dana om lou tuan louin, Kris dan jawm ngalin.
Hatloute ka lak lut theihna dingin hatlou te kiangah hatlou bangin ka om jel; bang chichi hiam beka khenkhatte bek ka hotdam theihna dingin mi tengteng kiangah bangkim ka hita hi.
Tanchin Hoih jiakin bangkim ka hih jela, a vualjawlnate ka tan sam theihna dingin.
Kitaitehte tuh a vek un a tai ua, himahleh khat kian kipahman a mu jel chih na theikei ua hia? Na muh theihna ding un huchi mahbangin tai un.
Huan, kidemna a mawlmi peuhmah bangkimah mahni kithununin a om nak hi. Amau jaw lallukhu se thei mu dingin a hih ua, eiten bel lallukhu setheilou mu dingin.
Huchiin, tuamahbangin ka taia, a jiak bei hi louin; huihkhua leltak noh louin, ka pang hi:
Ka pumpi ka hihsidupa; sikha in ka bawl zo jel hi; huchilou injaw midangte kianga ka tangkoupih nungin leng bangchichi hiamin keimah tak kipahman mutakloua koihin ka om khakha ding.
Unaute aw, hiai khawng na theih louh uh ka deih kei, huchia i pipute tengteng mei nuaia a om vek ua, a vek ua tuipi leng a kan ua,
A vek ua meia leh tuipi-a Mosi-a baptis luta a om vek ua,
A vek ua khalam an kibang leng a nek chiat ua.
A vek ua khalam dawn ding kibang leng a dawn chiat uh. Amaute jui, khalam Suangpi-a a dawn chiat ngal ua; huai Suangpi tuh Kris ahi.
Himahleh, a lak ua mi tamjaw tungah Pathian a lunghita keia; gamdai ah puklumin a om uhi.
Huan, huaite tuh ei dinga etjuiding ahi, thil gilou a lunggulh bang ua i lunggulh sam louhna dingin.
A lak ua khenkhat milim bemi a hih bang un milim bemi hi kei un. Mipi tuh ne ding leh dawn dingin a tu chiat ua, lam dingin a ding nawn uh, chih gelh bangin.
A lak ua khenkhatin nungak a ngai ua, ni khatin sing nih leh sang thumin a puklup loh bang un, i kingai sam kei ding uh,
A lak ua khenkhatin Toupa a zeet ua, gula hihmana a om bang un, Toupa jaw i zeet kei ding uh.
A lak ua khenkhat a phun ua, hihmangthangpa hihmanthata a om bang un, phun sam kei ni.
Huan, huaite tuh vaukholhna dingin a tunguah a hongtung h; eite, hun tawp hongtunnate, honthuhilhna ding aleng gelh ahi uhi.
Huaijiakin dinga kingaihtuah tuh pilvang hen, huchilou injaw a puk kha ding.

Mihing thuak theih val khemna himhim na tuang uah a tung ngei kei hi. Pathian jaw a muanhuai ahi, aman na thuak theih val uh khemna na tuah uh a phal kei ding; na thuak theihna ding un khemna peuhah taikhiak na lampi abawl pah zo ding hi.
Huaijiakin ka deihtakte aw, milimbiak jaw taisan un.
Mi pilte kianga gen bangin ka gen ahi; ka thugen ngaihtuah un.
Vualjawlna noua vual ka honjawl sak uh, Kris sisan kikoppihna ahi ka hia? Tanghou ka balkhap uh, Kris pumpi kikoppihna ahi ka hia?
Eite mi tampi tanghou beu khat, pumpi pumkhat, i hi hi; i vek un tanghou beu khata i tang chiat ngal ua.
Sa lama Israelte en dih ua; kithoihna sa neten maitam a kikoppih kei ua hia?
Bang ka genna ahia leh? Milim laka kithoihna leh, milim leng banghiamtak ahi chih ka gen ahia?
