Jentelte kithoihna, Pathian lakah hi louin dawite lakah a kithoih uh ahi chih, ka gen jaw ahi; nou jaw dawite na kikoppih uh hondeih lou ka hi.
Toupa nou leh dawi nou na dawn khawm theikei ding uh; Toupa dohkan ah leh dawi dohkan ah na ne khawm theisam kei ding uh.
Ahihkeileh, Toupa hajatna hantoh i tum uh ahi maw? Amah sangin i hatjaw ua hi?
Thil bangkim hih a sianga, himahleh thil bangkim hih a hoih khol kei. Thil bangkim hih a sianga, himahleh thil bangkim hihin mi a bawl hoih kei hi.
Kuapeuhin amah hoihna ding zong louin midang hoihna ding zong jaw hen.
Sa dawla a juak peuhmah uh sia leh pha-theihtheihna jiakin bangmah dong louin ne mai un.
Lei leh a sunga tengteng Toupaa ahi ngala.
Ginglou mi laka kuahiamin nou honsapa, hoh na ut ngal un, sialehphatheihna jiaka bangmah dong sese louin, a honlui peuh uh ne mai un.
Ahihhangin, kuahiamin, Hiai jaw kithoihna ahi, chia, a honhilh leh, sia leh pha theihna jiakin ne kei un amah nou a honhilhpa jiakin;
Nangmah sia leh pha theihna ka chi keia, amah sia leh pha theihna pen ahi ka chih jawk. Bang achia midang sialehphatheihnain ka noplenna thunun ahia?
Kipaktaka ka tan leh, a tunga kipahthu ka genna tungah bang dinga gensiat ka hia?
Huchiin, na nek uhiam na dawn uhiam, na hehpeuhmah uah leng, Pathian thupina ding ngenin hih un.
Judate ding hiam, Grikte ding hiam, Pathian saptuamte ding hiamin a pukna ding uh bangmah hih kei un,
Ken keimah phattuamna zong loua, hotdam a hih theihna ding ua mi tampi phattuamna zong jawa, mi tengteng bangkim a ka kipahsak bang takin.
Hon enjuite hi un, kei leng Kris enjuipa ka hih mahbangin
Huan, bangkima non theihgige jiak un leh thukhah kon hilh bang taka na vom chinten jiak un kon phat ahi.
Ahihhangin, pasal peuhmah lutang tuh Kris ahi, numei lutang tuh pasal ahi, Kris lu tuh Pathian ahi chih na theih uh ka deih hi.
Pasal, a lu khuh kawma thum hiam, thugen hiam peuhmahin, a lu a selphou hi.
Ahihhangin, numei, a lu khuhloua thum hiam, thugen hiam peuhmahin a lu a selphou ahi; metmai toh kibangleltak ahi ngala.
Numei a lu khuh loua a om ngal leh met vanglak hen. Ahihhangin, numei adinga sam met hiam mei maihiam a zumhuai leh, kikhuh hen.
Pasal jaw Pathian batpih leh thupina a hih jiakin a lu a khuh ding hi lou himhim ahi; numei bel pasal thupina ahi a.
Pasal jaw numei akipana pawt ahi keia; numei bel pasal akipana pawt ahi jaw hi:
Pasal numei adia siam leng ahi sam kei; numei bel pasal adia siam ahi ajaw:
Huai ahihjiakin, angelte jiakin numeiin pasal thuneih chiamtehna a khuk ding ahi.
Himahleh, Toupa thilgel dan ah, numei pasal louin a om theikeia, pasal leng numei louin a om thei sam kei hi.
Numei pasal akipana pawt ahi bangmahin pasal leng numei laka piang ahi ngal a; ahihhangin, bangkim Pathiana kipana pawt vek ahi.
Noumau kingaihtuah dih ua, numeiin a lu khuh loua Pathian kianga thum a kilawm hiam?
Pasal in sam sau a neih leh, amah adingin a zumhuai ahi chih na lungtang pianpih un leng a honthei sak kei ahia?
Numeiin bel sam sau a neih leh amah dingin thupina ahi jaw; a sam khuhna dinga piak ahi ngala.
Abang abang hitaleh, kuapeuh a selkhah leh, huchibang dan himhim i neikei uh, Pathian saptuam pawlten leng a nei sam kei hi.
Ahihhangin, nou hiai thu ka hon hilhna ah kon phat theikei, na hoih semna ding lam uh hi louin, na siat semna ding lam jaw ua na kikhop nak jiak un.
Amasapenin, saptuamte-a na kikhop un, na lak uah kilangkhenna a om nak chih ka za ngala; gin leng ka gingta sim sam hi.
Na lak ua a taktakte a lat theihna ding un, na lak ua gin tuamna leng a om sam him ding ahi.
Huchibangin, na kikhop un, Toupa nitakan nek theihna vual ahi kei:
Michihin nanek un noumau nitakan na ne masa jel ngal ua; huchiin, mi khat gil a kiala, adangin a kham ngala.

Bangchidan ahia? Nek leh dawnna ding, in na neikei ua hia? Ahihkeileh, Pathian saptuamte na musit ua, bangmah neiloute na selphou ua hia? Na kiang uah bang ka genta dia? Kon phat dia hia? Hiai lam thu ah ka honphat theikei hi.
Ka thu honhilh sawn Toupa kianga kipana ka muh ahi a, huchia Toupa Jesun matsaka a om jana, tanghou a laka,
Kipahthu a gen khita a balkhapa, Hiai ka pumpi nou adia piak ahi, Keimah theihgigena in hiai hih jel un, a chih.
Huchimahbanga, nitakan nek khita nou leng a laka, Hiai nou ka sisana thukhun thak ahi, Na dawn teng un keimah theihgigena in hiai hih jel un, a chih.
Huai tanghou na nek ua, nou na dawn teng un, a hongpai nawn masiah, Toupa sihna na phuangjak jel uh ahi ngala.
Huaijiakin, kuapeuh kilawm loutaka tanghou ne hiam, Toupa nou dawn hiam tuh, Toupa pumpi leh sisan tungah siamlouh a tang ding hi.
Huchiin, mi amah kienchian jaw hen, huchibangin tanghou tuh nein nou tuh dawn hen.
A ne leh dawnin, Toupa pumpi ngentel taka a ngaihtuah keileh, amah tunga vaihawmna dingin a nein a dawn jel ahi ngala.
Hiaijiakin, na lak ua mi tampi na hat kei ua, na jawngkhal uhi, duaisan leng na ihmu kei uhi.
Ahihhangin, ngentel takin eimah kingaihtuah jel lehang vaihawm saka om nak lou ding i hi uhi.
Himahleh, vaihawm saka i omin leng, khovel toh siamlouhtanga i om louhna dingin, Toupa taihilhin i om jel ahi.
Huaijiakin, ka unaute aw, ne dinga na kikhop in kingak chiat un.
Na kikhop uh vaihawmna na thuak pih louhna ding un, kuapeuhin a gil a kial leh a in lamah ne hen. Huan, thu dang jaw ka hong peuhpeuh chiangin kon hilh ding hi.
Huan, unaute aw, khalam thilpiak thute jaw na theih louh uh ka ut kei hi.
Jentelte na hih lai un bangchidan peuha honpi lai un leng, huai milim pautheiloute lamah pi mangin na om uh chih na thei uhi.
Huaijiakin, kuamahin, Pathian Khaa thugenin, Jesu jaw hamsiatin om hen, a chi ngei kei uh; huan, kuamahin, Kha Siangthou kia loungalin, Jesu jaw Toupa ahi, a chi ngei kei uh chih kon theisak ahi.
Huan, thilpiak tuamtuam a oma, Kha bel kikhat ahi.
Nasepna tuamtuam leng a om, himahleh Toupa bel khat ahi.
Nasepsakna tuamtuam leng a om, ahihhangin Pathian bel khat ahi - mi tengtenga bangkim sempa tuh.
Himahleh phattuam chiatna dingin Kha theihsakna michih kianga piak chiat ahi.
Mi khat kiangah, khain pilna thu a pia hi; midang kiangah, huai kha mahin theihna thu a pia hi;
Huan, midang kianga, huai kha mah-in, ginna a pia hi; midang kiangah hihdam theihna a pia hi;
Midang kiangah thillamdang hihtheihna, midang kiangah tugen theihna, midang kiangah khate theihkak theihna, midang kiangah pau chi tuamtuamte, midang kiangah paute hilhchetna.
Himahleh, hiaite tengteng Kha khat leh akikhat mahin, mi chih kiangah a deih bang jela hawm chiatin a sem jel hi.
Pumpi i chih khat ahia, hiang a neia, pumpi hiangte tengteng, tam mahle uh, pumpi khat ahi ngala; Kris tuh huchibangmah ahi hi.
I vek un pumpi khata om dingin Kha khata baptisin i omta ua - Judate hiam, Griskte hiam, sikhate hiam sikhalou hiam- huan i vek un Kha khat akipan dawnsakin i omta ngal ua.
Pumpi i chih hiang khat kia ahi ngal keia, hiang tampi ahi jaw.
Khepekin, khut ka hih louh jiakin pumpia pang ka hi kei, chileh, huai thu jiakin pumpia panglou ahi tuan kei.
Huan, bilin, mit ka hih louh jiakin pumpia pang ka hi kei, chileh, huai thu jiakin pumpia panglou ahi tuan kei.
Pumpi tengteng mit hi vek leh, ging jakna pen koiah a om dia? A vekin ging jakna hileh, gim jakna pen koiah a om dia?
Himahleh Pathianin hiang khempeuh pumpi ah a utna peuh ah a omsak chiatta hi.
Huchiin, huai tengteng hiang khat kia hileh, pumpi pen koi ah a om dia?
Ahihhangin hiang tampi ahi jaw uh, himahleh, pumpi khat kia ahi ngal ua.
Huan, mitin, khut kiangah, Bangmahin kon deih kei, a chi theikei; luin leng khepekte kiangah, Bangmahin kon deih kei, a chi thei sam kei hi.
Ahi, huchih naksangin, pumpi hiang hat dia kilawm loupente a kiphamoh zo mahmah uhi;
Huchiin, pumpi hiang pahtawi tham louh jawa i sehte, huaite ngei tuh i pahtawi jaw uhi; huan, i hiang kilawm louten kilawmna thupijaw a mu jel uhi;
I hiang kilawm ten bel huchibang a hih a kiphamoh kei uhi. Pathianin, kilawmna neilou hiang tuh pahtawi zopenin, pumpi tuh a lemkhawm zo ngala,
Huchia pumpia kikhenna himhim omloua, ahiangten kibang taka a kibuaipih tuah theih jawkna ding un.
Huchiin, hiang khatin a thuak leh, hiang tengtengin a thuak pih jela, hiang khat pahtawia a om leh, hiang tengtengin a kipahpih jel hi.
Huchiin noute Kris pumpi pen na hi ua, ahiangte na hi chiat lai uhi.

Huan, Pathianin khenkhat saptuam lakah a honkoiha - a khatna ah sawltakte, a nihna ah thugenmite, a thumna ah heutute a koiha; huai nungin thillamdang hihte a oma; huai nungin hihdam theihna thilpiakte, panpih theihna thilpiakte, vaihawm siamna thilpiakte, pautheihlouh chi tuamtuama thugen theihna thilpiakte a om nawn hi.
A vek un sawltak ahi vek uhia? A vek un thugenmi ahi vek uhia? A vek un heutu ahi vek uhia?
A vek un thillamdang hihmi ahi vek uhia? A vek un hihdim theihna thilpiakte a nei vek uhia? A vek un pautheihlouhtein thu a gen vek uhia?
A vek un thuhilhchianmi ahi vek u hia? Thilpiak thupipen te lunggulh mahmah jaw un. Huan, lampi hoih sem ka honensak ding hi.
Mihing paute leh angel paute-in thugen mahleng, itna ka neih keileh, dak ging lel hiam, dakkhutbet ging lel hiam ka hi ding hi.
Huan, thugen theihna neiin, thuguk tengteng leh theihna tengteng thei vekin, mual suan theihna khop hial ginna kim nei mahleng, itna ka neih keileh, bangmah ka hi kei hi.
Huan, mi gentheite vakna dingin ka sum tengteng pe vek mahleng, ka pumpi leng kang dingin kipe mahleng, itna ka neih keileh, kei dingin bangmah a phatuam kei.
Itna-in a dohzou a, a migi a: itna-in a haza kei a, a kisathei sam kei;
Itna a ki-uangsak kei a, a huham sam kei. Itna-in amah thulou thu a sa lou kei a, amah angsung a khual sam kei; a hehbaih kei a, hehsain a omden sam kei;
Itna-in gilou a kipahpih kei a, a dik a kipahpih jaw.
Itna-in bangkim a thuak teitei a, bangkim a gingta a, bangkim a lamen a, bangkim a thuak khe jel hi.
Itna jaw chikchiang mahin a bei kei ding: a hihhangin, thugennate om mahleh, hihtawp a hong hi ding a, pautheihlouhte om mahleh a hongtawp ding a, theihna bang om mahleh hihtawp a honghi ding.
A kimlou in i thei a, a kimlou in thu i gen uhi:
A kim a hongtun chiangin a kimlou hihtawp a hita ding.
Ka naupan laiin naupang pauin ka pai a, naupang theihin ka theia, naupang ngaihtuahin ka ngaihtuah nak: tua ka hongpichin nungin naupang hihdan ka tawpta.
Tuin jaw limlangah i mu milmial ahi, huai hun chiangin jaw kimaituahin a hita ding. Tuin jaw a kim-louin ka theia, himahleh huai hun chianginjaw theihkhita ka om bangin ka thei kim ta ding ahi.
Huchiin, hiai thumte, ginna, lametna, itna, a om gige ding; huan, huaitea a thupipen tuh itna ahi.
Itna delh jel unla, khalam thilpiakte leng lunggulh ngitnget un, ahihhangin thu na gen theihna ding uhouh lunggulh sem un.
Pau theihlouh a pau in mi kianga thugen hilouin, Pathian kianga gen ahi jaw hi, kuamahin lah a thugen a theikei a; himahleh, kha ah thu guk a gen ahi.
Thu gen miin bel mihing kiangah bawlhoihna thute, hasotna thute, khamuanna thute a gen zo jel hi.
Pau theihloua pau tuh amah kia a kibawl hoih a, thugenmin bel saptuamte a bawlhoih jaw hi.

Huan, na vek un pau theihloutea na pau uh kon deihsaka, himahleh thu na gen uh kon deih sak sem ahi; saptuamten kibawl hoihna a muh theihna ding un a hilhchet nawn ngal keileh thugenmi jaw pau theihlouhtea pau mi sangin a thupi zo himhim ahi.
Tuin, unaute aw, pau theihlouhtea thugenin na kiang uah hongleng, theihsakna lam hiam, thugenna lam hiam, thuhilhna lam hiam na kiang ua ka gen kei ngal leh, bang ahia ka honhih phattuamna ding om?
Thil, hinna neilou, gingtheite leng, tamngai hiam, kaihging hiam, gen neia a gin kei leh, bang la ahia a tum ua a kaih uh bang chin a theihtheih dia?
Pengkul gen neiloua a mut un kua ahia galkap dinga kisa ding?
Huchi mahbangin nou leng pautheih baihlama na gen kei uleh, bangthu ahia na gen uh bangchin a theihtheih dia? Huihkhuaa pau lel na hi kei ding ua hia?
Khovel ah pau chi tuamtuam tampi a om thama, himahleh gen neilou himhim a om kei hi.
A pauin a gen ka theih kei leh a genmi adingin kei tuh melmak ka hi dinga; a genmi leng keia dingin melmak mah ahi ding.
Huchiin, nou leng khalam thilpiakte tunga saptuamte bawl hoihna dia na hauh theihna ding un zong un.
Huaijiakin pau theihlouha thugenin a hilhchettheihna din thum hen.
Pau theihloua ka thum leh, ka khain jaw a thum ngei a, ka theihna bel a phatuam tuan kei.
Bang chin a hita dia leh? Khain ka thum dia, theihtheihnain leng ka thum ding; khain la kasa dia, theihtheihnain leng la kasa ding hi.
Hichilou injaw, khain vualjawl mah lechin, theinailouten na kipahthugen ah bangchin ahia, Amen, a chih theih ding, na thugen theithei lou piin?
Nang jaw kipahthu na gen hoih ngial taka, midang bel a bawlhoih tuan kei hi.
Noumau tengteng sikin pau theihlouhtea thu ka gen tam jawk jiakin Pathian kiangah kipahthu ka gen a:
Himahleh, saptuamte kikhopnaah pau theihlouha thu sing khat gen sangin, midangte ka hilh theihna dingin ka theihtheihnain thu nga kia gen ka ut jaw ahi.
Unaute aw, ngaihtuahna lamah naupang kei un; himahleh, gilou lamah jaw naungek unla, lungsim lamah piching un.
Dan laibu ah, Pau theihlouh mite kamin leh, gam dang a mite mukin, hiai mite kiangah thu ka gen dinga; huchiin leng a honngai khe tuan kei ding uh, Toupan achi, chih gelh ahi.
Huaijiakin pau theihlouhte jaw gingtate din chiamtehna ahi keia, gingloute din ahi jaw, thugen bel gingloute a din chiamtehna ahi keia, gingta te dingin ahi jaw.
Huaijiakin, saptuam tengteng kikhawm a, na vek ua, pau theihlouhtea na pau uleh, thei nailoute hiam, gingloute hiam honglut le uh, ahai uh honchi kei ding ua hiam?
Na vek ua thu na gen uleh tuh, ginglou hiam, thei nailou hiam honglut leh a siamlouhdan na vek ua hihlat ahita ding; a lungtang thugukte hihlatin a omta dia:
Huchiin leisiin Pathian chibai a buk dinga, Pathian na lak uah a om taktak chih a gen ding hi.

Unaute aw, bang chih ding a hita dia leh? Na hongkikhop un, phatna la hiam, thu kihilh hiam, theihsakna thu hiam, pau theihlouh hiam, hilhchetna hiam na nei chiat jel ua. Bangkim bawlhoihna dingin hih hi hen.
Kuapeuhin pau theihlouha thu a gen uleh, nihin hiam, a tampenin thumin hiam hi leh, kikhel jel inleng hi hen.
Huan, mi khatin hilhchian hen; hilhchianmi a om keileh saptuamte kikhopna ah daiin om henla, amah leh Pathian kiangah gen hen.
Thugen miin leng, nihin hiam, thumin hiam, gen uhenla, midangten hoihtakin ngaihtuah uhen.
Ahihhangin, a kianga tu midang kiangah theihsakna thupiak a na om leh, a masapen dai mai hen.
Mi tengteng in a theihtheihna ding uleh, mi tengteng khamuanga a om theihna ding un, na vek un khatkhatin thu na gen thei ngal ua.
Thugenmite khate thugenmite thu thuin a om uh ahi;
Pathian tuh buaina Pathian ahi keia, lemna Pathian ahi zo ngala. Mi siangthou saptuam pawl tengtenga om bangin,
Saptuamte kikhopna ah numei dai dindenin om uheh; amau jaw a thugen uh phal ahi ngal keia; Danlaibuin a gen mahbangin, thumangin om jaw uheh.
Huan, bangpeuh a theih nop uleh in lamah amau pasalte dong uhen; saptuamte kikhopnaa numei thugen jaw a zumhuai ngala.
Bang ahia? Pathian thu noumau laka pawt ahi maw? Ahihkeileh, noumau kiang kia a hongtung ahi maw?
Kuapeuh thugenmi hiam, kha mi hiam a kisak leh, na kiang ua ka gelh Toupa thupiak ahi chih a theih ding ahi.
Himahleh kuapeuhin hiai a theih kei leh, amah leng theih ahi kei.
Huaijiakin, ka unaute aw, thugen jaw lunggulh ngial unla, pau theihlouhte a thugen leng kham kei un;
Himahleh bangkim kilawm tak leh diktaka hih hi hen.
Huan, unaute aw, Tanchin Hoih ka honhilh jaw ka honthei sak nawn ding a; huai Tanchin Hoih na nakipahpih ua, huaimah ah na ding ua;
Kon thu hilh pen na mawk gintak uh a hih louha, pom kichian na hih uleh huai mahah hotdam lelin na om uhi.
A masapenin ken ka muh sam tuh nou kon hilh sawna; huchia, Kris Laisiangthou bangbanga i khelhnate jiaka a siha,
A vui ua, Laisiangthou bangbanga ni thum nia kaihthoha a oma,
Kifa kianga a hongkilaka, huai khita sawm leh nihte kianga a kilak thute.
Huai khitin unau za nga sanga tam kiangah a kilak nawna, huaite laka mi, a tam jaw tutanin leng a dam lai ua, khenkhat bel a ihmuta uhi.
Huai khitin Jakob kiangah a kilak nawna; huai khitin sawltak tengteng kiangah.
Huan, a tawppenah, a hunlou banga piang, keimah kiangah leng a kilaka.
Kei jaw sawltak laka neupen, Pathian saptuamte ka sawi jiaka sawltaka chihtuak louh ka hi ngala.

Himahleh, Pathian hehpihna jiakin ka hihhih ka hita; huan, a hehpihna honpiak a thawnin a om keia, huchih naksangin, amau tengteng sangin ka sem gim jaw ahi; himahleh keimah kian ka sem keia, Pathian hehpihna ka kianga omin a sem jaw hi.
Abang abang hitaleh, ken leng, amau leng, huchiin ka gen jel ua, huchiin nou leng na gingta uhi.
Huan, Kris thu misi laka kipan kaihthohin a om chih a honhilh ngal uleh, bangchidan ahia na lak ua khenkhatin, Misi thohnawnna himhim a om kei, na chih uh?
Misi thohnawnna himhim a omlou ahihleh, huai Kris leng kaihthohin a om kei ding hi.
Huan huai Kris kaihthoha a om kei leh, i thugen uh bangmah lou ahi dinga, na gin uleng bangmah lou ahi ding hi.
Ahi, Kris a kaithou chih Pathian i theihpih jiakin, Pathian lam thu ah theihpih juauthei leng i honghi ding hi, misite kaihthoha a om kei uleh, amah leng a kaithou kei dinga.
Misite kaithoha a om kei un jaw, Kris leng kaihthohin a omta kei ding.
Huan, Kris kaihthoha a om kei leh, na gin uh bangmah lou ahi dinga, na khelhna uah na om ni louhlouh uh ahi ding.
Huai ahihleh, Krisa ihmu sate a mangthangte uh ahi ding hi.
Tu damsung kiaa Kris tunga lametna i neih injaw mi tengteng dia mi hehpihhuai pen i hi ding hi.
Himahleh, Kris misi laka kipan kaihthohin a om taktak ahi, ihmute laka kipan gahmasa a na hita hi.
Mi khat jiaka sihna a hongom jiakin mi khat jiak mahin misi thohnawnna leng a hongomta ahi.
Adam ah mi tengteng a si mahbang un, Kris ah mi tengteng hihhinin leng a om ding uhi.
Himahleh, amau hun chiat jel ah: Kris tuh gah masapente ahia; huai khit chiangin a hongpainawnna ah Kris ate.

Huai khit chiangin a tawp a hongtung ding; huai hun chiangin, vaihawmna tengteng leh, thuneihna leh thilhihtheihna tengteng a hihman nungin, Pathian kiangah, Pa kiang ngeingei ah gam tuh a pe ding hi.
A melmate tengteng a khe nuaia a koih masiah aman vaihawm ding ahi ngala.
Melma nanungpen a hihmanga om ding tuh sihna ahi.
Aman a khe nuaiah bangkim a koih ngala, himahleh, A nuaiah bangkim koihin a om, a chihin, a nuaia bangkim koihpa a pang kha kei chih a kimugige ahi.
Huan, a nuaia bangkim koiha a om hun chiangin, Tapa mahmah leng a nuaia koihin a om dinga, Pathian tuh bangkima bangkim a hih theihna dingin
Huchi bang ahih kei in, misite adinga baptisma a tansak uh bang a chihna uh hi ding ahia? Misite kaihthoha a om louh hial ding uleh, bang achia amau adia baptisma tansak uh ahia?
Bangjiakin ahia, kei leng dak kal chiha lauthawnghuaia ka om?
Unaute aw, Kris Jesu i Toupaa ka honsuanna sialin, Ni tengin ka si, ka chi ahi.
Mihing danin gen leng, Ephesa khua a gam sate kilaipih ka hih leh, kei din bang a phatuam ding? Misi kaihthoha a om kei ding uleh nein dawn leng ake, jingchianga si ding hi ve hangin.
Khemin om kei un; Lawm gilouten omdan hoih a hihgawp nak uhi.
Kizentakin halh unla, thil hihkhial kei un; khenkhatin Pa Pathian theihna himhim na neikei uh; huai tuh na zumna ding ua ka gen ahi.
Himahleh, kuahiamkhatin, Misi bangchin kaihthoh ahi ding uh? Pumpi bangchi bang puin ahia a hongsuah ding? a chi ahi ding e.
Nang mi hai, nangmah mahin na tuh leng, a sih phot keileh hihhinin a om sama.
Huan, chi na tuhin a pumpi hongom ding pen ahi keia, a tang lel na tuh zo nak, buh tang hiam, chi dang tang hiam ahi thei hi.
Himahleh, Pathianin amah deih bangbangin pumpi a pia hi, a tang chih kiangah amah pumpi chiat.
Sa tengteng sa chi khat ahi kei ua; mihing sa a tuama, gamsa sa a tuama, vasa sa a tuama, ngasa sa a tuam ahi.
Vanlam pumpite leng a oma, leilam pumpite leng a om, himahleh vanlam pumpite thupina a tuama, leilam pumpite thupina a tuam,
Ni thupina a tuam, kha thupina a tuama, aksite thupina a tuam; aksi leh aksi leng a thupina uh a tuam ngala.
Misite thohnawnna leng tuabang ahi. Muattheia tuhin a oma, muattheiloua kaihthohin a om.
Pahtawilouha tuhin a oma, thupitaka kaihthohin a om. Hatloua tuhin a oma, thilhihtheihna neia kaihthohin a om.
Salam pumpi-a tuhin a oma, khalam pumi-a kaihthohin a om. Salam pumpi a om leh khalam pumpi leng a om.
Huchiin, Mi masapen Adam tuh mihing a honghia, chi-a gelh ahi; Adam nanungpen bel hinna pepa kha a honghi a.
Himahleh, khalam a om masa keia, sa lam a om jaw; huai zohin khalam pen a om hi.
Mihing masapen leia siam, leimi ahia; mihing nihna pen vanmi ahi.
Leia siam mihing bang tuh, leia te leng ahi ua; vana mi bang tuh, vanate leng ahi uhi.
Huan, leia siam batna pen i put bangin, vana batna pen leng i pu sam ding uhi.
Unaute aw, sa leh sisanin Pathian gam a luah theikei dinga; muat theiin muat theilou a luah sam kei ding, chih, ka gen ahi.
Ngai un, thuguk ka honhilh ding hi: i vek un i ihmu khol kei dinga, himahleh i vek un pengkul nanungpen gin chiangin, sawtlou kalin,
Mitphiat kal louin, hihlamdangin i om vekta ding; pengkul ging ding ahi ngala, huchiin, misite tuh muat theiloua kaihthohin a om ding ua, eite leng hihlamdanin i om ta ding hi.
Hiai muat theiin muat theihlouhna a silh ding ahi a, hiai sitheiin leng sihtheihlouhna a silh sam ding ahi.
Huchia, hiai muattheiin muatheihlouhna a silha, hiai sithein sihtheihlouhna a silh hun chiangin, huai hun ngeingeiin, zohnain sihnaa valh zouta, chih thugelh a hong tung ding.
Aw sihna, na zohna koia omta ahia? Aw sihna na gu koia omta ahia?
Sihna gu tuh khelhna ahia; khelhna thilhihtheihna tuh dan ahi.
Himahleh, i Toupa Jesu Kris jiaka zohna honpepa Pathian kiangah kipahthu om hen.
Huaijiakin, ka unau deihtakte aw, kip takin, hihlin vuallouhin, Toupa nasep phatuam ngai taka sem gigein om un, na sepgimna uh Toupa ah a thawn ngei kei chih na thei ngal ua.
Huan, mi siangthoute adia thohlawm thu jaw, Galatia gama saptuam pawlte kianga thu ka piak bangin nou leng na hih sam un.
Ni sagih ni masapenin mi chihin, vualjawlna na muh bang jel un koih khol chiat unla; ka hong chianga thohlawm lakkhawm himhim a om louhna dingin.
Huan, na hehpih thilpiak uh Jerusalem khuaa hohpih dingin ka hongtun chiangin kuapeuh hoih na chih ua lai na piak uh ka sawl ding hi.
Huan, ka hohna dinga kilawm a hihleh houh, kei toh a hoh ding uhi.
Huan, Masidonia gam ka tot suah khit chiangin na kiang uah ka hong dinga; Masidonia gam lah ka tuan suak himhim dia.
Nou kiangah ka tam nilouh kha thei hi, phalbi suang teng houh ahi khamaide, koi peuha ka hohna ding ah nouten non khak theihna ding un.
Tua pai kawm lela honmuh malam ka ut keia, Toupan lem a sak leh na kiang ua sawltsim tam ka lamen ngala.
Himahleh Pentikost tanin Ephesa khua ah na tam nilouh ding hi,
Kong lianpi, phatuampi sepna ding keia din a kihong ngala; huan, doumite leng tampi a om uhi.
Huan, Timothi a hongtun leh lauthawng loua na kiang ua a omna dingin pilvang un; ken ka sep bangmahin Toupa na a sem ngala.
Huaijiakin, kuamahin musit kei uhen; ka kianga a hong theihna dingin khamuang takin khajaw unla; unaute toh amah na muh ka lamen ngala.
I unau Apollo thu jaw, unaute toh na kiang ua hong dingin ka chial ngial hi, himahleh, tun jaw hong a ut het keia; a lemtan hun chiangin a hong ding hi.
Kiveng unla, ginna ah ding kip unla, kihihhang unla, hat takin om un.
Na hih peuhmah uh itnaa hih hi vek hen.
Unaute aw, Stephena inkuanpihte jaw Akhaia gama gingta makaite ahi ua, mi siangthoute na sem dingin a kipia uh chih na thei uhi;
Huchibang mite kiangah leh, na sepa panpih leh, semgim peuhte kianga lut dingin kon hasuan ahi.
Huan, Stephena te, Fortunate te, Akaika te, a hong ujaw, ka kipak ahi, na om louh uleng kithei loua honbawl jiak un.
Amau ka lungsim leh na lungsim uh honhihhalh ngal ua, hichibang mite jaw kipahpih un.
Asia gama saptuam pawlten chibai a honbuk uhi. Akuila leh Priskilla, a in ua saptuam kikhawmte toh in Toupa ah chibai tampiin honbuk uhi.
Unau tengtengin chibai a honbuk uhi. Tawp siangthouin chibai kibuk chiat un.
Kei Paula in hiai chibai bukna keimah khut mahmaha ka gelh ahi.
Kuapeuhin Toupa a it keileh hamse thuakin om hen. I Toupa a hongpai hi.
Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na kiang uah om hen.
Kris Jesua ka itna na vek ua lak ah om hen. Amen.
Paula, Pathian deihlama Kris Jesu sawltak leh i unaupa Timothi in: Korinth khuaa Pathian saptuam omte kiangah, leh Akhaia gam tengtenga mi siangthou om tengtengte kiang ah:
Pathian i pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pathian leh Pa, hehpihnate Pa leh khamuanna tengteng Pathian, phatin om hen.
Pathianin koumau honkhamuanna ngeiin gimthuakna peuhmaha omte leng ka khamuan sam theihna dingun, aman ka gimthuaknate uah a honkhamuan jel hi.
Kris thuaknate tampitak ka tan bangun, Kris jiakin khamuanna leng tamsem ka tang uhi.
Himahleh, gimthuaka ka om uleh, noumau khamuanna ding leh hotdamna ding ahia; huan, khamuana ka om uleh, ka thuak bang uh na thuak chiangua na theih ua na khamuanna ding uh ahi.
Huan, gimthuakna tang samte na hih bang un, khamuanna tang samte leng na hi uh chih ka theih un, ka hon lamet sakna uh a kip ahi.
Unaute aw, Asia gama ka tung ua gimthuakna tung na theih louh uh ka deih kei uh, huchia, nakpitaka thuakzoh vual louha, hin himhim leng lamen lou khop hiala delhdena ka om uh.
Ahi, sihna thupukna mutain ka kingai hial uhi; himah leh huai tuh koumau kimuang loua misite kaithoupa Pathian ka muan jawk nading uh ahi;
Aman huchibang sih lauhuai lakah honhunkhetaa, a honhunkhe nawn ding; a honhunkhe nawn jel ding chih amah tungah kalametna uh ka nga uhi.
Nou leng thumna a non panpih luat ding uh ahi, huchiin tampite thumna dawnna vualjawlna piaka ka om chiangun koute jiakin mi tampiin kipahthu a gen ding uhi.

Ka suan uh jaw hiai ahi, ka sia leh pha theihna thu uh theihsak, siangthouna leh Pathian dikna neiin, sa pilna ah hi louin, Pathian hehpihna hi jawin khovel ah ka gamta ua, nou lam ah ka gamta hoih nawn sem uhi.
Na sim theih uleh na theihtheih ding uh lou ngal thu dang himhim na kiang uah ka gelh kei uhi; a tawp phain ka thu uh na theihsiam uh ka lamen lai uhi,
Theihsiamna tan na neihtak bangun, i Toupa Jesu ni chiangin, noute kon suan theih bangun nouleng koute nonsuang thei sam ding uhi.
Huan, huai gintakna neiin, na kiang uah hong masa leng ka chi a, kipahna thuahnih na neih theihna ding un,
Noumau tawn kawmin Masidonia gamah pai jel leng la, Masidonia gama kipana na kiang uah hongkihei nawn leng la, huan Judia gama ka hohna ding ah noumau khakin om leng, leng ka chi a.
Huchiin, huchibang ka ngaihtuah laiin ka lungsim kip louhdan lang sak hia ka hih? Ahihkeileh, Ahi, chih leh, Ahi kei, chi tuaktuak dingin, thil hih ka tup nak pen khovelmi bangin hia ka tup?
Ahihhangin, Pathian a muanhuai bangin, noumau lama ka thu uh tuh, Ahi, chih leh, Ahi kei, chih ahi kei hi.
Abang abang hi hen aw, Pathian Tapa Jesu Kris, a thu kei leh Silvana leh Timothiin na lak ua ka gen un, Ahi, leh Ahi kei, a chi tuaktuak kei ngala, amahah jaw thil teng teng Ahi, chih ahi gige hi.
Pathian thu chiamte tengtengin amahah, Ahi, chih a mu vek hi. Huaijiakin ahi Pathian thupina dinga amah jiaka, Amen, ka chih uh.
Huan, Krisa noumau toh honhihkippa leh kou honsawlpa Pathian ahi;
Amah jaw honchiamtehpa leh, i lungtanga khamna Kha honpepa leng ahi.
Himahleh, ka kha tunga theihpih dingin Pathian ka sam ahi, noumau honhawi dingin ahi Korinth khuaa ka hongtak louh jaw.
Na ginna uh honthuneih khum hilou-in, na kipahna ding ua nou tawh sem khawm ka hi jaw uhi; ginnaa ding kip na hi ngal ua.
Himahleh, keimah lam thu ah jaw hiai ka natum chiltelta ahi, lungkham nadia na kiang ua hong nawnta lou dingin.
Ken ka honhihlungkham leh, ka hihlungkhampen mah louin kuana hia kei honhih kipak ding leh?
Huchiin, huai mahmah ka gelh ahi, huchilou injaw, ka hongin ka kipahna dingte lakah lungkhamna ka mu zo kha dinga; ka kipahna jaw na vek ua kipahna ahih ka hon gintak sak chiat ngala.
Khitui tampi ke kawmin, lungtang haksa leh lauthawng pipia ka gelh ahi; huai tuh hihlungkhama na omna ding uh ahi keia, na tung ua itna thupi zosem ka nei chih na theih jawkna ding uh ahi.
Himahleh, kuapeuhin mite ahih lungkham leh, keimah kia honhihlungkham ahi kei a, (ka hih luat louhna dingin) na vek un a honhihlungkham phet chiat ahi jaw hi.
Huchibang mi adin tampiin a gawt uh a kihunta ahi.
Huchiin na ngaidam un na khamuan zota ding uh ahi, huchilouinjaw bangchichi hiamin mi huchibang a lungkham luatnain a valh zou kha ding.
Huchi a hih jiakin amah lama na itna uh hihkip dingin ka honngen ahi.
Hiai jiak mahin leng ka gelh ahi, bangpeuhmah thu na man uleh, na man louh uh theihchetna dingin.
Banglam peuha mi na ngaihdam uh, ken leng ka ngaidam sama; ken leng ka ngaihdam khitsa jaw, bangpeuh ka na ngaihdam tak leh, noumau jiakin Kris maah ka ngaidam ta ahi.
Huchilou injaw setanin nuamtak honsa khading ahi; a tup lah i haih ngal kei ua.
Huan, Kris Tanchin Hoih gen dinga Troas khua ka tun in, Toupaa kongkhak honsakin ka oma;
Himahleh ka unaupa Tita ka muh louh jiakin ka kha lam ah jaw muanna himhim ka nei tuan kei a, huchiin, amaute kam phain ka khena, ka pawta, Masidonia gamah ka paita hi.
Himahleh, Kris vualzohnaa honpi jelpa leh, koutea mun chiha amah theihna gimnamtui theisakpa Pathian kiangah kipahthu om hen.
Hotdam lelteah leh mangthang lelteah Pathian adin Kris gimnamtui ka hi ngal ua;
Pawl khat te adin sihna lakah sihna ding gimnam ka na hi ua, pawl khatte din hinna laka hinna ding gimnam ka na hi uh. Hiai bangte adin kua ahia ching zou ding?
Mi tampiin Pathian thu jaw mite khema sumsinnaa a zat bang un jaw kou ka zang ngal kei ua; chihtak ngial jawin, Pathian sawl hijawin, Pathian mitmuhin Kris ah thu ka gen jel uhi.
Koumau kigenhoih ka pan nawn dekta ua hia? Ahihkeileh, na kiang ua piak ding hiam aw, na kiang ua kipan hiam genhoihna lai, mi khenkhat adia a kiphamoh bangin, kou din a kiphamoh sam dia hia?
Noute ka lai uh, na lungtang ua gelh, mi tengteng theih leh sim na hi uhi;
Kris lai, kou hon gelh sak laituia gelh hilou, Pathian hing Kha gelh hijaw, suangpeka gelh hilou, sa lungtang peka gelh hijaw na hi uh chih chiantakin na taklangta ngalua.
Huan, Pathian lamah huchibang muanna Kris vangin ka nei uhi;
Bangpeuh koumau akipana pawta sim dingin koumau kiain ka chin uh ka chi kei ua; ka chin theihna uh tuh Pathian kianga kipan ahi jaw.
Amahmahin thukhun thak nasemte hi dingin honchingsaka; a lai thu gelh lel nasemte ding hilouin, a Kha nasemte din ahi jaw hi; lai thu gelh lelin jaw ahihlum nak ngala, Khain bel ahihhing nak ahi.
Mosi mel a vak jiakin Israel taten a mel a en gige theikei ua, huai thupina a mang hiaihiai a; sihna nasepna suanga laimal gelh bawn, huchi tela thupi-a a tun leh,
Kha nasepna pen bangchi pheta thupiin a tung de aw?
Siamlouh tansakna nasepna bawn a thupi leh, diktatna nasepna thupi lamah a thupi zo mahmah ding ahi.
Hihthupia omsain hiaiah jaw thupina himhim a neita ngal keia, thupina thupijawin a khuh tak jiakin.
Mangta hiaihiai bawn thupia a tun leh, om gige ding tuh thupia tuamin om zo mahmah ding ahi.
Huan, huchi bang lametna ka neih jiakun hangtaka pan ngamna ka nei uhi,
Mosi hihbangin ka hih keiua, aman jaw thupina mangta hiaihiai man tawpna Israel taten a et gige louhna ding un a mai maikhuhnain a khuha;
A lungsim ubel hihkhauhin a oma; tuni tanphain thukhun lui a sim un khuhna ngeina tuh hawk louhin a om gige ngala, huai khuhna tuh Kris ah hihmangin a omta hi.
Himahleh, tuni tanphain Mosi Laibu a sim peuh chiang un a lungtang uah khuhna a om gige hi.
Himahleh, a lungtang uh Toupa lama a ngat peuh chiangun khuhna tuh lakmang a hita ding hi.
Huan, Toupa tuh huai kha ahia, Toupa kha omna peuh ah noplenna a om jel hi.
Huchiin, eite jaw i vek un mai khuh louin limlang banga Toupa thupina tangsawnsak jelin, amah kibatpih ngeingeia om dingin hihlamdanin i om jel; hiai tuh Toupa akipan i muh ahi; Amah tuh Kha ahi
Huchi a hih jiakin hehpihna ka muh bang jel un hiai nasepna ka neih jiak un ka lungke kei uhi;

Thil zumhuai kiselte tuh ka pampaih zota ua, zekhemna thu ka zang kei ua, Pathian thu tuh mi khemna dingin ka zang kei ua, thutak theisakin Pathian mitmuhin mi chih sia leh pha theihna mit ka tungsak jaw uhi.
Himahleh, ka Tanchin Hoih uh khuha a om leh, mangthang lelte ah ahi khuha a om;
Kris, Pathian batpih, a thupidan Tanchin Hoih vakin amau a salh vak theih louhna dingin, huaite ah hiai khovel Pathianin gingta loute lungsim a sukmial sakta hi.
Koumau thu ka gen ngal kei ua, Kris Jesu Toupa ka gen jaw uhi, koute leng Jesu jiakin sikha ka hih uh leng ka gen jel uhi.
Jesu Kris melah Pathian thupidan theihna vak honpe dingin, miala kipan vak a vak khe ding, chi pa Pathianin I lungtangte sal vakta ngala.
Himahleh, thilhihtheihna thupina koutea hi loua, Pathiana a hih theih jawkna dingin, huai gou tuh leibel peuh ah ka kem uhi.
Khat lam khat lama nehden in ka om ua, himahleh, ningkitelin ka om tuan kei uh; mangbangin ka om ua, himahleh ka lungke tuan kei uh;
Sawiin ka om ua, himahleh, taisanin ka om tuan kei uh; khet pukin ka om ua, himahleh, hihmangin ka om tuan kei uh.
Ka pumpi uah chiklai peuhin leng Jesu sihna ka pu jel ua, Jesu hinna leng ka pumpi ua a lat theihna ding-in.
Koute hingdama om nalaite Jesu jiaka si dinga matsakin ka om gige ua Jesu hinna leng kasa sithei ua a lat theihna dingin.
Huchiin, koute ah sihnain a sem gige a, nou ah bel hinnain a sem gige ahi.
Ahihhangin, Ka ginga, huaijiakin thu ka gen ahi, chih gelhp ginna lungsim ngei pui, kou leng ka ging ua, huaijiakin thu leng ka gen uhi;
Toupa Jesu kaithoupan koute leng Jesu ah hon kaithou sam dinga, noumau toh amah omna munah honding sak ding chih theiin.
Bangkim noumau hoihna ding ahi ngala, hehpihna mi tam jaw jiaka hihkhana oma, Pathian thupina dinga kipahthugenna nakpi taka a khansak theihna dingin.
Huai thujiakin ka bah kei uhi; i po lam mihing jaw jawngkhal hiaihiai mahleh, i sunglam mihing pen ni tanga bawlthak jelin a om jaw ahi.
Ka gimthuakna neukha uh, tu mitphiatkal sung kia om dingin, thupina thupitak khawntawna dingin a honbawl sak hulhul ahi;
Thil muh theihte en louin, thil muhtheihlouhte ka en zo ngal ua; thil muhtheihte jaw sawtlou kal ading ahi a, thilmuhtheihlouhte bel khantawn ading ahi ngala.
I omna leia in pen hisiatin om mahleh, vanah, in, khutta lamlouh, khantawna om ding, pathian akipan in kip inei uh chih i thei ngal ua;
Vana kipan i omna ding silhthuah ut mahmahin hiai in ah thum cihtakin i thum gige ngal ua;
Huchibanga silhin om leng vuaktangin i omkei ding uhi.
Eite hiai ina i om sungin gikpuain thum petmahin i thum ngala, silh loua i ut jiak ahi keia, silhthuaha om i ut jiak ahi jaw, sitheipen tuh hinna valh zoha a om theihna dingin.
Huan, huaia mahmah dinga honsutuahpa Pathian ahi, khamna kha honpepa.
Huchiin, pumpia i om laitengin Toupa kiangah i om kei chih theiin, muangtakin i om gige uhi.
Mu theia pai louin, ginnain i pai zo jel uhi.
Muangtakin i om, huan pumpia om loua Toupa kianga om i ut jaw hi.
Huaijiakin, omin, om kei leng, amah kipahpih lam mi hih i tum chinten ahi.
Mi chihin, pumpia thil hihte a sia a phain, i hih bangbanga i muh chiat theihna dingin, Kris thukhenna tutphah maah hihlatin i om vek ding uh ahi.
Huchiin, Toupa kihtakna dan theiin mihingte ka zol jel uhi, Pathian kiangah bel latsakin ka om ua, na sia leh pha theihna uah leng latsaka ka om uh ka lamen ahi.
Na kiang uah ka kigen hoih nawn uh ahi keia, lungtang lam hi loua, dinmun lam lel suangte, bang ahi hiam dawnna ding na neih theihna ding un kou lamah suan theihna honbawlin ka gen jaw uhi.
Ka hai u leh, Pathian adin ahi a; ka pi u leh, noumau adin ahi ngala.
Kris itnain honsawl teitei ahi; hichin ka ngaihtuah uh: Mi tengteng sih sikin mi khat a si a, huaijiakin mi tengteng a si uhi;
A hingte leng amau adia a hin nonlouh ua, a sih sik ua sia thounawn adinga a hin jawkna ding uh ahi, mi tengteng sih sika a sih.
Huchih ahih jiakin tuban kou jaw salamah kuamah ka thei nawngta kei ding uh; sa lamah Kris na theita mahle ung leng; tun jaw ka theita kei uhi.
Huchih ahih jiakin, kuapeuh Krisa a om leh, thilsiam thak a honghi a; thil luite a mangta a; ngai un, a hongthakta uhi.
Himahleh, bangkim Pathian kianga kipana pawt ahi a; aman Kris jiakin amah toh kituakin honbawla, kituahna nasepna a honpia hi;
Huchiin, Pathianin Kris ah khovel amah toh kituaknawnin a bawla, a tatleknate uh tatleknaa seh sak louin, kituahnawnna thu a honkem sak ahi.
Huaijiakin, Kris sika palai ka hi ua, Pathianin koute zangin a hon ngen ahi; Pathian toh kituakta un aw, chiin, Kris sikin ka hon ngen uhi.
Amah ah Pathian diktatna i honghih theihna dingin, khelhna himhim theilou amah tuh Pathianin eite jiakin khelhnain a bawl hi.
Huan, Pathian hehpihna phattuam pih loua na tan louhna ding un, amah seppih kouten kon ngen petmah uhi.
Hun kipahhuai ah kon ngaikhiaa, hotdamna ni ah kon panpih, a chi ngala. Ngai un, tu hun kipahuai ahia; ngai un, tu hotdamna ni ahi.
Ka nasepna uh dema om louhna ding in banglam peuhah kuamah puk lohna ding himhim ka bawl kei uhi;
Pathian nasemte bangin bangkim ah mi mit tungin ka om zo jel ua, nakpia kuhkalna ah bang, haksatna ah bang, taksapna ah bang, lunggimna ah bang,
Vuakna ah bang, hentaknaah bang, buaina ah bang, sepgimna ah bang, ihmutmohna ah bang, gilkialna ah bang;
Siangthouna bang, theihna bang, dohtheihna bang, chitna bang, Kha siangthou bang.
Itna taktak bang, thutakna bang, leh Pathian thilhihtheihna bang, neiin; taklam leh veilama diktatna galvante zangin;
Thupina leh pahtawi louhna, min-gensiat leh mingenhoihna ah leng;
Mikhemte banga bawlin ka om ua, mi diktat hi ngalin; mi theih tham louh bangin, min thangtak hi ngalin; si dekdek bangin, ngai dih ua, ka hing ngal ua, vuak bangin, hihlup ngal louhin;
Lungkham bangin, himahleh kipak gige ngalin; genthei bangin, himahleh bangkim hau ngalin.
Korinth-te aw, na kiang uah ka kam uh ka ka ua, ka lungtang uh a zata.
Koumau henchipin na om kei ua, noumau na thildeihlam uah na kihenchip jaw uh.
Huchiin kon piak bangbang honpe thuk sam dingin tate kianga gen bangin ka gen a hi-nou leng n alungtangte uh zasak sam un.
Ginglou mite toh kituak loupia hakkol po khawmin om kei un; diktatlouhna leh diktatnain bang ahia kikopna a neih uh? A hihkeileh, mial leh vakin bang ahia kithuahna a neih uh?
Belial leh Kris inleng bang ahia kituahna a neih uh? Ahihkeileh, ginglou leh gingmin bang ahia tankhawm a neih uh?

Milimte leh Pathian temple-in leng bang ahia kituahna a neih uh? Eite jaw Pathian hing temple i hi ngal ua; Pathianin, Amau ah ka om dia, amau ah leng ka pawt dia; huan, a Pathian uh ka hi dia, amau leng k amite ahi ding uh, a chih bangin.
Huaijiakin, A lak ua kipanin hong pawt unla, a tuamin om un, thil sianglou himhim khoih kei un, Toupan a chi, huchiin, kon kipahpih dia,
Nou din na Pa uh ka hi dia, nou leng kei din tanu tapa na hi ding uh, Toupa bang kim hihtheiin a chi.
Huchiin, deihtakte aw, huai thuchiam i neih jiak un, sa leh kha buahna tengteng ah i kisiangsak ding uh, Pathian laudan siam kawma siangthouna hih kimin.
Na lungtang uah mun hon awn un; kua tungmah ah ka khial kei uh, kuamah ka hihgawp kei uh, kuamah tungah hamphat ka tum kei uhi.
Huai tuh siamlouh nou hongtangsak dingin ka chi kei; sih leh sih chiata, dam leh dam chiat dingin ka lungtang uah nou kon vom uh chih tu-ma zekin ka genta hi.
Nou lamah jaw ka pau ngamdan a thupia kon suandan a thupi hi: khamuanna in ka dima, ka haksatna tengteng uah nuamsain ka dimlet a.
Masidonia gam ka tun un leng ka sa un muanna himhim a nei tuan kei a, khat lam khat lama hihgimin ka om zota ua; po lam kisualnate bang a oma; sunglam launate bang a om hi.
Himahleh, nuaisiaha omte khamuanpa, Pathianin,

Tita hongnain hon khamuanta a; a hongna kiain ahi keia, na lungjuandan te uh, na kahdante uh, ka tunga na phattuamngaihdan te uh honhilhin, noumaua a khamuanna mahin leng a honkhamuanta ahi; huchiin, ka kipak nawn sem hi.
Ka laikhakin honhihlungkham mahleng, ka kisik kei hi; a tungin ahihleh ka kisika, huai laikhakin nou a honhihlungkham chih ka theih jiakin; himahleh sawtlou kal kia ahi a.
Tun jaw ka kipak ahi, hihlungkhama na om jiak uh ahi keia, kisikna dinga na lungkham jiak un ahi jaw hi. Koumau jiaka bangmah na tan louhna ding un Pathian deihlam banga hihlungkhamin na om ngal ua.
Pathian deihlam banga lungkhamnain hotdamna dingin, kisikna a bawla, kisikhuai thil a tun kei; khovel lungkhamna inbel sihna abawl zo nak hi.

En mah un, Pathian deihlam a lungkhamnain bangchibang chihtakna, bangchibang kihahsiang nopna, bangchibang ki-awilouhna, bangchibang patauhna, bangchibang lunggulhna, bangchibang phattuamngaihna, bangchibang gawtna ahia nou-a dia hontuttak. Bangkim ah huai thu ah na siang uh chih nakihihlang ta uhi.

Huchiin, na kiang uah gelh mahleng, a gilou hihpa jiakin ka gelh keia, a gilou thuakpa jiakin leng ka gelh sam kei, ka tung ua na phattuam ngaihdan uh Pathian mitmuha na kiang ua theihsaka a om theihna dingin ka gelh ahi jaw hi.
Huaijiakin, khamuannain ka omta him ua; koumau khamuanna kia lou ah leng, Tita kipahna jiakin ka kipak nawn sem ua, nou tengtengin a lungsim na hihhalh sak tak jiakun.

A kiangah banglam peuhah leng noumau honsuang mah le ung, ka zahlak ngal kei ua, zahlak nak sangin bangkim, na kiang ua thu taktak a ka gen jel bang un, Tita maa a kon suan uh tuh thu taktak a honghita ngei hi.
Huan, na vek ua a thu na mandante uh, lau leh ling kawma amah na kipahpih dante uh thei gigein, a lungsim tuh noumau lamah a nak ten nawnsem ta ahi.
Thil bangkim ah na tung ua ka muan jiakin ka kipak ahi.
Huan, unaute aw, Masidonia gama saptuam pawlte laka Pathian hehpihna piak pen ka honthei sak ding uhi;
Huchia haksathuakna zeetna thupia a kipahna uh dimlet leh nakpia a gentheihna uh dimlet tuh, a thilphalna thupi uh a honghih danbang.
A neih bang un, ahi, a neih bang sang ua thupiin leng, amau thuthu un apia uh chih theih pih ka hi,
Hiai hehpihna leh misiangthoute nasepsakna thua nakpi taka honngen ngutngutin.
Huai leng ka lamet louh bang un ahih ua, Pathian deihlamin, amau mahmah Toupa kiangah leh kou kiangah a kipe masa phot ua;
Huchiin, tumaa a patsa, hiai hehpihna leng noumaua hihkim nalai dingin Tita ka ngen hialta ua.
Huchiin, bangkim ginna bang, thugen siamna bang, theihna bang, phattuamngaihna tengteng bang, non itnate uh na huah bang un, huai hehpihna leng na hauh theihna dingun thanop suah un.
Thupia bangin ka gen keia, midang phattuamngaihnain na itna uh gildan leng chian dingin ka gen ahi jaw.
I Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna. a gentheihna jiaka na honghauh theihna ding un hau mahleh noumau jiak ngeingeia hong genthieh takdan, na thei ngal ua.
Huchiin, huaiah ka ngaihdan bang ahia ka gen hi: kum khat paitaa na hihpat kia uleng hilou-a na ut pat uh tuin buchingsakta le uchin nou-a din a hoihpen ahi.
Huchiin, ut dinga kimanna a om bangin, na neih bang jel ua tangtunna leng a omtheihna dingin, tunah jaw hih tangtungta un.
Kimanna pen a om phot leh, mi a neih louhpi hi louin, a neih bangdan jela a piak tuh kipahpih tuak ahi ngala.
Midang a gim louh ua, nou na gimna ding un ka chi ahi keia.

Kibatlualna dingin, na hauhna u tuh tulaiin a taksap uh awnghukna a honghiha, a hauhna uleng na taksap awnghukna uh a honghih sam theihna dingin ka chi ahi jaw, huchiin, kibatlualna a hongom thei ding hi;
A khawm tamin a valin a neikei a, a khawm tawmin leng a tasam tuan kei, chih gelh bangin.
Huan, nou kon-awlmohdan bangbang Tita lungtanga pe jel Pathian kiangah kipahthu om hen.
Ka ngetna uh a sang ngeia; himahleh ka nget jiak kia uh hi louin, amah mah phattuamngai tak ahi a, amah thuthuin na kiang ua hoh dia pawt dingin a kisa hi.
Huan, amah toh unaupa kon sawl ding ua, amah tuh tanchin hoih lama a phat thu uh saptuam pawl tengteng ah a thangsuak hi;
Huchi lel leng ahi keia, Toupa thupina ding leh ka hoihdeihna uh ensak dinga hiai hehpihna thu a ka nasepna ua kou kianga zin vialvial sam dinga saptuam pawlte seh sam him leng ahi hi.
Hiai thilpiak ka hawmna lam uah kuamahin a hondem louhna ding un ka pilvang uhi;
Toupa ngaihdan kiain hi louin, mihing ngaihdana leng thil kilawm ka ngaihtuah khol jel uhi.

Huan, a kiang uah ka unaupa uh ka sawl ding ua, amah tuh thil tampitak ah phattuamngai tak ahi chih tamveipi ka theichianta uhi, tu khola houh nou a hontaksan mahmah jiakin phatuam a ngai nawn sem hi.
Tita a hih leh, ka lawm leh noumau lama ka naseppih ahi a; huan, ka unaute uh a hih leh, saptuam pawlte sawltak, Kris thupina ahi uh.
Huaijiakin, na it uh chih theihna leh, kon suanna uh theihna tuh saptuam pawlte maah a kiang uah hihchian un.
Misiangthoute adia thilpiak thu jaw na kiang uah ka gelh a kiphamoh kei:

Na kimandan uh ka thei ngala, huailam thu ah jaw, kum khat a hita Akhaia gam thu kimansain a omta, chiin, Masidonia gama mite kiangah ka honsuang jela; huchiin, na phattuamngaihna un a lak ua mi tampi a tokhalhta hi.
Hiamahleh, huailam thu ah jaw kon suanna bangmah lou a honghih louhna dingin unaute ka hoh sak jela, ka gen bang taka kimansaa nana om theihna ding un.
Huchilou injaw, Masidonia gama mi kuate hiamin honzuih zenzen uleh, kimansa loua honmuh ua leh, kou-nou kon chi kei uh-hiai kon ginna uh lamah ka zahlak kha ding uh.

Huaijiakin, unaute bel nou kianga hong masaa, hoih taka thilpiak na chiam kholhte uh na bawl khol dinga, nget kiphamohin ka gingta hi, huai tuh laksak teitei bang hi loua, phal taka piak bang jawin mansaa na omna ding un.
Ahihhangin huailam thu ah jaw, theh tawmin a at tawm nading, theh tamin a at tam nading hi.
Mi chihin it pipi-a pe louin, piak louh theih louh banga leng ngaihtuaha pe tuan louin, a lungtang ua a tup bang jel un pe chiat heh; Pathianin kipak taka pe mi ahi, a it.
Huan, Pathianin hehpihna chitengin na tunguah a vukthei ahi; huchiin, nou bangkim ah a hun ngail nei gigein, nasep hoih chiteng adingin na hau thei ding uhi;
A hawm jaka; gentheite kiangah a piaa; a diktatna khantawnin a om gige, chih gelh bangin.
Huan, thehpa kianga a chi pepa leh nek dinga tanghou pepan na theh ding uh chi tuh a honpe dia a hon hihpung sak dinga, na diktanna gahte uh leng a honhih pung sak ding.
Thilphalna chiteng, kou jiaka Pathian kianga kipahthu genna pen nei dinga, bangkima hih hauha omin,
Hiai sepsakna nain misiangthoute taksapna awng te a huksak kia leng ahi keia, Pathian kianga kipahthu genna tampi hiin, a luang let nalai ahi;
Hiai nasepnaa etkhiak a om in Kris Tanchin Hoih lama na thugin uh na zuih dan thu uleh, amau ading leh mi tengteng adia thilpiaka na thil phaldan un Pathian na hihthupi ding uh ahi;
Amau ngeiin leng na tung ua Pathian hehpihna thupi mahmah jiakin, nou adia thum sak kawmin a honngai ngail uhi.
A thilpiak gen zohvual louh jiakin Pathian kiangah kipahthu om hen.
Huan, kei Paula, na lak ua na mitmuh ua thunuailut taka oma, na kiang ua om louh taka noumau lama khauh ngal nakin, Kris lungnemna leh nunnemnain honngen ahi;
A hi, na kiang ua ka om chiangin, khenkhat sa banga oma honsepte tunga hang taka om ka tup ngamna bangin, kon khauhkhum akul louhna dingin kon ngen ahi.
Sa ah om mahleng, sa kidou bangin i dou kei ua,
Eite kigalvannate jaw sa leng ahi keia, kulhpi kip tak phelna dinga Pathian jiaka thilhih thei tak galvan ahi jaw.
Lunga gel pansante leh thil sang chiteng Pathian theihna dal dinga sang taka bawlte i phuk jel; ngaihtuahna chiteng Kris thumanna sikhaa piin;
Na thumandan uh hihkima a om chiangin, thumanlouhna tengteng phula ding nangawn aleng mansaa omin.
Na mitmuh ua, thil omte en jel un. Kuamahin Krisa hia a kigintak leh, hiai tuh amah ngaihtuah nawn hen, amah Krisa hi mahbangin, koute leng ka hi sam uhi.
Ka thuneihna uh (nou hihsiatna ding ahi keia, noumau bawl hoih jawkna dinga Toupan a honpiak) suang nawn semsem mahle ung ka zahlak kei ding uhi.
Ka lai khakte-a nou honhihlau tum banga ka lat louhna dingin huai ka chi ahi.
A laikhakte jaw a gikin, a khauha, a pumpi lam bel a jawngkhala, apau leng a hawmthohhuai ahi, a chi ngal ua.
Ka om mang chiang ua ka laikhakte ua ka thu gelh uleh, huailaia na kiang ua ka om chiang ua ka hih ding uh a kibatlouhna a om kei chih huchibang miten a theisiam ding uh ahi.

Khenkhat amau kiphatte lakah ka kisim khawm ngam kei ua, amau toh leng ka kitenpih ngam sam uh ahi keia, ahihhangin, amau jaw amau leh amau kitehin, amau leh amau kitehpihin lungsim neilouin a om uhi.
Kou jaw ka tehna hun val un ka uang kei ding uh, Pathianin uk a hontang saka, huai tehna bang jelin ka uang zo ding uhi, noumaute leng uk hial dinga tehna.
Uk phal louhpi honuk bangin ka huap lian lo ngal kei ua; Kris Tanchin Hoih genin na kho pha un leng ka hongpai uhi.
Ka tehna hun val uh, midang sepgimte jaw, ka suang kei ua; na ginna uh a khandan bang jelin, na lak ua ka louma uh nakpitaka hihletin leh om chih lametna ka nei jaw uhi,
Midang loumaa a sepsa suang louin, na khen lam gam uh phaa leng Tanchin Hoih ka gen theihna ding un.
Himahleh, a suang peuhin Toupa suang hen.
Amah kiphatin phat a loh ngal keia, Toupan a gen hoihin phat a loh jaw ahi.
ka hai deuhna ah nouten non thuaktheih uh ut hi nange: A hi, thuak leng non thuakthei ua.
Pathian hawmthohnaa, thikthuse khopin ahi nou kon hawmthoh; Kris kianga nungaksiangthou banga ka honpiak theihna dingin, pasal khat kon hawisak ngala.
Himahleh, gulin a zuau pila Evi a khem bangin, Kris lama takna leh siangthouna akipan bangchi hiamin na lungsim uh a hihse kha ding uhi, chih ka lauthawng ahi.
Khattei hongpaia Jesu dang, a thu ka gen ngei louh uh, a gena, kha lamdang na muh ngei louh uleh, tanchin hoih lamdang na san ngei louh uh, na san un tuh, kipe baih lua na himah kei ding uhia.
Hiai sawltak lianpente tuh banglampeuh ah leng phak louh ka kigingta kei hi.
Thugen ah jaw pau zat siam kei mahleng leng theihna ah jaw huchibang ka hi kei; ahi, kong bangkim ah, leh thil tengteng ah, noumau lamah ka kilangsak uhi.
A hihkeileh, Pathian Tanchin Hoih a thawn lela kon hilh jiaka tawisana na om theihna ding ua ka kihihniamin thil ka hihkhial ahia?
Na na uh ka sep theihna dingin amau akipana loh lain, saptuam pawl dangte ka lok ahi;

Huan, na kiang ua ka oma, ka taksap laiin, kuamah kon hihbuai kei a; unau Masidonia gama kipana hongpaiten ka taksapawng a honghuksak ngal ua: bangkimah noumau hihbuai louin ka kibawla, huchibangin ka kibawl jel ding hi.
Kris thutak keimaha a om bangin, hiai ka kisuanna jaw Akhaia gam lama hihdaihin om kei ding.
Bangjiakin? kon it louh jiak hia? Pathianin kon it a thei.
Huan, a nasep uh kisaktheihpiha, kou sep bang banga sem kichite kichihna ka bulkalh theihna dingin ka sep tuh ka sem zomjel ding.
Mi huchibangte jaw Kris sawltaka kibawl tawma, sawltak takloute, nasemmi mi khem hatte ahi ngal ua.
Huai a hihleh a lamdang kei; Setan hial leng vak sawltakin a kibawl tawm nak ahi.
Huaijiakin, a nasemte leng diktatna nasemmiin kibawl tawm mahle uh thil lamdang ahi kei; huaite tawpna jaw a thil hih bang jel un ahi ding hi.
Ka chi nawn: kuamahin mi haiin honsep kei uhen: himahleh non seh vanglak uleh, ken leng neu chik beka ka kisaktheih sam theihna dingin mi hai bang takin honpom un.
Ka gen jaw Toupa thuneihnain ka gen keia, ka kisaktheihna hai bang takin ka gen jaw ahi.
Mi tampiten khovel thilte a kisaktheihpih jiak un kei leng kong kisathei samdeh.
Nou bel mi pil na hih jiak un mihaite lungkim takin na thuakzou jel ua.
Min salin honbawl le uh, honne gai le uh, nuamtak honsa le uh, amau leh amau na tunguah kiliansak le uh, na mai uah honbeng le uh, na thuakthei jel ngal ua.
Huchi dia jaw hatlou lua mah kei ve ua! -kisitin ka gen ahi.
Hebrute ahi u hia? kei leng ka hi. Isrealte ahi u hia? kei leng ka hi. Abraham suante ahi u hia? kei leng ka hi.
Kris nasemte ahi u hia? (mi hai bangin genta leng) ka hi sem; sep gimna bang ah thupi semin, suangkulha tanna ah bang thupi sem in, vuakna ah bang akan avalin, sihnaah bang tamveipi.
Judate lakah vuakna khat veia sawmli chinglou nga vei ka tuaka;
Thumvei chianga khetin ka oma, khatvei suanga denin ka oma, thumvei long siatna ka tuaka, jan khat leh ni khat tuipi ah taihmangin ka om a,
Khualzinna ah tam veipi, luite laka lauhuai, suammite laka lauhuai, ka chipihte laka lauhuai, Jentelte laka lauhuai, khopia a lauhuai, gamdaia lauhuai, tuipia lauhuai, unau takloute laka lauhuai;
Septawlna leh sepgimna, ihmutmohna ah tamveipi, gilkial leh dangtakna ah, anngawlna ah tamveipi, khosik leh vuaktang a omna ah bang.
Huan, hiaite bana kigen lou saptuam pawl tengteng ka ngaihtuahna ni tenga hondelh gige leng a om hi.
Ka hat louh pih louha hat lou kua a om ngei? kei lungnoplouhpih louha hihpuk kua a om ngeia?
Suang ding ka hihvang lakleh ka hatlouhna lam thilte ahi ka suan ding.
Toupa Jesu Pathian leh Pa, khantawna hamphaa omin, juau ka gen louhdan a thei hi.
Damaska khua ah kumpipa Areta nuaia gamukpan honman dingin Damaskate khopi a veng saka;
Huan, tohletah kulh julah bawmin honkhai khia ua, huchiin, a khuta kipan ka suakta hi.
Ka kiuangsak himhim ding ahi. Ka metna ding jaw om het keia, himehleh Toupa kianga kipan kilakna leh theihsakna thu ka gen zom mai deh.
Krisa mi khat ka thei; huai mi mah tuh kum sawm leh kum li a hita (pumpiin hia a om ka theikei, pumpi louin hia a om ka thei sam kei: Pathianin a thei) van thumna hialah lak touhin a oma.
Huan, huai mi mahmah (pumpiin hia a om, pumpi louin hia ka theikei; Pathianin a thei; )
Paradisa lak touha a om dan, thugen vual louh, mihing gensiang loute a ja chih ka thei.
Mi huchibang a hihleh ka suang ding; himahleh, ka hatlouhna lou jaw keimah ka kisuang kei ding.
Suan ut mahleng mi hai ka hi kei ding, thu taktak ka gen dek ngala; himahleh ka kidek ding, huchilou injaw kuapeuhin honmuh bang uleh ka laka thu a jak bang sang un honngai thupi zo kha ding hi.
Huan, theihsaknate a thupi mahmah jiaka ka kingaihlet luat louhna dingin saa ling honpia ahi, Setan sawltak, khutthak nuhna dia honzang ding ngei tuh; huchilouin jaw ka kingailian kha ding hi.
Huai thil tungtang thuah hon awngsut theihna dingin Toupa thumvei ka ngena.

Huan, aman ka kiangah, Ka hehpihna nang din a hun hi, ka thilhihtheihna hat louhnaah ahi hihkima a om a chi a. Huchiin, Kris thilhihtheihna ka tunga a om theihna dingin kipak takin ka hatlouhna te ka suang zo ding hi.
Huaijiakin, Kris jiaka hatlouhna ah, liamna ah, taksapna ah, sawina ah, lungngaihna ah ka kipak jel ahi; ka hatlouh peuhpeuhin ahi ka hat jawk.
Hai ka nahita: nou hai lou theilou in non bawl ua ahi: kei pen noumau honpahtawi ding kei ve, bangmah hi kei mahleng, banglam peuhah leng sawltak lianpente ka pha lou kei ngala.
Sawltak hih chiamtehnate kuhkalna chiteng toh chiamtehnate, thillamdangte, thilhihtheihnate-in na lak ua hih ahi taktak ve.
Bang lamah ahia, saptuam pawl dangte sanga niam jawa bawla na omna uh? keimah ngeingeiin kon hihbuai louhna lam thu ah a hih kei ngalleh. Huai diklouhna ah honngaidam un.

Ngai un, hiai na kiang ua hong dinga ka man a thum veina ding ahi; huan, kon hihbuai kei ding, nou-a zong ka hi ngal keia, noumau honzong ka hi jaw; taten nu leh pate dingin a kholkhawm sak ding uh ahi keia, nu leh pate dingin a kholkhawm sak jaw ding uh ahi ngala.
Huan, ken jaw na kha ua dinga kipak takin ka zang bei dinga, ka kizangbei vek lai ding hi. Akan avala nou kon it jiakin, ken itna tawmjaw muhna-in ka nei ahi maw?
Ahihhangin, keimahmahin honhihbuai lou hita leng, ka lepciah a zekhemna-in kon man, na sa uh ahi dinge.
Na kiang ua ka sawlte lakah kuahiam bek zangin nou kon hamphatpih ahia?
Tita ka hasuana, amah toh unaupa ka sawl ahi. Tita-in nou a honhamphatpih himhim hia? Kha kibanga gamta khawm ka hi kei ua hia? Khap kibanga pai ka hi kei ua hia?
Tusung tenga noumau kianga kou leh kou kiphalam non sa ua, Kris ah Pathian mitmuhin ahi thu ka gen uh. Himahleh, deihtakte aw, bnagkim noumau bawl hoihna ding ahi hi.

Ka hong chiangin bangchihiama ka ut banga kon muh kei leh kei deih bangin non mu kei kha ding uh, chih leh, banchihiamin kitainate, kihazatnate, hehnate, kilangkhennate, kigennate, kihuaukhumnate, kingaihlet luatnate, buainate a hongom kha ding,

Chih leh ka hong chiangin ka Pathianin na lak uah honhihzahlak nawnin, tualama thil hihkhialte laka thil sianglou hihte, kingaihte, hukte chinga kisik tuanlo mi tampite ka kah kha ding e, chih, lau kei ve.
Hiaipen na kiang a ka hong a a thum veina ding ahi. Theihpih nih hiam, thum hiam kamah thu chiteng hihkipin a om ding.

Ka genkholtaa, a nihveinaa na kiang ua ka om laia ka gen bangin, tun ah na kiang ua om louin, tumalama thil hihkhialte kiangah leh midang tengteng kiangah ka gen khol non dek hi, ka hong nawn leh ka hawi kei ding, chih;
Kris keimaha thugen jelpa pen zeetna na zon jiak un, amah jaw noumau lamah a hatlou keia, na lak uah thil hihthei tak ahi jaw hi.

Amah jaw hatlouhna jiakin kilhdenin a om ahi a, himahleh, Pathian thilhihtheihna jiakin a hing gige ahi. Kou leng amahah ka hat kei uhi, himahleh, noumau lama Pathian thilhihtheihna jiakin a kiangah ka hing samding uh.
Ginna ah na omna uhiam chih noumau ngeingei ki enchian jel un. Ahihkeileh, noumau ah Jesu Kris a om chih noumau ngeingeiin na thei chian kei ua hia? deihlouh na hih kei ngal uleh.
Kou tuh deihlouin ka om kei uh chih na thei lai ding un ka gingta hi.

Huan, thil himhim na hihkhelh louhna ding un Pathian kiangah ka ngen jel uh; huai tuh koute deihhuaia ka lat theihna ding uh ahi keia, nouten a kilawm peuhmah na hih theihna ding uh ahi jaw, kou jaw deih louh bangin om mah le ung.
Thutak gum ding lou injaw, thutak dou dingin bangmah ka hih theikei uhi.
Koute ka hatlouh lai un leng noute na hat un ka kipak uhi; hiai thumnaa ka nget uh ahi: noumau hoih lama na kibawlphat uh.

Huaijiakin hihse ding hi lou a bawlhoih ding jaw a, Toupan thuneihna honpiak bang jelin, na kiang ua ka om chianga nakpi taka ka hontaihilh louhna dingin, na kiang ua ka om louh laiin hiai thu ka gelh ahi.

A tawppenin, unaute aw, kipak takin om un, Na omdan uh bawlhoih unla; konngetna limsak unla, khamuang takin om unla; lungsim munkhat pu unla, lunglualtakin om unla; huchiin itna leh lemna Pathian na kiang ua om ding ahi.
Tawp siangthouin chibai kibuk un.
Mi siangthou tengtengin chibai a honbuk uhi.
Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna, Pathian itna, Kha Siangthou kithuahpihna na vek ua kiangah om hen. Amen.
Paula, sawltak-mihingte, sawl khiak hi louin, mihing vanga leng hi sam lou, Jesu Kris leh misi laka pata kaithoupa, Pa Pathian vangin ahi jaw-
Leh ka kianga unau om tengtengten, Galatia gama saptuamte kiangah:
Pa Pathian leh i Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen;
Amah tuh, i Pathian leh a Pa deihdanin, tulai khovel gilou tak laka a honsuahtak sak theihna dingin i khelhnate adingin amah a kipeta hi;
Pathian kiangah thupina khantawnin om hen. Amen.
Kris hehpihna jiaka nou honsampa huchi guiha tanchin hoih tuam lama na kisuansan uh lamdang ka sa hi;
Tanchin hoih dang a om ahi keia; noumau honhihbuaiin, Kris Tanchin Hoih hihlamdan ut kuate hiam a na om uh ahi.
Himahleh, koumau hiam aw, van akipana hongsuk angel nangawn hiam inleng, tanchin hoih na kiang ua ka gensa pen louhngal uh tanchin hoih dang himhim honnahilhta a om uleh, hamse lohin om hen.
Tumaa ka gen bangmah un, tua gen nawn ding ka hi. Tanchin Hoih na muh pen louhngal uh, tanchin hoih dang kua peuhin nou a honhilh leh, hamse lohin om hen.
Ahihleh, tuin mihing deihsakna hia ka zon Pathian-a? Ahihkeileh, mihing ahi maw lungtaisak ta tup? Mihing nana lungtaisak lai hitaleng, Kris sikha ka hi kei ding.
Huchiin, unaute aw, ka tanchin hoih genpen mihing lam thu ahi kei chih ka hontheisak hi.
Mihing kianga kipana ka muh leng ahi kei, mi honhilh leng ka hi sam kei, Jesu Kris kilakna jiaka mu ka hi zo ngala.
Judate sabiakdan ah, nidanglai ka omdan na thei khinta ngal ua, huchia Pathian saptuamte nakpi taka sawiin ka hihbuai ngitngeta:
Huan, ka pipute thusiah tunga Phatuam ka ngaihtuan khol jiakin Judate sabiakdan lamah leng ka chite laka ka khanvual tampite ka na khengta hi.
Huan, ka nu gilsung akipana honhihtuampa leh a hehpihna jiaka honsampa Pathianin,
Jentelte laka a tanchin hoih ka hilh theihna dingin a Tapa tuh lunghi taka keimaha a kilaksak laiin, sa leh sisan toh kidong louin,
Sawltak ka hih maa sawltak na nahisate kiangah Jerusalem khuaa vahohtou tuan louin, Arabia gamah ka pai mang pah ngal jaw a; huan, Damaska khua ah ka kik nawnta hi.
Huan, kum thum a bei nungin Kifa veh dingin Jerusalem khuaah ka vahoh tou a, a kiangah ni sawm leh ni nga ka tama.
Sawltak dangte bel Toupa unau Jakob kia loungal, kuamah ka mu kei hi.
(Ngai him dih ua! na kiang ua thu ka gelhte khawng Pathian mitmuh ah leng ka juau kei hi. )
Huai nungin Suria leh Silisia gam khawngah ka hongpai hi.
Huan, Judia gama saptuamte Krisa omte meltheih ka hi nai kei lailaia,
Tumalama honsawipan tumaa khatvei ginna thu a hihbuai tuh tuin a gen zota, chih mi gen kia a ja uhi.
Huan, keimah jiakin Pathian a hihlianta uhi.
Huan, kum sawm leh kum li a bei nungin Tita mahleng pi samin, Barnaba toh Jerusalem khuaah ka vahohtou nawna.

Huan, theihsakna jiakin ka vahoh toua, Jentelte laka tanchin hoih ka tangkoupih tuh amau ka vahilha; himahleh mi lian deuhte tuh a tuamin ka hilha; huchilouin jaw a thawnin ka tai kha dinga, ahihkeileh taithawnta kana hi kha dinga.
Himahleh, Tita ka kianga om leng Grik mi himahleh zeksumsak teiteiin a om kei hi.
Huai tuh unau taklou, a guka piluta omte, sala honlak theihna ding ua Kris Jesu-a noplenna i neih uh enkhe dinga honglutte jiakin a hi-
Himahleh tanchinhoih thutak tuh noua dinga bittaka kep a hihtheihna dingin, amau kiangah mitphiat kal lel leng ka kipe himhim kei uhi.
Huan, hihna deuh min nei mahmahte (bangchibang hihna nei mah le uh kei adingin a lamdanna om kei; Pathianin kuamah a khentuam kei) -huai min nei mahmahten bangmah honbehlap kei uh.
Huchihnaksangin, zeksumte kianga tanchinhoih Peter kianga kepsaka a om bangin zeksumlouhte kianga tanchinhoih kei kiangah kepsakin a om chih a theih takun,
(Zeksumte sawltak hi dinga Petera sempa mahin Jentelte sawltak hi dingin kei ah a sem ngala)

Huan, hehpihna kei kianga piaka om a muh takun, Jakob te, Kifa te, Johan te, khuam muanhuai hi-a minneiten, amau bel zeksumte kianga hoh dinga, kou Jentelte kianga hoh dingin, kei leh Barnaba tuh kithuahna khut taklam honpe zota uhi.
Gentheite ka theihgige lel uh a deih ua, huai tak tuh hih ka tum chiltel him ahi.
Huan Kifa tuh Antiok khuaa a hongpai laiin demhuai mahmaha a om jiakin a maitang ngeiah ka kalha.
Mi kuate hiam Jakob kianga kipana a hongpai ma un amah tuh Jentelte kiangah an a, ne jel hi; himahleh a hongtun tak un zeksumte a kihtak jiakin pang nawnta louin a kihihtuamta ngala.
Juda dangte leng a lepchiah chiat sam ua, huchiin Barnaba hilhial leng a lepchiahna ua pimangin a omzou hial ahi.

Himahleh, tanchin hoih thutak bangin a om gina kei uh chih ka theihin, Kifa kiangah, a vek ua maah, Nang Juda mi na hi ngala, Judate om banga omlou in, Jentelte om banga na om jawk leh, bangchidanin ahia Jentelte Judate om banga na om sak teitei nak? ka chi hi.
Ei jaw Jentel mi khialte hi louin, Juda mi hima piang i hi ua-

Himahleh, dan thilhihte jiakin mi siamtangin a om kei hi, Jesu Kris gin jiak kia in siamtangin om jaw uh chih i thei ngala-en leng dan thilhih jiak hi louin, Kris ginna jiaka siamtanga i om theihna dingin, Kris Jesu tuh i ging ahi; dan thilhihte jiakin mihing himhim siamtanga om lou ding uh ahi ngala.
Ahihleh Krisa simatanga om tum kawmpia eite mikhialte i nahih nak leh, Kris tuh khelhna omsakpa hita ve maw le'! Hilou hial.
Ka thil hihsiatte ka lam nawn jel injaw, talekpa ka hi chih ka kitheisak phet ahi ding hi.
Pathian lama dia ka honghin theihna dingin, kei jaw dan jiakin dan lamah ka si khinta ngala.

Kris toh kilhdenin ka omta; himahleh ka hing ahi; keimah pen ka hita keia, Kris tuh keimah ah a hing ahi jaw; huan, tua saa ka hin bel ginnaa hing ka hi-Pathian Tapa, a honita ka sika kipepa, ginna ah.
Pathian hehpihna tuh bangmah louin ka bawl kei, dan jiaka diktatna a om ngal injaw Kris a thawna si ahi ding hi.
Galatia gama mihaite aw, kuan honbumhai a maijena? na mitmuh ngei ua Jesu Kris kilhdena kichian taka latsak a hihhih toh.
Hiai leltak kon dong ding: Dan thilhihte jiakin hia Kha tuh na muh uh, na ngaihkhiak ua na gintak jiak un?
Hichitelin na hai umaw? Khaa pan khinta ngalin, sain na khin ding ua hia?
Thil huchi zahzah a thawna thuak na hi umaw? -a thawn hi taktak hita leh.
Huan, na kiang ua Kha honpepa leh na lak ua thillamdang hihpan dan thilhihte jiakin hia a hih, na ngaihkhiak ua na gintak jiak un.
Abrahamin Pathian a gingtaa, huan, huai ginna tuh diktatnaa simsak a hihtak mahbangin.
Huchiin thei un, ginnaa omte, huaite mah tuh Abram tate ahi uhi.

Huan, laisiangthouin, Pathianin ginna jiakin Jentelte siamtangsak dingin a kisa chih theikholin, Nangmah ah namte vualjawl sakin a om ding uh, chiin, Abraham kiangah tanchin hoih tuh a nagenkholta hi.
Huchiin ginnaa omte tuh ginna nei Abraham toh vualjawl sakin a om sam nak uhi.
Dan thilhiha kinga peuhmahte tuh hamse nuaiah a om ngal ua; Dan laibua thugelh tengteng banga hih gige lou peuhmah tuh hamsiatin om hen, chia, gelh ahi ngala.
Tuin Pathian mitmuhin kuamah dana siamtang a om kei chih a lang kilkel hi. Ginnaa mi diktat tuh a hing ding, chih a hih jiakin.
Himahleh dan tuh ginnaa kinga ahi kei; Huchibanga hihpa tuh huaitein a hing ding, chih ahi jaw.
Kris tuh ei sika hamsiatin a hongoma, dan hamsiatna akipanin a hontan kheta-Singa khailup peuhmah jaw hamsiat hi hen, chih gelh ahi ngala-
Huchia Abraham tunga vulajawlna tuh Kris Jesu jiaka Jentelte tunga hongtun theiha, hucia kha chiam tuh ginna jiaka i muh theih nadingin.
Unaute aw, mihing hih dan gen leng: mihing thukhun lel leng, hihkipsa nung a phel kei ua, behlap leng a behlap ngeikei uhi.

Huan, Abraham kiangah ahi, thuchiamte piak a nahih, a chisuan kiangah leng. Mi tampi tungthu gen bangin, Chisuante kiangah leng, a chi keia; mi khat tungthu gen bangin, Nang chisuan kiangah leng, a chi ahi jaw, huai tuh Kris ahi.
Huan, huchiin ka chi ahi: huai thuchiam tuh bangmahlou suaksaka hihmang dingin, thukhun Pathianin ana hihkipsa tuh, anung kum za li leh kum sawnthum khita hongom danin a hihmang theikei hi.
Gouluah ding tuh dan jiak a hih leh, thuchiam jiak a nahita kei dinga; himahleh, Pathianin thuchiam jiakin ahi, Abraham kiangah a napiak.
Ahihkeileh, bangchithua dan tuh om ahia leh? Chisuan, thuchiamna tuh, a hongom masiah tatleknate jiakin behlapin a oma, angelte zanga palai khuta hihkip ahi.
Huan palai himhim mi khat lakah palai ahi ngei kei hi; Pathian bel khat ahi.
Ahihkeileh, danin Pathian thuchiam te a kalh ahia? Kalh lou hial, dan mi hihhingthei himhim piaka omkhin hita leh, diktanna tuh dan jiakin a om ngei ding hi.
Himahleh, Jesu Kris gin jiaka thilchiam tuh a gingtate kianga piak a hih theihna dingin laisiangthouin khelhna nuaiah bangkim a khakkhum vekta ahi.
Himahleh, ginna a hongtun main, ginna hongkilang ding ah khakkhumin, dan nuaia ven i nahi uhi.
Huchiin ginna jiaka siam i tan theihna dingin dan tuh Kris kiang lama honna chilpa ahi hi.
Himahleh, tua ginna a hongtun nungin, honchilpa nuaiah i omta kei uhi.
Kris Jesu gin jiakin Pathian tate na hi vek ngal ua.
Na lak ua Krisa baptisluta om peuhmah tuh Krisin na kithuamta ngal ua.

Huaiah tuh Juda mi a om theikeia, Grik mi leng a om theikei; huaiah tuh bawi a om theikeia, bawi lou leng a om theikei; huaiah tuh pasal leh numei leng a om theikei hi. kris Jesu ah na vek un pumkhat na hi ngal ua.
Huan, Krisa na hih uleh, Abraham suan, thuchiam banga gouluah dingte na hi uhi.
Himahleh, hichiin ka chi: Gouluah dingpa tuh bangkim tungah toupa hi mahleh, naupang a hih laiteng bawi toh bangmahin a kidang tuan kei hi;
A pa hun seh a hongtun masiah a donpate leh a kempate nuaiah a om jaw hi.
Huchibangin ei leng naupang i hih laiin, khovel thubulte nuaiah bawi hihna ah i om uhi;
Himahleh, a hunbi a hongkimin, Pathianin a Tapa, numei suanin, dan nuaia hongsuakin, a honsawl kheta,
Ta hihna i muh theihna dinga, dan nuaia omte tankhe dingin.
Huan, tate na hih jiak un Pathianin a Tapa Kha tuh, Abba, Pa, chia kikouin, i lungtang uah a honsawl hi.
Huchiin bawi na hita keia, ta na hi zota; huan, ta na hih leh, Pathian vanga gouluah dingpa na hi hi.
Himahleh tua Pathian na theih louh lai un, a piandan mawng ua Pathian hi lou hialte bawi na hi ua.
Tua Pathian na hontheih nung un bel-hi lou, Pathian theihmi na honghih nung un, chih ding ahi jaw-thubul jawngkhal leh namanloua bawia om nawn na utnate uh lama, bangchi dana kihei nawn na hi ua?
Nite, khate, hunte, kumte na tang jel ua.
Na tunguah tha ka seng thawn kha ding e aw, chih ka lau ahi.
Unaute aw, ka hongngen ahi, keimah bangin om un, kei leng noumau bangin ka om ngala, ka bangmah na suse kei uhi.
Tanchin Hoih na kiang ua ka gen masakna pen ka sa hat louh jiak ahi chih na thei ngal ua.
Huan, ka saa nou dia khemna om tuh na simmoh kei ua, na kih sam kei uh; Pathian angel bangin, Kris Jesu bang hialin na honnapakta jaw uhi.
Vangpha na kisakna uh koiah a omta aleh? Hihtheih liai hi le houh, na mit khawng uh khelkhiain na honpe khin ding uh chih ka hontheihpih ahi.
Huchiin, thu tak ka honhilhna jiakin na melma uh ka honghita ahia?
Hoih lamah hi het lou napiin phatuam ngai takin nou a honzong khe jel uhi; ahi, amau lama hon zoh theihna ding un noute hon pokhakkhiak a ut uhi.
Thu hoih lamah bel chiklai peuhin phatuamngai taka zona om gige tuh a hoih ahi, na kiang ua ka om lai kia hi louin.
Ka unaute aw, Kris noumaua siam pichinga a om masiah, nauveiin ka honvei hi.
A hi, tulaiin na kiang ua oma, ka aw hihlamdan ka ut theihdan; na tungthu uah ka mang a bang ahi.
Dan nuaia om utte aw, honhilh un, dan thu na ngaikhe jel kei ua hia?
Hichibanga gelh ahi ngala. Abrahamin tapa nih a neia, khat tuh bawinu toh. khat tuh noplennu toh.
Himahleh, bawinu laka pen tuh sa danin a pianga, noplennu laka pen bel thuchiam jiaka piang ahi, chih.
Huai thute bang, gentehna ahi; huai numeite tuh thukhun nih ahi uhi; khat tuh Sinai tanga, bawi hi dinga, ta neinu; huai tuh Hagar ahi.
Huan, Hagar bel Arabia gama Sinai tang ahi a, Jerusalem tulaia om toh kibang ahi, a tate toh bawiin a om ngal ua.
Tunglam Jerusalem bel noplen ahi; huai ngeingei tuh eite nu ahi hi.
Nang, ching, ta nei ngei lou, nuam in, nang, nauvei ngei lou, kikou khia in; pasal nei sangin lungjuangnun, tate a nei tam zo ngala, chih gelh ahi.
Huchiin unaute aw, eite Isaak bangin thuchiam tate i hi a.
Himahleh, huailai bangin tuin leng ahi; sa dana piangin tuh Kha dana piang a sawi ahi.
Himahleh, laisiangthouin bangchi bangin a gena? Bawinu tuh, a tapa toh, hawlkhia un; bawinu tapain noplennu tapa tuh gou a luahpih louh ding jiakin, a chi a.
Huchiin, unaute aw, bawinu tate i hi kei ua, noplennu tate i hi jaw uhi.
Noplen dingin Krisin a honsuaktasaktaa, huaijiakin ding kip unla, bawi hakkol ah jaw lut nawnta kei un.
Ngai un, kei Paulain na kiang ua ka gen tuh, zek na sum sak uleh Kris nou adingin bangmah phattuamna tuan hi lou ding ahi.
A hi, dan thu tengteng jui dinga bate a na hi uh chih zeksumte tengteng kiangah ka theisak nawn ahi.
Nou dana siamtan tumte aw, Kris toh kikhenta na hi uh, hehpihna na puksanta uhi.
Kou bel Kha jiakin ginnain diktanna lametna ka ngak uhi.
Kris Jesu ah bel zeksum bangmah a phatuam keia, zeksum louh leng bangmah a phatuam sam kei; ginna, itnaa sem a phatuam ahi.
Hoih takin na tai uh; thutak tuh na zuih louhna ding un kuan a hondala ahia?
Hiai khemna jaw nou honsampa kianga kipan ahi kei hi.
Silngou tawm chikin tanghou beupi a jel suakzou hi.
Kei ngaihtuahna banglouin na ngaih tuah lamdang tuan kei ding uh chih, Toupa ah ken jaw nou ka honmuang ahi; himahleh, nou honhih hai, kuapeuh hitaleh zong, a tunga thupuk ding a thuak ding hi.
Unaute aw, ken zeksum thu ngen lailai ka hihin, bang jiaka sawia om lai ka hia? Huchibang a hih ngal leh kros kisuihna tuh hihmang a hita ding hi.
Nou honhihbuaite amau leh amau kisat khe vanglak le uh ka deih ahi.
Nou, unaute aw, bawi hilou dingin sap na hi ngal ua; himahleh, na bawi hih louhna u tuh sa adinga lemtannan zang kei unla, itnain akua akua adinga kisepsakte hi jaw un.
Nangmah na kiit bangin na vengte na it ding ahi, chih thu kam khat ah dan thu tengteng kimsakin a om ngal a.
Himahleh, na kikeih ua, na kinek tuah uleh na kinekgaih louhna ding un, pilvang un.
Huchiin hiai ka chi ahi, Kha ah om un, huan sa utna tuh na hihtangtung kei ding uhi.
Sain Kha dou a ut naka, Khain leng sa dou a ut sam nak ahi; thil hih na tupte uh na hih theihlouhna ding un huaite khawng a kikalh uh ahi ngala.
Himahleh Kha pia na om uleh, dan nuaiah na om kei uhi.
Huan sa thilhihte tuh a kilang chian ahi, huaite tuh hiaite ahi uh: angkawmna, kingaihna, thanghuaina, hukna,
Milimbiakna, bumna, huatna, kinakna, hajatna, hehna, kilanna, omtuamna, gintuamna
Deihgohna, tualthahna, zumunnopna, zukhamna, hichite khawng; huchibanga thil hih chingten Pathian gam a tang kei ding uh, chia tumaa ka honhilh kholh mahbangin, ka honhilh khol ahi.
Kha gah ahihleh, itna, kipahna, lemna, thuaktheihna, migitna, hoihna, muanhuaina,
Nunnemna, kidektheihna khawng ahi jaw uh; huchibang kalh lamin dan thu piak himhim a om kei hi.
Huan, Kris Jesu-a hitaten tuh sa, a lunggulhna leh a duhgawlna toh a kilhdenta uhi.
Khaa hing i hih leh kha mahah i om ding uhi.
Kitoutuah chiata, kihaza chiatin, i kikoih lian kei ding uhi.
Unaute aw, mi takhial bangpeuh a hihlai phawkin naom leh, nou kha mite aw, Khemna ka tuak sam kha ding e, chia kiveng hoih kawmin, huchibang mi tuh nunnemna lungsim toh dingsak thak nawn un.
Na puakgikte uh kidawn chiat un, huchiin Kris dan thu na jui uh ahi ding.
Mi bangmah hi lou piin, mi lian kuama a kibawl leh, a kikhem tawm lel ahi ngala.
Mi chihin amah thilhih tuh enchian chiat jaw hen; huchia midang toh kiteha-ki-uangsak lou-a amahmaha suanhuai thil ahih theihna dingin.
Mi chihin amah puak po ding ahi ngala.
Huan, thuhilha omin thil hoih tengteng a hilhpa kiangah pe sam hen.
Khemin om kei un; Pathian jaw zekhema mawkbawl vual ahi kei; min a tuh peuh uh huaimah a at nawn ngei ding a hih jiakin.
Amah salama tuhin saa om siatna a at ding. Khalama tuhin bel khaa kipan khantawn hinna a at ding.
Huchiin, thil hoih hih chimtak kei ni; i lungkiak keileh a hun takah i at ngei ding ahi ngala.
Huchiin, lemtang hun i neihdan bang jelin mi tengteng tungah thil hoih hih ni, ginna inkuanpihte laka omte tungah hi khol diak hen.
Keimah khut mahmaha na kiang ua lai gol pipia ka hichi gelh en un.
Saa mel kilawmsak utte peuhmahin zeksuma om dingin nou a honsawl teitei nak ua; bangmah dang jiak leng ahi keia, Kris kros jiaka sawi a thuak louhna ding lel uh ahi.
Zeksumte nangawnin leng dan thu a jui tuan sam kei ua, na sa uah, suan ding a neih theihna dingun na zek uh kisum leh chih a ut lel uh ahi.
Ken jaw i Toupa Jesu Kris kros loungal ka suan louh dingdan, huai kros jiakin khovel kei adingin kilhdenin ka om hi.
Siamthak nawnna lou jaw, zeksum chih bangmah ahi keia, zeksumlouh leng bangmah ahi sam kei hi.
Huan, huai dan banga om peuhmahte tungah lemna leh hehpihna om hen, Pathian Isrealte tung ngei ah.
Tubansiah kuamahin honhihbuai nawn kei hen; ka pumpi ah Jesu chiamtehnate ka pu ngala.
Unaute aw, Toupa Jesu Kris hehpihna na kha kiang uah om hen. Amen.
Paula, Pathian deihlama Kris Jesu sawltakin, misiangthou Ephesa khuaa om Kris Jesu-a mi ginomte kiangah:
Pathian i Pa leh Toupa Jesu Kris kianga kipan hehpihna leh lemna na kiang uah om hen.
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pa leh Pathian phatin om hen. Aman vanmun khawnga khalam vualjawlna chitengin eite kris ah honvualjawlta,
Amah maia siangthou leh dembeia om dinga leitung pian maa eite honnateltak bang ngeiin.
Aman a deiha a tup bangbangin, eite Jesu Kris vanga a tate hi dingin, itna jiakin honnasepkhol khinta,
Huchi-a It-a a honpiak hondeihsakna thupi mahmah pahtawina i hih theihna dingin.
A sisan jiakin Amah ah tatkhiakna, huai a hehpihna hauhdan bangbanga i tatleknate ngaihdamna ngei i tangta hi,
Tua hehpihna tuh chillou hialin aman eite a honpeta.
A thiltup, Kris-a a gelkhiak, bangbangin a deihlam thuguk tuh pilna leh theihsiamna ngenin eite hontheisakta ngala;
Huai a deihlam thilgel bel; hunbi hongkim chianga, thil tengteng-vana omte leh leitunga omte-Kris-a gawmkhawma a suktuah vek ding tuh ahi.
Amah deihlam, a lunggel bangbanga thilbangkim semkhepa tup bang ngeiin, amah mah-ah
Koute, Kris-a ana lamen masate, a thupina pahtawina dinga hing dingin sehkholhin kana omkhinta uhi.
Huan, noute, thutak thu, na hotdamna tanchinhoih uh ngaikhiaa gin leng gingtate leng, amah ah chiamsa Kha Siangthou-a chiamtehin na om uhi;
Huai Kha Siangthou bel i gouluah ding tatna kim i luah matenga, Pathian thupina dinga, khamna ahi.
Huaijiakin ken leng Toupa Jesua ginna na lak ua om, misiangthoute tengteng tunga na kitheihsak jel uh ka najakin,
Ka thumnate ah na min uh lou-in nou jiaka kipahthu gen ka tawp kei hi;
I Toupa Jesu Kris Pathian, thupina Pan Amah theihna lam thu-a pilna leh kilakna kha nou a honpiak theihna dingin,
Huchia, na lungsim mitte uh hihvaka hongoma, na theihna ding un-huaibel, Aman nou a honsapna lametna bang; misianthoute-a a gouluah hauhsaknate bang;
Huan, a gingta eite-a A thilhihtheihna thupina tehvuallouh, huai A hatna thupi sep bang jela,
Kris-a a sepzohtak, huchia amah misi lak akipana a kaihthoha, vanmun khawnga A taklama a tutsaka,
Lalnate, thuneihnate, thilhihtheihnate, vaihawmna tengteng tung leh tu khovel kia hilou-a khovel hongtung ding nangawna minsak chiteng tung tham peka a koih laia a sepzoh chih bang.
Huan Aman bangkim a khe nuai ah a koiha, amah tuh bangkim tengteng tunga Suptuam lutangin a bawl,
Huai saptuam tuh a pumpi a hi-a, amah bang kima bangkim hihdimpa tangchinna ngei.
Nou leng na tatlekna uleh na khelhnate uh jiaka si na hih lai un a honhihhinga;
Huaite ah, tumalamin hiai khoveldan bangin na naom ua, huihkhuaa thuneihna lal, tua thumanglou tate sunga sem lelpa kha dan bangin.
Huai thumanglou tate lakah eite leng tumalamin sa duhgawlna hihin, i sa utnate bangin i om vek ua, midangte bangmahin thangpaihna taa piang him i hi uhi.
Himahleh, Pathianin hehpihna hauin a honitna thupitak jiakin,
Tatleknate jiaka si i hih hilhial laiin leng, Kris toh a honhihhinga (hehpihnaa hotdam na hita uh),
Kris Jesu ah amah toh a honkaithou-a van munte ah amah kiangah a hontusak hi:
Huchia hun hong tung ding te khawnga, Kris Jesu-a i tunga migitna neia, a hehpihna nak hauhdan tuh a etsak theihna dingin.
Ginna jiaka hehpihnaa hotdam na hi ngalua; huai leng noumaua suak ahi keia, Pathian thawnpiak ahi;
Thilhih jiak ahi kei, huchilou injaw min a suang kha ding uhi.
Thil hoih hih dingin Kris Jesu ah siamna omin, amah khut suak i hi ngalua; huai thil hoih hih tuh i khosakdan dingin Pathianin a bawlkhol ahi.
Huaijiakin, tumalama nou saa Jentelte, saa khuta sum, zeksum, a chihteun zeksumlouh, honchihte u aw,
Huchihlaiin, Kris lou-in Isrealte khua-leh-tui toh kimidangin khovel ah lametna neilou leh Pathian lou-a omin, thuchiam thukhun lakah mikhualin na om uh chih thei gige un.
Tun bel, Kris Jesu ah nou nidanglaia gamlapia omte, Kris sisana hihnaiin na hongomta uhi.
Amah tuh i kilemna ahi ngala; aman ei nihte tuh khata siamin i kikala kimelmakna banglai tuh a hihchimta,
Thusehte leh dan thupiakte a saa hihmangin; huchia nihte tuh Amaha mihing thak khata siama kilemna a bawl theihna dingin;
Huan, kros jiaka nihte tuh pumpi khata Pathian toh honkilemsak theiha, kimelmakna a beisak theihna dingin.
Huan, a hongpaiin, nou gamlapia omte kiangah lemna tanchin hoih honhilha, naichika omte kiangah leng lemna tanchin hoih a hilh sam hi.
Amah jiakin Kha kibanga Pa kiang lut theihna i nei tuaktuak uhi.
Huchiin, tun tuh zin leh leng na hi nawnta kei ua, misiangthoute toh tualsung khat leh Pathian inkuanpihte na hi zota uhi.
Kris Jesu ngei tuh a ninga suang kiphamoh pen hiin, sawltakte leh jawlneite suangphum tunga lam na hi uhi;
Amahah tuh suang lep tuam chiat, kituak tak a suktuahin, Toupa ah temple siangthou a suak hi;
Noute leng amah ah, Khaa Pathian omna ding huaia lep khawm na hi uhi.
Huchi a hih jiakin, kei Paula, nou Jentelte jiaka Kris Jesu hentain,
Nou adinga Pathian hehpihna kepna na a honpiak lam na theita ngei ding ua;
Huchia thuguk ka kianga theihsaka a omdan, tumaa tom chika ka gelh bangin.
Huaia na sim un Kris thuguk ka theihdan na theithei ding uhi.
Huaituh tulaia a sawltak siangthoute leh a jawlnei siangthoute kiangah Kha theihsakin a omta bangin, tumalamin leng mihing tate kiangah theihsakin a om ngei kei hi;
Huaituh hiai ahi, Tanchin Hoih jiakin Kris Jesu ah, Jentelte gouluahpihte, pumpi hiangte, thuchiam tanpihte ahi uhi.
A thilhihtheihna sepdan banga, a thawna piak Pathian hehpihna tuh a honpiak bang jelin huai tanchin hoih nasemtu dinga bawl ka hi.
